41013013	Apo gowau binei ma lawa atapuhi hina wihinigigiyemi . Ma apo iyawoi uyahimiyei hin'omtaibagibagi ma hina towolo kadidili po houga a siga uyahina , luyagohana apo hina tuhagaya .
41013014	‘ Apo yohola wekiwekilala naka ginouli waigola dumana ona galeya tupo waiwoiyawana uyahina e towotowolo ( taumi tu'mhiyawa ona wileta po baha geka anona ona hanapugena imahiyeya ) ma iyawoi Yudeya u tupona ona memae yaka ona lowo gae u oya .
41013015	Apo tam iyai om numa uputana una memae , yaka una lowo yagiyagina , ma ega una luilui hoi numa om gapola ubeihi .
41013016	Apo tam iyai hoi tano una wobagibagi , yaka ega om luilui binei una gunagunawilem .
41013017	Ma wiwine tu koikoiba po tu wigugu houga noka uyahina tauhi tu nugodubu .
41013018	Ma ona laupali omi lowo hougana binei , po ega houga wayau uyahina ona nenae .
41013019	Houga witai banei dumana , babana Yaubada a wiwawala uyahinei ma i nei po amalai ega kikina witai mei geka pitenana , ma houga he nenei uyahihi apega witai hina geleta meme .
41013020	Iyeta witai noka itapa Guyau hougana ega ita likukuya apo lawa atapuhi hita hilage pahihi , ma Guyau hougana apo ina likukuya , babana a lawa i inaganihi ubeihi .
41013021	Apo lawa gehouna ina paliwelemi ina pa , “ Ona galeya , geka bo noka Besinana lawana ” , ega ona itumaganeya ,
41013022	Matababana Besinana koyakoyama po tu bahapiko koyakoyama apo hina geleta po wekiwekilala po manini lawa u matahi hina wogeletehi , po Yaubada a bolu i inaganihi kikina apo hita koyamehi .
41013023	Uyahinei ona galena itete memi dewa geka uyahihi babana palihanapu atapuna amaka a bahehi uyahimi .
41013024	‘ Houga witai u mulina , “ Kabudala a kadidili apo ina tapiya ma wamahiya yayatana ina wigahugahu .
41013025	Ma yada ubonahi apo hina peu hopu mai ma yada ginouli atapuhi hai kadidili apo hina tapiya . ”
41013026	Apoma apo Lawa Moinau anai wipoyau po anai wasawasau ona gagaleu ma yaloigei a nei .
41013027	Ma apo u tu winoyanoya a himilihi hipuli atapuna , togowa mata wohepali i nae po yada a siga uyahihi po u lawa a inaganihi hina welugogonihi po hina nei uyahiu .
41013028	‘ Ani galena a paliwelemi po ona nugonugotuhuya , i galugalu hougana uyahina ta hanapugeya naka ega daona ma apo higolo ina wawala .
41013029	Yaka wekiwekilala awai a palipaliwelemi hina wawala ma ona galehi yaka ona hanapugeya u houga gunawilana ega daona ma apo ina geleta babana hoi mateta a towotowolo .
41013030	A baha duma uyahimi , geka ginoulihi atapuhi apo hina wawala tahaya ma apoma geka hapanana lawahi hina hilage pahihi .
41013031	Yada po hipuli apo hina yababa ma tau u baha apega ina yababa .
41013032	‘ Iyeta awai bo kabudala gaogaona awai apo a gunagunawilena meu ega iyai gehouna ita hanapugeya . Tu winoyanoya hoi yada ega hita hanapugeya , tau gasi ega ata hanapugeya ; Amau tunawana i hanapugeya .
41013033	Uyahinei ona gagalena imahi po ega on'eneno babana houga awai apo a geletai , ega ota hanapugeya .
41013034	Galenana mei bada gehouna ipa ina nae ina kadau , ma a tu bagibagi i otugehi po hai ututu i lawi . Ma emosi po emosi hai bagibagi i welehi , ma numa matetana tu galena itetena i paliweleya i pa , “ Una gagalena imahi ” .
41013035	‘ Uyahinei ona gagalena babana ega ota hanapugeya meka hougana apo numa taniwagana ina geletai : iyeta bolinai , bo ibigei , bo uguwa bolinai , bo malinatomtom , bo malatomtomgei ,
41013036	apo ina nei po anai enoenomi ma ina ligoholimi .
41013037	Awai a palipaliwelemi mei naka pitenana lawa atapuhi ona paliwelehi , ipa hina gagalena imahi . ’
41014001	Iyeta luwaga hi otonana , ma apo Welulagona a nugohepa tolehana uyahina hina geleta , po tolehana uyahina apo palawa ega ani lihaahanana hina dewaya . Ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi hi nugowilawila hi pa apo iyowai ma Yesu hina numa panipani gowadi po hina lihilageni .
41014002	Hi ibaabani po hi pa , ‘ Ega toleha u hinena Yesu ta panipani apo lawa hina wigawiyeta ’ .
41014003	Yesu u Betani i memae , Simona lepelo a numa uyahina hi'mam , ma wawine gehouna wedu gaimei hi dewadewaya u hinena wakatu dimudimumuna i waya po i nei , wakatuna gowana nadi ma mihana i lata duma . I neiyai po weduna i hedali po i hiwogi Yesu unubolina po i wineuli .
41014004	Ma hai bolu uyahinei gehouhi hi nugoapapoe , po hi pa , ‘ Wawine geka matababana awai ma wakatu geka i dewa guyougeya ?
41014005	Wakatu geka emoemotana hita gimalena haleya po mihana kina handele tonuga hita waya po dayadayabu uyahihi hita welehi ’ , po ega yaka wawinena hi paliyeya .
41014006	Yesu i baha uyahihi i pa , ‘ Geka wawinena ega ona palipaliwiyalutugeya . Awai uyahiu i dewadewaya naka i haki duma .
41014007	Taumi apo dayadayabu mitehi houga magomagouna ona memae po houga awai nugonugomi yaka apo ona haguhi ; ma tau apega houga daodaona ta memae .
41014008	Wawinena awai i dewadewaya naka emoemotana babana i bunabunamiu hiniu i wononogogeya apo hoi kokowaga hina huhouniu binei .
41014009	A baha duma uyahimi , yohola apo tuwegau hina guuguyeya lawa atapuhi uyahihi po hina noonoli ma gasi wawine geka a bagibagi uyahiu i dewadewaya apo hina deedeya ani nugomomota tauna binei . ’
41014010	Yudasa Isakaliyota Yesu a hewahewali magouhi 12 uyahihiyei i nae tu witalaguyaba babadahi uyahihi po Yesu wogana i talaya ipa ina nugohaleya .
41014011	Yudasa a baha hi nonoli ma hi kaoha labatana ma hi paliwitumaganeya hi pa , ‘ Apo mone to welem ’ , yaka Yudasa a gaogao i bibeiha ipa iyowai ma apo Yesu ina nugohaleya .
41014012	Welulagona tolehana uyahina ma palawa ega ani lihaahanana ma sipi hai houga omunugohi i geleta . Yesu a hewahewali hi lubayadeya hi pa , ‘ Meka tuponana u luhogaleya apo uyahina Welulagona tolehana bimgei to wononogogeya ? ’
41014013	Yesu a hewahewali luwaga i himilihi i pa , ‘ Meyagai baneina ona luiluiya hougana oloto gehouna goila talagigoilana i awawali apo ona itutuhaga , tauna ona wotagoya .
41014014	Ma numa awai o luiluiya , numana taniwagana ona paliweleya ona pa , “ Bada geka pite a baha uyahim i pa , Meka toumana hai babanoya naka uyahina apo u hewahewali mitehi Welulagona tolehana ton'ani ? ”
41014015	Ma tauna apo babanoya baneina u moyana ina wiatatiyemi po uyahina ginouli atapuna ona wononogogeya ubeita . ’
41014016	Ma a hewahewali meyagai baneina hi luiluiya po Yesu awai atapuna i bahebaheya naka pitenana ma hi tuhagaya yaka hai Welulagona tolehana hi wononogogeya .
41014017	Ma amaka aibiga , yaka Yesu a hewahewali mitehi hi nae hoi numa , hi lui po hi'mam .
41014018	Ma hai amna uyahina ma Yesu i pa , ‘ A baha duma uyahimi , uyahimiyei apo lawa gehouna ina nugohaleu tauna mitehi to'mam ’ .
41014019	Yesu a baha geka binei ma hi nugodubu duma , ma emosi po emosi Yesu i laubayadeya i pa , ‘ Iyai , nugote tau ? ’
41014020	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Apo magoumi 12 uyahimiyei tauna mitehi gaeba emosi uyahina to wohopu gogona tauna apo ina nugohaleu .
41014021	Lawa Moinau apo a hilage mei Yaubada a Buka uyahina hi gilugilumi pite ma iyai tu nugohaleu naka tauna tu nugodubu , itapa lolowa ega hita guni po ita lata apo ita haki wahaga , ma apo ina winugotootogo duma a apapoe binei . ’
41014022	Hai am uyahina ma Yesu aniani i waya po i wimaamala ma i tomutomuya po a hewahewali i welewelehi ma i ibaabani i pa , ‘ Geka hiniu ona waya ’ .
41014023	Mei gasi keyaka i waya , po i wimaamala , ma i welehi po atapuhi hi uma .
41014024	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Geka talau lawa atapuhi ubeihi Yaubada a wogatala binei apo ina kololo .
41014025	A baha duma uyahimi amalai ma i wawala po i nenae apega wine a umaya a sigana Yaubada anani taniwaga uyahina wine wouna apo tan'umaya . ’
41014026	Ega yaka hi lulougo ma hi hopu po hi gae Oliweta oyana uyahina .
41014027	Yesu i baha nae uyahihi i pa , ‘ Atapumi apo ona lowo haleu , mei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , “ Tu galena itete sipi ana ilawi ma sipi magomagouhi hina nohanoha mehi . ”
41014028	Ma u towolo meme u mulina apo a tahatahaya nae u Galili ma taumi muliugei ona nei . ’
41014029	Pita i baha i pa , ‘ Atapuhi apo hina lowo halem ma tau apega a lowo halem ’ .
41014030	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ A baha duma uyahim , uguwa geka uyahina kamkam olotona a tou apega ina wiluwagaya a sigana mala tonuga una bowiyeu ’ .
41014031	Ma Pita i baha kadidili i pa , ‘ Apeega , apo hina laihilagenim , yaka tau gasi hina lihilageniu , apega a bowiyem ’ . Ma atapuhi hi baha hi pa , ‘ Tauyai gasi , apega to lowo halem ’ .
41014032	Tauhi hi nei tano gehouna gowana Gesemani , po Yesu a hewahewali i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Geka hotanana ona memae ma tau tupona a tunae po a lupali ’ .
41014033	Ma a hewahewali tonuga i weluwinihi naka Pita ma Yamesa ma Yoni , hai wohepali tupona hi tu nae , ma Yesu i nugohelele duma ma gasi i nugowiyuwa .
41014034	Ega yaka i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Nugonugou i wiyuwa duma nugote kikina ma apo a hilage , uyahinei geka hotanana ona memae ma ona gagalena imahi ’ .
41014035	Ma Yesu i tunae tupona ma i polou hoi hipuli ma i lupali i pa , ‘ Amau , emoemotam wiyuwa geka una wihaleya .
41014036	Aba , Amau , ginouli atapuna emoemotam , yaka geka wiyuwa keyakana uyahiu una wihaleya . Tau u nugotuhu hawena ma tam om nugotuhu una dewa tagoya . ’
41014037	Yesu i gunawileya a hewahewali uyahihi po hi eneno ma i tuhagahi , po ega yaka Pita uyahina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Simona , awai binei e eneno ? Ega emoemotam kabudala gaogaona emosi una wiyaugeya ?
41014038	Ona kadidili po ona laupali ipa ega ludadana ona ialoni . Alugomi i luhogala ma hinimi hi begabega . ’
41014039	Yesu i gunawilena meya po a lupali i lilugo meya .
41014040	Ma i gunawilena meya a hewahewali uyahihi po hi eneno meme ma i tuhagahi , babana matahi hi pota duma .
41014041	Ma a gunawilana i witonugaya , ma i baha nae i pa , ‘ Iyowai yohola o eneno , ma o iyagohina , bo ? Ona galeya u houga amaka i geleta po tau Lawa Moinau hina nugohaleu tu apapoe u nimahi .
41014042	Ona towolo po ta nae babana tu nugohaleu amaka e nenei . ’
41014043	Yesu yohola i ibaabani ma Yudasa i geleta tauna a hewali gehouna . Ma lawa hi nenei naka tu witalaguyaba babadahi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga hi himilihi po Yudasa mitehi hi nei ipa Yesu hina numa panipani , a nimagawiya gapolahi kwasikwasi po anai dabalumahi hi nei Yesu uyahina .
41014044	Ma Yudasa wekiwekilala gehouna uyahihi i baheya i pa , ‘ Apo ona gagaleu ma lawana a nae po niuna a yagoyagoni , naka tauna Yesu apo ona womomohi po ona numa panipani ’ .
41014045	Hougana hi geleta po Yudasa Yesu uyahina i nenae ma i pa , ‘ U Guyau ’ , ma i tala hagauya .
41014046	Ma tu wigawiya hi nei po Yesu hi womomohi .
41014047	Ma Yesu a bolu uyahihiyei lawa gehouna a kwasikwasi i holi po tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga a tu bagibagi i lubuya po tanigana i talutuiya .
41014048	Yesu bolu i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Iyowai po a nimagawiya gapolami o nei biugei mei tau tu danene ?
41014049	Ma lolowa iyeta emosi hoi numa dalabu baneina uyahina a iatatiyana u hayami ma ega ota paniu , ma Yaubada a Buka odubona i bahebaheya geka amaka u houga i geleta . ’
41014050	Ega yaka Yesu a hewahewali atapuhi hi lowo haleya .
41014051	Ma hewali gehouna i lukaleko hota ma Yesu i witulani , po tu wigawiya nugonugohi ipa hina womomohi , po hi tapeilowoya .
41014052	Ma a kaleko hi teinagagi ma hipun'awa i lowo .
41014053	Ma tu wigawiya Yesu hi niyeya , po hi luiyeya tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga anu numa . Numana uyahina tu witalaguyaba babadahi po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi hi'mboina po ipa Yesu hina luhetaleya .
41014054	Ma Pita mulinei i wotago po i nae tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga a numa u gali hinena , po mayau i ebebala i galeya . Ma numana tu galena itetena hi lalana yaka i nae uyahihi po i tugula ma ipa ina wilalana .
41014055	Ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi po tu wiwogatala atapuhi Yesu hi igouya ipa iyowai ma a baba awai hina tuhagaya po hin'uni ma ega hita tuhagaya .
41014056	Ma tu wigou koyakoyamahi hai wibaabani ega hita dumalu , babana lawa luwaga ega hai baha emosi .
41014057	Ega yaka lawa gehouhi hi towolo po Yesu hi wigou koyakoyameya tanitaniwaga u matahi , hi pa ,
41014058	‘ Yesu iyeta gehouna to nonoli ma i pa , “ Numa dalabu geka lawa hi wogowogoya apo a hoe haleya ma iyeta tonuga u hinena a wogo meya , ega lawa nimahiyei ” . ’
41014059	Po lawa hai wibaabani ega galenahi emosi , yamoha po yamoha a nugotuhu .
41014060	Ega yaka tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga i towolo u hayahi po i baha i pa , ‘ Iyowai ? Ega emoemotana po noka lawahi hai wigou una wimiheya ? ’
41014061	Ma Yesu ega ponana ma i genuwana . Ega yaka tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga i lubayada meme i pa , ‘ Iyowai , tam Besinana lawana , Yaubada Natuna , bo ? ’
41014062	Yesu a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Ee , tau Lawa Moinau , ma yohola apo Tu maninidumana u awala hinebawana a tugutugula , ma ona gagaleu ma yaloi uyahinei a hopu mai ’ .
41014063	Uyahinei tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga uyona i gigai ma a kaleko i loloya ma i baha i pa , ‘ A baha amaka o nonoli ? Amaka ma ega tu wigou hina ibaabani a powa binei ,
41014064	babana a baha widiboga Yaubada uyahina amaka ta nonoli , ma omi nugotuhu awai Yesu binei ? ’ Ega yaka a boluhi hi pa , ‘ A baha powa binei ina hilage ’ .
41014065	Ega yaka Yesu hi howaya , ma matana hi humaya kalekogei ma hi launawatatani hi pa , ‘ Una wipiko iyai e ilawim ? ’ Ma tu wigawiya hi numa panipani po hi lawi ma hi niyeya .
41014066	Ma Pita mayau uyahina i lalana , ma tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga a tu poula wawinena i nei ,
41014067	po Pita i gagaleya ma i lalana yaka i pa , ‘ Tam Yesu lawa Nasaletagei a bolu ’ .
41014068	Ma Pita i bowi i pa , ‘ Om wibaabani ega ata hanapugeya ’ . Ega yaka Pita i lowo hopu gali matetana u liyaliyana .
41014069	Ma wawinena Pita i gagaleya mateta u liyaliyana i towotowolo , ma lawa hi lalana i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Noka lawana naka Yesu a hewali gehouna ’ .
41014070	Ma Pita i nonoli yaka i bowi meme i pa , ‘ Tau eega ’ . Ega yaka lawa hi towotowolo u liyaliyana hi pa , ‘ Moina dumana , tam Yesu a bolu babana tam lawa Galiligei ’ .
41014071	Ega yaka Pita i wigwala labatana i pa , ‘ U gwala amau , naka lawana binei o ibaabani , tau ega ata hanapugeya ’ .
41014072	Hougana naka kamkam olotona a tou i luwagaya , ma Yesu a baha Pita nugonei i gae , Yesu a baha i pa , ‘ Kamkam olotona a tou apega ina wiluwagaya a sigana mala tonuga una bowiyeu ’ . Pita i nugotuhuya ma i tou duma .
41015001	Malatomtom kikina tu witalaguyaba babadahi po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi po tu wiwogatala atapuhi hi lueeneya yaka Yesu hi numa panipani po hi niyeya Pilato uyahina .
41015002	Pilato mi Loma hai gawana tauna Yesu i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Tam mi Yudeya hai wasawasa , bo ? ’ Yesu i pa , ‘ Tam om baha naka pite ’ .
41015003	Ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi Yesu ginouli atapuna uyahinei hi wigouya .
41015004	Ega yaka Pilato Yesu i lubayadena meya i pa , ‘ Ega om baha awai hi goum ginouli atapuhi ubeihi ? ’
41015005	Ma Yesu i genuwana , yaka Pilato nugonugona i goholi .
41015006	Bolima emosi po emosi Welulagona tolehana uyahina lawa hoi numa panipani he memae ma bolu lawa awai hai luhogala uyahina apo hina winagani yaka gawana lawana apo ina lupena haleya hoi numa pani .
41015007	Bolima geka Welulagona tolehana iyetana ma hoi numa panipani lawa gehouna i memae gowana Balaba tauna witona i liwawali po omunugo binei hoi numa panipani i memae .
41015008	Bolu hi'mboina nae Pilato uyahina , po hi baha hi pa , ‘ Nugonugoiyai lawa gehouna una lupena haleya hoi numa panipani ’ .
41015009	Ega yaka Pilato hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ O luhogaleya mi Yudeya omi wasawasa a lupena haleya , bo ? ’
41015010	Pilato hai matababana amaka i galena tuhagaya , naka tu witalaguyaba babadahi , Yesu hi'mgenagenaliliyeya yaka hi numa panipani po ipa hina lihilageni .
41015011	Tu witalaguyaba babadahi lawa u nugonugohi hi wohouni ipa Balaba ina lupena haleya .
41015012	Pilato i lubayada meme i pa , ‘ Awai nugonugomi ipa mi Yudeya omi wasawasa uyahina a dewaya ? ’
41015013	Bolu atapuhi hi otu labatana hi pa , ‘ Una witakeya ! ’
41015014	Pilato i lubayada i pa , ‘ Ma powa awai i dewaya ? ’ Ma bolu hi otu meme hi pa , ‘ Una witakeya ! ’
41015015	Pilato nugonugona ipa bolu ina winugohegoyahi . Pilato i baha po Balaba hi lupena haleya ma Yesu hi wilawi ma ipa hina niyeya po hoi ani take hina tutu lawiteya .
41015016	Ega yaka mi Loma hai tu wigawiya Yesu hi luiyeya taniwaga a numa baneina u hinena , ma tu wigawiya hai bolu atapuna hi'mboina gogona mai Yesu uyahina .
41015017	Ma tu wigawiya Yesu tu wasawasa hai luilui hi wiluiya , ma a unuhau gologolowa waidonadonana hi dewaya po u unununa hi houni .
41015018	Ma Yesu hi lauguyoguyougeya hi pa , ‘ Tinani tam mi Yudeya hai wasawasa ’ .
41015019	Ma unubolina hi kodili digona uyahinei , ma hi howaya ma hi tupolou po hi wotalagae koyakoyama .
41015020	Hi luguyoguyougena woloeya ma wasawasa hai luilui hi wihaleya ma tauna a kaleko dumana hi wiluiya , ma hi niniyeya ipa hina witakeya .
41015021	Tahayagei hi nenae po lawa gehouna hi tuhagaya , gowana Simona tanogei i nenei ipa ina nae meyagai baneina uyahina . Ma tu wigawiya hi utani po Yesu anani take i awali . Simona tauna lawa Sailinagei natunatuna ololotohi luwaga Alesana ma Lupasi .
41015022	Yesu hi niyeya oya gowana Gologota , a bui naka ‘ Ununu Dobuna ’ .
41015023	Ega yaka wine mulamula waigolana mitehi hi wila emoteya ma hi weleya , ma Yesu wine noka i wihinigigiyeya .
41015024	Ma Yesu hoi ani take hi tutulawiteya ma a kaleko hi wikibugehi po hi tamihi .
41015025	Hougana Yesu hi tutulawiteya ani take uyahina mei iyeta bolina ina lauliyaliyani .
41015026	Tauna ani wigouna hi giluma geleteya hi pa , GEKA MI YUDEYA HAI WASAWASA .
41015027	Tu danene luwaga mitehi hi witake gogonehi gehouna u awala hinebawana ma gehouna u awala kehana .
41015029	Lawa liyaliyanei hi nenae ma hi bahabaha gae ma hi ununu kwadikwadiyana , ma hi palipaliyeya hi pa , ‘ Ee , u baha u pa emoemotam apo numa dalabu una hoe haleya , ma iyeta tonuga u hinena una wogomeya .
41015030	Heki , tam una luyawihi mem po ani takegei una hopu . ’
41015031	Ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi tunawahi ma Yesu hi inameya hi pa , ‘ Lawa gehouhi i wiluyagohanihi ma iyowai po tauna ega ita wiluyagohana meya ?
41015032	Itapa tauna Besinana lawana po mi Yudeya ata wasawasa , heki , geka hougana ani take uyahinei ita hopu mai po tata galeya ma tata witumaganeya . ’ Tu danene luwaga Yesu mitehi hi take gogonehi tauhi gasi Yesu hi widibogi .
41015033	Iyeta i lautipolini ma kabudala lalana i wohouni po tupo atapuna i uguguwi a sigana kabudalana i hopu po ibiga i lutipolini .
41015034	Houga noka uyahina Yesu i otu i pa , ‘ Eloi , Eloi , lama Sabatani ? ’ , anona ‘ U Yaubada , U Yaubada , awai binei u wihinigigiyeu ? ’
41015035	Ma lawa gehouhi u liyaliyana hi towotowolo , geka bahana hi nonoli po hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana Elaisiya e ototugeya ’ .
41015036	Ega yaka lawa gehouna uyahihiyei i bulili nae po baloi i waya po wine waitululuwana uyahina i wiyoli ma hige uyahinei i tupahigeya po i wiyoyoga giyeya u gamona ipa ina hanaguguya , ma i pa , ‘ Heki , ona wohouna ma tana iotonana ma apo Elaisiya ina nei po ina wiluyagohani ’ .
41015037	Yesu ponana i lata apoma i hilage .
41015038	Ma numa dalabu baneina u hinena kaleko baneina i taketake i gunalolo luwageya , u moyana ma i hopu po u babana .
41015039	Ma tu wigawiya hai taniwaga , Yesu u naona i towotowolo ma i gagaleya , ma Yesu a otu i nonoli , u mulina apoma i hawalele , yaka lawana i kawamoina i pa , ‘ Baha dumana geka lawana Yaubada Natuna ’ .
41015040	Wiwine gehouhi uheiya hi towolo ma hi gagalena nae . Gehouna gowana Maliya Magadalagei ma gasi Maliya gehouna tauna Yamesa a waligeha ma walehina Yosa hinahi , ma Salome .
41015041	Geka wiwinehi tauhi Yesu hi wotagoya po hi haguhaguya a wiwila tupo Galili uyahina . Ma gasi wiwine gehouhi Yesu mitehi Galiligei hi nei Yelusalem , tauhi Yesu a hilage matahiyei hi galeya .
41015042	Amaka aibiga po hai wononogo iyetana mi Yudeya hai dalabu binei .
41015043	Ega yaka Yosepa Alimatiyagei i nei , tauna mi Yudeya hai tu wiwogatala dewadewana , ma i otonana Yaubada a taniwaga a houga nei . Yosepa tauna lawa nugonugomotuna yaka i nae Pilato uyahina po Yesu hinina i lupaliyeya ipa ina waya .
41015044	A baha uyahina ma Pilato i goholi , po i pa , ‘ Moina amaka i hilage ? ’ Ega yaka Pilato gawiya taniwagana i himili ipa Yesu a hilage ina limoineya .
41015045	Ega yaka gawiya taniwagana i baha i pa , ‘ Ee , amaka i hilage ’ . Apoma hinina i palihaleya Yosepa uyahina .
41015046	Apoma hoi ani take i telehopuneya po kokowaga kalekonei i humaya . Kokowagana naka tapatapana hi hedali po i lui . Ma guduna gaima baneina , hi buiya po matetana hi lutomgeya .
41015047	Ma wiwine luwaga hi gagalehi ma Yesu hi houni hoi kokowaga , naka Maliya i nei Magadalagei , ma a waligeha Yosa hinana .
41016001	Mi Yudeya hai dalabu iyetana i kokoe ma malatomtomgei Maliya Magadala , ma a waligeha tauna Yamesa hinana , ma Salome , geka wiwinehi bunama dimudimumuna hi gimalaya po ipa Yesu hinina hina wineuli .
41016002	Malatomtom kikina , gaogao a iyeta tahatahayana uyahina kabudala i gelegeleta ma wiwinehi hi nae Yesu kokowagana uyahina .
41016003	Tahayagei hi nenae ma tunawahi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Iyawoi hita haguta po gaima hita beuli kokowaga matetanei ? ’
41016004	Hougana hi geleta kokowaga uyahina , ma hi galena nae po gaimana hi gagaleya naka amaka hi beula liyeni kokowaga matetanei .
41016005	Yaka wiwinehi hi lui kokowaga u hinena , ma hewali gehouna a luilui wakewakekena u awala hinebawana i tugutugula , ma hi matouta duma .
41016006	Ma hewalina i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Ega ona matomatouta . Yesu lawa Nasaletagei hi tutulawiteya ani take uyahina , tauna o bibiheya , ega geka hotana ita memae amaka i towolo meme , anani eno o galeya kokoena . ’
41016007	Ma hewalina i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Ona gunawilemi po ona nae , ma tuwegana a lawa ona paliwelehi , ma Pita ona paliweleya , ona pa , “ Yesu e tahatahaya nae u Galili ma taumi noka hota apo ona galeya mei lolowa uyahimi i bahabaha pite ” . ’
41016008	Ma wiwinehi kokowaga hinenagei hi weluhopu anai nugohelelehi po anai matoutahi hi bulibulili ma ega iyai hita paliweleya , babana matouta u nogonugohi .
41016009	Gaogao a iyeta tahatahayana uyahina Yesu malatomtom kikina ma i towolo meme po i lugeletena tahaeya Maliya Magadala uyahina , tauna Maliyana lolowa alugo apapoehi magouhi 7 Yesu i lilupa hopunehi ma i dewadewa .
41016010	Tauna tuwega i niyeya po a hewahewali i paliwelehi . Hi nugodubu po hi tutou Yesu binei .
41016011	Ma Maliya tuwega i palipaliwelehi i pa , ‘ Yesu amaka i towolo meme po mitehi to witutuhaga ’ . Ma ega hita witumaganeya .
41016012	Naka u mulina a hewahewali luwaga , tauhi tahayagei hi nenae , ma Yesu i lugeleteya tepa tapunei uyahihi .
41016013	Tauhi naka hi gunawilehi po hai lawa hi paliwelehi awai hoi tahaya ma hi gelegeleta . Ma hai baha ega hita witumaganeya .
41016014	U mulina Yesu i lugeleteya a hewahewali magouhi 11 uyahihi , tauhi hi'mam ma Yesu i geleta u tipolihi po i towolo ma i paliyehi i pa , ‘ Awai binei u towolo meme lawa hi bahebaheya ega ota witumaganehi ? Nugonugomi awai he guduguduhi ? ’
41016015	Ega yaka Yesu i baha nae uyahihi i pa , ‘ Hipuli tupo wohepali uyahihi ona nae po tuwega dewadewana ona guguyeya lawa atapuhi uyahihi .
41016016	Ma apo iyawoi hina witumaganeu yaka ona bapatisohi po Yaubada ina wiluyagohanihi ma iyawoi ega hina witumagana yaka apo Yaubada ina kawaiapapoenihi .
41016017	Apo iyawoi hina witumagana yaka wekiwekilala uyahihi ina geleta po gowaugei alugo apapoehi lawa uyahihi hina wiyagahi ma apo pona gehouhi uyahihiyei hina ibaabani .
41016018	Apo mota apapoehi hina wohepahi ma apega hina wiyuwa , apo kakai hin'umahi apega hina hilage . Ma apo tu tootogo hina wotepanihi yaka hina dewadewa . ’
41016019	Guyau Yesu a baha i wikokowi a hewahewali uyahihi , ma i gae hoi yada po Yaubada u awala hinebawana i tugula .
41016020	Yesu a hewahewali hi hopu po hi nae tupo atapuhi uyahihi hi luguguya , ma Guyau a baha i laimoineya wekiwekilala uyahihiyei . ]
42001001	Tiyopilasi tam taniwaga dewadewam . Awai u hayata hi waawala naka lawa hi maga duma hi wileta ipa hina giluma hopunehi .
42001002	Yesu a baha tu limoinena po tu bagibagiyena anani wawala ugolina hi bahebaheya hi giluma hopunehi .
42001003	Geka ginoulihi hai ani wawala ugolihi a todi ma a inugohiyahiyawehi po i nenei naka i dewadewa duma yaka a giluma dumaluhi tam Tiyopilasi bimgei .
42001004	Ma geka a dewadewaya naka apo ginouli atapuhi hi palipaliwelem moinana una hanapugeya .
42001005	Heloda a houga wiwasawasa u Yudeya ma tu witalaguyaba gehouna gowana Sakaliya tauna Abiya a bagibagi tu woiteyana i mamae . Agona gowana Elisabeta tauna Alona gugunigei i nei .
42001006	Hai luwaga Yaubada matana hi dumalu po a lugagayo po a palihanahanapu atapuhi hi iponawogogehi .
42001007	Tamogi ega natuhi babana Elisabeta naka alinawa ma i wikeduluma po Sakaliya amaka i wibada .
42001008	Iyeta gehouna Sakaliya witalaguyaba bagibagina i laidumaluya Yaubada u matana .
42001009	Ma tu witalaguyaba hai dewa naka wikibu po wikibugei i welutahaya po ipa apo tauna dadi ina apuya . Ega yaka i lui gae Guyau a numa dalabu baneina u hinena .
42001010	Ma lawa atapuhi noka hougana dadi i apapuya naka u uputa hi laupali .
42001011	Ma Guyau a tu winoyanoya dadi ani'mapuna u awala hinebawanei i lugeleteya .
42001012	Hougana Sakaliya i gagaleya po i goholi ma matouta i geini .
42001013	Ma Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i baha i pa , ‘ Sakaliya , ega una matomatouteu . Yaubada amaka am lupali i nonoli po agom Elisabeta apo natum olotona ina guni . Apo gowana Yoni una hiyawi .
42001014	Apo ina tutuipeili hougana una kaoha po una kaoha duma ma gasi lawa magomagouhi apo hina kaoha .
42001015	Matababana Guyau u matana apo tauna lawa baneina . Apega wine po umauma kadikadidilihi ina umuma . Ma hina guniguni hougana apo Alugo Woiyawa ina wihogoya po ina mamae po houga magomagouna .
42001016	Ma tauna apo Isalaela lawahi ina buinihi po hina luhagawilehi Guyau Yaubada ugolina .
42001017	Tauna apo Guyau u naonei ina tahaya mai a nugotuhu po a wipoya mei tu bahapiko Elaisiya . Ama po natu tauna apo ina winugoemotahi po tu wiponahahalena dewadumaluna ugolina ina hounihi . Ma Guyau ubeina lawa ina wononogogehi . ’
42001018	Sakaliya i baha nae tu winoyanoya ugolina i pa , ‘ Iyowai apo geka a wikawamoineya babana tau amaka a wibada ma agou i wikeduluma ’ .
42001019	Ma tu winoyanoyana a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Tau Gabeliyela houga magomagouna Yaubada u matana a towotowolo . Ma tauna i himiliu po a nei ugolim geka tuwega dewadewana ipa a paliwelem .
42001020	Tamogi u baha ega uta kawamoineya ma agom a houga wigunaguna ugolina apo una limoineya . Ma ega uta kawamoineu yaka apo una wigumgum po ega ponam a sigana iyeta noka ugolina anona ina lugeleteya . ’
42001021	Lawa boluhi u uputa hai wiotonana ugolina ma hi pa , ‘ Iyowai po Sakaliya a mae i dao numa dalabu baneina u hinena ? ’
42001022	Hi otonana ma Sakaliya i hopu mai po hi pa , ‘ Nugote Sakaliya numa dalabu baneina u hinena awai i galeya , po ega emoemotana ina baha ma nimanei e ibaabani ’ .
42001023	Iyeta wabihaga hi nae ma apoma Sakaliya a bagibagi atapuhi i wikokowihi ma apoma i gunawileya a u meyagai .
42001024	Ma a bagibagi hi kokoe po gaogao ega ita dao ma agona Elisabeta i koiba po tuawana hau numa i mamae wamahiya nimitutu hi kokoe ma i pa ,
42001025	‘ Amalai apoma Guyau i haguwe po u wialinawa wihinimayana lawa u matahi i wihaleya ’ .
42001026	Elisabeta i koiba po i mamae a wamahiya magouna 6 ma Yaubada a tu winoyanoya gowana Gabeliyela i himila hopu neiyai u Nasaleta , Galili u tupona .
42001027	Tu winoyanoyana guguhini gowana Maliya a tuwega i neiyai . Maliya tauna hi bigeya wasawasa Dawita a guguni hewalina gehouna gowana Yosepa ugolina .
42001028	Tu winoyanoyana i nei po Maliya ugolina i pa , ‘ Tinani tam . Guyau a winagana po gasi tauna tam mitehi . ’
42001029	Tu winoyanoyana a baha ugolina ma Maliya nugonugona i helele duma po a bahahi anohi i inugonugotuhugehi .
42001030	Ma tu winoyanoyana i pa , ‘ Maliya , ega una matomatouta babana amaka Yaubada i hagu lagonem .
42001031	Tam apo natum olotona una koibeya po una guni po gowana Yesu una hiyawi .
42001032	Tauna apo lawa baneina gehouna ma lawa apo hina wootalagiyeya hina pa , “ Yaubada Gegewahagana Natuna ” . Ma Guyau Yaubada apo tauna ina dewaya po wasawasa mei gogana Dawita i wasawasa pite ,
42001033	po apo Yakobo a guguni u hinehi ina iwasawasa houga magomagouna ina nae po ega a siga ma anani taniwaga apega ina kokoe . ’
42001034	Ma Maliya tu winoyanoyana ugolina i baha i pa , ‘ Tau ega ata tawine ma apo iyowai a wigunaguna ? ’
42001035	Ma tu winoyanoyana i pa , ‘ Alugo Woiyawa apo ina nei po Yaubada a wipoya ina welem po ugolinei tewela waiwoiyawana una guni po gowana hina hiyawi , Yaubada Natuna .
42001036	Am guguni wawinena Elisabeta gasi i koiba a houga wikeduluma ugolina . Tauna ipa ega emoemotana ina wigunaguna ma amalai a wamahiya magouna 6 .
42001037	Matababana Yaubada ginouli atapuhi emoemotana . ’
42001038	Ma Maliya i baha nae tu winoyanoyana ugolina i pa , ‘ Tau Guyau tu wiponawogogena ma amalai awai u palipaliweleu ugoliu ina wawala ’ . Ma tu winoyanoyana Maliya i nehaleya .
42001039	Geka u mulina Maliya i wononogo ma i wotowolo po i nae dobu waioyana i tutani po i nae Yudeya u hinena .
42001040	I nae po Sakaliya a u numa i geleta po Elisabeta i mamali .
42001041	Ma Elisabeta pona i noonoli po natuna managona u hinena i'imtuilupa po Elisabeta Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya .
42001042	Ma ponana i lata ma i wootu i pa , ‘ Wiwine atapuhi u hinehi tam tu kaoha lagona po tewelana apo una guniguni tauna tu kaoha .
42001043	Aee , awai binei lunugotootogo geka pite i wawala po u Guyau hinana i witoumana mai ugoliu .
42001044	Matababana am baha wimaamala a noonoli po tewela u managou i kaoha po i'mtuilupa .
42001045	Guyau a baha u itumaganeya binei apo ina laimoineya naka tam tu kaoha . ’
42001046	Maliya i pa , ‘ Guyau a hunena dumaya
42001047	ma nugonugou hinena i wotalagae babana u Yaubada Tu wiluyagohaniu .
42001048	Tau a tu bagibagi yabayababa ma i galena tuhagau tau . Ugolinei lawa atapuhi amalai ma i wawala po i nenae apo hina pa tau tu kaoha .
42001049	Matababana Yaubada manininagei ginouli gegehi biugei i dewahi . Tauna gowana i wiwoiyawa .
42001050	A lunugotootogo i mewahaga hapana po hapana ugolihi iyawoi Yaubada hi matumatuteya .
42001051	Tauna nimana kadikadidilina i lodomi po tu nugogegae hai wiwogatala i lunohahi .
42001052	Wasawasa gegehi hai ani tugula ugolihi i hauhopunehi ma tu nugohopuhopu i houna geletehi .
42001053	Tu omhilage lawahi i wiomhiyougohi , ma tu wigapola lawahi a nima kwakwawihi i himilihi .
42001054	A paliwitumagana googata ugolihi i womomota emoteya , ma i nei Isalaela lawahi ina haguta .
42001055	A lunugotootogo Abelaham ugolina i woogeleteya po gasi googana , po ataputa ugolita apo ina nae po ega a siga . ’
42001056	Ma Maliya Elisabeta mitehi hi mamae wamahiya tonuga hi kokoe ma i gunawilena meya a u numa .
42001057	Elisabeta upuna i wiyuwa po i igunaguna po natuna olotona .
42001058	Ma a lawa po a guguni hi noonoli po tauna mitehi hi kaoha babana Guyau a hagu dewadewa dumana i weleya .
42001059	Natuna i guni po iyeta magouhi 8 hi kokoe ma lawa hi'mboina mai . Ma hai dewa hi deweya po tewelana a wekiwekilala naka hinina hi hapi ma ipa Sakaliya hina wiwaligeheya .
42001060	Ma tamogi hinana i pa , ‘ Apega . Apo gowana Yoni . ’
42001061	Ma a lawa hi pa , ‘ Ega ita dewadewa ipa Yoni una hiyawi babana ega am bada gehouna gowana Yoni ’ .
42001062	Apoma amana nimahiyei hi paliweleya gowana apo iyai ina hiyawi , babana tauna naka i wigumgum .
42001063	Ma Sakaliya ani'mgiluma i lupaliyeya po i'mgiluma i pa ‘ Gowana Yoni ’ . Ma lawa nugonugohi hi goholihi .
42001064	Ma noka hougana Sakaliya a wigumgum i kokoe po i wibaabani meme ma Yaubada i wotalagiyeya .
42001065	Lawa u liyaliyahi tu mae matouta i wihogohi . Ma geka dewana atapuna tuwegana naka Yudeya oyana i weluyayata pahi .
42001066	Lawa iyawoi tuwegana hi noonoli naka hai nugohine ma hi pa , ‘ Geka tewelana apo tauna iyai ? ’ Matababana i lugeletana dumaya naka Yaubada a wipoya tauna ugolina .
42001067	Yoni amana Sakaliya Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya po Yaubada tuwegana i baheya i pa ,
42001068	‘ Isalaela lawahi ata Guyau Yaubada ta wotalagiyeya . Tauna a lawa haguta binei i nei po hau panipani i lupena haleta .
42001069	Yaubada a tu wiponawogo lawana gowana Dawita gogana i himiliyai Tu wiluyagohanita kadikadidilina .
42001070	Tu bahapiko waiwoiyawahi hi palipaliwitumaganeta hi pa ,
42001071	Tu wiluyagohana apo ina himili yaka tauta ata gawiya po tu wihinigigiyeta hai manini ugolihi ina luyawahita .
42001072	Ma i baha i pa apo googata ina lunugotootogogehi po a wiwogatala waiwoiyawana nugonei ina gae .
42001073	Mei gogata Abelaham ugolina i igwala , naka pite i paliwitumaganeta .
42001074	Tauna ata gawiya u nimahi apo ina halota po tauna apo ta pupouleya ma apega ta lowogeya .
42001075	Yaka houga magomagouna ata luyagohana iyetahi ugolihi ata dewa apo hina wiwoiyawa po ina dumalu tauna u matana .
42001076	Ma tam natuwe , Yoni , apo Yaubada Gegewahagana a tu bahapiko . Apo Guyau u naonei una tahaya po a tahaya una diuya .
42001077	Ma lawa una paliwelehi naka Yaubada apo hai apapoe ina paligigilihi ma luyagohana hina tuhagaya .
42001078	Ata Yaubada a lunugotootogo po a woideedeyana , apo luyagohana yayatana namanamalina ina dewaya po ina lalanita .
42001079	Apo yadei ina lalana hopu mai iyawoi hilage loguna u hinena ta mamae ataputa ugolita , po dumola tahayana ugolina aeta hounana ina laidumaluya . ’
42001080	Tewelana Yoni i lalata ma a winugonugotuhu hi lalata . Ma hau balabala yabayababa i meme nae a sigana a houga i geleta po Isalaela lawahi u matahi i wogeletena meya .
42002001	Noka hougana Sisa Ogasito a houga witaniwaga Loma u hinena ma i baha ipa apo tupo atapuna lawa gowahi hina giluma hopunehi .
42002002	Geka naka omgiluma tahatahayana Kwiliniya a witaniwaga u Siliya hougana .
42002003	Ugolinei ma lawa atapuhi yamoha po yamoha i nenae a meyagai ugolina po gowana hi gilugilumi .
42002004	Tupo Galili u hinena u Nasaleta Yosepa i wotowolo po i gae u Yudeya , meyagai gowana Betelehem ugolina . Yosepa i nae noka hosi babana gogana Dawita noka dobunei i nei .
42002005	Ma tauna Maliya ugolina hi bigebigeya mitehi hi nae po gowahi hi gilumihi . Maliya a koibana
42002006	ma u Betelehem hi mamae po a houga wigunaguna i geleta .
42002007	Ma i wigunaguna po a tutuwoga olotona i guni po lupulugei i huma imahiyeya ma gamogamo hai gaeba u hinena i wienoya . Matababana ani wiyagohina numana u hinena ega meka babanoya kwakwawina .
42002008	Dobuna u liyaliyana naka sipi tu galena itete u pitepitei hai sipi upomgei hi gagalena itetehi .
42002009	Ma Guyau a tu winoyanoya i lugeleteya ugolihi po yayata namanamalina i yayata wiiwilehi po lowo i geinihi .
42002010	Ma ega yaka tu winoyanoyana i pa , ‘ Ega ona matomatotouta . Ami tuwega dewadewana waikaohana a neiyai lawa atapuhi ubeihi .
42002011	Geka amalai Dawita a meyagai u hinena Tu wiluyagohanimi hi guni . Tauna Guyau , Yaubada a Besinana lawana .
42002012	Ma ani limoina naka tewelana apo a humahumana gamogamo hai ani am u hinena e eneno ma apo ona tuhagaya . ’
42002013	Mala emosi ma tu winoyanoya boluhi yadei hi lugeletehi tulahina u liyaliyana po Yaubada ugolina hi yamhuna hi pa ,
42002014	‘ Yaubada Gegewahagana ta wotalagiyeya po iyawoi hau hipuli i kaokaohehi ugolihi nugodumola ina mae . ’
42002015	Hougana tu winoyanoyana i wotowolo po i gae hau yada ma sipi tu galena itete tuawahi hi pa , ‘ Guyau geka ginoulina ugolita i woogeleteya ta nae u Betelehem po ta galeya ’ .
42002016	Ega yaka yagiyagina hi nae po Maliya po Yosepa po tewelana gamogamo hai gaeba u hinena i eneno ma hi tuhagahi .
42002017	Ma hi gagalehi po hi paliwelehi iyowai tewelana binei ma tu winoyanoya ugolihi i bahabaha .
42002018	Iyawoi sipi tu galena itete hai bahana hi noonoli po hi gohola dumahi .
42002019	Ma Maliya geka ginoulihi atapuhi nugonei hi gae ma i toditodi naka bala tapuna .
42002020	Ma sipi tu galena itete Yaubada hi wootalagiyeya po hi hunehuneya ma hi gunawilehi . Matababana awai atapuna hi noonoli po hi gagaleya naka i laimoineya mei tu winoyanoyana i palipaliwelehi pite .
42002021	Iyeta magouhi 8 hi kokoe ma tewelana a wekiwekilala naka hinina hi hapi ma hi wigowaya po Yesu . Gowana geka yohola ega hita guni ma tu winoyanoya hi palipaligeleteya tauna hi hiyawi .
42002022	Mose a lugagayo i baheya i pa , tutuwau hai wigunaguna u mulina hina laiyeuyeu mehi . Ega yaka Yosepa ma Maliya tewelana hi weluwaya po hi nae u Yelusalem ipa Yaubada ugolina hina wogeleteya .
42002023	Matababana Mose a lugagayo ugolina i baheya i pa , ‘ Tutuwoga ololotohi atapuhi hina palipaligwalehi Guyau ugolina ’ .
42002024	Ma Mose a lugagayo i baheya i pa , ‘ Bunebune luwaga bo natunatuhi luwaga ugolihiyei hai ani witalaguyaba hina dewadewahi ’ .
42002025	Noka hougana lawa gehouna dewadewana gowana Simona Yaubada tu wiponawogogena u Yelusalem i mamae . Tauna Isalaela Tu witowolo mena i ototoni ma Alugo Woiyawa i luiya .
42002026	Ma Alugo Woiyawa i paliweleya naka apega ina hilage a sigana Guyau a Besinana lawana ina galeya ma apoma ina hilage .
42002027	Tewelana Yesu tu gunina hi geleteya numa dalabu baneina u hinena ipa Mose a lugagayo hina wotagoya ma Alugo Woiyawa Simona i tahaeya po i nae numa dalabuna u hinena .
42002028	Ma Simona tewelana i guni po u nimana ma a wimaamala Yaubada ugolina i dewaya i pa ,
42002029	‘ Guyau Wasawasa , am paliwitumagana amalai u limoineya yaka amaka ma tau am tu bagibagi nugodumolagei una palihaleu po a hilage .
42002030	Matababana amaka am Tu wiluyagohana lawa atapuhi ubeihi u wononogogeya matougei a galeya .
42002031	
42002032	Tauna tu meuputa hai yayata am nugotuhu galena tuhagana binei . Ma am lawa mi Isalaela hai wasawasa binei . ’
42002033	Simona Yesu binei ma awai i bahebahehi naka amana po hinana hi nugogohola duma .
42002034	Ma i kawaidewedewehi ma Maliya ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Apo nugonugom ina wiyuwa duma babana geka tewelana tauna wekiwekilala Isalaela lawahi ugolihi , ma apo hina wihinigigiyeya . Lawa hai nugotuhu gowagowadahi apo ina wogeletehi tepanei ma lawa boluhi apo hina peu ma gehouhi hina towolo . ’
42002035	
42002036	Noka hougana keduluma odubona gowana Ana tauna tu bahapiko gehouna ma amana Penuweli ma a guguni Asa . Tauna a guguhinina ma i tawine po i mamae agona mitehi naka bolima magouhi 7 ,
42002037	ma i hiwape po i mamae naka bolima magouhi 84 . Tauna numa dalabu baneina ega ita nenehaleya . Uguwa po iyeta i wootalagae po am i iyohiyeya ma i laupali .
42002038	Noka hougana emosina i lui gae hau numa dalabuna tewelana ubeina po Yaubada ugolina i wimaamala . Ma iyawoi Yelusalem Tu luyawahina hi ototoni atapuhi ugolihi i wibaabani .
42002039	Hougana tewelana hinana po amana Mose a lugagayo dewana atapuna hi ikokowi naka hi gunawilehi Galili u tupona , hai meyagai dumana Nasaleta ugolina .
42002040	Ma tewelana i lata po i kadidili ma nugonugona i holahola po Yaubada a nugohegoya tauna ugolina .
42002041	Bolima emosi po emosi Yesu tu gunina hi gegae u Yelusalem Welulagona tolehana ubeina .
42002042	Hougana Yesu a bolima magouhi 12 , hinana po amana mitehi hi gae toleha binei mei bolima emosi po emosi .
42002043	Ma hougana tolehana i kokoe po hai houga gunawilana ugolina tewelana Yesu u Yelusalem ma hi nehaleya . Hinana po amana ega hita hanapugeya .
42002044	Hai nugotuhu hi pa , bolu mitehi hi nenae naka tauna mitehi . Ugolinei ma iyeta atapuna hi negeya ma apoma hi tugudu po hai guguni po hai lawa u hayahi hi beiha .
42002045	Ma ega hita tuhagaya yaka hi beiha po hi gunawilehi u Yelusalem .
42002046	Iyeta tonuga hi kokoe ma apoma numa dalabu baneina u hinena hi tuhagaya . Tu wiatatiyana u hayahi i tugula ma i launonola ma i laubayabayada .
42002047	Tu lunonolena atapuhi a hanapu po baha wimihana ugolina hi gohola dumahi .
42002048	Hougana hinana po amana hi gagaleya po hi gohola dumahi . Ma hinana i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Natuwe , iyowai po geka u dewiyai ? Amam po tau a nugodubuiyai to bibihem . ’
42002049	Ma tauna ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Awai binei uheiya o bibiheu ? Moina ega ota hanapugeya naka tau Amau a numa u hinena ? ’
42002050	Ma awai ugolihi i bahebaheya naka ega hita hanapugeya .
42002051	Tauna mitehi hi hopu po hi nae u Nasaleta po iponawogogehi . Ma geka ginoulihi atapuhi naka hinana a nugohine .
42002052	Yesu i lalata ma a winugonugotuhu hi lalata po Yaubada po lawa hi kawaidewedeweya .
42003001	Sisa Tibeliya u Loma i iwasawasa bolima magouna 15 u hinena naka Ponitiyo Pilato mi Yudeya hai taniwaga . Ma Heloda Galili tupona i gagalena iteteya ma walehina Pilipo Ituleya tupona i gagalena iteteya , ma gasi Talakoniti tupona i gagalena iteteya . Ma Lisaniya Abilini tupona i gagalena iteteya .
42003002	Ma Anase po Kayapa tauhi tu witalaguyaba tanitaniwagahi . Geka tauna hougana Yaubada a baha i nei Sakaliya natuna Yoni ugolina hau balabala yabayababa .
42003003	Yoni tauna i lui po i nae Yodani tupona atapuna u hinena apapoe paligigilana ubeina nugobui bapatisona i lauguguyeya .
42003004	Mei tu bahapiko Isaiya a baha bukana u hinena i gilugilumi i pa , ‘ Lawa gehouna hau balabala yabayababa e iototu i pa , “ Guyau a tahaya ona wononogeya . A tahaya ona lidumaluhi . ”
42003005	Guguba atapuhi apo hina hogohi . Oya baneihi po habuluhi apo hina hopu . Tahaya waiwilowilowahi apo hina dumalu . Ani nae waitupitupihi apo hina wihabuhabuna .
42003006	Ma lawa atapuhi apo Yaubada anani wiluyagohana hina galeya . ’
42003007	Bolu hi hopu mai po Yoni ipa ina bapatisohi naka ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Taumi ani galenami mei mota , ugolinei Yaubada a luuyogigai iyetana ipa ona lowo haleya .
42003008	Tamogi ega emoemotami babana ami nugobui anohi ega ota wogeletahi . Ma ega tuawami ona pa , “ Gogiyai Abelaham ” , naka ginouli yabayababa babana a paliwelemi Yaubada emoemotana po geka gaimahi ina dewahi po Abelaham googana .
42003009	Geka hougana Yaubada ilama i wononogogeya ipa mayau u dedena ina taleya . Ugolinei ma mayau atapuna ega ita ugugo apo ina talahalehi po mayau alalatana ugolina in'omapugehi . ’
42003010	Ma bolu hi lubayadeya hi pa , ‘ Iyowai apo to dewa ? ’
42003011	Ma hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Iyai ugolina luilui luwaga yaka ina gutaya lawa gehouna ega ita iluilui mitehi . Ma iyai ugolina aniani yaka dewana emosina ina dewaya . ’
42003012	Takisi tu tama hi nei po ipa bapatiso hina waya tauhi gasi hi baha ugolina hi pa , ‘ Bada , apo awai to dewaya ? ’
42003013	Ma tauna i baha i pa , ‘ Gapola mihana a lata awai mi Loma hi bahebaheya naka ega ona huhouna lagoneya ’ .
42003014	Tu wigawiya hi lubayadeya hi pa , ‘ Ma tiyai apo iyowai to dewa ? ’ Ma ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Lawa hai gapola ega ona halohalohi bo koyamagei ona tamitamihi . Ma ami bagibagi mihahi ona kaohehi tamogi . ’
42003015	Lawa hai witumagana hi lata po hi nugowilawila hi pa , nugote Yoni tauna Yaubada a Besinana lawana .
42003016	Yoni atapuhi ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ Tau eega ; tau goilagei a ibapatisomi ma tauna tu gelagoniu naka e nenei . Tau ega u dewadewa awai ipa apo a aehumahuma a lupeni . Tauna apo Alugo Woiyawei po wipoya mei mayau alalatanei ina bapatisomi .
42003017	Anani luhapu hipana u nimana po aniani mei pegapega ina tuwaluhi po a hanali u hinena ina tuupumi . Ma nudanudahi apo mayau alalata tuwetuweneina ugolina ina apuhi . ’
42003018	Luguguya galenahi tapuhi po tapuhigei Yoni tuwega dewadewana i lauguguyeya lawa ugolihi .
42003019	Ma Yoni taniwaga Heloda i palihopuhopuneya babana walehina agona gowana Helodiyasi i lawalawagi binei . Ma gasi dewa apapoe atapuhi Heloda i dewadewahi bihiyei .
42003020	Apoma apapoe banei dumana Heloda i dewadewaya naka Yoni hau numa panipani i tuguduya .
42003021	Lawa atapuhi hi bapatiso po u mulina Yesu i bapatiso . Ma hougana Yesu i laupali naka yada i gunahoeya
42003022	po Alugo Woiyawa i libunebuneya ma i hopu mai tauna ugolina . Ma pona yadei i hopu mai i pa , ‘ Tam Natuwe a luhogalem , ma bimgei a kaoha ’ .
42003023	Yesu hougana a bagibagi i wawali naka a bolima magouna 30 . Tauna lawa hi pa amana Yosepa ma Yosepa Heli natuna .
42003024	Heli Matati natuna ma Matati Libai natuna . Libai Meleki natuna ma Meleki Yanai natuna , ma Yanai Yosepa natuna .
42003025	Yosepa Matiyasi natuna ma Matiyasi Eimosi natuna . Eimosi Nahum natuna ma Nahum Esili natuna . Esili Nagai natuna ma
42003026	Nagai Mata natuna . Mata Matatiya natuna ma Matatiya Semeina natuna . Semeina Yoseka natuna ma Yoseka Yoda natuna .
42003027	Yoda Yowanani natuna ma Yowanani Lesa natuna . Lesa Selubabe natuna ma Selubabe Satiyeli natuna . Satiyeli Neli natuna ma
42003028	Neli Meleki natuna . Meleki Adi natuna ma Adi Kosam natuna . Kosam Elumadam natuna ma Elumadam Elu natuna .
42003029	Elu Yosuwa natuna ma Yosuwa Eliyesa natuna . Eliyesa Yolim natuna ma Yolim Matati natuna . Matati Libai natuna ma
42003030	Libai Simiyona natuna . Simiyona Yuda natuna ma Yuda Yosepa natuna . Yosepa Yonam natuna ma Yonam Eliyakim natuna .
42003031	Eliyakim Meleya natuna ma Meleya Mena natuna . Mena Matata natuna ma Matata Natani natuna . Natani Dawita natuna ma
42003032	Dawita Yese natuna . Yese Obedi natuna ma Obedi Bowasa natuna . Bowasa Sala natuna ma Sala Nahasona natuna .
42003033	Nahasona Amidana natuna ma Amidana Adimana natuna ma Adimana Ani natuna . Ani Heselona natuna ma Heselona Pelesa natuna . Pelesa Yuda natuna ma
42003034	Yuda Yakobo natuna . Yakobo Isako natuna ma Isako Abelaham natuna . Abelaham Tela natuna ma Tela Naho natuna .
42003035	Naho Seluga natuna ma Seluga Leu natuna . Leu Pelega natuna ma Pelega Ebe natuna . Ebe Sila natuna ma
42003036	Sila Kainana natuna . Kainana Apakada natuna ma Apakada Sem natuna . Sem Nowa natuna ma Nowa Lameka natuna .
42003037	Lameka Metusela natuna ma Metusela Enoka natuna . Enoka Yaledi natuna ma Yaledi Mahalali natuna . Mahalali Kainana natuna ma
42003038	Kainana Enosi natuna . Enosi Seta natuna ma Seta Adam natuna ma Adam Yaubada natuna .
42004001	Yesu Yodani u goilana Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya ma i gunagunawileya naka Alugo Woiyawa tauna i niyeya hau balabala yabayababa .
42004002	Iyeta magouhi 40 u hinehi Tomodulele i laudadani . Noka iyetahi ugolihi ega it'omam po u mulina ma am i hilage .
42004003	Ma Tomodulelena i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Inapa tam Yaubada Natuna yaka geka gaimahi una baha po hina lianianihi ’ .
42004004	A bahana Yesu i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Yaubada a Buka u hinena giluma e mamae i pa , “ Lawa apega aniani tuawana ugolinei hina lauyagohana ” . ’
42004005	Apoma Tomodulele Yesu i weluwaya po hi gae . Kabudala kukuna u hinena hipuli tupo wohepali i wogeleteya ugolina po i galeya .
42004006	Ma i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Geka dobuhi hai witaniwaga po hai wiwasawasa apo atapuhi tam a welem . Matababana i damanai u witaniwaga ugolina po tau apo iyai a lauhogaleya an'ombeneneya ugolina .
42004007	Inapa una polopolou ugoliu yaka geka atapunana apo ina wigalimgei . ’
42004008	Ma Yesu a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Yaubada a Buka u hinena i baheya i pa , “ Guyau am Yaubada tam una polopolou ugolina po tuawana una pupouleya ” . ’
42004009	Apoma Tomodulele Yesu i weluwaya po hi nae u Yelusalem numa dalabu baneina u moyana i houni ma i baha i pa , ‘ Inapa tam Yaubada Natuna yaka geka hosi ma una lupa hopu .
42004010	Matababana Yaubada a Buka u hinena i baheya i pa , “ Yaubada a tu winoyanoya mi yadena apo ina baha po hina galena itetem ,
42004011	ma apo nimahiyei hina wohepam po apega aem una toneya . ” ’
42004012	Yesu a bahana i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Yaubada a Buka u hinena i pa , “ Guyau am Yaubada ega una laudadani ” . ’
42004013	Hougana Tomodulele ludadana atapuhigei Yesu i ludadani po i kokoe ma i nehaleya po i nae gaogao gehouna i wiotonaneya .
42004014	Ma Alugo Woiyawa a wipoyagei Yesu i gunawileya u Galili . Tuwegana i gunanohaya po noka tuponana atapuna i hogoya .
42004015	Ma tauna hai numa dalabu u hinehi i iatatiyana po lawa atapuhi hi huneya .
42004016	Apoma Yesu i nae u Nasaleta , naka anani lata meyageina . Iyeta dalabu ugolina tauna hau numa dalabu i lui mei houga daodaona i dewadewa pite . Ma i towolo po ipa in'omhiyawa .
42004017	Ma tu bahapiko Isaiya a buka hi weleya po i lagahi po i nae po omgiluma geka pite ugolina i geleta i pa ,
42004018	‘ Guyau Alugona Waiwoiyawana tau ugoliu . Tauna i wotepaniu ipa tuwega dewadewana tu dayadayabu ugolihi a guguyeya . Tauna i himiliu ipa lawa hau panipani a paliwelehi apo panipani hina nehaleya . Ma tu matakeke hina galena meme , po iyawoi witai u hinena he mamae apo a wikaohahi .
42004019	Bolima awai apo Guyau a lawa ina iluyagohanihi ipa a baheya . ’
42004020	Yesu bukana i lukukumi po numa dalabu a tu wihaguhagu i weleya ma i tugula . Ma lawa atapuhi numa dalabu u hinena hi todi ma hi halugeya .
42004021	Ma i tugudu po lawahi ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ Baha kukuna o noonoli Yaubada a Buka u hinena naka amalai i lugeleteya ’ .
42004022	Lawa atapuhi hi kawaidewedeweya po gamonei baha waikamnahi i bahebahehi naka hi hunena dumaya . Ma hi pa , ‘ Iyowai ma Yosepa natuna geka pite u ibaabani ? ’
42004023	Ma ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ A hanapugeya naka apo ona paliweleu geka baha hanahanapuhi , “ Tu lumulamula , una wiluyagohana mem ” . Ma gasi apo ugoliu ona baha ona pa , “ Awai u Kapenaum i waawala ma to noonoli geka am meyagai ugolina una dewahi ” . ’
42004024	Ma i baha meme i pa , ‘ A baha duma ugolimi , ega tu bahapiko gehouna a meyagai ugolina hita luhogaleya .
42004025	Tamogi moina a paliwelemi naka Elaisiya a u houga hiwape i maga duma u Isalaela . Hougana gadiwewe ega ita atatuna naka bolima tonuga ma tupona po gomala baneina tupo atapuna hi wialoni .
42004026	Tamogi Elaisiya ega ita nae hiwahiwape mi Isalaela emosi ugolihi ma i nae hiwape Salepatagei Saidoni u tupona tuawana ugolina po i haguya .
42004027	Ma Elaisa a u houga lepelo lawahi hi maga duma ma ega gehouna ita luyawihi . Ma Neamana lawa Siliyagei tuawana i widewadewaya . ’
42004028	Hougana lawa geka bahahi hi noonolihi po hau numa dalabu uyogigai i wihogohi .
42004029	Ma hi welutowolo po Yesu hi teina niyeya hai meyagai u uputana . Oya u tepana hai meyagai hi dewadewaya ugolina hi giyeya po ipa apo hau gubala hina dubali .
42004030	Ma tamogi tipolihigei i honoga po i nae .
42004031	Yesu i hopu po i nae Galili meyageina gehouna gowana Kapenaum ugolina po noka hosi hau dalabu lawa i wiatatiyehi .
42004032	Ma hi nugogohola duma a wiatatiyana binei babana a baha hi wipoya ipa lawa hina wotagoya .
42004033	Noka numa dalabuna u hinena lawa gehouna alugo apapoena u hinena i mamae po ponana i lata ma i otu i pa ,
42004034	‘ Oo Yesu , tam Nasaletagei , awai ipa ugoliyai una dewaya ? U nei ipa una uniyai , bo ? A hanapugeya tam iyai . Tam Yaubada galinei Waiwoiyawam . ’
42004035	Tamogi Yesu alugona i lahatuutuneya i pa , ‘ Ega ponam ma naka lawana una hopu haleya ’ . Alugona lawana i dewaya po bolu u matahi ma i guli ma i hopu haleya . Tamogi lawana ega ita wihiniwiyuwaya .
42004036	Lawa atapuhi hi gohola dumahi po tuawahi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Geka wiatatatiyanana awai ? Matababana a taniwagagei po maninigei alugo apapoehi e taniwagehi po he laupa hopu . ’
42004037	Noka tuponana ugolina Yesu tuwegana i gunanohaya po tupo atapuna i waya .
42004038	Yesu numa dalabu i nehaleya po i nae Simona a numa ugolina . Ma Simona pohiyana wawinena i totogo . Tauna hinigugupouma baneina i waya po binei ma Yesu hi paliweleya .
42004039	I nae po wawinena u liyaliyana i towolo ma hinigugupouma i lahaya . Ma a hinigugupouma i kokoe ma mala emosi i welutowolo po i poulehi .
42004040	Kabudala i yoliyoli ma iyawoi hai lawa ugolihi totogo galenahi tapuhi po tapuhi hi neihi mai Yesu ugolina . Atapuhi ugolihi nimana i hounihi po i luyawahihi .
42004041	Lawa hi maga alugo apapoehi hi luinihi naka gasi hi laupa hopu ma hi ototu hi pa , ‘ Tam Yaubada Natuna ’ . Ma Yesu i lahahi po ega emoemotahi hina ibaabani babana hi hanapugeya naka tauna Besinana lawana .
42004042	Yayata hau hipuli i lauhedaleya hougana Yesu noka dobuna i nehaleya po i nae meyagai ega lawa hita mimiyeya ugolina . Ma lawa hi biheya po hi tutuhagaya naka hi nugoneya po ipa ega ina nenehalehi .
42004043	Tamogi ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ Tau ipa tuwega dewadewana Yaubada anani taniwaga binei a lauguguya meyagai gehouhi ugolihi gasi . Matababana geka tauna binei Yaubada i himiliu po a nei . ’
42004044	Ega yaka Yudeya u tupona numa dalabuhi u hinehi i lauguguya .
42005001	Genesaleta bogana u hadana Yesu i towotowolo ma lawa hi yamliyana gae ugolina ipa Yaubada a baha hina nonoli .
42005002	Tauna wam luwaga hi hepahi po hi mamae i galehi ma tamogi tu ebagahi amaka hi lupa hopu halehi po hai hagida hi lauoga .
42005003	Yesu wam gehouna i geluya naka Simona a wam ma i baha po i lududuya po hi hopu u bogei po noka hosi i tugula ma lawa i wiatatiyehi .
42005004	Ma hougana baha i woohouni po Simona ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Wamna una woeya po ta hopu boga daodaona ugolina po ami hagida ona telenehi po ona ebaga ’ .
42005005	Ma Simona Yesu a baha i buiya i pa , ‘ Bada , to luhilage malatom ma ega awai tota onaya . Ma am baha binei apo hagidahi to telena mehi . ’
42005006	Hougana iyana a maga hi ononaya naka mei hagidahi hina gunagunalolohi .
42005007	Ega yaka hai lawa wamna gehouna ugolina hi luhapiyehi ipa hina haguhi . Hi nei po wamhi luwaga hi lihogohi po mei hina yoliyoli .
42005008	Hougana Simona Pita i gagalena po i tutunei Yesu u naona i'mtutonetonena ma i pa , ‘ Una nehaleu , Guyau , babana tau tu apapoe lawau ’ .
42005009	A baha babana tauna po a lawa iyana a maga hi ononaya hi gagaleya po , hi gohola dumahi .
42005010	Sebedi natunatuna Yamesa ma Yoni Simona tu haguna tauhi gasi hi gohola dumahi . Ma Yesu Simona ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Ega una matomatouta . Amalai ma i wawala po i nenae apo lawa una ononahi ’ .
42005011	Ma wamhi hi hepa geletehi hau hayahaya po ginouli atapuna hi nehaleya ma Yesu hi wotagoya .
42005012	Yesu meyagai gehouna ugolina ma lawa lepelo hinina i hogoya i nei ugolina . Ma hougana lawa Yesu i gagaleya po u naona i guli hopu hau hipuli ma i lupali gonugonuwa i pa , ‘ Guyau , inapa nugonugom yaka una luyawahiu ’ .
42005013	Yesu nimana i lodomi po lawana i wodadani ma i pa , ‘ Ee , nugonugou . Amaka ma una dewadewa . ’ Mala emosi ma a lepelo i kokoe .
42005014	Ma Yesu i baha kadidili lawana ugolina ipa ega lawa ina palipaliwelehi . Tamogi i pa , ‘ Dumalu una nae po tu witalaguyaba hina galem . Ma am luyagohana binei witalaguyaba una dewaya mei Mose i bahebaheya po lawa hai ani kawamoina naka u luyagohana . ’
42005015	Tamogi Yesu tuwegana i gunanohaya po i lalata . Ma bolu hi liya mai po ipa hina lunonola po gasi hai totogo ugolihi ma ina luyawahihi .
42005016	Tamogi i'mhoe po i nae po dobu ega lawa hita mimiyehi ugolihi i laupali .
42005017	Iyeta gehouna Yesu i iatatiyana ma Palisi lawahi gehouhi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi hi tugutugula . Tauhi Galili po Yudeya meyageihi atapuhi po Yelusalem ugolihiyei hi nei . Ma Guyau a manini Yesu ugolina po tu tootogo ipa ina luyawahihi .
42005018	Ma lawa gehouna waigwameyameyana hau liyapa ma hi awala neiyai po hi leta ipa hina luiyeya numa u hinena po Yesu u naona hina wienoya .
42005019	Tamogi ega emoemotahi ipa tahaya hina tuhagaya po hina luiyeya babana lawa hi maga duma . Ega yaka hi awala geleteya hau gatowa po domo hi dewaya ma lawana anani enona mitehi hi houna hopuneya bolu u tipolihi Yesu u naonei .
42005020	Hougana Yesu lawahi hai witumagana i gagaleya po i baha nae lawana ugolina i pa , ‘ Tulau , am apapoe amaka a paligigilihi ’ .
42005021	Palisi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi tauhi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana iyai po Yaubada e palipaliguyoguyougeya ? Ega emoemotana lawa awai apapoe ina paligigili ma Yaubada tuawana . ’
42005022	Yesu hai winugonugotuhu amaka i hanapugeya yaka ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ Awai binei o inugowilawila ?
42005023	Memeka baha dewadewana ega ita ipilipili ? Am apapoe a paligigili bo una towolo po una nae ?
42005024	Apo ugolimi a limoineya naka tau Lawa Moinau , wipoya Yaubada i weleu po hau hipuli apo apapoe a paligigili . ’ Ega yaka i baha nae lawa wai gwameyameyana ugolina i pa , ‘ A bahabaha ugolim , una towolo po am ani eno una awali ma una nae ma meyagai ugolina ’ .
42005025	Mala emosi ma lawana u matahi i welutowolo po ani eno i enenogeya i awali po Yaubada i hunehuneya ma i nae a u dobu .
42005026	Tauhi atapuhi hi gohola dumahi po matouta i wihogohi ma Yaubada hi hunehuneya hi pa , ‘ Ginouli ega tota gagalehi amalai to galehi ’ .
42005027	Geka dewana u mulina Yesu i hopu po i nenae po takisi tu tama gowana Libai i galeya . Tauna anani bagibagi numana ugolina i tugutugula ma Yesu i baha nae ugolina ipa , ‘ Una wotagou ’ .
42005028	Libai ginouli atapuhi i nehalehi ma Yesu i wotagoya .
42005029	Ma Libai a u numa toleha baneina Yesu binei i dewaya po takisi tu tama po lawa gehouhi mitehi hi tugula am binei .
42005030	Ma lugagayo tanitaniwagahi po Palisi gehouhi Yesu a hewahewali mitehi hi pilipilihi hi pa , ‘ Awai binei takisi tu tama po tu apapoe mitehi o'mam po o umuma gogona ? ’
42005031	Ma Yesu hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Lawa ega hita tootogo ega tu lumulamula nugonugohi ma tu tootogo tauhi nugonugohi tu lumulamula .
42005032	A nenei ega ipa tu dewadumalu a otugehi ma tu apapoe a otugehi po hina nugobui . ’
42005033	Ma hi baha nae ugolina hi pa , ‘ Yoni a hewahewali po Palisi hai hewahewali he iyohi po aniani atapuhi ega hita ananihi po he laupali houga daodaona ma am hewahewali he'mam po he umuma ’ .
42005034	Ma Yesu i'mpaliluwaluwa i pa , ‘ Itapa tu tawine olotona a tawine tolehana ugolina tauna ita mamae , moina apo a toumana hita iyohi ? Apega .
42005035	Tamogi iyeta he nenei apo tu tawine olotona a gawiya hina wihaleya ma noka iyetahi ugolihi apoma apo hina wiyohi . ’
42005036	Yesu gasi geka paliluwaluwana i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Ega iyai luilui wouna ita papaya po luilui odubona ugolina ita hilahilama lawiteya . Inapa ina dewaya yaka naka luiluina wouna amaka i wiapapoeya ma gasi kalekona henahenamina apega luiluina odubona ina linanaya .
42005037	Ma gasi ega iyai wine wouna ita hiwohiwoga hopuneya talagigoila gamogamo opihiyei hi dewadewaya odubona ugolina . Inapa ina dewaya yaka apo winena wouna ina hahana po talagigoilana ina gunahaiya po wine ina kolologeya .
42005038	Apega iyai ina dewaya . Tamogi wine wouna ipa talagigoila wouna ugolina hina hiwohiwoga hopuneya po atapuna ina dewadewa pahi .
42005039	Apega iyai wine odubona ina umumaya po u mulina ma wine wouna ina umaya . Matababana apo ina pa , “ Odubona i dewadewa ’ . ”
42006001	Hau dalabu Yesu a hewahewali mitehi aniani mei pegapega tanona tipolinei i nenae ma a hewahewali pegapega anohi hi'mgomugomu po u nimahi hi gohohi po hi ananihi .
42006002	Ma Palisi lawahi hi baha hi pa , ‘ Ata lugagayo i baheya ipa ega hau dalabu ta wobagibagi ma iyowai po geka pite o dewadewa ? ’
42006003	Yesu hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Dawita po iyawoi tauna mitehi am hi hilage ma awai i dewadewaya o hiyawi , bo eega ?
42006004	Tauna i lui po Yaubada a numa u hinena palawa wailugagayona i waya po i ani ma a hewahewali i welewelehi . Tamogi ata lugagayo i baheya ipa ega iyai ina anani ma tu witalaguyaba tuawahi . ’
42006005	Ma i baha i pa , ‘ Tau Lawa Moinau dalabu taniwagana ’ .
42006006	Dalabu gehouna Yesu i lui hau numa dalabu po i iatatiyana . Ma noka hosi lawa gehouna awala hinebawana i habelu .
42006007	Palisi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi tahaya hi bibeiha ipa Yesu hina wigouya po hi todi ma hi gagaleya hi pa , apo lugagayo ina tulagoni po dalabugei lawana ina luyawahi , bo eega .
42006008	Tamogi Yesu hai nugotuhu amaka i hanapugehi po i baha nae tu nimahabelu ugolina i pa , ‘ Una nei po lawa u matahi una towolo ’ . Yaka lawana u matahi i towolo .
42006009	Ma Yesu ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Ipa a lubayademi , ata lugagayo ugolina awai i baheya ipa hau dalabu lawa tana idewadewahi bo tana iapapoenihi , bo lawa ta lauyawahihi bo ta ununihi ? ’
42006010	Yesu i galena wiwila po atapuhi i galehi ma lawana ugolina i pa , ‘ Nimam una lodomi ’ , ma nimana i lodolodomi po i dewadewa meme .
42006011	Tamogi tanitaniwaga uyogigai i wihogohi po awai ipa Yesu ugolina hina dewadewaya tuawahi hi ibaabaniyeya .
42006012	Noka hougana Yesu i gae po u oya i laupali . Ma uguwa daodaona naka Yaubada ugolina i laupali ma malitom .
42006013	I lauyayahi hougana Yesu tu wotagona i otugehi po u hinehi lawa magouhi 12 i winaganihi ma i wigowahi po tu wituwetuwega .
42006014	Tauhi naka Simona ma Yesu i wigowaya Pita ma walehina Andulu po Yamesa po Yoni po Pilipo po Batolomiu .
42006015	Ma Matiu po Tomasi po Yamesa Alipi natuna po Simona hi wigowaya po tu palihalena mena .
42006016	Ma Yudasa Yamesa natuna po Yudasa Isakaliyota Yesu apo ina nugohaleya .
42006017	Oya tepanei hi hopu mai po a hewahewali boluhi mitehi hi towolo . Ma lawa bolu baneina i liyaliya mai Yudeya tupona atapuna po Yelusalem po Taya ma Saidoni niha labehi meyageihi ugolihiyei hi nei .
42006018	Hi nei ipa a baha hina nonolihi po tootogohi ina luyawahihi . Ma iyawoi alugo apapoena i iapapoenihi hi nei po hi luyagohana .
42006019	Ma atapuhi hi ileta ipa hina wodadani babana ugolinei wipoya i hopu po lawa tu tootogo atapuhi i lauyawahihi .
42006020	Yesu a hewahewali i galehi ma i baha i pa , ‘ Taumi tu dayadayabu a kawaidewedewemi , babana Yaubada anani taniwaga galimiyei .
42006021	Taumi iyawoi amalai am o hilahilage a kawaidewedewemi , babana apo on'omhiyougo . Taumi iyawoi amalai o tutou a kawaidewedewemi , babana apo ona winama .
42006022	Taumi iyawoi hougana apo lawa hina lauuyogigiyemi po hina ihinigigiyemi po hina hapohaponimi po gowami hina iapapoenihi babana tau Lawa Moinau biugei taumi tu kaohadiidiga .
42006023	‘ Yaka omi houga witai ugolina ona kaoha po ona ilupalupa gae babana hau yada mihami apo ina lata duma . Geka pite apo lawa hina dewadewami mei googata hi dewedewehi tu bahapiko ugolihi .
42006024	‘ Ma kihoni tu nugodubu taumi waimonemi amalai , babana amaka kamnami o idewadewahi .
42006025	Kihoni tu nugodubu taumi iyawoi amalai o yamhiyougo , apo am ona hilage . Kihoni taumi tu nugodubu iyawoi amalai o inama , apo ona tou .
42006026	Kihoni taumi tu nugodubu lawa atapuhi he kawakawaidewedewemi , mei googata tu bahapiko koyakoyama hi kawakawaidewedewehi .
42006027	‘ Tamogi tu lunonoleu a paliwelem . Tu wigawiyemi ona luhogalehi po tu luuyogigiyemi ona dewa imahiyehi .
42006028	Iyawoi tu paliapapoenimi ona kawaidewedewehi . Ma iyawoi tu paliguyoguyougemi ubeihi ona laupali .
42006029	Inapa iyai nawatatam ina launi yaka nawatatam tupo gehouna una weleya po ina launi . Inapa iyai am gupouma luiluina ina waya yaka am luilui hota una palihaleya ugolina .
42006030	Iyawoi ugolim he laupali atapuhi hai luhogala una welewelehi po iyai am gapola ina winihi yaka ega una tamitami mehi .
42006031	Ma awai u luhogaleya ipa lawa ugolim hina dewadewaya naka dewana emosina ugolihi una dewadewaya .
42006032	‘ Inapa tu luhogalem lawahi tuawahi una lauhogalehi yaka naka apo a dewadewa awai tam ugolim ? Matababana tu apapoe lawahi gasi tu luhogalehi he lauhogalehi .
42006033	Ma inapa tu dewa imahiyem tuawahi una dewadewa imahiyehi yaka naka apo a dewadewa awai tam ugolim ? Matababana tu apapoe lawahi naka dewana he dewedeweya .
42006034	Ma inapa iyawoi am ginouli apo hina laidumaluhi tuawahi ugolihi una welewelehi yaka naka apo a dewadewa awai tam ugolim ? Matababana tu apapoe lawahi hai lawa ugolihi he lauguta babana apo hai ginouli latana emoemotana hina lidumalu meya .
42006035	Tamogi tu wigawiyemi ona luhogalehi po ona dewa imahiyehi . Ma ona luguta po ega wimihana ona nugonugotuhuya . Ugolinei ami meiha apo ina lata duma po taumi apo Yaubada Gegewahagana natunatuna . Matababana lawa yabayababa po tu'mboho ugolihi i lunugodewadewa .
42006036	Taumi ona lunugotootogo po mei Amami e launugotootogo .
42006037	‘ Ega lawa gehouhi ona laibahibahihi meka po apo Yaubada ina libahibahimi . Ma ega lawa gehouhi ona igouhi babana apo Yaubada ina wigoumi . Lawa geha hai apapoe ugolimi ona winugoguluwihi po apo Yaubada ami apapoe ina winugoguluwihi .
42006038	On'ambenena yaka apo Yaubada in'ombenena ugolimi . Awai hogohogona po i lautepanena meya apo ina woliligeya u alomi . Matababana ginouli a lata awai u yambeneneya apo una tuhaga meya . ’
42006039	Ma gasi Yesu geka paliluwaluwana i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Lawa matana keekena apega tu matakeke tulana ina weluwaya . Inapa ina weluwaya yaka apo hau domo hina peu gogona .
42006040	Tu lunonola a tu wiatatiyana apega ina gelagoni . Tamogi tu wisikuluna houga awai a sikulu ina wikokowi tauna apo mei a tu wiatatiyana .
42006041	‘ Awai binei walehim u matana dubudubu e gagaleya ma tam u matam mayau tipolina ega uta genogeya ?
42006042	Apo iyowai walehimna ugolina una baha nae una pa , “ Walehiu , una nei po u matam dubudubu a wihaleya ” , inapa tam u matam mayau tipolina ega una galeya ? Tam tu wikoyakoyama . U matam mayouna tipolina una wihalena tahaeya po una galena imahi ma apoma walehim u matana dubudubu una wihaleya .
42006043	‘ Mayau dewadewana apega ugona kakai ina houni . Ma kakai mayouna apega ugona dewadewana ina houni .
42006044	Matababana mayau atapuhi hai ugo ugolihiyei ma ta gagalena tuhagahi . Apega sitaniya u toyana kiyaha ugona una lohi po apega gologolowa gowana wine ugona donadona u toyana una lohi .
42006045	Lawa dewadewana u nugonugona ginouli dewadewahi he mamae apo ina hauhopunehi . Ma lawa apapoena u nugonugona ginouli apapoehi he mamae apo ina hauhopunehi . Matababana lawa nugonugona awai i wihogoya po e mamae apo gamonei ina baheya .
42006046	‘ Awai binei o pa , “ Guyau , Guyau ” , ma awai a palipaliwelemi ega ota wootagohi .
42006047	Iyai ina nei ugoliu po u baha ina nonolihi ma ina dewa tagohi apo a wogeleteya ugolimi tauna galenana mei iyai .
42006048	Tauna mei tu lunuma . I ludomo hopu po dobu waigaigaimana ugolina a ogola i pati tatahi po hougana goila i hopuhopu po numana i launi . Tamogi ega ita guhuya babana i wogo imahiyeya .
42006049	Ma iyai u baha ina nonolihi ma ega ina dewa tagohi , tauna mei lawa numa i wogowogoya po ega ogola ita pati tatahi . Hougana goila i hopu po numana i laulauni naka mala emosi ma i guli po i laugolutena haleya . ’
42007001	Yesu geka bahahi atapuhi i ibaabaniyehi lawa ugolihi po i kokoe ma i nae u Kapenaum .
42007002	Noka hosi mi Loma hai tu wigawiya tu galena itetehi a tu bagibagi upuna hegohegoyana i totogo po mei ina hilahilage .
42007003	Hougana lawana Yesu noyana i noonoli po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga i himilihi , ipa hina nae po Yesu hina baha po ina nei po tu bagibagina ina luyawahi .
42007004	Tu tahayahi hi nae po Yesu ugolina hi bahabaha gonugonuwa i pa , ‘ Geka lawana to bahebaheya a dumalu ipa una haguya .
42007005	Matababana tauta mi Yudeya i luhogaleta po ata numa dalabu i witowoli . ’
42007006	Ega yaka Yesu mitehi hi nae . Hougana hi nae po tu galena itetena a numa hi tutuliyaliyani ma tu galena itetena a lawa i himilihi po hi nei Yesu ugolina ipa a baha hina paliweleya . A bahana geka pite i pa , ‘ Guyau , ega una laigeno mem , babana tau ega u dewadewa awai ipa a winim po una lui mai u numa u hinena .
42007007	Geka binei ma tau ega ata nehi ugolim . Tamogi baha awa una baheya po apo u hewali ina luyagohana .
42007008	Babana tau gasi tanitaniwaga hai tu bagibagi taniwagana po tu wigawiya u nimau hi hounihi po a gagalena itetehi . Ma apo tu wigawiya emosi ugolina ana pa , “ Una nae ” , ma e nae . Ma apo gehouna ugolina ana pa , “ Una nei ” , ma e nei . Ma apo u tu bagibagi ugolina ana pa , “ Geka una dewaya ” , ma e dewaya . ’
42007009	Hougana geka bahahi Yesu i noonolihi po i goholi ma i luhagawileya po bolu hi imulitagoya ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ A paliwelemi , yohola mi Isalaela u hinemi ega lawa awai a witumagana ata galeya po mei geka lawana ’ .
42007010	Lawana a hewahewali hi gunawilehi po hi nenae tu galena itetena a u numa po tu bagibagina a kamna dewadewana hi tuhagaya .
42007011	Geka dewana u mulina Yesu i'mhoe po i nenae meyagai gowana Naina ugolina naka a hewahewali po bolu mitehi hi nae .
42007012	Meyageina matetana i tutuliyaliyani ma popoya hi awali po hi hopuhopu mai . Popoyana naka keduluma hiwahiwapena natuna amaka emosi hotana olotona . Ma lawa meyaginei boluhi hi wotago po tauna mitehi .
42007013	Guyau hougana hiwapena i gagaleya po nugonugona i wiyuweya ma i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Ega una tutou ’ .
42007014	Ma apoma i nae po halawina i wodadani po tu wikeyauga hi tutowolo ma i baha i pa , ‘ U hewali ugolim a bahabaha , una towolo ’ .
42007015	Ma popoyana i welutowolo po i tugudu po i ibaabani ma apoma Yesu wawinena natuna u nimana i palihaleya .
42007016	Matouta lawa atapuhi nugonugohi i hogoya po Yaubada hi wootalagiyeya hi pa , ‘ U hayata tu bahapiko gegena i lugeleteya ’ , po gasi hi pa , ‘ Yaubada a lawa i tudadanita ipa ina haguta ’ .
42007017	Ma Yesu tuweganana i gunanohaya po Yudeya tuponana atapuna po meyagai Yudeya u liyaliyana hi nonoli .
42007018	Yoni a hewahewali geka ginoulihi atapuhi tauna hi paliweleya .
42007019	Ega yaka a hewahewali luwaga i otugehi po i himilihi po hi nae Guyau ugolina po ipa hina pa , ‘ Tam iyai ? Tu wiluyagohana bimgei to iotonana ipa apo una nenei , bo ega tam ma lawa gehouna to ototonaneya ? ’
42007020	Ma hi nae po hougana Yesu ugolina hi laugeleta po hi baha hi pa , ‘ Yoni bapatiso i himiliyai ipa to lubayadem . Moina tam i bahebahem ipa apo una nenei bo ega tam ma lawa gehouna to ototoni ? ’
42007021	Noka kabudalana ugolina lawa hai totogo po hai hilitani i wihalehi . Ma gasi lawa alugo apapoehi u hinehi i wiyagahi po tu matakeke i luyawahihi .
42007022	Ma hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Awai o gagalehi po o noonolihi ona gunawilemi po Yoni ona paliweleya . Tu matakeke he gagalena imahi po tu aeapapoe he neneimahi po lepelo lawahi he wodewadewa meme po tu tanigapupu he launonola po lawa hau hilage ma he towotowolo meme po tu dayadayabu tuwega dewadewana he noonoli .
42007023	Iyai ega ita inugomagomagougeu tauna a kawaidewedeweya . ’
42007024	Yoni a baha tu hihiwa hougana hi'mhoe po hi nenae ma Yesu i wiwawala po bolu ugolihi i ipaliwelena Yoni binei i pa , ‘ Hougana o nenae hau balabala yabayababa Yoni ugolina ami nugotuhu ipa awai ona galeya ? Ega togowa didiyala ita kwadikwadiyeya ma ota galeya .
42007025	Ma ami nugotuhu ipa awai ona galeya ? Ega ipa lawa a wihiya gegena , bo ? Babana lawa noka pite hai wihiya po hai wigapola naka tauhi wasawasa hai u numa he tugutugula .
42007026	Ona paliweleu awai ipa ona galeya ? Tu bahapiko , bo ? Moina tauna tu bahapiko tamogi tu bahapiko atapuhi i gelagonihi .
42007027	Matababana Yaubada a Buka ugolina tauna ubeina hi baha hi pa , “ Una galeya , u tu winoyanoya apo a himila tahaeyem po am tahaya ina wononogogeya . ”
42007028	A paliwelemi , ega meka lawa hita guni po a gae mei Yoni . Tamogi Yaubada anani taniwaga ugolina lawa muhomuhohi tauhi hi geduma ma apoma Yoni . ’
42007029	( Hougana lawa tapuhi po takisi tu tama geka bahahi hi noonolihi po Yaubada a tahaya hi kawamoineya . Naka tauhi lolowa Yoni i bapatisohi .
42007030	Tamogi Palisi lawahi po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi Yaubada a nugotuhu ubeihi hi wihinigigiyeya , po tauhi Yoni ega ita wibapatisohi . )
42007031	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Lawa geka hapanana apo awai ugolina a wiluweluwena niyehi po galenahi awai ?
42007032	Tauhi mei logaloga ani gimala meyageina ugolina he tugula ma he yampalidamadamana he pa , “ Ubeimi to lauinainaga ma ega ota hala . Ma to tutou ma ega ota tou haguiyai . ”
42007033	Ma Yoni bapatiso i nenei naka a omhilagena po ega wine ita umaya ma o ibaabani o pa , “ Tauna alugo apapoena u hinena ” .
42007034	Tau Lawa Moinau a nenei a omniu po a umau ma o pa , “ Geka lawana ona galeya , tauna tu'mlabatana po tu uma buuwa po a lawa takisi tu tama po tu apapoe ” .
42007035	Tamogi Yaubada a hanapu iyawoi ugolihi apo hina baheya naka hanapu moinana . ’
42007036	Palisi gehouna gowana Simona Yesu i igigimeya po ipa mitehi hina am . Yaka i lui Simona a u numa po hau ani am i tugula .
42007037	Ma noka u meyageina tu apapoe wawinena gehouna i mamae . Tauna Yesu tuwegana i nonoli naka Simona a u numa i'mam . Ega yaka wedu gaimei hi dewadewaya u hinena wakatu dimudimumuna i awali po i nei .
42007038	Ma i nae po Yesu u mulina i towolo , aena u liyaliyana ma i tutou naka matadiligwegwena Yesu aena i lainigi . Apoma apalanei Yesu aena i hamagi po aenana i yagoni ma ugolina wakatu dimudimumuna i howogi .
42007039	Ma Simona i gagaleya po tuawana u nugonugona i pa , ‘ Itapa geka lawana tu bahapiko apo geka wawinena a luyagohana galenana waiigohina apo ita hanapugeya . Ma tauna Yesu e wodadani po apo ita hanapugeya naka wawinena wawine apapoena . ’
42007040	Ma Yesu Simona a winugonugotuhu i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Simona , ginouli gehouna ugolim ipa a baheya ’ . Ma Simona i pa , ‘ Bada , ginouli awai ? ’
42007041	Ma Yesu i pa , ‘ Lawa gehouna ugolina lawa luwaga mone hi tama yageya . Lawa emosi a yaga naka 5 kina ma gehouna a yaga 50 kina .
42007042	Hai yagahi ega emoemotahi ipa hina lidumaluhi yaka lawana i kawahawenehi . Ma geka hai luwagahi naka apo iyai tulahina ina luhogalena dumaya ? ’
42007043	Ma Simona a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Nugote lawana a yaga baneina apo tulahina ina luhogalena dumaya ’ . Ma Yesu i pa , ‘ Naka u baha moina ’ .
42007044	Apoma i luhagawileya wawinena ugolina ma Simona ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Geka wawinena u galeya . A geletai am u numa po ega aeu goilana uta weleu ma tauna matadiligwegwenei aeu i linigi ma apalanei i hamagi .
42007045	Tam ega niuwe uta yagoni ma tauna a gelegeletai naka aeu i yagoyagoni ma i nei po geka .
42007046	Ega wakatugei apalau uta wololoya ma tauna wakatu dimudimumunei aeu i wololoya .
42007047	Ugolinei ma a paliwelem naka a apapoe magomagouhi amaka a paligigilihi . Matababana a luhogala i lata duma . Ma iyai a paligigila ina habulu ugolinei a luhogala i habulu . ’
42007048	Apoma wawinena ugolina Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Am apapoe a paligigilihi ’ .
42007049	Ma iyawoi tauna mitehi hau ani am hi tugutugula tuawahi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Geka iyai tauna , po apapoe e palipaligigilihi ? ’
42007050	Ma Yesu wawinena ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ A nugodumolam una nae , am witumagana i wiluyagohanim ’ .
42008001	Geka u mulina Yesu i kadau po i nae meyagai baneihi po habuluhi Yaubada anani taniwaga tuwegana dewadewana i guuguyeya . Ma a hewahewali magouhi 12 tauna mitehi hi nae .
42008002	Ma gasi wiwine gehouhi hai hilitani po alugo apapoehi ugolihi ma lolowa i lauyawahihi mitehi hi nae . Geka wiwinehi naka Maliya ( gowana gehouna Magadala ) tauna ugolina alugo apapoehi magouhi 7 i wiyagahi .
42008003	Ma Heloda a tu poula gowana Kusa ma agona gowana Yowana Yesu i wotagoya . Ma Susana ma gasi wiwine gehouhi . Tauhi hai gapolagei Yesu a hewahewali mitehi hi haguhi .
42008004	Lawa meyagai emosi po emosi ugolihiyei hi liyaliya nae po hougana bolu baneina hi yamtuboina naka Yesu geka paliluwaluwana i baheya i pa ,
42008005	‘ Tu lupehi i nae a tano ugolina po a pehi polahi i nohanohahi . I nohahi po i nenae naka gehouhi hau tahaya hi peu po lawa hi tutanihi po kiu hi anihi .
42008006	Ma gehouhi dobu waigaigaimana ugolina hi peu po hougana hi lahalahahi naka kabudala i lalana unihi , babana hipulina ega ita niginigi .
42008007	Ma pola gehouhi hiyamoni waidonadonana u hayahi hi peu po hougana hi lahalahahi naka donadona i numa panipani unihi .
42008008	Ma pola gehouhi hipuli dewadewana ugolina hi peu po hi lata po hi ugo . Hai houga ugo naka hi ugo duma . ’ Apoma Yesu i pa , ‘ Taumi iyawoi waitanigami yaka ona launonola ’ .
42008009	Geka ompaliluwaluwana anona awai binei Yesu a hewahewali hi lubayadeya .
42008010	Ma Yesu i pa , ‘ Yaubada anani taniwaga hanapuna gowagowadana taumi ugolimi amaka i lugeleteya . Ma gehouhi ompaliluwaluwagei apo a bahabaha nae ugolihi . “ Ma apo hina ihalu ma apega hina galena tuhaga po apo hina launonola ma apega hina hanapugeya . ” ’
42008011	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Geka ompaliluwaluwana anona . Pola anona naka Yaubada a baha .
42008012	Pola hau tahaya hi pipeu naka iyawoi amaka Yaubada a baha hi nonoli ma Tomodulele i nei po bahana u nugonugohi i wihaleya . Ma naka tauhi apega hina witumagana po hina luyagohana .
42008013	Pola dobu waigaigaimana ugolina hi pipeu anona naka iyawoi amaka anai kaohahi Yaubada a baha hi nonoli , tamogi ega dedehi ugolinei ma he itumagana po ega daona ma hai ludadana kabudalana ina geleta naka amaka he peu .
42008014	Hiyamoni waidonadonahi u hayahi pola hi pipeu anona naka iyawoi amaka Yaubada a baha hi nonoli , ma tamogi winugopilipili po wigapola po ani kaoha gehouhi he lui mai hai luyagohana ugolihi po e panihi po ugohi ega hita gugou .
42008015	Pola hipuli dewadewana ugolina hi pipeu naka anona iyawoi amaka Yaubada a baha hi nonoli po nugonugohi moinahi po dumadumaluhi ugolihi hi houna emotehi . Ma hai upuhegoyagei apo hina ugo . ’
42008016	Yesu i baha i pa , ‘ Ega iyai lampa ita apuya ma gaebagei ita lautataya bo ani eno u gaboulina ita huhouni , tamogi anani tugula ugolina e houni po lawa he luilui apo yayatana hina galeya .
42008017	Awai gowagowadana apo ina wihabuhabuna po lawa hina nonoli . Ma awai gowagowadana apo hina tuhagaya po hina neiyai hau yayata po lawa hina galeya . Iyowai o lautanigana ipa ona gagalena imahi . Matababana iyai ugolina awai dewadewana e mamae apo Yaubada ina luwitani tauna ugolina . Ma iyai ugolina eega , ma a nugotuhu ipa awai habuluna e mamae apo Yaubada ina wihaleya . ’
42008018	
42008019	Yesu hinana po walewalehina hi nae ugolina tamogi ega hita geleta babana bolu i lata duma .
42008020	Ma lawa gehouna Yesu i paliweleya i pa , ‘ Hinam po walewalehim u uputa ma hai luhogala ipa hina galem ’ .
42008021	Tamogi Yesu lawa atapuhi ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Hinau po walewalehiu naka tauhi Yaubada a baha hi nonoli po he iponawogogeya ’ .
42008022	Iyeta gehouna Yesu a hewahewali ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Ta damana po ta nae geka bogana u tupona ’ . Ega yaka hi gelu hopu
42008023	po hi'mkuka po hi nenae ma Yesu i eno . Ma togowa baneina bogana i launi po hai wam i higuya po mei hina yoliyoli .
42008024	Yesu a hewahewali hi nei po hi limaamahi po i towolo ma hi pa , ‘ Bada , Bada , ega daona ma apo ta hilage ’ . Yesu i welutowolo po togowa ma boga anai guligulina i lahahi po hi todi ma noka hougana dumola baneina .
42008025	Apoma a hewahewali ugolihi i baha i pa , ‘ Meka ami witumagana o hounihi ? ’ Ma tauhi hi goholihi po tuawahi hi yamhuna hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana iyai po e baha nae togowa po boga ugolihi ma he iponawogogeya ? ’
42008026	Galili bogana u tuponei dobu gowana Gelasene ugolina hi lugeleta .
42008027	Hougana Yesu i hauhopu hau hipuli naka lawa noka meyageinei alugo apapoehi hi luiluiya tauna ma Yesu hi witutuhaga . Houga i dao ega kaleko ita oteni po ega hau numa ita mamae ma hau kokowaga i mamae .
42008028	Hougana Yesu i gagaleya po i wootu ma u aena i guli hopu po ponana i lata ma i pa , ‘ Yesu , Yaubada Gegewahagana Natuna tam . Awai ipa ugoliu una dewaya ? A laupali gonugonuwa ega una ihiniwiyuwau . ’
42008029	Geka bahana i bahebaheya babana Yesu i baha ipa alugo apapoena lawana ina hopu haleya . Houga magomagouna hinina hi luiluiya po hawena hau numa panipani gulawa pawasigei he panipani ma apo ina lautuiya ma alugona e weluwaya po e niyeya hau balabala yabayababa .
42008030	Apoma Yesu lawana i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Gowam iyai ? ’ Ma tauna i pa , ‘ Boluiyai ’ , babana alugo apapoehi boluhi tauna u hinena hi lui .
42008031	Alugohi apapoehi Yesu hi lupaliyeya po ipa ega ina himihimilihi domo daodaona u hinena .
42008032	Ma polo boluhi oya u hadana hi banibani , Yesu u liyaliyana . Alugohi hi lupali gonugonuwa ipa ina palihalehi po polohi ugolihi hina lui . Ega yaka Yesu i palihalehi .
42008033	Apoma alugo apapoehi lawana hi hopu haleya po polohi hi luinihi . Ma polohi oyana yapanei hi haha hopu po bogana ugolina hi halele .
42008034	Polohi tu galena itetehi awai hi gagaleya po hi lowo po hi nae dobu baneina po pitapita tu miyehi ugolihi hi wibenabenama awai hi gelegeleta .
42008035	Apoma lawa hi hopu po hi nae ipa awai i waawala hina galeya po Yesu ugolina hi geleta . Ma lawana alugo apapoehi hi nenehaleya naka hi tuhagaya Yesu aena u labena i tugutugula . Tauna i lukaleko po nugonugona a dumadumaluna ma hi gagaleya po hi matouta .
42008036	Ma iyawoi geka dewana hi gagaleya naka lawa hi paliwelehi iyowai Yesu lawana i lauyawahi .
