43021018	A baha duma uyahim , om houga tewela uyahina om nogutuhu ipa meka una nae naka om dagilolo u lumomohi ma apo una nae . Ma apo om houga wibada uyahina nimam una lodomi po lawa gehouhi hina widagilolom , ma tupo ega uta lauhogaleya apo uyahina hina niyem . ’
43021019	A baha geka naka Pita a hilage binei i ibaabani , ipa hina hanapugeya . Ma a hilagena uyahina Yaubada gowana ina wilataya . Yesu Pita uyahina i baha i pa , ‘ Una wootagou ’ .
43021020	Hewalina Yesu i lauhogaleya i wotagohi ma Pita i luhagawileya po i galeya ( ma nugonei i gae tauna Yesu i luhogaleya yaka toleha uyahina u nugonugona i luwahala ma i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Guyau , iyai apo ina nugohalem ? ’
43021021	Uyahinei Pita i baha nae Yesu uyahina i pa , ‘ Guyau , Yoni tauna iyowai ? ’ )
43021022	Yesu Pita a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Itapa ita memae ma ata gunawilena meu naka ega om nugotuhu . Tam tunawam una wimulitagou . ’
43021023	A baha geka binei ma tu witumagana gehouhi hi winugonugotuhu powa , po hi pa , ‘ Yoni apega ina hilage ’ . Yesu ega ita baha uyahina ita pa , ‘ Apega ina hilage ’ ; tamogi i pa , ‘ Itapa u nugotuhu ita memae ma ata gunawilena meu , naka ega om nugotuhu ’ .
43021024	A hewali gehouna ginouli magomagouhi i bahebahehi amaka i giluma hopunehi , ma lawa magomagouhi hi limoineya .
43021025	Yesu ginouli atapuhi i dewadewahi , itapa emosi po emosi hita gilumi , a nugonugotuhuya apo buka hita maga duma po hipuli tupo wohepali hita wihogoya .
44001001	Tiyopilasi , u buka tahatahayana u hinena Yesu a bagibagi i wawali hougana , ginouli atapuhi i dewadewahi po i iatatiyanehi a gilugilumi
44001002	i nae po a siga iyetana Yaubada i waya po i gae hau yada . Yohola ega po ita gae ma Alugo Woiyawa a hanapugei litahatahaya a tu wituwetuwega i inaganihi i welehi .
44001003	A hilage u mulina dewa tapuna po tapunei i woogeletena meya a tu wituwetuwega ugolihi ma i mamae naka iyeta magouhi 40 . Ma iyowai i woogeletena meya naka ega ani lunugoluwaluwaga ma tamogi moina dumana i lauyagohana . A tu wituwetuwega hi galeya po mitehi hi ibaabani naka Yaubada anani taniwaga i paliwelehi .
44001004	Hougana tauna po a tu wituwetuwega hi'mtuboina gogona ma i baha kadidili ugolihi i pa , ‘ Ega Yelusalem ona nenehaleya . Amau anani'mbenena i palipaliwitumaganana a bahebaheya ona ototoni ,
44001005	babana Yoni goilei lawa i bapatisohi ma taumi apo iyeta wabihaga u hinena Alugo Woiyawa ugolinei bapatiso ona waya . ’
44001006	Yesu a tu wituwetuwega mitehi hougana hi yamtuboina gogona naka hi lubayadeya hi pa , ‘ Guyau , apo geka u hougana mi Isalaela i witaniwaga una wele meiyai ? ’
44001007	Yesu hai baha i wimihaya i pa , ‘ Amau tuawana a taniwagagei apo geka ginoulihi wawala hougahi ina hounihi ma ega ipa taumi ona hanapugehi .
44001008	Ma tamogi hougana Alugo Woiyawa ugolimi ina geleta , apo ona manini . Taumi apo tuwegau ona nohaya lawa atapuhi u Yelusalem dobuna ugolina po tupo Yudeya po Samaliya ma i nae po hipuli a u ani kokoe ugolihi . ’
44001009	Geka a bahana u mulina Yaubada i waya po i gae hau yada . Hi ihalu ma yaloi Yesu i guduya po u matahi i lugowadeya .
44001010	Yesu i nenae ma a tu wituwetuwega hi todi ma hi ihalugeya ma mala emosi lawa luwaga , hai kaleko wakewakekehi awa hi lugeletehi po u liyaliyahi hi towotowolo .
44001011	Lawahi luwaga hi lubayada hi pa , ‘ Lawa mi Galili , iyowai po o towolo ma o ihalu gae hau yada ? Yesu lolowa mitehi o mamae ma iyowai Yaubada i waya po e gegae hau yada naka apo dewana emotanei ina gunawileya . ’
44001012	Oliweta u oyana ma hi gunawilehi po hi nenae u Yelusalem naka balana ega ita dao babana oyana naka Yelusalem u liyaliyana .
44001013	Ma hougana hi lui u Yelusalem po hi gae numa babanoyana wiluwaganaa ugolina , noka u hougana hi mimiyeya . Tu wituwetuwegahi naka : Pita , Yoni , Yamesa , Andulu , Pilipo , Tomasi , Batolomiu , Matiu , Yamesa Alipi natuna , Simona tauna mi Yudeya hai tu'mpaligudugudu , Yudasa Yamesa natuna .
44001014	Houga magomagouna tauhi ma Yesu tu wotagona wiwinehi , po Maliya , Yesu hinana , po Yesu walewalehina naka hi yamtuboina gogona ma hau tapalolo hi welewele mehi .
44001015	Houga noka ugolina tu witumagana nugote magouhi 120 hi'mtuboina mai ma Pita i towolo po ugolihi i baha i pa ,
44001016	‘ Walewalehiu , Yaubada a baha amaka i limoineya . Ugolinei ma Alugo Woiyawa Dawita i tubahabahaya po i bahabaha piko tu'mpalihalena binei . Po amaka Yudasa tauna lawa i litahatahaehi po Yesu hi numa panipani .
44001017	Yudasana Yesu i winagani po a tupo i dewaya ata bagibagi u hinena , po tauna tulata igehouna . ’
44001018	( Yudasana i benabenama po mihana hi weleweleya ugolinei hipuli i gimaleya . Ma geka hipulina ugolina i peu po amamona a liyalapoila po i hilage .
44001019	Lawa atapuhi u Yelusalem hi nonoli yaka hipulina hi wigowaya hai ponei hi pa Akedama bo ta baheya Hipuli Waitalana . )
44001020	Pita gasi i baha i pa , ‘ Buka Sam ugolina Yudasa ubeina i baheya i pa , “ A numa ina gouda po ega lawa igehouna u hinena ina mamae . ” Ma gasi Buka i pa , “ Tamogi lawa gehouna apo iyawena ina peli . ”
44001021	Yaka apo yohola Yudasa tu luhalenana lawa awai houga magomagouna i mulitagotago Guyau Yesu a gae po a hopu ugolihi ,
44001022	ma gasi Yoni Yesu i bapatisoya hougana ma i nei po Yesu a gae hougana . Geka lawana tauna ina nei po Yesu a towolo meme tona ituwetuwegeya . ’
44001023	Ega yaka lawa luwaga gowahi hi bahehi : Yosepa ma gowana gehouna Basabasa ma gasi gowana gehouna Yusito ; ma Matiyasi .
44001024	Hi bahehi po i kokoe ma hi tapalolo hi pa , ‘ Guyau , lawa hai winugonugotuhu u hanapugena dumahi . Yaka geka lawahi luwaga ugolihi emosi u inagani una wogeleteya .
44001025	Tauna apo geka bagibagina po wituwetuwegana Yudasa i nenehaleya ina towologeya babana Yudasa amaka i newahaga . ’
44001026	Hai luwagahi hi wikibu gowagowadehi po Matiyasi a winagana i lugeleteya yaka tauna i lui tu wituwetuwega hai bolu magouhi 12 ugolina .
44002001	Mi Yudeya hai toleha iyetana gowana Penitikosi . Noka hougana tu witumagana atapuhi hi'mtuboina gogona po hi winugoemota .
44002002	Hi duhuduhuna po mala emosi ma gololo mei togowa baneina gololona yadei i hopu mai po numana i wihogoya .
44002003	Ma hai galena ugolina ginouli mei mayau ina laumenamena u hayahi , po menamenana emosi po emosi lawa emosi po emosi i tatadadani .
44002004	Ma Alugo Woiyawa i wihogohi po i dewahi po pona tapuhi po tapuhigei hi ibaabani .
44002005	Lawa atapuhi hai witumagana Yaubada ugolina mei mi Yudeya hai witumagana tupo atapunei hi nei u Yelusalem po ipa hina toleha . Tauhi tu witumagana kadidili Yaubada ugolina .
44002006	Hougana gololona hi noonoli po bolu baneina hi'mboina nei numana u liyaliyana , po nugonugohi i goholi babana lawa emosi po emosi a pona i noonola tuhagaya .
44002007	Hai nugogohola po nugopilipili ugolina ma hi pa , ‘ Geka lawahi noka pite he ibaabani naka tauhi mi Galili ?
44002008	Ma iyowai po tauta emosi po emosi ata meyagai ponana ta noonola tuhagaya ?
44002009	Tauta mi Pateya po mi Midiya po mi Elama po mi Mesopotamiya po mi Yudeya po mi Kapadosiya po mi Ponita po mi Asiya
44002010	po mi Piligiya po mi Pampiliya po mi Isipita po Libiya ani taniwagana tupohihi Sailini u liyaliyana . Ma gehouta Loma tu mimiyena ,
44002011	naka tupota ata babada mi Yudeya ma tupota moina mi Loma ma ata witumagana mei mi Yudeya . Ma gehouta mi Kilita po mi Alebiya . Tamogi ginouli baneihi Yaubada i dewadewahi ataputa ata ponei he bahebahehi ma ta noonolihi . ’
44002012	Hai nugogohola po hai nugopilipili ugolinei ma yohola hi lulubayadena mehi hi pa , ‘ Geka ginoulina anona awai ? ’
44002013	Ma gehouhi tu witumaganahi hi paliguyoguyougehi hi pa , ‘ Geka lawahi hi uma po hi buuwa ’ .
44002014	Ega yaka Pita ma tu wituwetuwegahi gehouhi magouhi 11 mitehi hi towolo , po Pita ponana i lata ma bolu ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Yudeya po taumi atapumi u Yelusalem o mamae , ona lautanigana imahi ma a paliwelemi .
44002015	Ami nugotuhu o pa tiyai tota uma po tota buuwa ma tamogi eega , babana geka apoma e gegae ata malatomtom amna kabudalana ugolina .
44002016	Ma tamogi moina dumana geka awai e wawala naka Yaubada a tu bahapiko odubona gowana Yoela i bahehi .
44002017	Yaubada i baha i pa : “ Houga sigasigana u hinena apo geka dewahi a dewehi Alugo Woiyawa apo lawa atapuhi a welehi . Natunatumi ololotohi po wiwinehi apo u baha hina bahabaha pikogeya , ami hewahewali ma babada apo u kawaimoina hina luboniyehi .
44002018	Ee , noka hougana ugolina u tu bagibagi ololotohi po wiwinehi , Alugo Woiyawa apo a welehi po u baha hina bahabaha pikogehi .
44002019	Apo u manini hau yada a wogeletehi , ma u wekiwekilala hau hipuli a wogeletehi . Tala po mayau ebebalana po bogahu wopotopotona .
44002020	Kabudala apo ina uguwi ma wamahiya ina kaya po ani galenana mei tala , ma muliyei apoma Guyau a iyeta ina geleta , naka iyetana iyeta baneina po namanamalina .
44002021	Ma apoma iyawoi nawa Guyau gowanei hina laupali apo hina luyagohana . ” ’
44002022	Pita gasi i baha i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Yudeya , geka bahahi ona nonolihi : Yesu Nasaletagei , Yaubada a manini po a wipoya po a wekiwekilala amodewedewei i wogeletehi po ugolinei Yaubada a winagana i limoineya . Tauta geka ta hanapugeya babana u hayata i wawala .
44002023	Yaubada i nugotuhu lagoneya yaka Yudasa Yesu u nimami i houni , ma taumi o uni babana ombeneneya tu apapoe lawahi ugolihi po hau ani take hi tutuya po i hilage .
44002024	Tamogi Yaubada i witowolo meya hilage ugolina po hilage wiyuwahi i wihalehi , babana hilage ega a kadidili emoemotana ipa ina womomohi .
44002025	Ubeina po Dawita i baha i pa , “ Houga magomagouna Guyau u matana a gagaleya . U awala hinebawau e mamae ugolinei apega lawa hina lipilipiliu .
44002026	Geka binei nugonugou i kaoha ma u baha kaoha awa , yaka hawena apo uyogou ina buda ma a nugotuhu lagoneya a towolo meme ugolina .
44002027	Matababana tau apega hau hiyoyowa una nugohelau yaka gasi apega am tu bagibagi una palihaleu po hiniu ina buda .
44002028	Tam luyagohana tahayana u wiatatiyeu , ma tau tam u matam apo a kaoha duma . ”
44002029	Gasi Pita i baha i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , dumalugei apo a paliwelemi naka gogata Dawita i hilage po hi guluwi ma kokowagana amalai e mamae ugolita .
44002030	Tauna tu wipiko ma Yaubada a paliwitumagana kadidilina ugolina i hanapugeya . Yaubada a paliwitumagana ipa apo Dawita gogana emosi ina witaniwaga mei Dawita .
44002031	Ma Dawita i nugotuhu lagoneya apo Yaubada awai ina dewaya . Yaka Keliso a towolo meme ubeina i baha i pa , “ Apeega hau hiyoyowa una nugohaleu ma hiniu apeega ina buda . ”
44002032	Naka binei Yaubada geka Yesuna hilage ugolina i witowoli , ubeina ma tauyai tu baha moina babana matiyei to galeya .
44002033	Yesu i wohepaya po u awala hinebawana e mamae . Ma a paliwitumagana ubeina Alugo Woiyawa Yesu i weliyai . Yaka i dewa geka amalai o noonolihi po o gagalehi naka Yesu anani'mbenena i lautepaneya ugoliyai .
44002034	Dawita ega ita gae hau yada mei Yesu ma tamogi i pa , “ Yaubada u Guyau ugolina i baha nae i pa : U awala hinebawau una duhuduhuna
44002035	a sigana am gawiya una kadidili lagonihi po aem u labena a hounihi . ”
44002036	U lawa , mi Isalaela atapumi , ipa ona hanapugena dumaya geka Yesuna hau ani take o tuutulawiteya naka Yaubada i dewaya po Yesu tauna Guyau po tauna Besinana lawana . ’
44002037	Hougana lawa geka bahahi hi noonolihi po hi nugotona . Hi baha nae Pita po tu wituwetuwegahi gehouhi ugolihi hi pa , ‘ Walewalehiyai , apo awai to dewaya ? ’
44002038	Pita ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ Atapumi ona nugobui ma bapatiso Yesu Keliso gowanei ona waya , po apo Yaubada ami apapoe ina paligigilihi ma ani'mbenena Alugo Woiyawa ona tuhagaya ,
44002039	babana Yaubada a paliwitumagana Alugo Woiyawa binei ugolita po natunatuta ugolihi po bala daodaohi tu miyehi ugolihi . Guyau ata Yaubada e igiigimana ataputa ugolita ’ .
44002040	Pita guguya daodaona i welehi Yesu tuwegana ubeina ma i palihunahunahi i pa , ‘ Ami apapoe ona palihalehi yaka apega tu apapoe mitehi ona hilage ’ .
44002041	Iyawoi Pita a baha hi itumaganeya naka noka iyetana ugolina bapatiso hi waya . Magouhi mei tausana tonuga hi lui tu witumagana gugunihi ugolina .
44002042	Ma tu wituwetuwega hai wiatatiyana po hai wilawalawa ugolihi hi palihalena mehi . Ma gasi palawa omtomutomuna ugolina Yesu hi nugonugohepaya ma hi tapatapalolo .
44002043	Yaubada a manini po a wipoya tu wituwetuwega ugolihiyei i wogeletehi po lawa atapuhi hi matouta .
44002044	Tu witumagana atapuhi hi meme labelabena mehi ma hi ginouli luluemota .
44002045	Hai hipuli po hai gapola hi gimalena halehi ma mihahi hai lawa , tu witumagana ega hita igapola hi welehi .
44002046	Iyeta emosi po emosi Yelusalem hai numa dalabu baneina ugolina hi yamboina gogona . Ma Yesu hi nugonugohepaya palawa omtomutomunei naka anai kaohahi po anai nugoemotahi hai numa emosi po emosi ugolina hi yamgogoneya .
44002047	Yaubada hi hunehuneya ma tu meuputa lawahi tu witumaganahi hi lunugodewedewehi . Ma Guyau iyeta emosi po emosi tu witumaganahi i laimagouhi lawa tu nugobuigei .
44003001	Ibiga u tipolina , lupali kabudalana ugolina Pita ma Yoni hi nae Yelusalem numa dalabu baneina ugolina .
44003002	Noka hougana lawa aena paapana hinana u managona ma noka pite i wawala . Iyeta emosi po emosi hi awala niyeya po numa dalabuna baneina matetana , gowana Mateta Diidigana ugolina hi huhouni . Ma hagu lawa tu lui ugolihi i laupali . Noka pite houga magomagouna i dewadewa .
44003003	Hougana Pita ma Yoni hi luilui ma i galehi yaka i lupali ipa mone hina weleya .
44003004	Hi todi po hi gagaleya ma Pita i pa , ‘ Una galeiyai ! ’
44003005	Ega yaka i ihalugehi anai witumaganana ipa apo awai hina weleya .
44003006	Ma Pita i pa , ‘ Ega u mone ma tamogi awai ugoliu e mamae apo a welem . Yesu Keliso Nasaletagei gowanei una towolo po una nae . ’
44003007	Apoma Pita tu aepapana u awala hinebawana i wogo po i witowoli . Mala emosi ma ae yapayapana po ikwalukwaluna hi kadidili .
44003008	Ma i lupa gae po i hopu i lautowologeya po i nae . Apoma i nenelupalupa ma Yaubada i hunehuneya ma Pita po Yoni mitehi hi lui numa dalabu baneina ugolina .
44003009	Lawa atapuhi i nenelupalupa ma Yaubada i hunehuneya hi gagaleya
44003010	po hi galena tuhaga , tauna Mateta Diidigana ugolina i duhuna houga magomagouna ma mone i laupali . Hai galena tuhagaya awai i wawala ugolina ma apoma hi gohola dumahi po hai winugonugotuhu hi kokoe .
44003011	Tu aepapana hi lauyawahi Pita ma Yoni ugolihi i womomota po Solomona a kape ugolina hi mamae . Ma lawa atapuhi anai nugogoholahi hi wibulibulili nae po ugolihi hi'mtuboina .
44003012	Hougana Pita lawahi i gagalehi po ugolihi i baha nae i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Yudeya , iyowai po geka dewana o goholeya ma iyowai po o ihalugeiyai ? Omi nugotuhu o pa i kadidili bo i dewadewa Yaubada u matana ugolihiyei geka lawana tota dewaya po ita nenae ?
44003013	Abelaham po Isako po Yakobo hai Yaubada , googata hai Yaubada tauna a tu bagibagi Yesu kawaidewadewa wotalagaena i weleya . Taumi ombeneneya tu taniwaga ugolihi ma o wihinigigiyeya Pilato u matana . Hougana Pilato ipa ina wohaleya ma taumi yohola o ikawakoyakoyameya .
44003014	Tauna Lawa Waiwoiyawana po Dumadumaluna , tamogi o wihinigigiyeya ma o lupali po tu'munugo Pilato i wohaleya .
44003015	Yaka taumi Lawa Luyagohana tu weleta o uni ma tamogi Yaubada hilage ugolina i witowola meya . Geka ubeina tauta tu baha moina .
44003016	Geka lawana o gagaleya po o hanahanapugeya naka witumagana Yesu gowanei kadidili po dewadewa i waya atapumi u matami .
44003017	‘ Ma walewalehiu , amalai a hanapugeya taumi po ata tanitaniwaga awai Yesu ugolina hi dewadewaya naka o dewaya babana o winugoneina .
44003018	Amaka mei lolowa Yaubada a baha tu bahapiko atapuhi ugolihiyei i wogeleteya naka apo a Besinana hinina ina iyuwa amaka Yaubada i limoineya .
44003019	Ugolinei ona nugobui ma ona luhagawilemi yaka apo Yaubada ami apapoe ina hamaga halehi
44003020	ma Guyau wiyagohina hougana ina welemi . Ma apo Yesu , Yaubada a Besinana amaka i inagani ubeita ina himila hopunena meyai .
44003021	Hau yada apo ina mamae a sigana ina gunawileya po ginouli atapuhi ina liwou mehi , mei lolowa Yaubada a tu bahapiko waiwoiyawahi hi pikogeya .
44003022	Ma tu bahapiko Mose i pa , “ Yaubada ata Guyau apo tu bahapiko gehouna mei tau ina himili ugolimi . Taumi omi bolu ugolinei ina nei . Ginouli atapuhi ina ibaabaniyehi ona lautaniganehi .
44003023	Iyai noka tu wipikona awai ina bahebahehi ega ina lautaniganehi apo Yaubada bolu ugolina ina wihaleya po ina houni hau hilage . ”
44003024	‘ Tu bahapiko Samwela a u houga ma i wawala po i gegei naka awai hi bahebahehi amalai he waawala .
44003025	Tauta tu bahapiko googahi ugolinei Yaubada wiwogatala i dewadewaya googata mitehi a tu bahapiko ugolihiyei i bahebahehi naka tauta ubeita . Mei a baha nae Abelaham ugolina i pa , “ Am guguni ugolihiyei apo lawa atapuhi hau hipuli kawaidewadewa a welehi ” .
44003026	Yaka Yaubada a Tu bagibagi Yesu i winagani ma i himili po i netahaya mai tauta mi Yudeya ugolita . Ugolinei ami dewa apapoehi ugolihi ina wiiwilimi naka anani kawaidewadewa ugolimi . ’
44004001	Pita ma Yoni yohola lawa ugolihi hi ibaabani ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi po numa dalabu baneina tu galena itete hai bada po Sadusi hai bolu hi nei ugolihi .
44004002	Uyohi i gigai babana Pita ma Yoni Yesu hi iatatiyaneya ma hilage ugolina a towolo meme hi kawaimoineya , apo lawa hilage ugolina hina towolo meme .
44004003	Yaka hi panihi po numa panipani ugolina hi hounihi po hi eno babana amaka kabudala i nae .
44004004	Ma tamogi lawa i maga bahana hi noonoli hi witumagana , po tu witumagana lawahi hai maga i gae mei tausana nimitutu .
44004005	Malatomtomgei mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga po babadahi po hai lugagayo tanitaniwagahi hi'mtuboina u Yelusalem .
44004006	Anase , tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga po Kaiyapa po Yoni po Alesana po tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga a guguni gehouhi ipa Pita ma Yoni mitehi hina wibaabani .
44004007	Yaka Pita ma Yoni u naohi hi witowolihi ma hi lubayadehi hi pa , ‘ Iyai a manini bo iyai gowanei tu aepapa o luyawahi ? ’
44004008	Alugo Woiyawa Pita i wihogoya po hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Taumi lawa tu tahaya po tu taniwagehi ,
44004009	inapa amalai ona laubayadiyai dewa dewadewana tu aepapa ugolina to dewedeweya ubeina po iyowai ma i wodewadewa ,
44004010	naka atapumi ona hanapugeya po mi Isalaela lawahi atapuhi hi hanapugeya naka Yesu Keliso Nasaletagei gowanei . Tauna o itakeya po tauna Yaubada hau hilage ma i itowola meya , ugolinei geka tu aepapana anai dewadewana u matami e towotowolo .
44004011	Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya Yesu binei i pa , “ Tu lunuma , taumi geka ogolana o ihinigigiyeya naka i gunabuiya po ogola gegedumana . ”
44004012	Hau hipuli ega iyai gehouna tu wiluyagohana . Yesu tauna tuawana , Yaubada lawa i weleta po gowanei emoemotana ta luyagohana . ’
44004013	Pita ma Yoni hai nugomotu ugolina ma tu wiwogatalahi hi goholihi , babana hi hanapugeya Pita ma Yoni tauhi tu mae u meyagai po ega hita wisikulu , ma amaka hi hanapu . Apoma tu wiwogatalahi hi nugotuhu tuhagaya naka Pita ma Yoni Yesu mitehi hi liya nae .
44004014	Tamogi ega emoemotana ipa awai hina baheya babana tu aepapana hi lauyawahi u liyaliyahi i towotowolo .
44004015	Tamogi hougana hi palihalehi po hi meliya wogatala numana ugolina ma tu wiwogatalahi tuawahi hi ibaabani ,
44004016	hi pa , ‘ Apo geka lawahi iyowai ta dewahi ? Lawa atapuhi u Yelusalem tu mae manini baneina hi galeya , po ega emoemotana ta wikawakoyakoyameya .
44004017	Tamogi geka lawahi ta paligagalihi po ega Yesu gowanei lawa awai ugolina hina bahabaha nae , po geka dewana apega lawa u hayahi ina lata . ’
44004018	Ega yaka Pita ma Yoni hi otugena mehi po hi lui ma hi paliguduguduhi hi pa , ‘ Ega houga igehouna Yesu gowanei ona ibaabani po ona iatatiyana ’ .
44004019	Tamogi Pita ma Yoni hai baha hi wimiheya hi pa , ‘ Taumi tuawami ona wikahaya meemeka Yaubada u matana i dumalu , to wiponawogogemi bo Yaubada to wiponawogogeya .
44004020	Awai to gagalehi po awai to noonolihi ega emoemotana to bahena woloehi . ’
44004021	Tu wiwogatalahi hi'mpaligudugudu kadidili ugolihi ma hi wohalehi po hi nae . Ega emoemotana po hina panihi babana awai i waawala ubeina lawa atapuhi Yaubada hi wotalagiyeya .
44004022	Lawana ugolina geka luyagohana wekiwekilalana i waawala naka a bolima magouhi 40 i lagoni .
44004023	Hougana Pita ma Yoni hi woohalehi hi gunawilehi po hi nae hai lawa ugolihi po awai tu witalaguyaba babada po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga hi palipaliwelehi hai lawa ugolihi hi wibenabenama .
44004024	Ma hai lawahi hi noonoli po atapuhi hi winugoemota ma hi tapalolo Yaubada ugolina hi pa , ‘ Guyau Wasawasa , yada po hipuli po boga po ginouli atapuhi u hinehi he mamae Tu wiwawalihi .
44004025	Alugo Woiyawei gogiyai Dawita , am tu bagibagi u dewaya po i baha i pa , “ Iyowai po tauhi ega mi Yudeya uyohi i gigai duma ? Ma iyowai po tu mehipuli hai nugotuhu ega anona ?
44004026	Hipuli wasawasahi hi nonogo mehi ma tu taniwaga hi'mboina gogona po ipa Guyau Yaubada a Besinana mitehi hina igawiyehi . ”
44004027	Moina , Heloda ma Ponotiyo Pilato geka meyageina baneina ugolina mi Isalaela po tauhi ega mi Yudeya mitehi hi'mboina gogona . Ma Yesu am Tu bagibagi waiwoiyawana , tauna u dewaya po am Besinana hi wigawiyeya .
44004028	Hi'mboina gogona po ginouli atapuhi am wipoya po am nugotuhugei ipa apo hina waawala naka hi dewahi .
44004029	Ma Guyau , amalai hai ani'mpalilowolowo ugolihi una galena nae . Ma tiyai am tu bagibagi una dewiyai po to nugomotu am tuwega bahenana ugolina .
44004030	Nimam una lodomi po lawa una luyawahihi ma manini po wekiwekilala una dewahi po am Tu bagibagi waiwoiyawana , Yesu gowanei hina wawala . ’
44004031	Hougana tapalolo hi laiwoloeya , dobuna ugolina hi yamboina i wiguhu . Ma atapuhi Alugo Woiyawa i wihogohi po Yaubada tuwegana anai nugomotuhi hi wiwawala po hi iyahoneya .
44004032	Tu witumagana atapuhi hai winugonugotuhu po hai luhogala emosi . Ega iyai gehouna ita pa ‘ Geka tau u ginouli ’ . Iyai ginouli awai i tanitaniwageya naka atapuhi ubeihi .
44004033	Guyau Yesu a towolo meme naka wipoyagei tu wituwetuwegahi hi ibaabaniyeya lawa ugolihi . Ma Yaubada i kawaidewadewa dumahi .
44004034	Boluna ugolina ega iyai gehouna awai ugolina ita kuku . Iyawoi waihipulihi po wainumahi naka hi gimalena halehi
44004035	ma monehi tu wituwetuwega hi welehi po tauhi hi nohaya . Iyawoi hagu ugolina hi kukuku hi welehi .
44004036	Ega yaka Yosepa , lawa Saipilasigei , ma a guguni Libai , naka tauna tu wituwetuwegahi hi wigowaya po Banabasi ( Banabasi anona , tu winugokadidili natuna )
44004037	a hipuli tupona gehouna i gimalena haleya ma monena i niyeya po tu wituwetuwegahi u nimahi i houni .
44005001	Lawa gehouna gowana Ananaya , agona gowana Sapaila , mitehi hai hipuli tupona hi gimalena haleya .
44005002	Sapaila i hanapugeya naka hipulina monena tupona Ananaya i womomohi , tauna tuawana ubeina . Ma tupona tu wituwetuwega u nimahi i houni ma i koyama i pa , ‘ Geka hipuli mihana atapuna ’ .
44005003	Ma Pita i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Ananaya , iyowai po u palihalena mem po Tomodulele nugonugom i taniwageya , ma Alugo Woiyawa u koyameya po hipuli monena tupona u womomohi ?
44005004	Lolowa ega hipulina uta gimalena haleya naka tam galimgei . Ma muliyei u gimalena haleya po monena tam galimgei . Yaka iyowai po u nugonugom u pa apo geka pite dewa una deweya ? Lawa ega uta koyamehi ma Yaubada u koyameya . ’
44005005	Hougana Ananaya geka bahahi i noonolihi po i guli po i hilage . Ma tuwegana tu nonolina atapuhi hi matouta .
44005006	Hewahewali hi wotowolo po hi woimahi ma hi awala hopuneya po hi guluwi .
44005007	Mei kabudala gaogaona tonuga hi kokoe ma Ananaya agona i geletai . Ma tamogi awai i waawala ega ita hanapugeya .
44005008	Pita wawinena ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Una paliweleu , tam ma agom ami hipuli mihana atapuna gegeka ? ’ Wawinena i wimeiha i pa , ‘ Ee , atapuna ’ .
44005009	Yaka Pita i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Iyowai po tam ma agom o pa Guyau Alugona ona ludadani ? Hewahewalihi agom tu guluwina naka geka kabudalana tauhi hau mateta , ma apo hina awala hopunem gasi . ’
44005010	Mala emosi ma wawinena Pita u aena i guli po i hilage . Hewahewalihi hi lui mai po hi gagaleya naka amaka i hilage , yaka hi awala hopuneya po agona u liyaliyana hi guluwi .
44005011	Tu witumagana atapuhi po geka tuwegana tu nonolina atapuhi hi matouta duma .
44005012	Manini po wekiwekilala magomagouhi lawa u hayahi tu wituwetuwegahi hi dewadewahi . Houga magomagouna tu witumagana atapuhi hi yamboina gogona Solomona a kape ugolina .
44005013	Iyawoi ega hita itumagana hi matouta po tu witumagana mitehi ega hita yamboina gogona . Ma tamogi hi wiyateyatehi ma hi hunehi .
44005014	Ma tamogi tu witumaganahi hai bolu i lalata . Oloto po wiwine iyawoi Guyau hi itumaganeya naka hi luilui .
44005015	Tu wituwetuwegahi hai dewa ugolihi ma tu tootogo hi awala hopunehi po u tahaya pata po liyapa ugolihi hi wienohi . Apo Pita a nae ugolina , ipa kabudala ina lalani po alugona ina yato tu tootogohi ugolihi po hina luyagohana .
44005016	Lawa boluhi , hai tu tootogo po lawa alugo palopaloumana i luiluinihi hi neihi mai u Yelusalem po atapuhi hi lauyawahihi .
44005017	Tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga ma tu wimulitagona tauhi Sadusi hai bolu gehouna tu wituwetuwegahi hi'mgenagenaliliyehi .
44005018	Yaka tu wituwetuwegahi hi panihi po bolu hai numa panipani ugolina hi hounihi .
44005019	Tamogi noka upomna , Guyau a tu winoyanoya yadei i hopu mai po panina matetana i hoeya ma tu wituwetuwegahi hi hopu . Ma ugolihi i baha nae i pa ,
44005020	‘ Ona nae numa dalabu baneina ugolina po ona towolo , ma lawa geka luyagohanana tuwegana atapuna ona paliwelehi ’ .
44005021	Tu wituwetuwegahi hi wiponawogo po malatomtom kikina hi lui numa dalabu baneina ugolina po wiatatiyana hi wiwawali . Tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga ma a tu wotago , mi Isalaela babadahi hi otugehi po tauhi tu wiwogatala awa omboina baneina hi waya . Ma apoma baha hi himili po i nae hau numa panipani ipa tu wituwetuwegahi hina neihi mai omboinana ugolina .
44005022	Hougana numa panipani tanitaniwagahi hi gelegeleta po ega tu wituwetuwega gehouna hita tuhagaya numana ugolina . Ega yaka hi gunawilehi po hi wibenabenama hi pa ,
44005023	‘ To tuhagaya naka panina anai gudu momotana po tu galena itetena hau mateta hi towotowolo . Ma tamogi hougana to hoehoeya naka ega iyai gehouna u hinena tota tuhagaya . ’
44005024	Hougana tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga po tu witalaguyaba babadahi po numa dalabu baneina tu galena itete hai baha hi noonoli po hi winugonugotuhu bala tapuna hi pa , ‘ Apo awai ina geleta ? ’
44005025	Ma lawa gehouna i lui mai po i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Ona lautanigana , lawahi hau numa panipani o huhounihi naka numa dalabu baneina ugolina he towotowolo , ma lawa he iatatiyehi ’ .
44005026	Ega yaka numa panipani taniwagana a hewahewali mitehi hi nae po tu wituwetuwegahi hi weluwinihi po hi gunawilehi . Ma tamogi ega hita lihunahunahi babana hi matouta hi pa apo lawa hina luuyogigai po tu galena itete hina lugeimahi .
44005027	Tu wituwetuwegahi hi luiyehi po tu wiwogatala u naohi hi witowolihi . Ma tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga i lubayadehi i pa ,
44005028	‘ Paligudugudu kadidilina to welemi to pa ega Yesu gowanei ona iatatiyana . Ma awai o dewadewaya amaka o galeya ? Ami wiatatiyana o nohaya po Yelusalem i wihogoya , ma geka lawana a hilage gouna ipa ona weliyai . ’
44005029	Pita ma tu wituwetuwegahi gehouhi hai baha hi wimiheya hi pa , ‘ Yaubada ipa tona iponawogogeya , ma ega ipa lawa .
44005030	Googata hai Yaubada , Yesu hilage ugolina ma i witowolo meya . Tauna o uni hau ani take o tuutulawiteya ugolina ma
44005031	tauna Yaubada i wohepaya po u awala hinebawana i houni . Tauna Tu tahaya ma Tu wiluyagohana , ipa lawa mi Isalaela ata gaogao ina weleta po ta nugobui po apo ata apapoe ina paligigilihi .
44005032	Tiyai tu baha moina geka ginoulihi ugolihi , mei gasi Alugo Woiyawa , tauna Yaubada anani'mbenena tu wiponawogogena ugolita . ’
44005033	Hougana tu wiwogatalahi geka hi noonoli po uyohi i gigai duma po ipa hina unihi .
44005034	Ma lawa gowana Gameliyela a bolu Palisi ma lugagayo tu wiatatiyanena po gasi tu wogatala gehouna lawa hai ani wiyateyate , tauna i towolo po i baha po tu wituwetuwega hi himila hopunehi hau uputa .
44005035	Apoma i baha nae a lawa ugolihi , i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Yudeya , geka lawahi ugolihi awai ona dewadewaya ipa ona gagalena imahi .
44005036	Lolowa Tiudasi i towolo po ipa tauna lawa hai tu tahaya gehouna , po lawa magouhi mei 400 hi imulitagoya . Tamogi lawa gehouhi hi uni ma tu wotagona hi gunanohanohahi po a bagibagina i yababa .
44005037	Geka u mulina Yudasa Galiligei , lawa omhiyawahi hougana i towolo po lawa gehouhi i teinihi po hi wootagoya . Tauna gasi lawa gehouhi hi uni ma tu wotagona hi gunanohanohahi .
44005038	Ugolinei ma geka pite dewa amalai ipa a paliwelemi naka ega ugolihi ona wogowogo nae . Ona palihalehi po tuawahi . Inapa geka hai bagibagina lawa ina ununugeya yaka apo ina yababa .
44005039	Ma inapa hai bagibagina Yaubada ina ununugeya , ega emoemotana ona lagonihi , babana meka po apo ona tuhaga memi naka taumi Yaubada ona igawiyeya . ’
44005040	Ega yaka tu wiwogatalahi Gameliyela a wiututu lulougo hi wotagoya . Tu wituwetuwegahi hi otugehi po hi lui ma hi kodikodilihi po i kokoe ma hi paliwelehi ega houga gehouna Yesu gowanei hina ibaabani . Ma apoma hi wohalehi po hi nae .
44005041	Tu wiwogatalahi hi nenehalehi naka kaoha i wihogohi babana Yaubada apoma i hiyawihi emoemotana hiniwiyuwa Yesu gowana binei hina waya .
44005042	Ma iyeta emosi po emosi numa dalabu baneina ugolina hi yamboina gogona po gasi lawa hai numa ugolihi Yesu tauna Besinana lawana a tuwegana dewadewana hi iatatiyaneya po hi guuguyeya .
44006001	Noka u hougana Yesu tu wotagona hi magamaga po mi Giliki mi Yudeya mitehi hi gamogahigahi . Mi Giliki hi pa yaniyani omgutana iyeta emosi po emosi ugolina hai hiwahiwape hi lauwiwilihi .
44006002	Ega yaka tu wituwetuwegahi magouhi 12 tu wotago atapuhi hi otugehi po hi'mboina ma hi pa , ‘ Ega ita dumalu ipa Yaubada a baha guguyana to wohouni ma yaniyani gutana ugolina to genogeno .
44006003	Ugolinei , walewalehiyai , lawa magouhi 7 u hayami , o hanahanapugehi tauhi Alugo Woiyawa e tanitaniwagehi po hanahanapuhi ona winaganihi po tauhi geka bagibagina ugolina hina towolo .
44006004	Ma tiyai lupali po Yaubada a baha luguguyana ugolina , ega i gaogao to hahaleya . ’
44006005	Atapuhi geka nugotuhuna ugolina hi kaoha yaka Sitibeni hi witowoli . Tauna lawa waitumaganana ma Alugo Woiyawa ugolina . Ma Pilipo po Polokola po Nikano po Timona po Pamenasa po Nikolosi , lawa Anitiyokagei , a witumagana ega mei mi Yudeya ma hi buiya po mei tauhi .
44006006	Geka lawahi hi inaganihi naka atapuhi hi wogeletehi tu wituwetuwegahi ugolihi po hi wotepanihi ma hi lupaliyehi .
44006007	Ma Yaubada a baha i gunanohaya po i lata . U Yelusalem tu wimulitago hi magamaga po tu witalaguyaba boluhi witumaganana hi wiponawogogeya .
44006008	Sitibeni naka Yaubada a lunugotootogo po a wipoya i wihogoya . Ugolinei lawa u hayahi manini po wekiwekilala i dewadewahi .
44006009	Ma tu tapalolo mi Yudeya tamogi tauhi , mi Sailina po mi Alesana po mi Silisiya po mi Asiya atapuhi hai tapalolo boluna gowana hi pa , ‘ Palipalihalenahi ’ , hi towolo po Sitibeni mitehi hi igegae .
44006010	Tamogi Alugo Woiyawa hanapu Sitibeni i weleya po ugolinei i ibaabani naka ega emoemotana a baha hina wimihehi .
44006011	Ega yaka lawa gowadei hi wimihehi ma hi witowolihi po tauhi hi pa , ‘ To lautanigana ma Mose po Yaubada i iapapoenihi ’ .
44006012	Geka ugolina ma lawa po mi Yudeya tanitaniwaga po lugagayo tanitaniwagahi hi linugoapapoenihi . Yaka hi nae po Sitibeni hi numa panipani po hi neiyai tu wiwogatala ugolihi .
44006013	Ma lawa gehouhi hi neihi mai po Sitibeni hi benabenama koyakoyameya tu luhetala ugolihi , hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana houga magomagouna ata numa dalabu waiwoiyawana po Mose a lugagayo e iapapoenihi .
44006014	To lautanigana ma i pa Yesu Nasaletagei apo geka numa dalabuna ina wiapapoeya ma ata dewa Mose ugolina ma i wawala po i nenei ina buinihi . ’
44006015	Tu wiwogatala atapuhi hi tugutugula naka hi todi ma Sitibeni hi gagaleya naka tepana mei tu winoyanoya yadei .
44007001	Tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga Sitibeni i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Geka lawahi awai hi bahebahehi naka moinahi ? ’
44007002	Sitibeni hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu po amamau , ona lautanigana ! Gogata Abelaham goila luwaga u tipolina i mamae yohola ega a u dobu u Halana ita mae ma Yaubada Diidigana i wogeletena meya ugolina .
44007003	Hougana i wogeletena meya naka i baha nae ugolina i pa , “ Am hipuli po am dobu lawahi una nehalehi po una nae hipuli gehouna apo ana iatatiyem ugolina ” .
44007004	Ega yaka goila luwaga hipulina i nehaleya po i nae u Halana i mae . Amana i hilage po u mulina Yaubada Abelaham noka hipulina ugolina i wihaleya po geka hipulina ta mimiyeya ugolina i houni .
44007005	Noka hougana Yaubada Abelaham ega hipuli tupona ita weleya , ma tamogi i paliwitumagana ipa apo ina weleya . Hipulina apo tauna galinei po gasi a hewahewali guguninei hina nenei ubeihi . Noka hougana Yaubada geka paliwitumaganana i dewadewaya , Abelaham ega natuna .
44007006	Ugolinei ma Yaubada i baha nae Abelaham ugolina i pa , “ Am guguni apo u tupo geha hina mae . Noka hosi apo hina itubagibagi ma ega mihahi , ma gasi hina dewadewa yabayababehi ma hina mamae bolima magouhi handele wohepali ( 400 ) .
44007007	Tamogi dobuna ugolina hi wobagibagi lawahi apo a libahibahihi . Ma muliyei apoma apo noka dobuna hina hopu haleya po geka u dobuna hina wotalagiyeu . ”
44007008	Ma Abelaham i laueeneya naka guguninei logaloga ololotohi hai wekiwekilala hini omhapina hina welehi . Abelaham Isako i guni po gaogao emosi i kokoe ma hapihapi i weleya . Naka pitenana gasi Isako natuna Yakobo hapihapi i weleya . Ma Yakobo gasi natunatuna magouhi 12 hapihapi i welehi .
44007009	‘ Gogata Yakobo natunatuna hai tewela Yosepa hi gimalena haleya mi Isipita ugolihi babana hi'mgenagenaliliyeya po noka hosi i tubagibagi ma ega mihana . Tamogi Yaubada ega ita nugohaleya .
44007010	Ugolinei ma a pilipili atapuhi u hinehi tauna i haguhaguya po i kawaidewedeweya po hanapu i weleya . Ma Isipita hai wasawasa gowana Pelo Yosepa i galena tuhagaya po ani taniwaga i weleya Isipita atapuna u hinena po gasi a numa u hinena .
44007011	‘ Apoma gomala Isipita po Kainana po tupo atapuhi i wogohi po lawa hi nugodubu duma . Ma googata ega emoemotahi yaniyani hina tuhagaya . Ma tamogi u Isipita naka amaka yaniyani hi luhanalihi .
44007012	Ugolinei ma Yakobo tuwega i inonoli naka u Isipita yaniyani i mamae , ega yaka natunatuna hai houga tahatahayana i himilihi po hi nae Isipita .
44007013	Ma hai nae u Isipita wiluwagana ugolina Yosepa i wogeletena meya walewalehina ugolihi po i pa , “ Tau geka walehimi Yosepa ” . Ma Pelo tuwega i nonoli po gasi Yosepa a guguni i hanapugehi .
44007014	Ega yaka Yosepa baha i himili po i nae amana Yakobo ugolina i pa tauna po a manago atapuhi hina nei u Isipita . Hi nenae magouhi 75 .
44007015	Apoma gogata Yakobo po natunatuna hi hopu Isipita po noka hosi hi mamae po hi hilage .
44007016	Ma hai popoya hi hilahilage hi niyehi po odubona Abelaham hipuli monegei i gimagimaleya u Sikemi , Hemo natunatuna , ugolihi naka hosi hi kokowaga .
44007017	‘ Bolima hi maga duma hi kokoe ma Yaubada a bahapiko anona Abelaham ugolina ipa ina lugeleteya naka ipa mi Yudeya Isipita hina hopu haleya . Matababana googatahi u Isipita hi maga duma .
44007018	A sigana wasawasa gehouna u Isipita i towolo po a houga witaniwaga naka Yosepa ega ita hanapugeya .
44007019	Googata i koyakoyamehi ma i ihiniwiyuwahi . Ma i duduhi po natunatuhi muhomuhohi hi palipalihalehi po hau balabala hi hilahilage .
44007020	‘ Noka hougana Mose hi guni po Yaubada u matana i diidiga duma . Ma amana a numa ugolina i mamae naka wamahiya tonuga .
44007021	Hougana hi houna hopuneya goila u liyaliyana ma Pelo wasawasa natuna wawinena i waya po i woilataya po i kawainatuneya .
44007022	Ma mi Isipita hai hanapu atapuna Mose i wiatatiyeya po tauna baha po mamae ugolihi i welulagona .
44007023	‘ Mose hougana a bolima magouhi 40 ma u nugonugona i lugeleteya apo a lawa mi Yudeya ina dadanihi .
44007024	Tauna matanei i gagalena nae ma Isipitagei Isalaela lawana gehouna i ilawi yaka tulana i haguya po Isipitagei i lihilageni .
44007025	A nugotuhu ipa a lawa apo hina hanapugeya naka tauna Yaubada apo ina wibagibagi po nimanei mi Isipita ugolihi a guguni ina wihalena halehi . Ma tamogi ega hita hanapugeya .
44007026	Malitom po mi Yudeya luwaga i gagalehi ma hi itona yaka i wileta po ipa ina winugoemotahi po i pa , “ U lawa , taumi guguni emosi ma iyowai po o ilawi memi ? ”
44007027	‘ Tamogi tu wilougona Mose i luniyeya uheiya ma i pa , ‘ Iyai i witowolim po ipa una witaniwaga po gasi tu lidumaluiyai ?
44007028	Nugonugom ipa una uniu po mei pom Isipitagei u ununi ? ”
44007029	Geka bahana Mose i noonoli po Isipita i lowo haleya po i nae u Midiyani po i mamae . Noka hosi natunatuna ololotohi luwaga i gunihi .
44007030	‘ Bolima magouhi 40 hi kokoe ma Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i wogeletena meya Mose ugolina mayau wailuguna ugolina ma mayouna i laumenamena hau balabala Sinai oyana u liyaliyana . Mayouna i wilugu ma tamogi ega ita yaguli .
44007031	Ugolinei Mose i gohola dumaya , yaka i tunae dobuna i alalahi u liyaliyana po ipa ina galena imahiyeya , ma Guyau ponana i nonoli i pa ,
44007032	“ Tau googam hai Yaubada , Abelaham a Yaubada , po Isako a Yaubada , po Yakobo a Yaubada ” . Mose matouta i tapeitaatawi po ega ita gagalena nae mayouna ebalana ugolina .
44007033	Ma Guyau Mose ugolina i baha nae i pa , “ Am ae humahuma una gagi haleya babana geka hipulina ugolina e towotowolo naka dobu woiyawa .
44007034	U Isipita , u lawa he ihiniwiyuwahi naka amaka a galehi po hai gabala amaka a nonolihi . Ugolinei ma a hopu mai ipa a lupena halehi . Una nei apo a himilim po una nae u Isipita . ”
44007035	‘ Mi Yudeya Mose hi wihinigigiyeya hi pa , “ Iyai i witowolim po ipa una witaniwaga po gasi tu lidumaluiyai ? ” Mi Isalaela hi wihinigigiyeya ma Yaubada a winagana hougana tu winoyanoya mayau ebebalana ugolina i winagani ipa tauna tu witaniwaga ma tu'mhoe .
44007036	Mi Yudeya i tahaehi po Isipita hi hopu haleya . Manini po wekiwekilalahi u Isipita po boga kayakayana i dewadewahi . Ma gasi maninihi po wekiwekilalahi hau balabala yabayababa i dewadewahi naka bolima magouhi 40 .
44007037	Mose tauna mi Yudeya ugolihi i baha nae i pa , “ Yaubada apo a tu bahapiko lawana ina himiliyai ugolimi ani galenana mei tau . Tauna apo guguni tulami gehouna . ”
44007038	Hau balabala yabayababa Mose mi Yudeya hai bolu u hinena tauna googata mitehi hi mamae , ma tu winoyanoya yadei i ibaabani oya Sinai ugolina . Tauna Yaubada a baha lauyagohanana i waya po i wodamaneya ugolita .
44007039	‘ Ma tamogi googata hi wihinigigiyeya po hi teleliyeya ma ipa hina gunawilehi u Isipita .
44007040	Ega yaka talaguyaba taniwagana Alona ugolina hi baha nae hi pa , “ Ata talaoloto una tahi po apo ata yaubada u naota hina awali ma ta wotagohi . Mose i weluwinita po Isipita ta nenehaleya naka tauna i gae u oya , ega tata hanapugeya awai i meme . ”
44007041	Noka hougana talaoloto hi dewaya po mei bulumakau natuna . Ma ugolina hi italaguyaba po nimahiyei awai hi dewadewaya hi kaohena dumaya ugolinei ma hi toleheya .
44007042	Tamogi Yaubada i mepuputehi ma i palihalehi po yada ginoulihi mei kipola po wamahiya po kabudala hi polopolou ugolihi mei tu bahapiko Yaubada a baha hi gilugilumi hi pa , “ Mi Yudeya , bolima magouhi 40 u hinehi hau balabala gamogamo o unihi po o italaguyaba naka ega tau ugoliu .
44007043	Ami talaoloto gowana Moloka a kape o iomawawaleya ma ami talaoloto Lepana a kipola o tahi po ugolina o wootalagae . Ugolinei apo a tupahimilimi po ona nae Babiloni u upunei . ”
44007044	‘ Googata naka hau balabala Yaubada a kape , numa tapalolo kapena hi iomawawalena niyeya . Mose kapena i dewadewaya naka mei Yaubada i iatatiyeya po tautauna i wogeleteya ugolina .
44007045	Muliyei googata geka kapena hi wiwaya naka Yosuwa mitehi hi nae po geka hipulina hi waya Yaubada geka hipulina lawahi i wiyagahi ma apoma mi Yudeya hi miyeya . Ma kapena i mamae geka u hipulina a sigana Dawita a houga wasawasa .
44007046	Tauna Yaubada a kawaidewadewa i weleya . Ma Yaubada ugolina i lubayada ipa ina palihaleya po Yakobo a Yaubada a numa ina wogoya .
44007047	Ma tamogi natuna Solomona Yaubada a numana i wogoya .
44007048	‘ Yaubada Gegewahaga dumana a numa lawa nimahiyei hi wogowogoya ega u hinena ita mamae mei tu bahapiko a baha i pa ,
44007049	“ Guyau i pa : Tau u ani tugula hau yada , ma aeu ani luhanatanana hipuli tupo wohepali . Ega emoemotana numa biugei ona dewaya . Ma ega dobu emosi hota u ani wiyagohina .
44007050	Tau ginouli hau yada po hau hipuli nimougei a dewahi . ”
44007051	‘ Taumi tu nugokapala lawami . Yaubada tuwegana ugolina naka nugonugomi a bidahi po tanigami a pupuhi . Taumi amaka mei googami houga daodaona Alugo Woiyawa o ihinigigiyeya .
44007052	Googami tu bahapiko magomagouhi hi ihiniwiyuwahi . Tu wituwetuwega , Lawa Dumadumaluna a nei lolowa hi noenoeya naka googami hi ununihi . Ma geka hougana Lawa Dumadumaluna tauna i wogeletena meya po o uni .
44007053	Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i himila hopunihi mai po a lugagayo o waya ma tamogi ega ota iponawogogeya . ’
44007054	Tu wiwogatala Sitibeni a baha hi noonoli po hai modi i kekehi ma uyogigai i dewahi po niwohi hi kiko .
44007055	Ma tamogi Sitibeni anai hogohogona Alugo Woiyawei i galena gae hau yada po Yaubada namanamalina i galeya ma u awala hinebawana Yesu i towotowolo ma i galeya .
44007056	Ma i pa , ‘ Ona galeya ! Yada i gunahoeya ma Lawa Moinana e towotowolo Yaubada u awala hinebawana ! ’
44007057	Hi ototu labatana po tanigahi hi wopupuhi ipa ega a baha hina noonoli . Apoma ubeina hi lupa gogona ,
44007058	po meyageina u uputana hi dubala hopuneya ma gaimei hi wilawi . Tu lueenena lawahi Sitibeni a hilage hi lueeneya yaka hi dubala hopuneya meyageina u uputana ma gaimei hi wilawi . Ma tu lueena lawahi hai luilui hewali gowana Saulo aena u babana hi upumi .
44007059	Sitibeni yohola gaimei hi ilawi ma Guyau ugolina i tapalolo i pa , ‘ Guyau Yesu , alugou una waya ! ’
44007060	Ma itutunei i'mtutonetonena ma i otu labatana i pa , ‘ Guyau , geka apapoena ega ugolihi una nugonugotuhu niyeya ! ’ Geka bahana i baheya po i kokoe ma i hilage .
44008001	Sitibeni a hilage hougana u mulina Yelusalem u hinena tu witumagana hiniwiyuwa baneina hi wialonihi . Tu witumagana boluhi hi gunanohanohahi po hi nae Yudeya po Samaliya u tupohi . Ma tu wituwetuwega tuawahi u Yelusalem hi mamae .
44008002	Lawa Yaubada tu wotalagiyena Sitibeni hi waya po hi tutougeya po i kokoe ma hi guluwi .
44008003	Tamogi Saulo i ileta ipa tu witumagana hai bolu ina liyababaya . Numa po numa i luiluinihi ma tu witumagana i hihiwihi po hau numa panipani i tutuguduhi .
44008004	Tu witumaganahi hi launohanohahi naka hi nae tupo igehouhi Yesu tuwegana hi lauguguyeya .
44008005	Ma Pilipo i nae meyagai baneina u Samaliya po noka hosi lawa ugolihi Besinana lawana noyana i guguyeya .
44008006	Pilipo awai i bahebahehi bolu hi lunonola imahi po a manini wekiwekilalana hi galehi .
44008007	Alugo palopaloumahi lawa hi luiluinihi anai otuotuhi ma lawahi hi hopu halehi . Lawa tootogohi po aehi woapapoehi Pilipo i luyawahihi .
44008008	Ugolinei ma lawa meyageina u hinena hi kaoha duma .
44008009	Noka u meyageina lawa gehouna i mamae gowana Simona . Tauna houga gehouna mi Samaliya a dewa balabalau ugolinei i koyamehi . Ma i bahena meya naka tauna lawa baneina gehouna .
44008010	Lawa atapuhi , lawa hota po lawa baneihi ugolina hi lautanigana po hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana mei Yaubada ’ , po hi pa , ‘ Tam tu manini dumam ’ .
44008011	Ma ugolina hi lautanigana imahi babana houga daodaona dewa balabalaugei hai omhuna i waya .
44008012	Tamogi hougana Pilipo Yaubada anani taniwaga po Yesu Keliso a tuwega dewadewana i guuguyeya ma ololoto po wiwine hi itumagana naka bapatiso hi waya .
44008013	Simona gasi i witumagana po bapatiso i waya ma u mulina naka Pilipo i melabena emoteya . Ma Pilipo manini po wekiwekilala i dewadewahi ma i gagalehi po i nugogohola .
44008014	Tu wituwetuwegahi u Yelusalem tuwega hi noonoli naka amaka lawa u Samaliya Yaubada a baha hi witumaganeya . Ega yaka Pita ma Yoni hi himilihi po hi nae lawahi u Samaliya ugolihi .
44008015	Hougana hi laugeleta naka tu witumaganahi u Samaliya ubeihi hi tapalolo po apo Alugo Woiyawa ina wihogohi .
44008016	Alugo Woiyawa yohola ega iyai gehouna ita wihogoya ma bapatiso tuawana Guyau Yesu gowanei hi waya ugolinei hi lupali ubeihi .
44008017	Apoma tu witumaganahi u ununuhi Pita ma Yoni nimahi hi hounihi po Alugo Woiyawa i luinihi .
44008018	Tu wituwetuwegahi nimahi tu witumaganahi ugolihi hi hounihi ma Alugo Woiyawa i luiluinihi naka Simona i galeya . Yaka Pita ma Yoni ugolihi mone i palihaleya
44008019	ma i pa , ‘ Geka wipoyana ona weleu po apo iyai ugolina nimau a huhouni naka apo Alugo Woiyawa ina luiya ’ .
44008020	Ma tamogi Pita a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Am mone mitehi ona hilage babana am nugotuhu u pa , apo emoemotam Yaubada anani'mbenena una gimaleya hiyahi .
44008021	I bagibagi ugolina ega am tupo gehouna babana nugonugom ega ita dumalu Yaubada u matana .
44008022	Una nugobui geka am nugotuhu apapoena ugolinei ma una lupali po nugote Guyau geka am winugonugotuhuna ina paligigili .
44008023	A gagalem naka omgenagenalili nugonugom i wihogoya po apapoe i panim . ’
44008024	Simona hai baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Ami baha a nonoli ma Guyau ugolina biugei una lupali po geka ginoulihi u bahebahehi apega ugoliu hina wawala ’ .
44008025	Muliyei Pita ma Yoni awai Guyau i dewadewahi ma hi gagalehi hi deedeya ma hi guuguya po i kokoe naka hi gunawilehi u Yelusalem . Hai houga gunawilana meme ugolina tuwega dewadewana hi guguyeya meyagai atapuna Samaliya u hinena .
44008026	Guyau a tu winoyanoya i baha nae Pilipo ugolina i pa , ‘ Una wononogo ma una nae hau tupo yawana , tahaya u Yelusalem ma i nenae u Gasa ugolina ’ . Tahayana i nenae balabala yabayababa ugolina .
44008027	Ega yaka Pilipo i wotowolo po i nae . Noka hougana taniwaga baneina , Itiyopiyei i gunagunawileya a u meyagai . Tauna Itiyopiya hai wasawasa wawine gowana Kanase a mone i gagalena iteteya . Tauna i nae u Yelusalem po Yaubada i wotalagiyeya ma i gunagunawileya .
44008028	I gelu po i nenae ma bahapiko bukana Isaiya ugolina i yamhiyawa .
44008029	Ma Alugo Woiyawa Pilipo ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Una nae po noka lawana una tulatuya ’ .
44008030	Ega yaka Pilipo i wibulibulili po i nae ugolina po i launonola ma lawana i yamhiyawa . Pilipo lawana i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ U hanapugeya awai e hiyahiyawi ? ’
44008031	Lawana i pa , ‘ Eega , babana ega iyai ipa ina dede imahiyeya ugoliu ’ . Ma i baha po Pilipo i'mgeina gae po katina ugolina mitehi hi duhuna .
44008032	Yaubada a Buka i hiyahiyawi i pa , ‘ Tauna mei sipi hi waya po hina uni po mei sipi natuna ega ponana ma apalana he boliboli , tauna ega awai ita baheya .
44008033	Hi palihopuhopuneya po ega hita lidumalu imahiyeya . Ega iyai igehouna tauna natunatuna i gunigunihi ipa hina dedeya . Babana amaka hau hipuli a luyagohana i kokoe . ’
44008034	Lawana i baha nae Pilipo ugolina i pa , ‘ Una paliweleu , geka tu bahapiko naka iyai e bahebaheya ? Tauna e bahebahena meya bo lawa gehouna ? ’
44008035	Pilipo geka Yaubada a bahana gutana ugolina i wiwawala po i nenae naka Yesu tuwegana dewadewana i dedeya .
44008036	Tahayanei hi gelu po hi nenae po goila ugolina hi geleta ma taniwagana i pa , ‘ Geka goila ma iyowai po apega bapatiso a waya ? ’
44008037	[ Pilipo taniwagana a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Inapa nugonugom atapunei una witumagana , apo bapatiso una waya ’ . Taniwagana i pa , ‘ Nugonugou atapunei a itumagana . Ma gasi a itumaganeya Yesu Keliso tauna Yaubada Natuna . ’ ]
44008038	Taniwagana i baha po katina hi liwoloeya ma hai luwaga hi lupa hopu ma hi hopu goilana ugolina . Ma Pilipo taniwagana i bapatisoya .
44008039	Hougana u goilana ma hi haugeleta po Guyau Alugona Pilipo i wihaleya , po taniwagana ega Pilipo ita galena meya . Ma tamogi anai kaohana tahayana i wotagoya po i nae .
44008040	Ma Pilipo u Asota hi tuhagaya , po meyagai i weluweluwilehi ma tuwega dewadewana i guuguyeya ma i nenae po u Sisaliya i geleta .
44009001	Saulo yohola Yesu tu wimulitagona i palipalilowolowohi ipa ina unihi . Ma i nae po tu witalaguyaba taniwagana ugolina
44009002	i lubayada i pa ‘ Pepa una weleu po apo ugolinei a lui Damaseko numa dalabuna po oloto po wawine noka hosi a tutuhagahi , tauhi Guyau a tahaya tu wotagona apo a panihi po to gunawiliyai u Yelusalem ’ .
44009003	I nenae po hougana Damaseko i tutuliyaliyani , naka mala emosi ma yayata yadei i hopu po i yayata wiwileya .
44009004	Ma i ludubali hau hipuli po lawa ponana i noonoli ma i pa , ‘ Saulo ! Saulo ! Iyowai po e ihiniwiyuwau ? ’
44009005	Ma Saulo i pa , ‘ Guyau , tam iyai ? ’ Ma lawana i pa , ‘ Tau Yesu e ihiniwiyuwau .
44009006	Tamogi una towolo po meyageina una luiya . Noka hosi apo hina paliwelem awai apo una dewaya . ’
44009007	Lawa Saulo mitehi hi nenae naka hi tutowolo , ma lawa ponana hi nonoli ma tamogi ega hita galeya .
44009008	Ma Saulo hau hipuli i eneno po i wotowolo po matana i tatakaeya naka ega emoemotana awai ina galeya . Ega yaka u nimana hi wogo po hi luiyeya u Damaseko .
44009009	Ega ita gagalena ma i mamae naka iyeta tonuga . Ma noka iyetahi ugolihi ega awai ita ani po ega awai ita umaya .
44009010	Noka hougana Yesu tu wotagona gehouna u Damaseko i mamae , gowana Ananaya . Tauna a enogagalena u hinena Guyau i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Ananaya ! ’ Ma Ananaya i pa , ‘ Guyau , tau gee ’ .
44009011	Apoma Guyau i pa , ‘ Un'omhoe po una nae tahaya gowana Dumalu ugolina . Noka hosi Yudasa a u numa lawa Tasasigei gowana Saulo ubeina una lubayada . Tauna e laupali
44009012	ma hau enogagalena i gagalena ma lawa gowana Ananaya i lui po nimana u unununa i houni po ipa apo ina galena meme . ’
44009013	Ananaya Guyau a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Guyau , lawa i maga duma geka lawana dededena ugoliu hi baheya . Ma gasi tu wiwoiyawem u Yelusalem i dewadewa yabayababehi naka bahana atapuna amaka a nonoli .
44009014	Tauna tu witalaguyaba babadahi ugolihi palihalena i waya po i nei ipa gowam tu hiyawina u Damaseko ina panipanihi . ’
44009015	Guyau i baha nae Ananaya ugolina i pa , ‘ Una nae babana a winagani tauna apo ina pupouleu . Tauna apo tu wipaliwelena lawa tupo wohepali u hinena po wasawasa po Yudeya lawahi ina dewahi po gowau hina hanapugeya .
44009016	Tau biugei ma hiniwiyuwa atapuna ina ialoni apo a wiatatiyeya . ’
44009017	Ega yaka Ananaya Yudasa a numana i luiya po nimana Saulo u unununa i hounihi ma i pa , ‘ Walehiu Saulo , Guyau Yesu u nenei tahayagei ma i woogeletena meya i himiliu po a nei . Apo una galena meme ma Alugo Woiyawa ina wihogom . ’
44009018	Mala emosi ma ginouli mei iyana wenawihi Saulo u matana hi mamae hi peu ma i galena meme . Apoma i welutowolo po bapatiso i waya
44009019	ma i am po a kadidili i wimeya . Saulo Yesu tu wotagona mitehi hi mae u Damaseko iyeta ega hita maga .
44009020	Ma i dumalu po i nae numa dalabu ugolihi po Yesu i guguyeya i pa , ‘ Yesu Yaubada Natuna ’ .
44009021	Lawa atapuhi Saulo a baha hi noonoli po hi gohola dumahi po hi pa , ‘ Geka tauna lawana u Yelusalem Yesu gowana tu hiyawina i panipanihi . Ma i nenei geka hosi ipa Yesu gowana tu hiyawina ina panipanihi po hina gunawilehi tu witalaguyaba babadahi ugolihi , bo ? ’
44009022	Ma tamogi Saulo a guguya i ipoya . A limoina Yesu tauna Tu wiluyagohana naka bahana i winugowiwai duma ugolinei ma mi Yudeya u Damaseko hi mamae ega emoemotana a baha hina wimihehi .
44009023	Iyeta i maga i nae ma apoma mi Yudeya hi wiwogatala ipa Saulo hina uni .
44009024	Ma tamogi hai wiwogatalana amaka Saulo i hanapugeya . Uguwei po iyetei meyageina galina matetana hi ihalugeya ipa a hopu ugolina ma hina uni .
44009025	Ma tamogi uguwa emosi Saulona tu wotagona galina malamalanei hau poha i tugula ma gulawei hi woipipeili po i hopu u uputa .
44009026	Saulo i gunawileya u Yelusalem po i ileta ipa Yesu tu wotagona u hinehi ina lui , ma tamogi ega hita witumaganeya naka tauna Yesu tu wotagona gehouna . Ma gasi Saulona hi matouteya .
44009027	Apoma Banabasi Saulo i weluwaya po i niyeya tu wituwetuwega ugolihi po i dedeya iyowai Saulo u tahaya Guyau i gagaleya . Ma iyowai Guyau i bahabaha nae Saulo ugolina po iyowai u Damaseko i nugomotu ma Yesu gowanei i lauguguya naka i dedeya .
44009028	Ega yaka Saulo tauhi mitehi hi mae ma Yelusalem atapuna i weluyagohi , anai nugokadidilina Guyau gowanei i lauguguya .
44009029	Saulo ma mi Yudeya pona Giliki tu bahebahena mitehi hi ibaabani po hi wigamogahigahi po hi ileta ipa hina uni .
44009030	Ugolinei Yesu tu wotagona dewana geka hi gagalena tuhagaya po Saulo hi hopuneya u Sisaliya po hi himili po i nae u Tasasi .
44009031	Ee , apoma tu tapalolo Yudeya po Galili po Samaliya meyageihi atapuhi u hinehi hi meimahi . Ma Guyau hi wiyateyateya po Alugo Woiyawa a winugokadidili po a wihaguhagu ugolihi ma hi mamae , ugolinei hai bolu hi ilataya .
44009032	Pita tupo atapuna i kadaugeya . Ma houga gehouna Yaubada tu wiwoiyawena u Lida tu mae i hopu po i dadanihi .
44009033	Noka hosi lawa gehouna gowana Iniyasi i tuhagaya . Tauna hinina hi hilage po hau ani eno i mamae naka bolima magouhi 8 .
44009034	Ma Pita i baha nae i pa , ‘ Iniyasi , Yesu Keliso gowanei una luyagohana . Una towolo po am ani eno una woimahiyeya . ’ Mala emosi ma Iniyasina i welutowolo .
44009035	Lida po Selona tu miyena atapuhi hi galeya po Guyau hi witumaganeya .
44009036	Wawine Yopagei gehouna Yesu tu wotagona gowana Tabita ( mi Giliki ponahigei he pa Dokasi ) . Noka wawinena naka a dewa hi dewadewa po tu dayadayabu i haguhaguhi .
44009037	Noka hougana i totogo po i hilage ma hai dewei hi deweya , hi witogoya po i kokoe , ma babanoya gehouna u moyana hi houni .
44009038	Yopa naka Lida u liyaliyana ugolinei ma hougana Yesu tu wotagona Pita tuwegana hi noonoli po lawa luwaga hi himilihi po hi nae Pitana ubeina . Lawahi tuwega hi niniyeya naka Pita ugolina hi pa , ‘ Una bulili mai po una nei ugoliyai ’ .
44009039	Ega yaka Pita i wotowolo po lawahi mitehi hi nae , hougana hi laugeleta naka hi weluwaya po hi gae babanoyana u moyana . Hiwahiwape atapuhi Pitana hi towolo wiwileya ma luilui po ani oteotena Dokasi lolowa i dewadewahi hi woogelegeletehi ma hi tutou .
44009040	Pita atapuhi i hauhopunehi u uputa ma i tutunei i'mtutonetonena ma i lupali Yaubada ugolina . Apoma i mewila po popoyana ugolina i pa , ‘ Tabita , una towolo ! ’ Wawinena matana i kaya po Pita i galeya ma i towolo po i duhuna .
44009041	Pita i wotayaga po i witowolo haleya apoma tu witumagana po hiwahiwapehi i otugehi , po wawinena anai luyagohanana i wogeleteya ugolihi .
44009042	Wawinena a towolo meme tuwegana Yopa atapuna i hogoya po lawa boluhi Guyau hi witumaganeya .
44009043	Ma Pita u Yopa lawa gamogamo opihi tu'mdidina po tu'mkaniyoga gowana Simona mitehi hi meidaodao kikina .
44010001	U Sisaliya lawa gehouna gowana Koniliyasi i mamae . Tauna mi Itali hai gawiya kapenana gehouna .
44010002	Tauna Yaubada tu lowogena gehouna po a manago mitehi Yaubada hi wootalagiyeya . Tu widayadayabu i haguhagu dumahi . Ma houga magomagouna i laupali Yaubada ugolina .
44010003	Kabudala mei ibiga i lautipolini ma enogagalenagei Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i gagaleya ma i nei po ugolina i pa , ‘ Koniliyasi ! ’
44010004	Tauna anai matoutana i todi ma tu winoyanoyana i gagaleya po i pa , ‘ Guyau , am luhogala awai ? ’ Tu winoyanoyana i pa , ‘ Yaubada am lupali po am gadili dewadewana i hanapugehi po i lunugotootogogem .
44010005	Yaka geka kabudalana lawa una himilihi po hina nae u Yopa lawa gowana Simona Pita hina weluwaya .
44010006	Tauna lawa gamogamo opihi tu'mdidina gowana Simona ugolina e itoumana . Simonana a numa naka niha u liyaliyana . ’
44010007	Apoma Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i baha po i kokoe ma i nae . Ma Koniliyasi a tu bagibagi luwaga i otugehi . Ma gasi tu wigawiya gehouna i otugeya , tauna Yaubada tu lowogena gehouna ma Koniliyasi u liyaliyana tu mae .
44010008	Hi nei po awai hi waawala i paliwelehi ma i himilihi po hi nae u Yopa .
44010009	Malitom po lawahi tonuga Yopa hi tutuliyaliyani ma Pita iyeta bolinai i gae po numa wogotabataba u upuna ipa ina lupali .
44010010	Ma am i hilage po yohola yaniyani hi wononogogeya ma i enogagalena .
44010011	I gagalena ma yada i gunahoeya po ginouli mei lupulu baneina u aliyana hina wogo ma ina hopuhopu mai hau hipuli .
44010012	Geka ginoulina u hinena naka gamogamo galenana tapuna tapuna po mota po kiu .
44010013	Ma lawa ponana i noonoli ma i pa , ‘ Pita una towolo po geka gamogamohi una unihi po una am ! ’
44010014	Ma tamogi Pita i pa , ‘ Guyau , apega ananihi babana i lugagayo ginouli apapoena po gobugobuna i wilugagayo ma yohola ega ata tulagoni ’ .
44010015	Lawana i baha meme i pa , ‘ Awai Yaubada i laiyeuyeuya ega una pa i gobu ’ .
44010016	Mala tonuga geka pite i baha ma apoma ginoulina i wohepa po i gae hau yada .
44010017	Pita yohola a enogalena anona i inugonugotuhugeya ma lawahi tonuga Koniliyasi i himihimilihi Simona a numa hi tuhagaya po hi nei po gali u matetana hi towotowolo ,
44010018	ma hi lubayada hi pa , ‘ Geka hosi toumana gowana Simona Pita e mamae ? ’
44010019	Pita yohola i ileta ipa a enogalena anona ina tuhagaya ma Alugo Woiyawa i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Lawa tonuga he bibihem ,
44010020	ugolinei una hopu po ega una inugowilawila ma mitehi ona nae , babana a himilihi po hi nei ’ .
44010021	Ega yaka i hopu po lawahi ugolihi i pa , ‘ Lawana o bibiheya geka tau . Ma awai binei o nei ? ’
44010022	Lawahi hi pa , ‘ Tu wigawiya hai kapena gowana Koniliyasi i himiliyai po to nei . Tauna lawa dumadumaluna po Yaubada e wootalagiyeya . Yaka mi Yudeya atapuhi he iyateyateya . Yaubada a tu winoyanoya waiwoiyawana Koniliyasi i paliweleya po i himiliyai po to nei ipa to gigimem po ta nae a u numa , po awai apo una bahebahehi ina nonoli . ’
44010023	Yaka Pita lawahi i gigimehi po hi lui numana ugolina po noka hosi hi am ma hi eno . Malitom po Pita i wotowolo po lawahi tonuga mitehi hi nae . U Yopa tu witumagana gehouhi hi wotago po mitehi hi nae .
44010024	Malitom meme apoma u Sisaliya hi lugeleta . Ma noka hosi Koniliyasi a guguni gehouhi po a lawa gehouhi i otugehi po hi nei po hi otonana .
44010025	Hougana Pita i luilui naka Koniliyasi mitehi hi witutuhaga po Koniliyasi i peu hopu Pita aena u babana po i wiyateyateya .
44010026	Ma tamogi Pita i baha po ipa Koniliyasi ina towolo po i pa , ‘ Una towolo , tau lawa hota ’ .
44010027	Pita Koniliyasi ugolina i ibaabani ma hi luilui po bolu hi'mboina ma hi otonana i tuhagahi .
44010028	Ma i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Taumi o hanapugeya naka tau Yudeyagei ega emoemotau taumi ega mi Yudeya ipa to luwoheyanemi naka i lugagayo po ipa ega a dadanimi . Ma tamogi Yaubada i wiatatiyeu naka lugagayona amaka i kokoe .
44010029	Ugolinei ma ubeu lawa hi nenei naka ega ata luhinigigai . Ma a lubayademi , am luhogala awai ? ’
44010030	Koniliyasi i pa , ‘ Iyeta wohepali amaka hi kokoe ma kabudala geka pite mei ibiga u tipolina u numa u hinena a laupali . Mala emosi ma lawa a kaleko namanamalina u matau i lugeleteya ,
44010031	po i pa , ‘ Koniliyasi ! Yaubada am lupali po am gadili dewadewa i hanapugehi po i lunugotootogogem .
44010032	Lawa una himilihi po hina nae u Yopa , lawa gowana Simona Pita hina weluwaya . Tauna lawa gehouna gamogamo opihi tu'mdidina gowana Simona ugolina e itoumana Simonana a numa naka niha u liyaliyana .
44010033	Ega yaka mala emosi ma ubeim a wihimilana po u lunugotootogogeiyai yaka u nei . Ugolinei ma amalai atapuiyai geka hosi Yaubada u matana . Ginouli awai Guyau i paliwelem po ipa una bahebahehi naka atapuyai to iotonana ipa to nonoli . ’
44010034	Apoma Pita a baha i wiwawali i pa , ‘ Amalai apoma a galena tuhaga naka Yaubada a galena itete lawa ataputa ugolita naka emosi hota .
44010035	Ma tupo wohepali ugolihi taumi iyawoi ona matouteya po dewa dumadumaluhi ona mimiyehi naka tauna u matana i haki duma .
44010036	Ma tuwega amaka o nonoli naka Yaubada amaka Isalaela lawiyai i paliweliyai nugodumola a tuwega dewadewana Yesu Keliso u hinena naka tauna lawa ataputa ata Guyau .
44010037	Geka tuwegana Yoni tu wibapatiso ugolina i waawala naka i gunanohaya po u Galili ma i nae po Yudeya atapuna i wihogoya .
44010038	Tuwegana naka geka pite Yaubada Yesu Nasaletagei i wotepani po Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya po i wipoya ma a wipoyana amaka o nonoli tupo atapuna u hinena lawa i dewadewahi ma iyawoi nawa alugo apapoena ugolihi i lauyawahihi matababana Yaubada i witulaneya .
44010039	‘ Yesu awai atapuna i dewadewahi u Yudeya po u Yelusalem naka tauyai tu baha moina . Tauna hau ani take hi tutulawiteya po i hilage .
44010040	Ma tamogi iyeta witonugana ugolina Yaubada i witowolo meya hilage ugolina po i dewaya po i wogeletena meya .
44010041	Ega lawa atapuhi ugolihi ma Yaubada amaka i winaganiyai tauyai tu baha moina tuawiyai ugoliyai . Ma a towolo meme u mulina mitehi to am po to uma .
44010042	Ma i paliweliyai i pa , ‘ Lawa ugolihi tuwega dewadewana ona guuguyeya ’ , po ugolinei baha moina naka tauna Yaubada i witowoli lawa hilahilagehi po lauyagohanahi tu libahibahihi .
44010043	Binei tu bahapiko atapuhi hi bahabaha hi pa , ataputa iyawoi ugolina ta itumagana apo gowana a wipoyagei ata apapoe ina paligigilihi . ’
44010044	Pita yohola i ibaabani ma Alugo Woiyawa i hopu mai po bahana tu nonolina atapuhi i luinihi .
44010045	Ma mi Yudeya lawahi u Yopa ma Pita hi wotagoya po hi nenei naka hi gohola dumahi , matababana Yaubada ani'mbenena Alugo Woiyawa tauhi ega mi Yudeya i welehi .
44010046	Hi lautanigana ma pona geha ega hita hanapugeya ugolinei hi ibaabani po Yaubada hi mamali po hi wotalagiyeya . Apoma Pita i baha nae a lawa ugolihi i pa ,
44010047	‘ Geka lawahi ta wibapatisohi goilei babana limoinana Alugo Woiyawa amaka i luinihi mei tauta ’ .
44010048	Ega yaka i paliwelehi po Yesu Keliso gowanei bapatiso hi waya . Ma apoma hi lupaliyeya po ipa ugolihi ina mae houga kukuna .
44011001	Tauhi ega mi Yudeya Yaubada a baha hi itumaganeya naka Yesu tu wituwetuwega po tu witumagana Yudeya atapuna u hinena hi nonoli .
44011002	Hougana Pita i gegae u Yelusalem naka Yesu tu wotagona tauhi mi Yudeya lawahi hi galena iapapoeya po
44011003	hi pa , ‘ Iyowai po ilugagayo u tulagoni po u nae po tauhi ega mi Yudeya hai u numa mitehi o am ? ’
44011004	Ega yaka Pita a enogalena i waawala naka ginouli atapuna i bahena pahi po i wikokowi anona awai .
44011005	Geka pite i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Yopa u meyageina a laupali po ginouli mei lupulu baneina a eno galeya u aliyana hi wogo ma yadei i hopuhopu mai . I hopu mai po u liyaliyau i tutowolo .
44011006	A gagalena imaimahiyeya naka gamogamo malamalagamahi po woyahiyahihi po mota po kiu u hinena .
44011007	Apoma a lautanigana ma lawa i pa , “ Pita , una towolo po geka gamogamohi un'omunugo po una am ! ”
44011008	‘ Ma tamogi a pa , “ Guyau , apega naka lugagayo ma yohola ega ginouli apapoena po gobugobuna gamougei ata am dadani ” .
44011009	‘ Ma lawana yadei i baha meme i pa , “ Yaubada awai i laiyeuyeuya ega una pa i gobu ” .
44011010	Dewana geka pite mala tonuga i wawala ma apoma ginoulina i wohepa po i gae hau yada .
44011011	‘ Noka kabudalana u hinena lawa tonuga u Sisaliya ma hi himilihi po ubeu hi nenei naka numana a mimiyeya ugolina hi lugeleta .
44011012	Ma Alugo Woiyawa i paliweleu i pa , ega anai nugowilawila ma lawahi a wotagohi . Geka mi Yopahi magouhi 6 hi wotago po mitehi to nae u Sisaliya , po atapuiyai to lui Koniliyasi a numa u hinena .
44011013	I paliweliyai iyowai Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i gagaleya ma a u numa i towolo ma i bahabaha i pa , “ Lawa gehouhi una himilihi po hina nae Yopa lawa gowana Simona Pita ubeina .
44011014	Tauna apo baha ina bahebahehi naka ugolihiyei tam po am manago apo ona luyagohana . ”
44011015	‘ Hougana baha a iwawali ma Alugo Woiyawa i luinihi , amaka mei tauta lolowa ta iwawala hougana .
44011016	Ma apoma Guyau a baha nugougei i gae i pa , “ Yoni goilei i bapatiso ma taumi apo Alugo Woiyawei bapatiso ona waya ” .
44011017	Ma i lugeleteya naka Yaubada geka ani'mbenenana emosina i welewelehi naka i weleta , hougana Guyau Yesu Keliso ta itumaganeya . Ugolinei , tau iyai po ipa Yaubada a bagibagi a lauguduguduya ? ’
44011018	Hougana geka bahahi hi noonolihi po hai ompalihibahiba hi wohounihi . Ma hi tugudu po Yaubada hi wotalagiyeya hi pa , ‘ Apoma Yaubada tauhi ega mi Yudeya gaogao i welehi apo hina nugobui po luyagohana tuwetuwenai hina waya . ’
44011019	Sitibeni hi ununi ugolina ma tu witumagana hi lunohanohahi po hi nae u Pinisiya po u Saipilasi po u Anitiyoka . Noka u dobuhi Yesu tuwegana lawa mi Yudeya tuawahi ugolihi hi deedeya .
44011020	Tamogi tu witumagana gehouhi mi Saipilasi po mi Sailina hi nenei u Anitiyoka naka mi Giliki ugolihi Guyau Yesu hi guguyeya .
44011021	Guyau Yaubada a wipoya tauhi ugolihi po bolu baneina hi witumagana naka Guyau hi kawaibadeya .
44011022	Geka tuwegana tu witumagana hai bolu u Yelusalem hi nonoli yaka Banabasi hi himili po i nae u Anitiyoka .
44011023	Hougana i laugeleta naka Yaubada a lunugotootogo baneina i gagaleya po i kaoha . Ugolinei ma i winugokadidilihi ma ipa atapuhi houga daodaona Guyau ugolina hina iponawogo ma nugonugohi atapunei hina nugonugomomohi .
44011024	Banabasi tauna lawa dewadewana . Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya po gasi witumagana u nugonugona i lata duma . Geka binei ma bolu baneina Guyau hi witumaganeya .
44011025	Apoma Banabasi i nae u Tasasi Saulo i biheya ,
44011026	ma hougana i tutuhagaya naka i weluwaya po i neiyai u Anitiyoka . Hai luwaga noka hosi hi mae bolima emosi ma tu witumagana mitehi hi amboina ma hi iatatiyana lawa boluhi ugolihi . Ma u Anitiyoka Yesu tu wotagona apoma hai houga tahatahayana hi wigowahi po Keliso a bolu .
44011027	Noka hougana tu bahapiko gehouhi u Yelusalem hi wotowolo po hi hopu u Anitiyoka .
44011028	Ma tulahi emosi i towolo po Alugo Woiyawa a litahatahayagei i baha piko ipa apo gomala baneina tupo atapuna ina wogoya . ( Ma geka gomalana naka yohola Kilodiyasi a houga i itaniwaga ugolina ma i lugeleteya . )
44011029	Ega yaka tu wimulitago hi wiwogatala ipa apo emosi po emosi a wihaguhagu ina himila niyeya walewalehihi u Yudeya tu mae ugolihi .
44011030	Geka hai wihaguhaguna naka Banabasi ma Saulo u nimahi hi houni po hi niyeya tu witumagana hai tanitaniwaga u Yudeya ugolihi .
44012001	Noka hougana Wasawasa Heloda i wiwawala po tu witumagana i hiniwiyuwahi po hai bolu ugolihiyei gehouhi i panipanihi .
44012002	Tauna Yesu a hewali Yamesa , Yoni walehina kwasikwasi daodaonei i uni .
44012003	Ma i gagalena naka geka dewana lawa mi Yudeya i winugodewadewahi yaka i dewa gawahi po Pita i numa panipani . Geka dewana Welulagona tolehana ugolina i wawala .
44012004	Ma hougana Pita i numa panipani po hau numa panipani i houni po i kokoe ma tu galena itetena lawa wohepali wohepali i upumihi po i nae po bolu wohepali i dewahi . A nugotuhu ipa Welulagona tolehana u mulina mi Yudeya ina welehi po hina uni .
44012005	Ega yaka hau numa panipani hi houni po i mamae ma tamogi tu witumagana ubeina hi laupali kadidili Yaubada ugolina .
44012006	Apo malinatom po upomna Heloda Pita ina uni ma amalai upoma tu galena itete luwaga mateta naka , gulawa pawapawasigei Pita hi numa panipani wiwileya po hi womomota luwagehi ma hi eneno ma gasi tu galena itete luwaga hi gagalena iteteya .
44012007	Ma mala emosi ma yayata numana u hinena i luebaleya po Yaubada a tu winoyanoya i lugeleteya . Lawana Pita tolotolona i lutonaya po i limaamahi ma i pa , ‘ Una towolo yagiyagina ! ’ Gulawahi pawapawasi Pita u nimana hi gunalupenihi .
44012008	Ma tu winoyanoyana i baha nae Pita ugolina i pa , ‘ Una leli ma am ae humahuma una otenihi ’ . Yaka Pita i wiponawogo , ma tu winoyanoyana i baha meme i pa , ‘ Am lupulu una luhagogoleya ma una wotagou ’ .
44012009	Ega yaka tu winoyanoyana i hopuhopu ma Pita i wotago po panina i hopu haleya . Tamogi tu winoyanoyana awai i dewadewahi naka moinahi hi waawala ma Pita ega ita nugotuhu tuhagaya . A nugotuhu ipa ita lauboni .
44012010	Hi nei po tu galena itete wiluwagana hi weluwileya ma apoma hau mateta pawapawasi hi lugeleta . Geka matetana nugonei i gunahoeya po hi nae hau meyagai . Ega yaka hi lui po hi tuluwaluwaga po ega daona ma tu winoyanoyana Pita i nehaleya .
44012011	Apoma nugohanahanapu i geleta meme Pita ugolina ma i pa , ‘ Geka apoma a hanapugeya naka tau Heloda u nimana Guyau i haguwe ma a tu winoyanoya i himili po i halou . Gasi lawa mi Yudeya hai winugonugotuhu ipa ugoliu awai hina dewadewahi naka a nehalehi . ’
44012012	Pita i gagalena tuhaga po i nae Yoni Maki ma hinana Maliya hai u numa . Noka hosi lawa boluhi hi amboina ma Pita binei hi laupali .
44012013	Ma hougana i lulougo naka tu bagibagi wawinena gowana Loda i nei po ipa guduna ina hoeya .
44012014	Ma Pita ponana i nonola tuhagaya yaka ega guduna ita hoeya ma anai kaohana i bulili lui po a lawa i paliwelehi naka Pita hau mateta e towotowolo .
44012015	A lawa hi baha nae ugolina hi pa , ‘ Nugote u badebade ’ . Tamogi i lugamobagibagi yaka hi baha meme hi pa , ‘ Naka nugote alugona ’ .
44012016	Hi ibaabani ma Pita yohola i lulougo . Ma guduna hi hoeya ma hi gagaleya po hi gohola dumahi .
44012017	Tamogi nimanei i paliwelehi po ega hita iyahona ma apoma iyowai hau numa panipani ma Guyau i wiwihaleya naka i paliwelehi po i pa , ‘ Awai i waawala naka Yamesa po walewalehita ona paliwelehi ’ . Geka bahana u mulina i nehalehi po i nae dobu gehouna ugolina .
44012018	Malatomtomgei numa panipani tu galena itete hi winugoneina po hi talabibeiha , hi pa , ‘ Pita miyei i nae ? ’
44012019	Ma hougana Heloda i bibeiha po i beiha awa yaka tu galena itetehi i luhetalehi ma i baha po hi unihi .
44012020	Apoma Heloda Yudeya i nehaleya po i hopu u Sisaliya i mae . Heloda mi Taya po mi Saidoni i luuyogigiyehi yaka tauhi nugonugohi ipa hina winugoemosi . Ugolinei hi nae po a numa tu galena itetena gowana Balasita mitehi hi witulaneya . Ma hi lupaliyeya ipa apo wasawasa po tauhi hina winugoemosi . Matababana wasawasana a u meyagai hi lauwahala nae , yaniyani a u tupo .
44012021	Heloda iyeta i inagani ugolina wasawasa hai luilui i luiya ma anani tugula ugolina i tugula ma i wibaabani .
44012022	Ma lawa hi ototu hi pa , ‘ E ibaabani amaka mei Yaubada ma ega lawa ’ .
44012023	Ma hai omhuna i waya po ega Yaubada ita wotalagiyeya yaka mala emosi ma Guyau a tu winoyanoya Heloda i dewaya po i totogo po motamota hi tonaya po i hilage .
44012024	Ma naka hougana lawa Yaubada a baha hi nonoli po hi iponawogogeya . Ma hai boluna i lalata .
44012025	Banabasi ma Saulo ma hewali gowana Yoni Maki hi weluwaya po hi gunawilehi hougana u Yelusalem hai bagibagi hi laiwoloeya .
44013001	Tu witumagana u Anitiyoka naka gehouhi tu bahapiko po gehouhi tu wiatatiyana . Naka geka gowahi : Banabasi po Simiyona ( hi wigowaya po Uguwa ) po Lukasi Sailinagei po Wasawasa Heloda a woilata Manaeni po Saulo .
44013002	Hougana hi iyohi po Guyau hi wotalagiyeya ma Alugo Woiyawa i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Banabasi ma Saulo ona teleliyehi po hai bagibagi tapuna ubeina a itowolihi hina dewaya ’ .
44013003	Apoma tu witumaganahi hai wiyohi po tapalolo u mulina , nimahi Banabasi ma Saulo u ununuhi hi houna po hi kawaidewedewehi ma hi himilihi po hi nae .
44013004	Banabasi ma Saulo Alugo Woiyawa i himilihi yaka hi hopu niha u liyaliyana meyagai gehouna gowana Selusiya po noka hosi wam hi geluya po hi'mkuka po hi nae Saipilasi u bonabonana .
44013005	Hi kadau nae meyagai gowana Salamisi po hi gota po naka hougana Yaubada a baha hi guguyeya mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu ugolina . Ma Yoni Maki hi weluwaya po tauna hai tu hagu .
44013006	Salamisi hi nehaleya po hi hopu po hi nenae po Paposi u meyageina hi lugeleta po hi mamae ma tu balabalau gowana BaYesu mitehi hi witutuhaga . Tauna Yudeyagei ma ipa tauna Yaubada a tu bahapiko , ma tamogi i koyama .
44013007	Tauna Saipilasi bonabonana hai taniwaga gowana Segasi Poulasi a hewali . Taniwagana naka lawa hanahanapuna , ma Banabasi ma Saulo i otugehi po hi nae babana ipa Yaubada a baha ina nonoli .
44013008	Tamogi tu balabalauna , BaYesu gowana Elimasi ( pona Gilikigei i ampaligudugudu ) i pa , ‘ Tulau , ega una itumaganehi ’ .
44013009	Tamogi Saulo ta wigowaya po Paulo naka Alugo Woiyawa i wihogoya po i toditodi ma tu balabalauna i gagaleya
44013010	po i pa , ‘ Tam mei Tomodulele . Tam ginouli dumadumaluna atapuna e igawiyeya . Koyama i wihogom po houga daodaona e ileta ipa Guyau a baha moinahi una buinihi po koyama .
44013011	Ma geka amalai apo Guyau ina wimihem po matam ina keke po ega una gagalena a sigana Yaubada am iyeta i bahebaheya ugolina una geleta , apoma apo una galena meme . ’ Mala emosi ma Elimasi maya i wiwaya ma matana i uguwi po i woyadaga nae ipa lawa u nimana hina wogo po hina widaadaya .
44013012	Apoma taniwagana Guyau a manini i gagaleya po i witumagana , po nugonugonei i'mhuna duma Guyau a wiatatiyana ubinei .
44013013	Paulo ma a lawa hi'mkuka po Paposi hi nehaleya po hi nae po u tanowai meyagai gehouna gowana Pega hi gota tupo Pampiliya u hinena . Yoni Maki noka hosi i nehalehi po i gunawileya po i nae u Yelusalem .
44013014	Ma Paulo ma a lawa Pega hi nehaleya po aehiyei hi lui po hi nae Anitiyoka Pisidiya u tupona hi lugeleta . Ma mi Yudeya hai dalabu iyetana ugolina hi nae po hau numa dalabu hi duhuna .
44013015	Yaubada a lugagayo Mose i gilugilumi po tu bahapiko hai giluma omhiyawana u mulina numa dalabu babadahi Paulo a lawa mitehi hi utanihi , hi pa , ‘ Walewalehiyai , inapa lawa winugokadidilihi bahahi ugolimi yaka ona bahehi ’ .
44013016	Ega yaka Paulo i wotowolo po nimana i wohepahi po lawa hi genuwana ma i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Yudeya po taumi ega mi Yudeya , Yaubada tu wotalagiyena atapumi ona lautanigana .
44013017	Yaubada tauta mi Isalaela ta itumaganeya naka googata i winaganihi , ugolinei natunatuhi hi maga duma po gasi hi kadidili duma hougana Isipita u tupona hi wihewahewa . Ma a maninigei googata i weluwinihi po Isipita hi hopu haleya .
44013018	Bolima magouna 40 u hinena Yaubada hau balabala i galena itetehi .
44013019	Ma Kainana hipulina u hinena dobu magouna 7 anai lawahi i wiapapoenihi . Ma googata i dewahi po Kainana hipulina hi tanitaniwageya naka bolima magouna 450 .
44013020	‘ Ma noka u mulina hai tu luhetala i witowolihi po hi tanitaniwagehi a sigana tu bahapiko gowana Samwela a houga witaniwaga .
44013021	Hougana Yaubada ugolina tu wiwasawasa hi laupaliyeya yaka Kisi natuna gowana Saulo i welehi . Saulo tauna Beniyamina guguninei i nei po bolima magouna 40 i witaniwaga .
44013022	Ma Saulo i wihaleya po u mulina Dawita i witowoli po hai wasawasa . Dawita ubeina geka pita Yaubada i baha i pa , “ Yese natuna Dawita a tuhagaya naka tauna a luhogaleya babana u luhogala atapuhi apo ina dewahi ” .
44013023	Yaubada a paliwitumagana i limoineya mi Isalaela ugolita , naka Yesu Tu wiluyagohanita i weleta , po Dawita guguninei i nei .
44013024	Yohola ega Yesu ita nei ma Yoni mi Isalaela lawahi ugolihi i nei ipa hai apapoe hina palihalehi ma bapatiso hina waya .
44013025	Ma Yoni a bagibagi mei ina ikokowi ma i baha nae mi Yudeya lawahi ugolihi i pa , “ Ami nugotuhu o pa tau iyai ? Tu wiluyagohana o ototoni naka ega tau . Tamogi muliugei e nenei . ” Ma Yoni i baha wiyateyate Yesu binei i pa , “ Tau ega u dewadewa awai ipa a pouleya , po a ae humahuma a wihaleya ” .
44013026	‘ Walewalehiu , Abelaham googana po taumi ega mi Yudeya iyawoi Yaubada tu wotalagiyena geka hosi , tauta ugolita geka luyagohanana tuwegana Yaubada i himiliyai .
44013027	Tuwegana naka Yesu binei , tamogi iyawoi u Yelusalem tu mae hai tanitaniwaga mitehi ega hita hanapugeya naka tauna Tu wiluyagohana . Ma gasi tu bahapiko hai baha dalabu magamaga he hiyahiyawi naka ega hita nugotuhu tuhagaya . Tamogi Yesu hi igouya naka tu bahapikohi hai baha hi laimoineya .
44013028	Moina hai wigou ega anona tamogi Pilato hi lupaliyeya ipa Yesu hina uni .
44013029	Yesu ubeina Yaubada a Bukau ugolina ginouli atapuna hi gilugilumi naka hi lautagoya po i kokoe ma hau ani take hi wihaleya po hau kokowaga hi houni .
44013030	Tamogi Yaubada hau hilage ma i witowolo meya po i woogeletena meya lawa ugolihi .
44013031	Naka tauhi mitehi lolowa Galili hi nehaleya po hi kadau gae Yelusalem . Ma i wogeletena meya ma i mamae naka iyeta magomagouna . Tauhi amalai a tu baha moina mi Yudeya lawahi ugolihi .
44013032	‘ Tiyai to nei geka hosi ipa tuwegana dewadewana to dedeya ugolimi . Mei Yaubada a paliwitumagana googata ugolihi
44013033	ipa Yesu ina itowolo meya naka tauta ugolita e laimoineya . Mei Sam wiluwagana u hinena hi gilugilumi geka pite , “ Tam Natuwe , amalai a wogeletem lawa boluhi u matahi naka tam Natuwe . ”
44013034	Ma Yaubada Yesu i witowolo meya po ega emoemotana Yesu ina buda , mei a Buka i bahebaheya pite i pa , “ Kawaidewadewa waiwoiyawana po moinana tam natuwe apo a welem . Mei Dawita a palipaliwitumaganeya . ”
44013035	Ugolinei ma i baha meme i pa , “ Yaubada a Tu bagibagi waiwoiyawana apega ina palihaleya po ina buda . ”
44013036	Geka paliwitumaganana ega Dawita binei babana Dawita a u houga Yaubada a nugotuhu i wootagohi po i hilage . Ma googana kokowagahi u liyaliyana hi guluwi po hinina i buda .
44013037	Ma tamogi Yaubada lawa emosi hotana hau hilage i towolo meya apega ina buda .
44013038	Walewalehiu , geka binei ipa ona hanapugena dumaya naka geka lawana ugolinei apo apapoe ina paligigilihi po binei ma tuwegana to guuguyeya ugolimi .
44013039	Ma ugolinei apo tu witumagana atapuhi ina houna idumaluhi . Mose a lugagayo ega ita huhouna idumaluta ma Yesu ugolinei apo hina houna idumaluta .
44013040	Ugolinei ipa ona gagalena imahi po tu bahapiko awai hi bahebaheya , apega ona wialoni . Hi pa ,
44013041	“ Ona lautanigana taumi tu'mpalihibahiba , ona wineneyabayababa ma ona hilage . Matababana ami houga bagibagi awai a dewadewaya naka apega ona witumaganeya . Hawena lawa gehouna ina paliwelemi ma apega ona witumaganeya . ” ’
44013042	Hougana Paulo ma Banabasi numa dalabuna hi nenehaleya ma lawa hi lupaliyehi ipa dalabu gehouna hina gunawilehi po geka ginoulihi hina dede mehi .
44013043	Omboina u mulina mi Yudeya po ega mi Yudeya naka mi Yudeya hai witumagana hi wiwaya tauhi atapuhi Paulo ma Banabasi hi wotagohi . Ma tu wituwetuwegahi lawahi ugolihi hi baha ma hi winugokadidilihi hi pa , ‘ Yaubada a lunogotootogo ona meme tagoya houga daodaona ’ .
44013044	Dalabu gehouna naka lawa atapuhi meyageina u hinena hi nei po Guyau a baha ipa hina nonoli .
44013045	Hougana mi Yudeya lawa boluna hi gagaleya po omgenagenalili nugonugohi i wihogoya . Ma Paulo a baha hi tugotugowiwili po hi yampaligudugudu .
44013046	Tamogi Paulo ma Banabasi hi bahabaha gawata babana ega hita geno , po hi pa , ‘ Lawa ipa Yaubada a baha hina dede tahaeya ugolimi ma a bahana o wihinigigiyeya . O pa ega ami dewadewa awai ipa luyagohana tuwetuwenai ona waya yaka apo to nehalemi po to nae tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi .
44013047	Matababana i lugagayo geka pite Guyau i baheya i pa , “ Tam a witowolim yayata tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi . Tam ugolimgei apo luyagohana una neiyai tupo wohepali . ” ’
44013048	Hougana tauhi ega mi Yudeya geka bahana hi noonoli po hi kaoha ma Yaubada a baha hi wiyateyateya . Ma iyawoi Yaubada i inaganihi luyagohana tuwetuwenai ubeina naka hi witumagana .
44013049	Ma Guyau a baha i gunanohaya po tupo noka i wihogoya .
44013050	Tamogi mi Yudeya , meyageina babadahi po wiwine waigapolahi po gasi waitumaganahi , hi liuyogigeinihi . Yaka lawa hi lihunahi po Paulo ma Banabasi hi wigawiyehi po tupo naka hi nehaleya .
44013051	Ega yaka tu wituwetuwegahi aehi dubudubuhi noka u meyageina hi lihooholihi ma hi nehalehi po hi nae u Ikoniyam .
44013052	Ma Yesu tu wotagona Alugo Woiyawa i wihogohi po gasi kaoha i wihogohi .
44014001	U Ikoniyam Paulo ma Banabasi mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu ugolina hi lui po hi luguguya . Hai luguguya ugolina ma mi Yudeya po ega mi Yudeya bolu baneina hi witumagana .
44014002	Ma mi Yudeya Keliso ega hita itumagana tauhi ega mi Yudeya hi liuyogigeinihi po tu witumagana hi wigawiyehi .
44014003	Ega yaka Paulo ma Banabasi hi meidaodao u Ikoniyam . Guyau ubeina hi bahabaha kadidili . Ma Guyau a lunugotootogo i laimoinehi hai baha ubeihi naka Paulo ma Banabasi i dewahi po wekiwekilala po manini nimahiyei hi wogeletehi .
