44014004	Meyageina u hinena naka lawa hi gunanohahi po bolu luwaga . Gehouhi tu wituwetuwegahi ubeihi hi nenae ma gehouhi mi Yudeya ubeihi hi nenae .
44014005	Apoma mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya , hai babada mitehi hi wiwogatala po ipa Paulo ma Banabasi hina dewa guyougehi po gaimei hina wilawihi .
44014006	Hougana wiwogatalana Paulo ma Banabasi hi hanahanapugeya po hi lowo po hi nae u Lisita po u Debi , meyagai baneihi Laikoniya u tupona . Ma gasi meyagai gehouhi Laikoniya u hinena
44014007	ugolihi Yaubada a baha hi guguyeya .
44014008	Lawa gehouna u Lisita i mamae naka hinana u managona ma aena i apapoe po ega ita nenae ma i tugutugula .
44014009	Tauna Paulo a baha i noonoli ma Paulo lawana i gagalena imahiyeya po i pa , ‘ Geka lawana a witumagana binei emoemotana ina luyagohana ’ .
44014010	Yaka Paulo i todi ma lawana i gagaleya po ponana i lata ma i baha nae ugolina i pa , ‘ Aemgei una towolo dumadumalu ! ’ Lawana i lupa gae ma i hopu po i lautowologeya po aenei i nae ma i nei .
44014011	Awai Paulo i dewadewaya , bolu hi gagaleya po Laikoniya ponahigei hi ototu hi pa , ‘ Yaubada hi lilawa hotahi po hi hopu mai ugolita ’ .
44014012	Banabasi hai yaubada hi wiwaligeheya po hi pa , Susi . Ma Paulo hai yaubada gehouna hi wiwaligeheya po hi pa , Hemesi , babana tauna omboinana i tanitaniwageya .
44014013	Yaubada Susi a tu witalaguyaba , a numa dalabu meyageina u aliyana naka bulumakau anai wihiyana i neiyai po meyageina mateta ma ugolina ipa lawa mitehi hina witalaguyaba .
44014014	Tamogi Paulo ma Banabasi geka dewana hi nonoli , yaka hai luilui hi laugagihi ma bolu u hinehi hi lui po hi ototu hi pa ,
44014015	‘ Iyowai po geka dewana o dewedeweya ? Tiyai lawa hota mei taumi . Ma to nei ipa tuwega dewadewana to dedeya ugolimi po geka dewahi ona palihalehi , ma ona luhagawilemi Yaubada Lauyagohanana ugolina . Geka Yaubadana tauna yada po hipuli po boga i dewahi . Ma u hinehi awai he mamae i dewahi .
44014016	Lolowa hapa odubona i palihalehi po hai nugotuhu hi lautago .
44014017	Tamogi dewa dewadewahi houga magomagouna i dewedewehi naka i laimoinena meya ugolihi . Mahula po gadiwewe yadei i weleta . Yaniyani i weleta po nugonugota i wikaoahahi . ’
44014018	Geka ompaliguduguduhi bahahi hi bahehi ma tamogi lawa boluhi yohola hi ileta ipa hina witalaguyaba Paulo ma Banabasi ugolihi .
44014019	Mi Yudeya Anitiyoka tupo Pisidiyagei hi nei po Ikoniyamgei hi nei u Lisita . Tauhi lawa boluhi nugonugohi hi litomatomahi po Paulo gaimei hi wilawi ma hi teina niyeya meyageina u aliyana . Hai nugotuhu hi pa amaka ita hilage .
44014020	Tamogi hougana tu wimulitago hi nei po hi meme wiwileya naka i towolo po meyageina i lui meya . Malitom po tauna ma Banabasi mitehi hi nae u Debi .
44014021	Paulo ma Banabasi tuwega dewadewana u Debi hi guguyeya po lawa boluhi hi winugobuinihi . Ma hi gunawilehi po hi nae u Lisita po u Ikoniyam po hi nae u Anitiyoka Pisidiya u hinena .
44014022	Hai nae ugolihi tu wimulitago hi inugokadidilihi po hi pa , ‘ Ona nugomomota omi witumagana ugolihi . Babana pilipili magomagouhi apo ta weluwilehi ma apoma apo Yaubada anani taniwaga ugolina ta geleta . ’
44014023	Paulo ma Banabasi bolu emosi po emosi u hinehi hai tanitaniwaga hi witowolihi . Ma anai lupalihi po anai wiyohihi hi'mbenenehi Guyau u nimana babana tauna ugolina hai witumagana hi hounihi .
44014024	Pisidiya tupona hi weluyayahi ma apoma hi nae Pampiliya anani taniwaga ugolina .
44014025	Tuwega dewadewana u Pega hi guguyeya ma apoma hi hopu u Ateliya
44014026	po u Ateliya ma hi gelu po hi nae Anitiyoka . Lolowa u Anitiyoka tu witumagana Yaubada a lunugotootogo po a galena itete binei hi lupali po Paulo ma Banabasi hi himihimilihi naka hi lugeleta meme babana hai bagibagi hi wikokowi .
44014027	Hougana u Anitiyoka hi laugeleta naka tu witumagana hai bolu hi tuboinihi ma Yaubada ginouli atapuhi ugolihi i dewadewahi naka hi paliwelehi . Ma gasi tauhi ega mi Yudeya Yaubada hai gaogao i welehi po hi witumagana .
44014028	Ma u Anitiyoka tu witumagana mitehi hi meidaodao .
44015001	Lawa gehouhi Yudeyagei hi nei u Anitiyoka po walewalehihi hi iatatiyehi hi pa , ‘ Inapa ega ami wekiwekilala hini omhapina ona waya mei Mose lugagayo i gilugilumi ugolina yaka apega ona luyagohana ’ .
44015002	Paulo ma Banabasi lawahi mitehi hi wigamogahigahi geka bahana binei . Ega yaka Paulo ma Banabasi lawa gehouhi hi itowolihi mitehi hi nae u Yelusalem , tu wituwetuwega po tanitaniwaga ipa hina galehi geka bahana ubeina .
44015003	Paulo ma Banabasi ma lawahi hi himilihi po hi nenae naka hougana Pinisiya tupona po Samaliya tupona hi luinihi po hi nenae naka hi ipaliwelena hi pa , ‘ Tauhi ega mi Yudeya Yaubada hi itumaganeya ’ . Naka ugolinei walewalehihi atapuhi hi kaoha duma .
44015004	Hougana u Yelusalem hi laugeleta naka tu witumagana hai bolu po tu wituwetuwega po tanitaniwaga hi likaohahi . Ma Paulo ma Banabasi Yaubada ginouli atapuhi ugolihi i dewadewahi naka hi paliwelehi .
44015005	Tamogi mi Yudeya hai lugagayo tu wiatatiyana gehouhi Yesu hi wootagoya ugolinei hi towolo po hi pa , ‘ Tu meuputa lawahi iyawoi nawa Yesu hi itumaganeya ona paliwelehi ona pa , “ Wekiwekilala hini omhapina ona waya po Mose a lugagayo i gilugilumi naka i pa ona iponawogogeya ” . ’
44015006	Ega yaka tu wituwetuwega po tanitaniwaga hi'mboina po geka bahana hi wibaabaniyeya .
44015007	Ma hai wibaabani a dao u hinena naka Pita i towolo po i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , o hanapugeya lolowa u hayami ma Yaubada i winaganiu , po ipa tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi tuwega dewadewana a guguyeya , ma apo hina nonoli po hina witumagana .
44015008	Ma lawa hai nugotuhu naka Yaubada i hanapugena dumahi , po tu meuputa iyawoi nawa hi itumagana i galena idewedewehi . A galena idewadewa i wogeleteya naka Alugo Woiyawa i welehi mei i weleweleta pite .
44015009	Tauhi po tauta ega ita galena ikahata . Nugonugohi i liyeuyeuhi babana hi witumagana .
44015010	Ugolinei tu wimulitago wouhi ega ta laipeunihi Mose a lugagayo ugolinei . Geka witeina ega emoemotana ipa ta awali babana odubona po amalai naka lugagayona ata ani peu . Geka dewana binei ega Yaubada ta laudadani .
44015011	Ta itumagana po Guyau Yesu a lunugotootogogei ta lauyagohana naka amaka mei tauhi gasi . ’
44015012	Pita a baha u mulina ma lawa atapuhi ega ponahi ma hi lautanigana . Banabasi ma Paulo Yaubada a wekiwekilala po a manini atapuhi tauhi ega mi Yudeya u hayahi i dewadewahi naka hi dede pahihi .
44015013	Hai widedede u mulina Yamesa i baha i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , ona lautanigana !
44015014	Pita i dedeya iyowai Yaubada tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi i woogeletena meya po u hayahi a guguni i inaganihi .
44015015	Geka pite emoemotana mei tu bahapiko hai baha Yaubada a Buka ugolina i pa ,
44015016	“ Geka u mulina apo a gunawileu , po Dawita a numa i guliguli a witowola meya . Awai hi woapapoe apo a liwou mehi , ma a witowolihi ,
44015017	po apo lawa atapuhi tau Guyau hina biheu . Ma tauhi ega mi Yudeya waigowahi apo hina wigaliugei .
44015018	Geka pite Guyau ponana lolowa i bahebahena geleteya . ”
44015019	‘ Ugolinei ma u wikaha naka tauhi ega mi Yudeya Yaubada he itumaganeya , ega ipa ta laipilipilihi .
44015020	Tamogi ipa hai pepa ta gilumi po ta paliwelehi : Aniani hi yambenenehi talaoloto ugolihi ega hina ananihi . Ega hina matamatamaga . Gasi ega muhala waitalana po gadouna he kikiki hina anani .
44015021	Matababana geka lugagayohi Mose i gilugilumihi mi Yudeya hau numa dalabu hi guuguyeya houga i dao duma . Ma a baha meyagai atapuhi u hinehi dalabu emosi po emosi he guuguyehi . ’
44015022	Tu wituwetuwegahi po tanitaniwaga po tu witumagana boluhi mitehi hi wiwogatala po lawa hi winaganihi boluna u hinena . Tauhi apo Paulo ma Banabasi mitehi hina himilihi po hina nae u Anitiyoka . Lawa hi itowolihi naka Yudasa ( gowana gehouna Basabasa ) ma gasi Sailasi . Naka hai luwagahi walewalehihi hi wiyateyatena dumahi .
44015023	Pepa lawahi mitehi hi himilihi po hi nenae naka geka pite : ‘ Tu wituwetuwega po tanitaniwaga tiyai , walewalehimi i wimaamala taumi walewalehiyai atapumi ugolimi . Taumi ega Yudeya lawami u Anitiyoka po u Siliya po u Silisiya tu mae .
44015024	Amaka to nonoli naka i bolu ugolina lawa hi nehi po hi lipilipilimi po nugonugomi hi wiapapoenihi hai baha ugolihiyei . Tamogi ega ugoliyai hita lubayada ma geka dewana hi deweya .
44015025	Ugolinei ma to'mboina po atapuiyai to lueena ma lawa to winaganihi po hi nehi ugolimi ata lawa Banabasi po Paulo mitehi .
44015026	Hai luwaga hai luyagohana hi palihalehi Guyau Yesu Keliso gowanei .
44015027	Ma Yudasa po Sailasi to himilihi tauhi apo ginoulihi to gilugilumihi emoemotahi apo hina limoinehi .
44015028	Matababana Alugo Woiyawa a nugotuhu mei i nugotuhu po ipa ega to laiwiteinimi , ma geka ginoulihi tuawahi ona wootagohi .
44015029	Aniani hi yambenenehi talaoloto ugolihi ega ona ananihi . Ega muhala waitalana po gadouna hi kikiki ona anani . Ega ona matamatamaga . Inapa geka ginoulihi ega ugolihi ona wogowogo nae yaka apo ona meimahi . Kihoni . ’
44015030	Tu winoyanoyahi hi himilihi po hi nenae naka hi hopu u Anitiyoka po tu witumagana hai bolu hi boinihi ma pepana hi welehi .
44015031	Ma lawahi pepana hi hiyahiyawi po a baha winugokadidili ugolina ma hi kaoha duma .
44015032	Yudasa ma Sailasi naka tauhi Yaubada a tu bahapiko ugolinei ma walewalehihi mitehi hi wibaabani duma . Hi inugokadidilihi po hi towolo kadidili .
44015033	Tauhi mitehi hi meidaodao ma apoma hi himilihi po anai nugodumolahi hi gunawilehi tu himilihi ugolihi .
44015034	[ Tamogi Sailasi i nugonugotuhu po noka hosi i mae . ]
44015035	Paulo ma Banabasi u Anitiyoka hi mamae , ma lawa magomagouhi mitehi Guyau a baha hi guuguyeya po hi atatiyaneya .
44015036	Iyeta wabiha hi kokoe ma Paulo i baha nae Banabasi ugolina i pa , ‘ Ta gunawilena meta po walewalehita ta dadanihi lolowa meyageihi ugolihi Guyau a baha ta guuguyeya , po ta galena niyehi iyowai hai mae galenahi ’ .
44015037	Banabasi a luhogala ipa Yoni Maki hina weluwaya po mitehi hina nae .
44015038	Ma Paulo i nugonugotuhu po ega ita dumalu , babana lolowa u Pampiliya hi mamae po Yoni Maki i lowo halehi ma ega ita wotagohi po hai bagibagi hita wikokowi .
44015039	Ugolinei Paulo ma Banabasi geka bahahi bihiyei ma hi lugamogahigahi po hi wikahakaha . Banabasi Yoni Maki i weluwaya po hi'mkuka po hi nae u Saipilasi .
44015040	Ma Paulo Sailasi i winagani po mitehi ipa hina nae , po ega yaka walewalehihi Paulo ma Sailasi hi lupali ubeihi ipa Guyau a lunugotootogo po a galena itete ina melabenihi .
44015041	Ma hi'mhoe po Siliya ma Silisiya hai ani taniwaga meyageihi hi luinihi po tu witumagana hai bolu atapuhi hi itowolo kadidilihi .
44016001	Naka hougana Paulo ma Sailasi hi nae u Debi po gasi hi nehaleya po hi nae u Lisita . Ma noka hosi u Lisita tu wimulitago gehouna i mamae , gowana Timoti . Timoti hinana wawine Yudeyagei ma Yesu i itumaganeya . Ma amana lawa Gilikigei .
44016002	Tu witumagana atapuhi u Lisita po u Ikoniyam naka Timoti hi kawaidewedewena dumaya .
44016003	Paulo nugonugona ipa Timoti ina weluwaya . Ega yaka mi Yudeya hai dewagei a wekiwekilala hini omhapina i waya babana lawa noka hosi tu mae tauhi mi Yudeya po hi hanapugeya Timoti amana lawa Gilikigei .
44016004	Lisita hi nehaleya po hi nenae meyagai emosi po emosi hi luinihi naka Yelusalem tu wituwetuwegahi po tanitaniwaga dewa awai hi laueenehi naka tu witumagana hi palipaliwelehi ipa hina iponawogogehi .
44016005	Ega yaka tu witumagana hai bolu hi witowolo kadidilihi po iyeta emosi po emosi lawa hi nugonugobui ma tu witumagana hai bolu hi magamaga .
44016006	Ma hi kadau po hi nae tupo Piligiya ma Galatiya ugolihi ma Alugo Woiyawa ega ita palihalehi ipa Guyau a baha hina guguyeya u Asiya .
44016007	Ega yaka Maisiya u tuponana hi nae po sigana ugolina hi lugeleta po hi ileta ipa Bitiniya tupona hina luiya . Tamogi Yesu Alugona Waiwoiyawana ega ita palihalehi ipa hina lui .
44016008	Ega yaka Maisiyagei hi'mhoe po hi hopu u Tolowasi .
44016009	Ma noka upomna Paulo i eno galena po lawa Masedoniyagei i gagaleya ma i towolo po i laupaliyeya i pa , ‘ Una lunugotootogeyai po una damanai u Masedoniya po una haguyai ’ .
44016010	Hougana Paulo lawana i eneno gagaleya po i welutowolo po to wononogo po tau ipa mitehi to nae u Masedoniya babana to nugotuhuya naka Yaubada i otugeiyai ipa tuwega dewadewana lawa noka hosi ugolihi to guguyeya .
44016011	Ega yaka u Tolowasi ma wamgei to'mkuka po to dumalu , po to damana bonabona gowana Samotalesi ugolina . Ma malitom po to damana u Nipolisi .
44016012	Noka hosi ma to lui po to nae Masedoniya meyageina baneina Pilipai ugolina . Meyageina gasi mi Loma hi mimiyeya . Noka u meyageina to mamae iyeta ega hita maga imahi .
44016013	Ma hau dalabu , meyageina to nehaleya po to nae goila u hadana . Tu nugotuhuya apo noka hosi mi Yudeya hai ani lupali to tuhagaya . Wiwine noka hosi hi'mboina mai po to duhuna ma ugolihi to wibaabani .
44016014	Tu lutaniganeiyai emosi naka Lidiya , wawine Tayatailagei . Tauna luilui kayakayahi i gimagimalehi . Wawinena naka Yaubada tu wotalagiyena gehouna po nugonugona Guyau i luhoeya ma Paulo awai i bahebahehi naka ugolihi i kawamoina .
44016015	Po noka hougana tauna po a numahine lawahi hi bapatisohi ma u mulina i igiigimeiyai i pa , ‘ Taumi o baha o pa tau Guyau tu witumaganena moinana yaka ona nei po u numa ona mae ’ . Ma nugonugoiyai i talatalahi po to nae .
44016016	Iyeta gehouna to'mhoe po to nenae ani lupali dobuna ugolina po tu bagibagi wawinena to tuhagaya . Wawinena naka alugo palopaloumana i luiya po i dewaya po awai apo houga u naota hina waawala i bahebahehi . Geka dewana ugolina ma mone baneina a tanitaniwaga ubeihi i dewadewaya .
44016017	Paulo po tiyai i wotagoiyai po i ototu i pa , ‘ Geka lawahi naka Yaubada Gegewahagana a tu bagibagi . Tauhi luyagohana tahayana he bahebaheya ugolimi . ’
44016018	Geka dewana iyeta magomagouna i dewedeweya a sigana Paulo uyona i gigai ma i luhagawileya po alugona palopaloumana ugolina i baha nae . I pa , ‘ Yesu Keliso gowanei a paliwelem , naka wawinena una hopuhaleya ! ’ Mala emosi ma alugo palopaloumana wawinena i hopu haleya .
44016019	Wawinena a tanitaniwaga hi gagalena po hai ani lumone tahayaha i kokoe . Ega yaka Paulo ma Sailasi hi womomohihi po hi teina niyehi ani gimala u dobuna , tanitaniwaga ugolihi .
44016020	Hi neihi mai po tu luhetala mi Loma u naohi ma hi pa , ‘ Geka mi Yudeya lawahi , ma ata meyagai u hinena pilipili he laiwawalihi .
44016021	Lugagayo he iatatiyanehi naka tauta mi Loma ata lugagayo he tutulagonihi po ega emoemotana ta winihi po ta metagohi . ’
44016022	Paulo ma Sailasi hi lawihi naka bolu tu luhetalahi u hayahi hi lui po hi wilougo haguhagu . Ma tu luhetalahi Paulo po Sailasi hai kaleko hi laulolohi ma hi baha po hi kwapukwapuhi .
44016023	Hi wilawihi po i kokoe ma hau numa panipani hi hauluiyehi . Ma numa panipani tu galena itete hi paliweleya hi pa , ‘ Numa una gudu momohi ’ .
44016024	Tu galena itetena baha i noonoli po Paulo ma Sailasi numa panipani u hine dumana i hounihi ma aehi mayau talaikukuna ugolina i panipani lawitehi .
44016025	Mei upom u tipolina Paulo ma Sailasi hi laupali ma hi lulougo tapalolo Yaubada ugolina ma hai lawa numa panipani u hinena hi lautanigana .
44016026	Mala emosi ma guhuguhu baneina i nei po panina ogolana i guhuhi po mala emosi ma gudu atapuna i gunahoe pahi . Ma lawa atapuhi hai ae panipani pawapawasi hi gunagunalupenihi .
44016027	Tu galena itete i welutowolo po gudu gamohi hi taatagihi ma a nugotuhu ipa amaka lawahi hita lowo . Ega yaka a kwasikwasi i waya po ipa ina uni meya .
44016028	Ma Paulo i otu labatana ugolina i pa , ‘ Ega una ununi mem babana atapuiyai geka u hinena ’ .
44016029	Tu galena itetena yayata ubeina i otu i pa , ‘ Lampa ona neiyai ’ , ma i bulili lui Paulo ma Sailasi u aehi po i guli hopu ma i taatawa a matouta binei .
44016030	Ma apoma i weluwinihi po hi hopu u uputa ma i lubayadehi i pa , ‘ Babada , awai apo a dewaya po a luyagohana ? ’
44016031	Ma hi pa , ‘ Guyau Yesu una witumaganeya yaka apo una luyagohana . Tam po am numahine lawahi mitehi . ’
44016032	Ega yaka a numa u hinena Guyau a baha hi guguyeya tauna po a manago lawahi atapuhi ugolihi .
44016033	Noka uguwana ugolina Paulo ma Sailasi i weluwinihi po kelohi i ogahi ma tauna po a manago atapuhi hi wibapatisohi .
44016034	Ma apoma i weluwinihi po hi gae a numa ugolina po aniani i welehi po hi am . Ma lawana a manago mitehi hi kaoha duma babana Yaubada hi witumaganeya .
44016035	Malitom po tu luhetalahi tu'mpanipani hi himilihi po hi nenae naka baha geka hi himili hi pa , ‘ Naka lawahi ona wohalehi ’ .
44016036	Tu galena itete geka bahahi Paulo ugolina i bahehi i pa , ‘ Tu luhetala baha hi himiliyai ipa to wohalemi . Ugolinei ma ona hopu mai a nugodumolami ona nae . ’
44016037	Tamogi tu'mpanipani ugolihi Paulo i baha nae i pa , ‘ Ega i powa awai ma bolu u matahi hi wilawiyai ma hau numa panipani hi houniyai . Tauhi hai powa babana tiyai Loma lawiyai , ma ega emoemotana ipa gowagowadei hina hauhopu neiyai ? Apeega ! Tauhi hina nei po hina hauhopu neiyai . ’
44016038	Tu'mpanipani geka bahahi hi bahebahehi tu luhetala ugolihi po tu luhetalahi hi matouta duma matababana Paulo ma Sailasi naka mi Loma .
44016039	Ega yaka hi nae po Paulo ma Sailasi hi mamalihi ma hi weluwinihi po numa panipani hi hopu haleya . Ma hi lupaliyehi ipa meyageina hina nehaleya .
44016040	Numa panipani hi hopu haleya po hi nae Lidiya a numa ugolina . Ma noka hosi tu witumagana hi tuhagahi po hi winugokadidilihi ma hai u meyagai hi nehalehi .
44017001	Paulo ma Sailasi hi nehalehi po hi nae Apilosi po Apoloniya hi luinihi po hi weluwilehi . Ma hi nei u Tesalonika mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu i memeyana .
44017002	Ma Paulo a dewa houga daodaona ugolinei ma i dumalu po i nae hau numa dalabu . Noka u numana Yaubada a Buka ugolinei lawa i iatatiyehi naka dalabu gaogaona tonuga .
44017003	Tauna Yaubada a baha i deede imahiyehi po i laimoinehi naka ipa Yesu ina hilage po ina towolo meme . Ma Paulona i pa , ‘ Geka Yesuna ugolimi a deedeya naka tauna Besinana lawana ’ .
44017004	Mi Yudeya gehouhi nugonugohi i waya po Paulo ma Sailasi hi wotagohi . Ma gasi tu wotago gehouhi naka mi Giliki boluhi Yaubada tu wotalagiyena po wiwine waigapolahi gehouhi .
44017005	Tamogi mi Yudeya hi'mgenagenalili po lawa woapapoehi hi tuboinihi po bolu hi dewaya . Ma meyageina atapuna u hinena hi laigologololo po Yasona a numa hi wigawiyeya ipa iyowaka ma Paulo ma Sailasi hi bibihehi po ipa hina hopu nehi lawa boluhi u matahi .
44017006	Tamogi ega hita tuhagahi , yaka Yasona po tu witumagana gehouhi hi teina niyehi meyagai tanitaniwagahi ugolihi . Ma hi ototu hi pa , ‘ Paulo ma Sailasi tauhi naka tupo atapuhi he laipilipilihi . Ma amalai hi lui mai ata meyagai u hinena ,
44017007	po Yasona a numa ugolina i hounihi po he mamae . Tauhi ata wasawasa baneina Sisa a lugagayo he tutulagonihi . Ma hi pa Wasawasa gehouna , gowana Yesu . ’
44017008	Tanitaniwaga po lawa geka bahahi hi noonolihi po nugonugohi hi geno duma ,
44017009	ma hi baha po Yasona a lawa mitehi hi wimeiha monegei hai numa panipani lupena halenana binei ma apoma hi wohalehi .
44017010	Aipompom ma tu witumaganahi Paulo ma Sailasi hi himilihi po hi nae u Beleya . Hougana u Beleya hi laugeleta naka hi nae mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu ugolina .
44017011	Noka hosi lawa nugonugohi hi lugadagadalihi ega mei lawa u Tesalonika nugonugohi hi pupu . Matababana lawa u Beleya Paulo a baha hi lautaniganeya ma hi luweluweya Yaubada a Buka ugolina iyeta emosi po emosi . Moina Paulo a baha moinahi bo eega , naka ubeina ma hi luweluwehi .
44017012	Ugolinei mi Yudeya boluhi hi witumagana ma gasi wiwine mi Giliki waigapolahi gehouhi po ololoto mi Giliki magomagouhi hi witumagana .
44017013	Tamogi mi Yudeya u Tesalonika naka Paulo u Beleya Yaubada a baha i guuguyeya hi nonoli . Yaka hi nei po lawa hi liuyogigeinihi po Paulo ma Sailasi hi wigawiyehi .
44017014	Ega yaka tu witumagana Paulo hi himili po i nae u niha ma Sailasi Timoti mitehi u Beleya hi mae .
44017015	Lawahi Paulo mitehi hi gelu po hi nenae naka u Ateni hai siga . Noka hosi ma hi gunawilehi po hi nenae u Beleya naka Paulo a baha hi waya , po ipa Sailasi ma Timoti hai bagibagi ina kokoe naka Paulo hina latu yagiyagineya .
44017016	Paulo u Ateni Sailasi po Timoti i ototonihi naka nugonugona i witai duma babana u meyageina talaoloto i maga duma .
44017017	Ega yaka mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya Yaubada tu wotalagiyena , mitehi hi wigamogahigahi hau numa dalabu ma ani gimala dobuna ugolina , iyeta emosi po emosi lawa hi ialoni naka mitehi hi igamogahigahi .
44017018	Ma tu hanahanapu hai bolu gowahi Epikuli ma Sitoweki lawahi gehouhi Paulo mitehi hi wigamogahigahi . Ma gehouhi hi pa , ‘ Geka buuwana ipa awai ina baheya ? ’ Gehouhi hi pa , ‘ Galenana mei tupo geha yaubadahi hai tu luguguya ’ . Geka bahana hi baheya babana Yesu tuwegana po a towolo meme i guuguyeya .
44017019	Ega yaka Paulo hi weluwaya po hi niyeya tanitaniwaga hai omboina gowana Aliyopago ugolina po hi pa , ‘ Wiatatiyana wouna geka tam e ibaabaniyeya ipa to hanapugeya .
44017020	Ginouli gehouhi to noonolihi naka to winugoniniyehi , binei ipa to hanapugehi anohi awai . ’
44017021	( Hai lubayada babana gegeka , mi Ateni po gasi tupo geha lawahi u Ateni hi mamae naka ega awai hita dewadewaya ma ginouli wouhi hi deedehi ma hi ibaabaniyehi . )
44017022	Paulo Aliyopago tu'mboinahi u tipolihi i towolo ma i pa , ‘ Mi Ateni , ami dewa atapuhi ugolihi ma a gagalemi , naka ami ani witumagana tapuna po tapuna hi maga duma .
44017023	Matababana ami meyagai a yayahi po a nae ma ani tapalolo dobuhi a gagalehi po ani'mbenena patahi ugolihi geka bahana a tuhagaya , i pa , “ Yaubada ega tata hanapugeya a pata ” . Ugolinei Yaubadana tauna o wotalagiyeya ma ega ota hanapugeya tauna a deedeya ugolimi .
44017024	‘ Yaubadana hipuli tu dewana po ginouli atapuhi ugolina he mamae tu dewahi , yaka naka tauna yada ma hipuli Guyouna , naka numa tapalolo lawa hi dewadewahi ega u hinehi ita mamae .
44017025	Ma gasi lawa nimatiyei ginouli ta iwawalihi ega emoemotana tan'ombeneneya ugolina babana tauna ega dayadayabu . Tauna yautu po luyagohana po ginouli atapuhi lawa e weleweleta .
44017026	Hipuli tupo wohepali u hinena Yaubada lawa i wiwawalita po ta mamae naka lawa emosi ugolinei ta nei . Tauna tuawana ata houga amaka i bahehi po ata ani mae sigasiga dumahi i bahehi .
44017027	Geka i dewadewaya babana ipa ta bibiheya ma ta iletaya ipa ta tuhagaya . Matababana Yaubada a mawa ega ita dao .
44017028	Mei lawa gehouna i baheya i pa , “ Yaubada tauna a manini u hinena ta mamae po ta idagudagu po ta lauyagohana ” . Mei ami tu wipakulo hi bahebaheya hi pa , “ Tauta gasi tauna natunatuna ” .
44017029	‘ Yaubada natunatuna tauta ugolinei ega ipa Yaubada galenana ta nugonugotuhuya mei talaoloto lawa hai winugonugotuhugei he laukidihi . Gole bo siluba bo gaima ugolinei hi gilugilumihi tauhi ega mei Yaubada .
44017030	Winugoneina hougahi ugolihi Yaubada ega lawa wimeihana ita genogeya . Ma amalai lawa ataputa e palipaliweleta i pa , “ Ami dewa apapoehi ona palihalehi ” .
44017031	Matababana iyeta i bahebaheya ugolina lawa i inagani apo dewa dumadumalunei lawa ataputa ina libahibahita . A baha limoinana lawa ataputa ugolita naka lawana i inagani amaka hilage ugolinei i witowolo meya . ’
44017032	Hougana Paulo a baha towolo meme ubeina hi noonoli po lawa gehouhi hi'mpalihibahiba ma gehouhi hi pa , ‘ Nugonugoiyai apo una wibaabani meme geka bahahi ubeihi ’ .
44017033	Ega yaka Paulo omboinana i nehaleya .
44017034	Tamogi lawa gehouhi hi latuya po hi witumagana ma u hayahi naka lawa gowana Diyonisi , tauna Aliyopago taniwagana gehouna . Ma gasi u hayahi naka wawine gowana Damalisi po gasi lawa gehouhi hi witumagana .
44018001	Paulo a baha u mulina Ateni i nehaleya po i nae u Kolinito .
44018002	Noka hosi lawa Yudeyagei gowana Akwila , Ponita u meyageina hi guniguni i tuhagaya . Tauna amalai hotana agona gowana Pilisila mitehi Italigei hi nei . Hai nei matababana Itali hai taniwaga gowana Kilodiyasi i baha i pa , Yudeya lawahi Loma hina nehaleya .
44018003	Paulo i nae po i galehi po mitehi hi mae , babana tauna po tauhi hai mone tahayana naka palai hi yamdewa .
44018004	Dalabu magamaga hau numa dalabu mi Yudeya po mi Giliki mitehi hi igamogahigahi . Ma i ileta ipa nugonugohi ina waya .
44018005	Hougana Sailasi ma Timoti Masedoniyagei hi laugeletai naka Paulo a bagibagi palai didinana i nehaleya ma a houga luguguya ugolina i hahaleya . Ma mi Yudeya i palipaliwelena imahiyehi naka Yesu tauna Besinana lawana .
44018006	Ma hi bahabaha guduguduya po hi iapapoeya naka a luilui dubudubuna i lihooholi ipa hai apapoe ina wiatatiyehi . Ma i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Inapa ona lugowademi , yaka taumi tuawami apo gouna ona waya . Tau ega u gou . Yaka amalai i wawala po i nenae naka apo a nenae tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi . ’
44018007	Ugolinei mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu i nehaleya po i nae lawa gowana Sisiyasi Yusito , Yaubada tu wotalagiyena a numa ugolina . Lawana a numa naka mi Yudeya hai numa dalabu u liyaliyana .
44018008	Mi Yudeya hai taniwaga gehouna gowana Kilisipa Guyau i witumaganeya , tauna po a numahine lawahi atapuhi . Ma mi Kolinito magomagouhi Paulo a baha hi noonoli naka hi witumagana po bapatiso hi waya .
44018009	Upom emosi Paulo i enogagalena po Guyau i bahabaha nae Paulona ugolina i pa , ‘ Ega lawa una matomatoutehi . Tamogi una ibaabani ma ega una wohouna ,
44018010	matababana tau tam mitem . Ma ega emoemotana po iyai ina wihiniwiyuwam babana geka meyageina u hinena u lawa hi maga . ’
44018011	Ega yaka Paulo noka hosi i mae bolima emosi ma tupona , Yaubada a baha lawa i iatatiyehi .
44018012	Tamogi hougana Galiyo i taniwaga u Giliki naka mi Yudeya lawahi hi'mtuboina ma Paulo hi numa panipani po hi niyeya hau luhetala .
44018013	Ma Galiyo ugolina hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana lawa nugonugohi e talatalahi ipa Yaubada hina wotalagiyeya . Ma nanakahi naka lugagayo e tutulagoni . ’
44018014	Paulo gamona i tatagi po ipa ina baha ma Galiyo i baha nae mi Yudeya ugolihi i pa , ‘ Itapa geka lawana powa bo apapoe baneina ita dewaya apo nanaka u matababana ma upuwe ita hegoemi .
44018015	Ma geka wigamobahabahana naka baha po gowa po ami lugagayo ubeihi . Ugolinei ma taumi tuawami ona lidumaluya . Apega geka ginoulihi ugolihi a wituluhetala . ’
44018016	Ma ega yaka i wiyagahi po ani luhetala meyageina hi nehaleya .
44018017	Atapuhi numa dalabu badana gowana Sositene hi womomohi ani luhetala u matetana ma hi wilawi . Tamogi Galiyo geka dewana ugolina ega ita geno .
44018018	Paulo u Kolinito i mamae naka iyeta i maga duma , ma apoma tu witumagana i nehalehi po Pilisila ma Akwila mitehi hi'mkuka po Siliya ubeina hi nae . Yohola ega hita gelu ma Yaubada u matana i wigwala u Kenekeleya ma unununa hi gali .
44018019	Ma u Kenekeleya hi gelu po hi nae u Epeso po noka hosi Pilisila ma Akwila i tuhounihi . Ma tuawana i lui hau numa dalabu po mi Yudeya lawahi mitehi hi wibaabani .
44018020	Hi lupaliyeya ipa mitehi hina meidaodao ma i luhinigigai .
44018021	Tamogi i nenae ma i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Inapa Yaubada a nugotuhu yaka apo a gunawileu ugolimi ’ . Ega yaka u Epeso ma i'mkuka po i nae .
44018022	Hougana u Sisaliya i laugeleta naka i nae u Yelusalem po tu witumagana lawahi i mamalihi ma apoma i hopu u Anitiyoka .
44018023	Noka hosi houga kukuna i haleya ma apoma Galatiya po Piligiya tupohi i yayahihi . Tu wimulitago atapuhi i towolo kadidilihi .
44018024	Lawa Yudeyagei ma a meyagai Alesanila gowana Apolo i nae u Epeso . Tauna lawa bahabahana po Yaubada a Buka i hanapugena dumaya .
44018025	Wiatatiyana Guyau a Tahaya ugolina i waya po i palihalena dumaya po Yesu ubeina i iatatiyanehi po i bahebahehi naka i laidumaluhi . Tamogi Yoni a wibapatiso tuawana i hanapugeya .
44018026	Mi Yudeya hai u numa dalabu i wiwawala po i ibaabani kadidili ma hougana Pilisila ma Akwila hi noonoli po hi weluwaya . Hi weluwaya po hi niyeya hai numa ugolina apoma Yaubada a Tahaya hi dede idumaluya ugolina .
44018027	Apolo i inugonugotuhu ipa ina damana u Giliki , yaka tu witumagana u Epeso hi haguya po hi'mgiluma nae tu wimulitago u Giliki ugolihi . Hi paliwelehi ipa Apolo hina kaoheya ma hina weluwaya . Hougana i laugeleta naka Yaubada a lunugotootogo galena itetenagei ma lawa hi itumagana naka ugolihi i wihaguhagu duma .
44018028	Matababana mi Yudeya lawahi mitehi hi laugamobagibagi ma hai baha i ununihi , bolu omboinahi u hinehi , po Yesu tauna Besinana lawana naka Yaubada a Buka ugolinei i laimoineya .
44019001	Apolo u Kolinito i mamae naka Giliki tupona ma Paulo Piligiya tupona i nehaleya po meyagai atapuhi i weluyayahihi po i hopu u niha po u Epeso i geleta . Noka hosi tu wimulitago i tuhagahi .
44019002	Ma i lubayadehi i pa , ‘ O itumagana naka Alugo Woiyawa o tuhagaya bo eega ? ’ Ma hi wimeiha hi pa , ‘ Yohola ega tota nonoli naka Alugo Woiyawa e mamae ’ .
44019003	Ega yaka Paulo i lubayadehi i pa , ‘ Bapatiso waigohina o waya ? ’ Ma hi pa , ‘ Yoni a bapatiso to waya ’ .
44019004	Paulo i pa , ‘ Yoni a bapatiso naka iyawoi hai apapoe ugolihi ma hi nugonugobui naka ubeina ma i ibapatiso . Ma lawa i paliwelehi i pa mulinei lawa i nenei naka ugolina hina itumagana . Lawana naka tauna Yesu . ’
44019005	Geka bahana hi noonoli po Guyau Yesu gowanei bapatiso hi waya .
44019006	Ma hougana Paulo nimana i huhounihi ugolihi naka Alugo Woiyawa i nei ugolihi po pona tapuhigei hi ibaabani ma gasi baha piko bahana hi ibaabaniyeya .
44019007	Tauhi magouhi mei 12 .
44019008	Geka pite Paulo i wobagibagi wamahiya tonuga u hinehi . Houga daodaona i nae po mi Yudeya hai u numa dalabu i bahabaha kadidili po i igamogahigahi po Yaubada anani taniwaga ubeina lawa nugonugohi i talatalahi .
44019009	Tamogi gehouhi hi nugokapala po ega hita witumagana ma Guyau a Tahaya hi iapapoeya . Ega yaka Paulo tu wimulitago i tamihi po mitehi ma lawahi hi nehalehi . Ma iyeta emosi po emosi tu wiatatiyana gowana Tilana anani wiatatiyana numana ugolina i ibaabani .
44019010	Geka dewana i nenae naka bolima luwaga . Ugolinei ma lawa atapuhi u Asiya tu mae Guyau a baha hi nonoli , mi Yudeya po gasi ega mi Yudeya .
44019011	Yaubada Paulo i dewaya po nimanei manini galenahi tapuhi po tapuhi i dewadewahi .
44019012	Ugolinei lawa hai tepa hamahamaga po hai luilui Paulo i wodadanihi ma hi winihi po hi niniyehi tu tootogo ugolihi , naka hai totogo hi kokoe po alugo apapoehi hi nehalehi .
44019013	Lawa gehouhi tauhi mi Yudeya houga magomagouna hi kadakadau ma alugo apapoena hi iyagahi ma hi nei po ipa Guyau Yesu gowanei alugo apapoena hina wiyagaya . Yaka alugona ugolina hi pa , ‘ Paulo Yesu e guuguyeya gowanei a paliwelem una hopu po una nae ’ .
44019014	Geka dewana mi Yudeya hai tu witalaguyaba badana natunatuna ololotohi magouhi 7 hi dewedeweya .
44019015	Ma tamogi houga gehouna alugo apapoena ugolina hi bahabaha nae po i pa , ‘ Yesu a hanapugeya po Paulo a hanapugeya ma taumi iyawoi ? ’
44019016	Lawana ugolina geka alugo apapoena i mamae naka i wotowolo po i wilawihi po kelo i welehi ma hai kaleko i loolohi po ani kowakowahi yawa hi lupa hopu po hi lowo po hi nae .
44019017	Mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya atapuhi u Epeso tu mae awai i waawala tuwegana hi noonoli po hi matouta . Ma Guyau Yesu gowana hi wiyateyate dumaya .
44019018	Tu witumagana boluhi hi nei po bolu u matahi hai apapoe hi hoena geletehi .
44019019	Tu balabalau boluhi hai buka hi hihiwa mai po bolu u matahi ma hi'mapugehi . Ma bukahi mihahi hi lauemotehi a lata mei K50,000 .
44019020	Wipoya geka pite ugolinei ma Guyau a baha i gunanohaya po i nenae ma i kadikadidili .
44019021	Geka dewahi u mulihi Paulo a wiwogatala ipa Masedoniya po Giliki tupohi ina yayahihi po ina nae Yelusalem . Ma i pa , ‘ A nae Yelusalem u mulina u luhogala ipa Loma a galeya ’ .
44019022	Ega yaka a tu hagu luwaga , Timoti ma Elasita , i himilihi po hi nae u Masedoniya ma tauna Asiya u tupona i womaamae .
44019023	Noka u hougana lawa hi wogalahi babana ega nugonugohi ipa Guyau a tahaya Paulo ina deedeya .
44019024	Ma lawa gehouna gowana Demitiliya a bagibagi numinumi namanamalihi i yamdewa . Geka ginoulihi i dewadewahi talaoloto wawinena gowana Atemisi ubeina naka mone baneina i tutuhagaya a tu bagibagi ubeihi .
44019025	Tauna a tu bagibagi atapuhi po lawa gehouhi hai bagibagi mei tauhi i otugehi ma i pa , ‘ Babada , o hanapugena dumaya naka geka bagibagina ugolina ta igapola .
44019026	Amaka o galeya po o hanapugeya naka geka lawana Paulo awai e dewadewahi . Tauna i pa talaoloto lawa nimahigei he dewadewahi naka ega hai wipoya . Ma lawa boluhi i winugowinihi po he iponawogogeya . Ega Epeso lawahi tuawahi ma Asiya tupona atapuna .
44019027	Ugolinei ipa ta lowo duma babana apo geka ata bagibagina gowana ina apapoe . Ma gasi ega ata bagibagi gowana tuawana , ma ipa ta lowo duma babana apo ata talaoloto wawinena gegena gowana Atemisi a numa dalabu lawa ega hina iyateyateya . Geka ata talaoloto wawinena Asiya tupona atapuna po hipuli atapuna he wotalagiyeya apo a lugae ina kokoe . ’
44019028	Bolu geka bahahi hi noonolihi po uyohi i gigai ma hi wootuotu hi pa , ‘ Atemisi Epesogei i gewahaga ’ .
44019029	Geka wootuotuna i lata po i nae po meyagai atapuna i wihogoya . Ma tu wootuotuhi hi bulibulili ani'mboina numana ugolina naka Gayasi ma Alisitaka hi titeinihi ma hi lui ani'mboina u gali hinena . Geka lawahi luwaga naka mi Masedoniya Paulo mitehi hi kadakadau .
44019030	Paulo i luhogaleya ipa ina lui omboina u hinena , ma tu wimulitago hi guduguduya
44019031	ma gasi meyageina tanitaniwagana gehouhi naka Paulo a lawa yaka a baha hi himili po hi lupaliyeya hi pa ega ina nenae ani'mboina u gali hinena .
44019032	Tu wootuotuhi gehouhi ginouli tapuna hi woototugeya ma gehouhi ginouli tapuna hi woototugeya . Matababana lawa boluhi hi luilui naka hi winugoneina po ega hita hanapugeya awai binei hi lui .
44019033	Lawa gehouhi hi pa Alesana tauna wogalahina ita wiwawali babana mi Yudeya hi baha po i gae bolu u matahi . Ma Alesana nimana i wohepahi po i'mtalagaagala ipa hina todi ma ina paliwelehi naka mi Yudeya ega hina igouhi .
44019034	Tamogi Alesana hi gagalena tuhagaya tauna lawa Yudeyagei ugolinei kabudala gaogaona luwaga u hinena hi ototu gogona hi pa , ‘ Atemisi Epesogei i gewahaga ’ .
44019035	Apoma meyageina tanitaniwagana hai tu'mgiluma lawahi i litodihi ma i pa , ‘ U lawa mi Epeso , lawa ataputa ta hanapugeya Epeso meyageina naka Atemisi gegewahagana a numa dalabu tu galena itetena ma gasi gaima yadei i pipeu hopu mai naka tauna tu galena itetena .
44019036	Apega iyai geka ginoulihi ina bowiyehi . Ugolinei ma ipa ona todi ma ega ona dewadewa buubuuwa .
44019037	Geka lawahi o neneihi mai naka ega awai hita daneneya ata numa dalabu ugolina po ega ata talaoloto wawinena hita paliguyoguyougeya .
44019038	Ugolinei ma inapa Dimitiliya a tu bagibagi lawa gehouna hina igouya yaka ani luhetala he mamae po tanitaniwaga he mamae . Emoemotana noka hosi hina igou mehi .
44019039	Ma tamogi inapa nugonugomi ginouli gehouhi ona wibaabaniyehi yaka apo meyagai lawahi hai omboina ugolina lugagayogei hina lidumalu .
44019040	Ma ipa ta nugomatouta babana amalai awai i waawala naka apo wogalahi gouna ta waya . Matababana ega emoemotana baha awai dewadewana ta baheya amalai dewana i waawala ubeina . ’
44019041	Geka a bahana u mulina lawahi boluhi i baha po hi'mnoha .
44020001	Wogalahina i yababa po u mulina Paulo tu wimulitago i boinihi po baha winugokadidili i welehi ma i mamalihi . Ma apoma i gelu po i damana u Masedoniya .
44020002	Masedoniya meyageina magomagouna i yayahi po i nenae ma lawa baha winugokadidili i welewelehi ma i nae po Giliki anani taniwaga ugolina i geleta .
44020003	Noka hosi wamahiya tonuga i mamae . I wononogo ipa Siliya ubeina in'omkuka ma i tuhagaya mi Yudeya hi wogatala ipa hina uni . Ega yaka i gunawileya po Masedoniyagei i nae .
44020004	Pilasi natuna Sopata Beleyagei po mi Tesalonika luwaga , Alisitaka ma Sekanasi , ma Gayasi Debigei po Timoti ma Tikikasi po Tolopima Asiya tuponanei , geka tauhi atapuhi Paulo mitehi hi nae .
44020005	Tauhi hi tahaya nae po u Tolowasi hi otonana .
44020006	Palawa ega haahanana tolehana u mulina u Pilipai Paulo ma tau to'mkuka . Iyeta nimitutu hi kokoe ma apoma u Tolowasi to tuhagahi po noka hosi to mae dalabu gaogaona emosi .
44020007	Dalabu ugolina to'mboina gogona po to'mam ma Guyau nugohepana omgogonana to waya ma Paulo i wibaabani lawa ugolihi . I ibaabani naka i nae po upom tipolina i waya babana ipa apo malinatom po ina nae .
44020008	Babanoyana u moyana to yamboina naka lampa i maga .
44020009	Hewali gehouna gowana Yutikasi naka hau malamala i duhuduhuna . Paulo a baha i daodao ma Yutikasi i yadayada po amaka i eno hilage . Ma i eneno po i pipeu naka numana hayana witonugana ugolina ma i hopu po hau hipuli i laihilageneya , po hilahilagena hi wohepaya .
44020010	Tamogi Paulo i hopu po i pegoya ma i pa , ‘ Ega ona genogeno babana yohola e lauyagohana ’ .
44020011	Ma apoma Paulo i gememe po palawa i tomutomuya po hi am . Amna u mulina lawahi mitehi hi ibaabani ma i nae po i lauyayahi ma i nehalehi .
44020012	Hewalina a luyagohanana ma hi weluwaya po hi nae hai u meyagai a nugodumolahi .
44020013	To tahaya nae hau wam po to'mkuka po to kwakwawila nae u Asosi ipa apo noka hosi Paulo to touli . Paulona tauna i baha po geka pite to dewaya babana tauna ipa apo tepanei ina tagonai .
44020014	Ma hougana u Asosi i tutuhagiyai po i gelu po to nae u Mitilini .
44020015	Noka hosi ma to gelugelu naka to welumalatom po Kayosi bonabonana liyaliyanei to nae . Ma malitom po Samosi u bonabonana to gota ma malitom meme po to damana u Mailitasi .
44020016	Paulo a nugotuhu i dewaya po ipa Epeso ina weluwileya po ina nae . Ega nugonugona ipa u Asiya a kabudala ina haleya , matababana i bulibulili ipa u Yelusalem ina lugeleta , Penitikosi tolehana ugolina .
44020017	Ega yaka u Mailitasi ma baha i himili po i nae u Epeso ipa tapalolo tanitaniwagahi hina ototoni .
44020018	Ma hougana hi laugeleta naka Paulo i baha ugolihi i pa , ‘ Taumi o hanapugena dumaya iyowai u mae galenana u hayami iyeta magomagouna . Hougana a laugeleta wawalai Asiya u tupona po i nei po amalai naka o hanapugena dumaya .
44020019	Nugohopuhopugei po tougei u bagibagi a dewaya mei Guyau a tu bagibagi . Mi Yudeya lawahi hi wogatala ipa iyowai ma hina ihiniwiyuwau naka hiniwiyuwahi hinehiyei a wobagibagi .
44020020	O hanapugena dumaya naka ginouli awai apo ina haguhagumi ega ata nugoneya . Hougana bolu u matahi po numa emosi po emosi ugolina a lauguguya po a iatatiyana naka ginouli atapuna a paliwelemi .
44020021	Mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi a baha kadidili , a pa , “ Omi apapoe ona palihalehi ma ona luhagawilemi po Guyau Yesu ona witumaganeya ” .
44020022	‘ Ma amalai Alugo Woiyawa a wiponawogogeya po a nenae u Yelusalem . Ma awai apo ugoliu ina waawala noka hosi naka ega ata hanapugeya .
44020023	Tamogi meyagai emosi po emosi a luiluinihi ugolihi Alugo Woiyawa i paliweleu i pa , “ Numa panipani po hiniwiyuwa he ototonim ” .
44020024	Hilage po noka ginoulihi atapuhi ega ata genogehi babana tau u luyagohana iyetana hipuli geka ugolina naka ega genona . Ma tamogi awai a genogenogeya naka ipa u bagibagi a luegahi Guyau Yesu i weleweleu naka lawa tuwega dewadewana a paliwelehi Yaubada a lunugotootogo binei .
44020025	‘ Atapumi u hayami Yaubada anani taniwaga binei a lauguguya ma a nae ma a nei . Ma amalai a hanapugeya apega tepau ona galena meya .
44020026	Ugolinei ma amalai u baha kadidilina ugolimi , inapa u hayami iyai ina lugowadeya naka ega tau u gou .
44020027	Matababana Yaubada a nugotuhu atapuna i weleweleu ega gehouna ata nugoneya ma amaka atapuna a paliwelemi .
44020028	Ona gagalena itetena memi po gasi tu witumagana atapuhi ona gagalena itetehi . Matababana Alugo Woiyawa i witowolimi po taumi tanitaniwaga . Yaubada Natuna a hilage talanei bolu i winihi po tauna galinei . Naka tauhi ona gagalena itetehi mei sipi tu galena itete .
44020029	Matababana a hanapugeya naka gamogamo woyahiyahihi mei kedewa , sipi hai gawiya apo muliugei hina nei u hayami . Ma apeega iyai hina luemuli .
44020030	Ma houga e nenei u hayami apo lawa hina towolo po hina ikoyakoyama po hai luhogala ipa tu wimulitago hina wotagohi .
44020031	Ugolinei ma ipa matami hina kaya . A touwe ma bolima tonuga u hinena iyetei po uguwei a iatatiyemi naka ona nugonugotuhuya .
44020032	‘ Ma amalai Yaubada u nimana po a lunugotootogo bahana ugolina a hounimi , tauna apo ina winugokadidilimi . Natunatuna waiwoiyawata ubeita ma kawaidewadewa i houni po e mamae apo ina welemi .
44020033	Hougana u hayami ega iyai a mone po a kaleko dewadewahi ata galena luhogalehi .
44020034	Taumi o hanapugeya naka geka nimouhigei a bagibagi po tau po u lawa uyogoiyai ani haguhi a winihi .
44020035	Ginouli atapuhi ugolihi amaka a wiatatiyemi naka ipa ta bagibagi po tu tapitapiya ta haguhi . Ma ta nugonugotuhuya naka Guyau Yesu geka pite i baha i pa , “ Awai ta tutuhagaya kaohana i habulu ma ombenena kaohana i lata duma ” . ’
44020036	Paulo geka a bahana u mulina babadahi mitehi itutuhi hi'mtutonetonena ma hi tapalolo .
44020037	Atapuhi Paulona hi talaluluni po hi tutougeya po i kokoe ma hi mamali .
44020038	A baha ipa apega hina gagalena meya ugolina ma nugonugohi i wiyuwa duma . Ega yaka hi witulani po hi nae hau wam .
44021001	Ma hougana to mamalihi ma to nenehalehi naka to'mkuka po dumalu to damana Kosi bonabonana ugolina . Ma malitom po to nae Losi bonabonana ugolina po noka hosi ma to nae Patala meyageina ugolina .
44021002	U Patala ma wam i nenae u Pinisiya to tuhagaya yaka to gelu damana ugolina po to nae .
44021003	To nei po Saipilasi bonabonana to galena niyeya ma wam hi buiya po to nae hau tupo yawana ma to gota Taya Siliya u tupona . Wamna ginouli i tutoulihi ipa noka hosi ina hiwogihi .
44021004	Ma noka hosi tu wimulitago gehouhi to tuhagahi po mitehi to mae dalabu gaogaona emosi . Alugo Woiyawa a litahatahayagei tu witumaganahi Paulo hi paliweleya hi pa ega ina nenae u Yelusalem .
44021005	Noka hosi to mamae po i kokoe ma to nehalehi po to nae . To wotowolo hougana ugolina naka agagohi po natunatuhi mitehi hi weluwiniyai po to hopu meyageina u gadowana po noka hosi atapuiyai itutuiyei to'mtutonetonena hau bubu ma to tapalolo po i kokoe
44021006	ma to wimaamala po hau wam to gelugelu ma hi gunawilehi hai yu meyagai .
44021007	U Taya ma to gelugelu naka u Tolemesi to gota po noka hosi tu wimulitago to mamalihi ma mitehi to mae iyeta emosi .
44021008	Ma malitom po to nehalehi po to nae u Sisaliya , po Pilipo a numa to luiya po mitehi to mae . Tauna a bagibagi tuwega dewadewana i guuguyeya . Lawa magouhi 7 u Yelusalem hi towolihi naka tauna gehouna .
44021009	Tauna natunatuna guguhinihi wohepali bahapiko bahana hi ibaabaniyeya .
44021010	Noka hosi to mae iyeta wabihaga hota ma tu bahapiko gowana Agabasi Yudeyagei i hopu mai
44021011	ugoliyai po Paulo a dagilolo i waya po aena po nimana i panipani meya ma i pa , ‘ Alugo Woiyawa i bahebaheya geka pite i pa : Mi Yudeya lawahi u Yelusalem apo geka dagilolona taniwagana hina numa panipani mei a panipani meu pite ; apoma tauhi ega mi Yudeya u nimahi hina houni . ’
44021012	Geka bahahi to noonolihi po tiyai po noka dobuhi lawahi Paulo to talagagali to pa ega ina nenae u Yelusalem .
44021013	Tamogi i baha i buiya i pa , ‘ Awai o dewadewaya ? Po geka pite o tutou ma nugonugou e iyuwa . Tau a nonogo duma ipa u Yelusalem hina paniu ma gasi ipa Guyau Yesu binei a hilage . ’
44021014	Ega emoemotiyai ipa nugonugona to buiya yaka to pa , ‘ Heki , Guyau tuawana a nugotuhugei ina nae ’ .
44021015	Noka hosi to womaamae kikeina ma i ginouli to wononogo ma to nehalehi po Yelusalem binei to nae .
44021016	Tu wimulitago mi Sisaliya gehouhi mitehi to nae . Tauhi hi weluwiniyai po to nae Nasona Saipilasigei a numa ugolina ipa apo noka hosi to mae . Nasona tauna tu wimulitago tahatahayana u Saipilasi .
44021017	Hougana u Yelusalem to laugeleta naka tu wimulitago a kaohahi ma hi witutuhageiyai .
44021018	Malitom po Paulo mitehi to nae Yamesa to galeya . Ma tanitaniwaga atapahi noka hosi hi'mboina po hi mamae .
44021019	Paulo i mamalihi po i kokoe . Ma a bagibagi ugolinei Yaubada ginouli emosi po emosi tauhi ega mi Yudeya u hayahi i dewadewahi naka atapuhi i dede pahi .
44021020	Tanitaniwagahi a baha hi noonoli po Yaubada hi wotalagiyeya . Ma apoma hi baha nae Paulo ugolina hi pa , ‘ Walehiyai , u galeya Yudeya lawahi tausana wabihaga naka Guyau he itumaganeya . Ma tauhi gasi Mose ugolinei lugagayo i nenei naka yohola he wootagoya .
44021021	Lawa gehouhi hi nei po hi igoum hi pa , tam mi Yudeya tauhi ega mi Yudeya hai meyagai ugolihi hi mamae , Mose a lugagayo uta iatatiyena powahi po ipa uta pa , “ Mose a lugagayo ta palihaleya ” , po uta paliwelehi uta pa , “ Ega natunatuta hai wekiwekilala ta huhounihi . Ma gasi ega mi Yudeya ita mae odubohi ta meme tagohi . ”
44021022	U laugeletai tuwegana apo hina nonoli . Ma apo awai ta dewaya ?
44021023	Ugolinei ma awai to bahebaheya naka una dewa tagoya . Lawa wohepali ugoliyai amaka Yaubada ugolina hi wigwala .
44021024	Geka lawahi una weluwinihi po ona nae po hina laiyeuyeu mehi naka tam mitehi . Ma una wimeiha po apo apalami hina galihalehi . Geka dewana ugolina ma apo lawa ubeim hi ibaabani hina kawaikoyakoyamehi . Ma apo hina pa tam gasi Mose a lugagayo e meme tagohi .
44021025	Tamogi tauhi ega mi Yudeya Guyau hi itumaganeya amaka hai baha to himili . Ma to paligaagalihi i wikaha ugolina naka aniani awai talaoloto hi yambenenehi ega hina anani . Muhala waitalana po gadouna he kikiki ega hina anani . Ma gasi to paligaagalihi ipa ega hina matamatamaga . ’
44021026	Malitom ma Paulo lawahi wohepali i weluwinihi po mitehi hi liyeuyeu mehi . Ma numa dalabu baneina i luiya po lawa i paliwelehi apo iyeta awai liyeuyeumehi ina kokoe ma hai ani witalaguyaba hin'ombenenehi .
44021027	Hi laiyeuyeu mehi naka iyeta magouhi 7 , hougana geka iyetahi magouhi 7 mei hina kokoe ma mi Yudeya Asiya tuponanei hi nenei naka Paulo hi galeya hau numa dalabuna . Geka tauhi lawahi bolu hi lihunahi po Paulo hi womomohi ,
44021028	ma hi ototu hi pa , ‘ I lawa mi Yudeya , ona haguiyai . Geka tauna lawana tupo atapuna e wiiwileya ma lawa e iatatiyehi i pa Yudeya lawahi Mose a lugagayo po geka numa dalabuna ega hina iponawogogeya . Ma amalai gasi tauhi ega mi Yudeya i weluwinihi po hi lui mai numa dalabu baneina ugolina , po geka dobu gegena hi wigobugobugeya . ’
44021029	( Geka bahahi hi bahebahehi naka matababana Paulo ma Tolopima Epesogei hi gagalehi ma hi gae ma hi hopu meyageina ugolina . Ma hai nugotuhu hi pa Paulo Tolopimana ita weluwaya po hita lui numa dalabuna baneina u hinena . )
44021030	Wogalahi i geleta u meyageina po lawa hi wibulibulili nae po hau numa dalabuna Paulo hi teina hopuneya ma mateta hi guduhi .
44021031	Lawahi boluhi hi ileta ipa Paulo hina uni ma baha hi himili mi Loma hai tu wigawiya hai taniwaga ugolina hi pa mi Yelusalem atapuhi he itona .
44021032	Taniwagana mala emosi ma a tu wigawiya po tu galena itete i tamihi po hi hopu lawahi boluhi ugolihi . Hougana lawahi tu wigawiyahi po hai taniwaga hi gagaleya ma Paulo hi wilawi woloeya .
44021033	Apoma taniwagana i nae po Paulo ugolina ma i baha po hi womomohi ma gulawa pawapawasi luwaga ugolinei nimana hi panihi . Ma bolu i lubayadehi i pa , ‘ Geka lawana iyai ? Ma powa awai i dewaya ? ’
44021034	Boluna u hinena hai wibaabani gololohi tapuna po tapuna ega ginouli emosi ugolinei hita wigouya . Nugolagalaga i lata duma u hayahi po taniwagana awai moinana i waawala naka ega ita hanapugeya . Ega yaka i baha po a hewahewali ipa Paulona hina giyeya tu wigawiya hai ani mae ugolina .
44021035	Paulo hi gigiyeya naka hau tete ma hi awali babana bolu mulinei hi nenei uyohi i gigai duma ipa hina uni .
44021036	Ma gasi hi awawali babana lawahi hi ototu hi pa , ‘ Ta uni ! ’
44021037	Tu wigawiyahi mei hai ani mae hina luiluiya ma Paulo i baha nae taniwagana ugolina i pa , ‘ Emoemotana apo ginouli gehouna ugolim ata baheya ’ . Ma Paulo pona Gilikigei i baha yaka taniwagana i lubayada i pa , ‘ Pona Giliki u hanapugeya ?
44021038	Nugote tam lawa Isipitagei yaka lolowa witona u laiwawali ? Ma tu'munugo tausana wohepali ami witona ugolina u tahaehi po mitehi o nae hau balabala yabayababa ? ’
44021039	Paulo taniwagana a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Tau lawa Yudeyagei . Silisiya u tupona dobu gowana Tasasi ugolina hi guniu . Noka meyageina u Silisiya i geduma ma tau meyageina lawana . A mamala dumam ma una palihaleu po lawa ugolihi a wibaabani . ’
44021040	Taniwagana Paulo i palihaleya yaka hau tete i towolo ma nimanei lawa i litodihi . Hougana lawahi hi wogenuwana naka Paulo Yudeya ponahigei i baha nae ugolihi i pa :
44022001	‘ Walewalehiu po amamau , ona lautanigana ma u matami tau biugei u baha a baheya . ’
44022002	Lawahi hi lautanigana ma Paulo mi Yudeya ponahigei i ibaabani yaka hi genuwana imahi . Ma i wibaabani i pa ,
44022003	‘ Tau lawa Yudeyagei . Ma Silisiya u tupona meyagai gowana Tasasi ugolina hi guniu , ma tamogi u Yelusalem a lata , po hougana a ihewali Gameliyela ugolina a wisikulu po googata hai lugagayo ugolinei hi wiatatiyeu . Ma a wileta duma po Yaubada ugolina a palipalihalena meu mei gasi atapumi amalai .
44022004	Guyau Yesu tu wotagona a ihiniwiyuwahi po hi hilahilage . Ma ololoto po wiwine a womomohihi po hau numa panipani a hauluiyehi .
44022005	Tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga po tu wikaha babadahi emoemotana awai a bahebaheya hina wikawamoineya . Tauhi mi Yudeya lawahi u Damaseko hi mamae hai pepa hi gilumihi po ipa a niyehi . Ega yaka a nenae noka hosi po Guyau Yesu tu wotagona ipa gulawa pawapawasigei a panipanihi po a neihi mai u Yelusalem po hina wimihehi .
44022006	‘ Ma a nenae po iyeta bolinai hougana Damaseko a tutuliyaliyani ma mala emosi ma yayata baneina yadei i hopu mai po i yayata wiiwileu .
44022007	Ma a peu hopu hau hipuli ma lawa ponana a noonoli ma i pa , “ Saulo ! Saulo ! Awai binei e ihiniwiyuwau ? ”
44022008	‘ Apoma tau a lubayada a pa , “ Guyau , tam iyai ? ” ‘ Ma lawana i pa , “ Tau Yesu Nasaletagei ma houga daodaona e ihiniwiyuwau ” .
44022009	Lawa mitehi to nenae naka yayatana hi galeya ma tamogi Yesu i bahabaha mai ugoliu anona ega hita hanapugeya .
44022010	‘ Ega yaka a lubayada a pa , “ Guyau , apo awai a dewaya ? ” ‘ Ma Guyau ugoliu i baha mai i pa , “ Una wotowolo po Damaseko una luiya po noka hosi tahaya bimgei Yaubada i woononogogeya apo hina paliwelem ” .
44022011	Noka hougana yayatana a kadidili ugolina ma matau i apapoe . Ega yaka tu witulaniu hi lunimaniu po Damaseko to luiya .
44022012	‘ Noka hosi Yaubada tu wotalagiyena po Mose a lugagayo tu wotagona gowana Ananaya i mamae , ma Yudeya lawahi u Damaseko tu mae hi iyateyateya .
44022013	Tauna i nei po u liyaliyau i towolo ma i pa , “ Walehiu Saulo , una galena meme ” . Noka kabudalana ugolina a galena meme po Ananaya a galeya .
44022014	‘ Ma ugoliu i baha mai i pa , “ Googata hai Yaubada i winaganim po ipa a nugotuhu una hanapugeya ugolinei a Tu bagibagi dumadumaluna Yesu amaka u galeya , po ponana amaka u nonoli ,
44022015	matababana tam apo a tu baha moina lawa atapuhi ugolihi awai u gagaleya po awai u noonoli binei .
44022016	Ma geka kabudalana awai e ototoni ? Una towolo po bapatiso una waya ma Guyau gowanei una lupali po am apapoe ina oga halehi .
44022017	‘ Ega yaka a gunawilena meu Yelusalem po numa dalabu baneina u hinena a tapatapalolo po enogagalena a gagaleya .
44022018	Enogalena u hinena Guyau a gagaleya ma i pa , “ Una bulili yagiyagina po geka dobuna una nehaleya babana tau biugei ma am wibaabani apo hina wihinigigiyeya ” .
44022019	‘ Apoma a pa , “ Guyau hi hanapugena dumaya naka tau a nae po numa dalabu atapuhi ugolihi tu witumaganem a panipanihi po a ilawihi .
44022020	Po gasi am tu baha Sitibeni hougana hi ununi naka tau u liyaliyahi a mamae . Omunugona a kawaidewedeweya po tu'munugohi hai kaleko a tamihi . ”
44022021	‘ Ma Guyau i baha mai ugoliu i pa , “ Yelusalem una nehaleya po una nae tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi , po tam hai tu wituwetuwega ” . ’
44022022	Lawa hi genuwana ma hi lautanigana naka i nei po tauhi ega mi Yudeya bahana ugolina ma hi wootuotugena meya hi pa , ‘ Ta uni haleya . Lawa geka pite ega ita dumalu ipa ina lauyagohana . ’
44022023	Ma uyohi i gigai po hi iototu ma hai luilui hi loolohi ma aehigei hipuli hi tutugoiya .
44022024	Yohola hi lauuyogigai ma tu wigawiyahi hai taniwaga a hewahewali i baha po Paulo hi awala niyeya hai ani mae ugolina . Ma i baha po hi kodikodili ipa ina bahena meya awai binei ma mi Yudeya hi luuyogigai ugolina .
44022025	Ega yaka aena ma nimana hi panipanihi po i kokoe . Ma ipa hina wilawi . Ma Paulo gawiya kapenana ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Tau lawa Lomagei babana u Tasasi hi guniu Loma a u ani taniwaga ma ata lugagayo i baheya ipa luhetala ina tahaya ma taumi ipa ona wilawiu ? ’
44022026	Hougana gawiya kapenana geka bahana i noonoli po i nae hai taniwaga ugolina i lubayada i pa , ‘ Awai ipa una dewaya noka lawana ugolina ? Tauna lawa Lomagei . ’
44022027	Ega yaka hai taniwagana i nae po Paulo i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Moina tam Loma lawana ? ’ Ma Paulo i pa , ‘ Ee , tau lawa Lomagei . ’
44022028	Apoma taniwagana i pa , ‘ Tau ega mi Loma natuhi ma mone baneina Loma tanitaniwagahi a welehi ma a lui u hinehi ’ . Ma Paulo i pa , ‘ Tau mi Loma natuhi babana u Tasasi hi guniu ’ .
44022029	Ega yaka tu wilawina mala emosi ma Paulona hi nehaleya . Ma tu wigawiyahi hai taniwaga i gagalena tuhaga po i matouta duma , matababana lugagayo i tulagoni po Paulo Loma lawana ma i baha po aena po nimana hi panipanihi .
44022030	Tu wigawiyahi hai taniwaga a nugotuhu baneina ipa ina hanapugeya awai binei mi Yudeya Paulo hi igouya . Yaka malitom ma i baha po tu witalaguyaba babadahi po tu wiwogatala atapuhi hi'mboina gogona . Apoma Paulo hau numa panipani i wihaleya po niyeya po u naohi i witowoli .
44023001	Paulo i todi ma tu wiwogatalahi i gagalehi po i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , odubona ma i nei po geka iyetana ugolina naka u luyagohana Yaubada u matana ega wigougou u nugonugou ita mamae ’ .
44023002	Tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga gowana Ananaya i baha po lawa Paulo u liyaliyana hi towotowolo Paulona u gamona hi lougo .
44023003	Apoma Paulo i baha Ananaya ugolina i pa , ‘ Tam nonola luwaga , Yaubada apo ina launim . Naka hosi u duhuna ma lugagayogei ipa una luhetaleu ma tamogi lawa u baha po hi laulauniu naka lugagayo u tulagoni . ’
44023004	Ma lawa Paulo u liyaliyana hi towotowolo naka hi baha nae Paulona ugolina hi pa , ‘ Tam Yaubada a tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga e palipaliguyoguyougeya ! ’
44023005	Ega yaka Paulo i baha i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , ega ata hanapugeya naka tauna tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga . Itapa ata hanapugeya apega geka pite ata baha , babana Buka odubona ugolina geka pite hi gilumi hi pa , “ Am lawa hai taniwaga ega una palipalihopuhopuneya ” . ’
44023006	Paulo i hanapugeya naka tu wiwogatalahi gehouhi Sadusi ma gehouhi Palisi . Hougana geka boluhi luwaga i gagalena tuhagahi po tu wiwogatala u matahi i wootu i pa , ‘ Walewalehiu , tau Palisi natuhi , yaka tau Palisi . Geka a lauhetala babana u witumagana i kadidili po a iotonana apo lawa hilahilagehi hina towolo meme . ’
44023007	Paulo geka bahana i bahebaheya po Sadusi ma Palisi hi tugudu po hi igamogahigahi po hi wikahakaha .
44023008	( Hai wikahakaha matababana Sadusi hai bolu hi pa lawa apega hilage ugolinei hina towolo meme . Ma gasi hi pa Yaubada ega a tu winoyanoya po gasi ega alugo . Ma Palisi hai bolu geka ginoulihi tonuga naka ugolihi hi itumagana . )
44023009	Hi ikahakaha ugolina ma hi lahalaha mehi . Ma lugagayo tanitaniwagahi gehouhi Palisi boluna ugolina hi towolo po hi baha kadidili hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana ega a apapoe awai tota tuhagaya . Nugote alugo bo Yaubada a tu winoyanoya moina Paulo ugolina i baha nae . ’
44023010	Hai wigamogahigahi i lata po i nenae ma tu wigawiya hai taniwaga i matouta duma naka Paulo apo hina lihilageni . Yaka a tu wigawiya i baha po hi hopu ipa Paulo hina wihaleya tu wiwogatala ugolihi po hai ani mae ugolina hina houni .
44023011	Upomgei Guyau Paulo u liyaliyana i towolo ma i pa , ‘ Una nugokadidili . Geka u Yelusalem amaka biugei u baha ma apo yohola u Loma gasi una wibaabaniyeya . ’
44023012	Malitom ma mi Yudeya gehouhi hi wiwogatala po hi wigwala hi pa , apega hina am bo hina uma a sigana Paulo hina uni .
44023013	Lawa magouhi 40 i lagoni naka tauhi geka wogana hi talaya .
44023014	Apoma hi nae po tu witalaguyaba babadahi po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga ugolihi hi pa , ‘ Amaka to wigwala kadidili apega awai to ani dadani a sigana Paulo to uni .
44023015	Ugolinei ma taumi tu wiwogatala mitehi baha ona himili po ina nae mi Loma hai tu wigawiya hai taniwaga ugolina po Paulo ina hopu neiyai ugolimi , ma ona witepa ona pa , “ Paulo ipa to niyeya po to lubayabayadena imahiyeya ” . Tamogi apo amaka tahaya u liyaliyana to wononogo po to lihilageni . ’
44023016	Tamogi wiwogatalana Paulo auna i nonoli yaka i nae po tu wigawiyahi hai ani mae i luiya po Paulona i paliweleya .
44023017	Ma Paulona gawiya kapenana i paliweleya i pa , ‘ Geka hewalina una niyeya ami taniwaga ugolina po baha gehouna ina paliweleya ’ .
44023018	Ega yaka kapenana hewalina i niyeya po hai taniwaga ugolina i pa , ‘ Paulo tauna hau numa panipani i otugeu po a nae po i paliweleu po geka hewalina a neiyai ugolim . A neneiyai matababana ipa baha gehouna ina paliwelem . ’
44023019	Ega yaka gawiya taniwagana hewalina i lunimani po hi nae po tuawahi ma i lubayadeya i pa , ‘ Ginouli awai ipa una paliweleu ? ’
44023020	Ega yaka hewalina i pa , ‘ Mi Yudeya gehouhi hi lueena ipa haumalatom hina lubayadem ma Paulo hina hopuneya tu wiwogatala ugolihi , ma apo Paulo lubayabayadana hina witepeya ma hina weluwaya .
44023021	Tamogi ega hai baha una noonoli babana lawa magouhi 40 i lagoni apo u tahaya hina megowada po Paulo hina ototoni . Ma atapuhi hi igwala hi pa apega hina am bo hina uma a sigana Paulo hina uni . Atapuhi hi nonogo po ipa hina dewaya ma tam am nugotuhu he iotonaneya . ’
44023022	Apoma gawiya taniwagana i pa , ‘ U nei po u ibenabenama ega iyai una palipaliweleya ’ . Ma hewalina i himili po i nae .
44023023	Tu wigawiya hai taniwaga gawiya kapenahi luwaga i otugehi po i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Tu wigawiya magouhi handele luwaga ma hosi tu geluhi magouhi 70 , ma kwasikwasi daodaohigei tu witona magouhi handele luwaga ona wononogogehi po apo mitehi ona nae u Sisaliya . Ona wononogo po uguwei mei eno kabudalana ugolina apo ona wotowolo po ona nae .
44023024	Ma hosi gehouhi ona wonogogehi po apo Paulo ina gelu . Ma ona galena iteteya po ona niyeya Taniwaga Pelikisi ugolina . ’
44023025	Ega yaka taniwagana Pelikisi a pepa geka pite i gilumi i pa :
44023026	Tau Kilodiyasi Lisiyasi . Tam Taniwaga baneim Pelikisi ugolim . Tinani baneina .
44023027	Mi Yudeya geka lawana hi womomohi po amaka mei hina ununi . Ma a tuhagaya naka tauna Loma lawana yaka u tu wigawiya mitehi to nae po to haguya .
44023028	Awai binei ma hi igouya naka ipa a hanapugeya yaka a hopuneya lawa hai tu wiwogatala ugolihi .
44023029	Ma a tuhagaya naka ega a powa awai po ipa ina hilage bo hau numa panipani to houni . Lawahi hi igouya naka tauhi tuawahi hai lugagayogei .
44023030	Ega yaka mi Yudeya gehouhi hi iwogatala po ipa hina uni . Ma hougana hi palipaliweleu naka u nugotuhu a dewaya po a himihimiliyahi ugolim . Ma tu wigouna a paliwelehi po tam u matam hai wigou hina wogeletehi .
44023031	Tu wigawiyahi baha hi wotagoya po Paulo hi weluwaya po noka uguwana hi nenae naka Anitipatila .
44023032	Ma malitom po tu wigawiyahi aehigei hi nenae naka hi gunawilehi hai ani mae ugolina . Ma hosi tu gelugelu hi tuhalehi po ipa Paulo mitehi hina nae .
44023033	Paulo hi weluwaya po hi hopu u Sisaliya po pepana Taniwaga Pelikisi hi weleya ma Paulona hi wodamaneya ugolina .
44023034	Pelikisi pepana i hiyawi po i kokoe ma Paulo i lubayadeya tauna tupo miyei lawana . Hougana i tuhagaya naka Paulo lawa Silisiyagei
44023035	yaka i pa , ‘ Tu wigoum hina lugeletai ma apoma am baha a nonoli ’ . Ma apoma i baha po Heloda numa baneina i wogowogoya ugolina Paulo a tu galena itete mitehi hi hounihi .
44024001	Iyeta nimitutu hi kokoe ma tu witalaguyaba hai taniwaga gowana Ananaya po tanitaniwaga po tu luhetala gowana Tetalasi mitehi hi hopu u Sisaliya . Tauhi hi hopu mai po Taniwaga Pelikisi ugolina hi wogeletena mehi ipa apo Paulo hina wigouya .
44024002	Tetalasi hi otugeya po geka pite Paulo i igouya i pa , ‘ Pelikisi , tam taniwaga baneina . Am galena itete hanahanapu ugolinei nugodumolagei to mae po i nei houga i dao duma . Ata hipuli a dewadewa binei meimahi magomagouhi tam am hanapugei he dewadewahi .
44024003	Geka maehi tupo atapuna to kaohehi po to mamala dumam .
44024004	Ega ipa am kabudala ugoliyai una hahaleya ma a lupaliyem ipa nugodewagei i baha kukuna una nonoli .
44024005	‘ Geka lawana to tuhagaya naka tauna lawa apapoe dumana . Hipuli tupo wohepali u hinena mi Yudeya u hayahi houga daodaona wogalahi e talatalaiwawali . Ma Yesu lawa Nasaletagei a bolu e itaniwageya ma e tahatahaehi .
44024006	Tauna gasi i ileta ipa numa dalabu baneina u hinena tauhi ega mi Yudeya ina luiyehi ma to tuhagaya [ po i lugagayogei ipa to luhetaleya .
44024007	Ma tu wigawiya hai taniwaga gowana Lisiyasi i nei po u nimiyai ma i haloiyai po i niyeya .
44024008	Ma apoma i paliweliyai ipa Paulo tu wigouna hina nei ugolim . ] Inapa Paulo una lubayabayadeya apo ginouli atapuna una hanapugeya awai binei to igouya . ’
44024009	Mi Yudeya Pelikisi u naona hi towotowolo po hi baha haguhagu hi pa , ‘ Tetalasi ginouli atapuna i bahebaheya naka baha moina ’ .
44024010	Ega yaka taniwagana Pelikisi i baha po Paulo i ibaabani i pa , ‘ A hanapugem tam geka tupohihi ugolihi u lauhetala naka bolima i maga duma , yaka a kaoha duma babana apo u matam biugei a wibaabani .
44024011	Inapa una wilulubayada apo lawa hina paliwelem naka tau gaogao emosi po tupona amaka hi kokoe a lugeleta Yelusalem po ipa Yaubada a wotalagiyeya .
44024012	Ega iyai mitehi tota igamogahigahi ma mi Yudeya lawahi hita tuhagau . Ma numa dalabu baneina po muhomuhohi po Yelusalem u hinena ega lawa ata laiuyogigeinihi ma hita tuhagau .
44024013	Geka amalai hi igouwe naka ega emoemotana hina limoinehi .
44024014	Ma geka a palipaliwelem , Yesu a tahaya tu wotagona tau yaka he ikawakoyakoyameu . Tamogi googiyai hai Yaubada a wootalagiyeya ma Mose a lugagayo a wootagoya ma tu bahapiko hai buka ugolina ginouli atapuhi hi gilugilumihi naka tau a itumaganehi .
44024015	Ma u winugonugotuhu lagona Yaubada ugolina mei geka tauhi lawahi , naka lawa atapuhi dewadewahi po apapoehi apo hilage ugolina hina towolo meme .
44024016	Ugolinei houga daodaona a ileta ipa u winugonugotuhu Yaubada u matana po lawa u matahi ina dumadumalu .
44024017	‘ Yelusalem a nenehaleya naka bolima wabihaga . Ma a gunawileu noka hosi ipa i mone tu dayadayabu a welehi ma a witalaguyaba Yaubada ugolina .
44024018	Geka nugotuhuhi a dewadewahi ma numa dalabu baneina ugolina hi tuhagau . Liyeuyeu dewana a deweya po u mulina ma hi tuhagau . Noka hougana ega bolu tau mitehi po ega dewa yabayababa .
44024019	Tamogi mi Yudeya Asiya tuponanei hi nenei naka noka hosi . Tauhi tamogi hitapa hai nugoapapoe ugoliu yaka hita nei po ugolim hita wigouwe .
44024020	Heki geka lawahi una baha po tu wiwogatala ugolihi a lauhetala ma u powa awai hi tutuhagaya hina paliwelem .
44024021	Tamogi moina geka ginoulina emosi tu wiwogatala u matahi ma a wootugeya po nugokahakaha a wiwawali a pa a itumagana lawa hilage ugolina ma apo hina towotowolo meme binei ma taumi o lauhetaleu . ’
44024022	Iyawoi Yesu a wiatatiyana lawa hi meme tagoya naka Pelikisi i hanapugena dumaya . Ugolinei ma luhetala i guduya ma i paliwelehi i pa , ‘ Tu wigawiya hai taniwaga gowana Lisiyasi ina lugeletai apo ami luhetala a winugonugotuhugeya ’ .
44024023	Ma Pelikisi gawiya kapenana i paliweleya i pa , ‘ Paulo ona galena iteteya , ma tamogi kikeina ona wohaleya po a luhogala awai yaka a lawa hina weleweleya ’ .
44024024	Iyeta wabihaga hi kokoe ma u mulina Pelikisi agona Dusila mitehi hi nei , Dusila Yudeya wawinena . Ma Pelikisi Paulo a baha i himili po hi neiyai po witumagana Yesu Keliso ugolina binei i ibaabani ma hi lautanigana .
44024025	Ma Paulo i baha po i nae po dewadumalu po upuhegoya po Yaubada a Libahibahi iyetana i deedeya naka Pelikisi i matouta . Ega yaka i pa , ‘ Amaka ma una nae . Inapa u gaogao a tuhagaya yaka apo a otugena mem . ’
44024026	Pelikisi a luhogala ipa apo Paulo mone ina weleya ugolinei houga magomagouna Paulo i otugeya po mitehi hi ibaabani .
44024027	Bolima luwaga hi kokoe ma u mulina Posiya Petasi Pelikisi taniwaga ugolina i luhaleya . Pelikisi a luhogala ipa mi Yudeya hina kawaidewedeweya . Geka binei ma Paulo i palihaleya po hau numa panipani i mamae .
44025001	Petasi i nei anani taniwaga ugolina po iyeta tonuga hi kokoe ma u Sisaliya i'mhoe po i gae u Yelusalem ,
44025002	po noka hosi tu witalaguyaba babadahi po mi Yudeya tu tahaehi Paulo hi igouya naka Petasi hi wibenabenameya . Ma hi lupali gawagawata
44025003	hi pa Petasi ina winugodewadewahi po Paulo ina palihaleya po ina nei u Yelusalem . Matababana amaka hi wiwogatala ipa Paulo hau tahaya hina uni .
44025004	Petasi hai lupali i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Paulo u Sisaliya to womomohi po hau numa panipani e mamae ma apo ega daona ma a gunawileu .
44025005	Inapa powa awai amaka ina dewaya yaka ami babada ona palihalehi po mitehi to nae u Sisaliya po hina wigouya . ’
44025006	Petasi Yelusalem lawahi mitehi hi mae gaogao emosi ma tupona ma apoma i gunawileya u Sisaliya . Ma malitom po ani luhetala numana ugolina i duhuna ma i baha po Paulo hi luiyeya .
44025007	Hougana Paulo i luilui mi Yudeya Yelusalemgei hi nenei hi mewiiwileya ma hi igou koyakoyameya .
44025008	Ma Paulo tuawana ubeina i baha nae Petasi ugolina i pa , ‘ Mi Yudeya hai lugagayo po numa dalabu baneina a lugagayo po Sisa a lugagayo ega ata tulagona dadani ’ .
44025009	Tamogi Petasi mi Yudeya ipa ina winugodewadewahi yaka Paulo ugolina i pa , ‘ Nugonugom una gae u Yelusalem po geka wigouhi bihiyei una luhetala u matau ? ’
44025010	Ma Paulo lubayada geka i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Eega , geka Sisa anani luhetala ugolina a towotowolo ma geka hosi ipa a luhetala , matababana ega kikina apapoe gehouna mi Yudeya ugolihi ata dewaya , tam u hanapugena dumaya .
44025011	Inapa lugagayo awai amaka a tulagoni po powa a dewaya naka i dewadewa a hilage . Ega ipa hilage a lowo haleya . Tamogi inapa geka wigouhi koyama apega iyai ina wodamaneu geka lawahi ugolihi . U lupali ipa Sisa ata wasawasa baneina u matana a luhetala . ’
44025012	Apoma Petasi tu paliteetena mitehi hi ibaabani po i kokoe ma i pa , ‘ Sisa u lupaliyeya yaka apo una nae Sisa ugolina ’ .
44025013	Iyeta wabihaga hi kokoe ma wasawasa Agilipa nouna Benaisi mitehi hi nei u Sisaliya ipa Petasi hina mamali .
44025014	Noka hosi hi mae iyeta wabihaga ma Petasi Paulo a tupo i dedeya Agilipa ugolina i pa , ‘ Geka hosi naka lawa gehouna hau numa panipani e mamae ma Pelikisi i nehaleya .
44025015	Ma hougana a nenae u Yelusalem naka tu witalaguyaba babadahi po mi Yudeya hai tanitaniwaga lawana iyowai ma hi igouya naka tuwegana hi paliweleu . Ma hi lupaliyeu hi pa a baha po hina uni .
44025016	‘ Tamogi a paliwelehi a pa , “ Mi Loma i dewa naka ega emoemotana po powa tu dewana to baha po hina uni yababaya a sigana tu wigouna mitehi hina luhetala . Ma powana tu dewana a gaogao to weleya po tuawana binei ina wibaabani . ”
44025017	Ega yaka hougana hi laugeletai geka hosi naka ega u houga ata haleya . Ma malitom po hau ani luhetala a duhuna ma a baha po lawana hi neiyai .
44025018	Hougana tu wigouna hi towolo po hi ibaabani naka powa baneihi a nugonugotuhuhi naka ega gehouna ita dewaya .
44025019	Awai atapuhi i bahebahehi naka tauhi tuawahi hai witumagana po hai mamae ubeihi . Ma lawa gehouna gowana Yesu hi bahebaheya hi pa , “ Amaka i hilage ” , ma Paulo i pa , “ Eega , yohola e lauyagohana ” .
44025020	Ega ata hanapugeya iyowai ma apo dewa geka pite a lidumaluya . Ega yaka Paulo a lubayadeya a pa , “ Nugonugom yaka una gae u Yelusalem po hina igoum binei una luhetala ? ”
44025021	Ma tamogi Paulo i lupali i pa , “ Tu galena itete u nimahi a mamae po apo u luhetala Sisa ina winugonugotuhugeya ” . Ega yaka a baha po hau numa panipani hi houni po e mamae apo gaogao a tuhagaya yaka a himili po ina nae Sisa ugolina . ’
44025022	Agilipa Petasi ugolina i baha i pa , ‘ Nugonugou ipa geka lawana a baha a nonoli ’ . Ega yaka Petasi i pa , ‘ Hau malatom apo a baha una nonoli ’ .
44025023	Ma malitom po Agilipa ma Benaisi hai wasawasa lelihigei hi leli ma hi lui ani'mboina numana ugolina . Hi luilui naka gawiya tanitaniwagahi po Sisaliya meyageina babadahi mitehi hi lui . Apoma Petasi a bahagei Paulo hi niyeya numana ugolina .
44025024	Ma Petasi i pa , ‘ Wasawasa Agilipa po taumi iyawoi atapumi geka hosi , geka lawana ona galeya . Mi Yudeya atapuhi geka hosi po u Yelusalem hai ompili geka lawana ugolina , ma hi otu hi pa , “ Ega ina lauyagohana ” .
44025025	Tamogi a tuhagaya naka ega powa awai ita dewaya po apo binei ma ina hilage , tauna tuawana ipa Sisa ugolina ina luhetala yaka a lueena ipa apo a himila niyeya .
44025026	Tamogi tauna ubeina ega awai ita lugeleteya ipa u guyau Sisa a pepa a gilumi po a paliweleya . Ugolinei ma Paulo a neiyai taumi u matami ma a dumalu tam wasawasa Agilipa u matam . Ta lubayabayadeya po u mulina nugote apo awai ina lugeleteya po apoma Sisa a baha a gilumi Paulona ubeina .
44025027	Matababana ega ita dumalu ipa lawa hau numa panipani tu mae a himili po ina nenae ma ega ani libahibahi a wogeleteya . ’
44026001	Agilipa i baha Paulo ugolina i pa , ‘ Amaka ma bimgei una wibaabani ’ . Ega yaka Paulo nimana i wohepaya ma geka pite a baha i witowolihi i pa ,
44026002	‘ Wasawasa Agilipa , a kaoha duma naka amalai apo u matam biugei a wibaabani po mi Yudeya hai wigou atapuna a wimiheya .
44026003	Matababana tam mi Yudeya ata mamae po ata dewa u hanapugena dumahi . Ugolinei a lupaliyem ipa upum ina hegoya ma u baha una nonoli ma mi Yudeya hai wigou atapuna a wimiheya .
44026004	‘ A habuluwe ma u mae i nei po amalai mi Yudeya hi hanapugeya . U luyagohana u meyagai po u Yelusalem naka i wawala po i nenei hi hanapugeya .
44026005	Lolowa amaka hi hanapugeya , ata tapalolo wailugagayo dumana a bolu gowana Palisi naka tau tulahi gehouna . Inapa nugonugohi yaka apo hina bahena geleteya .
44026006	Ma amalai naka geka hosi a towolo ma he lauhetaleu , matababana Yaubada a paliwitumagana googata ugolihi towolo meme binei naka ugolina a iotonana ma a itumagana .
44026007	Ma tamogi ata guguni magouhi 12 iyetei po uguwei Yaubada he wootalagiyeya , ma geka paliwitumaganana ugolina he iotonana ma he itumagana ipa apo hina tuhagaya . Wasawasa tam , geka tauna wiotonanana po witumaganana binei ma mi Yudeya he igouwe babana a ibaabani Yesu a towolo meme binei .
44026008	Awai binei Yaubada lawa hilage ugolina ma e itowolo mehi ega emoemotana ona witumaganeya ?
44026009	‘ Lolowa a inugonugotuhu ipa ginouli magomagouhi a dewahi po Yesu Nasaletagei gowana a luhopuneya .
44026010	Ma geka pite dewa u Yelusalem a deweya . Tu witalaguyaba babadahi hi palihaleu po Yesu tu wotagona hi maga duma hau numa panipani a hounihi . Ma gasi hougana hi ununihi naka tau omunugohi a lueeneya .
44026011	Houga i maga duma numa dalabu atapuhi u hinehi a baha po hi wimihehi po gasi a wiletahi ipa hai witumagana hina bowiyehi . Ma uyou i gigai duma yaka a nae u meyagai geha po a ihiniwiyuwahi .
44026012	‘ Geka dewana ugolina ma tu witalaguyaba babadahi ugolihi taniwaga a waya ma hi palihaleu po a nae Damaseko u meyageina .
44026013	Wasawasa , iyeta bolinai tahayagei a nenae ma yayata namanamalina yadei i hopu mai po tau po lawa mitehi to nenae naka i yayata wiiwileiyai . Geka yayatana naka i kadidili duma ma apoma kabudala yayatana a kadidili .
44026014	Ma atapuiyai to guli hopu hau hipuli po a lautanigana ma lawa gehouna Mi Yudeya ponatiyei i baha mai ugoliu i pa , “ Saulo ! Saulo ! Awai binei e ihiniwiyuwau ? Tam e ihiniwiyuwa mem . Galenam mei bulumakau ani lihunahi higeyala kamkamna ugolina , e ilabatena mem . ”
44026015	‘ A lubayada a pa , “ Guyau , tam iyai ? ” ‘ Ma Guyau i pa , “ Tau Yesu , houga daodaona e ihiniwiyuwau .
44026016	Tamogi una welutowolo po aemgei una towolo . A wogeletena meu ugolim ipa a witowolim po tam u tu bagibagi . Amalai awai ugoliu u gagaleya ipa lawa gehouhi una paliwelehi . Ma gasi houga u naota awai ana iatatiyem naka ipa lawa una paliwelehi .
44026017	Apo a himilim po una nae mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi . Geka tauhi lawahi ugolihi apo a wiluyagohanim hai pilipili ubeihi .
44026018	Tam apo hau uguwa matahi una hoenihi ma una wiwilihi po hau yayata hina nae . Ma Tomodulele a manini ugolina ma una wiwilihi po hina nae Yaubada ugolina . Yaka hai witumagana tau ugoliu tepanei apo hai apapoe a paligigilihi . Ma Yaubada a lawa waiwoiyawahi u hayahi apo ani mae hina tuhagaya . ”
44026019	‘ Wasawasa Agilipa , geka binei ma enogalena yadei a ialoni naka ega ata wiponahahaleneya .
44026020	Yaka lawa u Damaseko a paliwelena tahaehi ma apoma u Yelusalem , po gasi Yudeya tupona atapuna po gasi tauhi ega mi Yudeya . A guuguya ipa hai apapoe hina palihalehi ma hina luhagawilehi Yaubada ugolina . Ma awai hina dewadewahi naka ipa hai nugobui ina wogeletaya .
44026021	Mi Yudeya numa dalabu baneina u hinena hi womomohiu po hi ileta ipa hina ununiu naka a matababana geka a paliwelem .
44026022	Tamogi Yaubada i haguhaguwe ma i nei po amalai . Ugolinei ma geka hosi a towolo ma baha moinana lawa atapuhi ugolihi a bahebaheya . Lawa gegehi po habuluhi ugolihi . Awai tu bahapiko po Mose hi bahebaheya ipa apo ina waawala naka bahana emosi a bahebaheya .
44026023	Geka pite hi baha hi pa Keliso apo wiyuwa ina wialoni po hilage ugolina apo tauna lawa tahatahayana ina towolo meme . Ma luyagohana tahayana apo ina baheya mi Yudeya po tauhi ega mi Yudeya ugolihi . ’
44026024	Paulo tuawana ubeina geka pite i ibaabani ma Petasi i baha yahiyahi i pa , ‘ Paulo , u badebade ! Am hanapu baneina e laibuuwam ! ’
44026025	Ma Paulo i pa , ‘ Taniwaga Petasi , ega ata badebade ! Ununuwe a dumaluna ma baha moinahi a bahebahehi .
44026026	Wasawasa Agilipa , geka ginoulihi i hanapugehi ugolinei ma a bahabaha dumalu tauna ugolina . A hanapugeya geka ginoulihi atapuhi i nonola tuhagahi . Matababana geka ginoulihi hi waawala ega hita lugowagowadehi .
44026027	Wasawasa Agilipa , a hanapugeya naka tam tu bahapiko hai baha e itumaganeya . ’
44026028	Agilipa Paulo ugolina i baha nae i pa , ‘ Am nugotuhu u pa geka kabudalana kukuna ugolina apo una winugobuiniu , bo ? ’
44026029	Ma Paulo Agilipa a baha i wimiheya i pa , ‘ Kabudala kukuna bo daodao ugolina ega ata geno . Tamogi u tapalolo Yaubada ugolina naka tam po taumi atapumi o lautanigana ugoliu a pa apo dogou ona peli . Tamogi ega nugonugou ipa gulawa pawapawasigei hina panipanimi . ’
44026030	Apoma wasawasana po taniwagana Petasi po Benaisi po iyawoi mitehi hi duhuduhuna naka atapuhi hi towolo .
44026031	Hi hopu po u uputa ma tuawahi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Geka lawana ega awai ita powaya po ipa ina hilage bo hau numa panipani ina mamae ’ .
44026032	Ma Agilipa Petasi ugolina i baha i pa , ‘ Geka lawana emoemotana hau panipani uta wohaleya itapa ega Sisa ita lupaliyeya ’ .
44027001	Nugotuhu hi baheya ipa ton'omkuka po to nae u Itali . Ma Paulo po hau numa panipani tu mae gehouhi Yuliyasi u nimana hi hounihi . Yuliyasi tauna gawiya kapenana gehouna ma a bolu gowahi ‘ Sisa a tu wigawiya ’ .
44027002	Ma wam Adamitiyagei i nenae Asiya u tupona po wam hai ani gotagota ugolihi yaka wamna ugolina to gelu . Alisitaka tauna a meyagai Tesalonika Masedoniya tuponana naka mitehi to gelu .
44027003	Malitom po u Saidoni to gota . Yuliyasi Paulo i lunugodewedeweya yaka i palihaleya po i nae a lawa i galehi , ma a luhogala awai naka hi'mbeneya .
44027004	Noka hosi ma to gelugelu naka togowa matana to gahigahi yaka Saipilasi bonabonana liunei to nae .
44027005	Silisiya po Pampiliya bogahi to damanihi po to nae u Maila , Lisiya u tupona .
44027006	Noka hosi Yuliyasi wam Alesanilagei i nenae u Itali i tuhagaya yaka ugolina to gelu damana .
44027007	To'mkuka po to nenae naka ega tota bulili ugolinei ma iyeta wabihaga to halehi ma apoma Naidasi u niha labena to gota . Togowana yohola i togotogo yaka ega dumalu tota nae ma Kilita bonabonana liunei to nae po Salamone mutuna to wiwili .
44027008	Niha labei to dewadewa bagibagi ma to nae po Lisiya meyageina u liyaliyana huhu gehouna gowana Ani Gota Dewadewana ugolina to gota .
44027009	Iyeta hi maga duma ma to haleya bababana togowa matiyei i togo mai , po wiyohi iyetana amaka to haleya ma houga apapoe hougana kikina ma apo ina geleta yaka Paulo i baha nae Yuliyasi po wamna taniwagana ugolihi i pa ,
44027010	‘ Babada , a nugonugotuhuya naka ata kadau geka hosi ma i nenae apo ina apapoe duma . Geka wamna po ginouli awai u hinena o tutoulihi naka apo ta halehi . Ega wam po ginouli tuawahi ma lawa apo hina hilage . ’
44027011	Tamogi Yuliyasi Paulo a baha ega ita nonoli ma wamna taniwagana po tu yabiyabiyena ugolihi i lautanigana .
44027012	Ani gotana naka wayau po houga apapoe hougahi ugolihi ega ita dewadewa imahi . Ugolinei ma lawa hi maga duma hai luhogala ipa hina gelu hopu po emoemotahi yaka hina wileta po Pinikisi hina waya . Pinikisi naka ani gota gehouna Kilita bonabonana ugolina . Geka ani gotana matana tupo yalasi ugolina yaka ipa apo hina wiliu houga apapoe ugolina .
44027013	Hougana yawana amanugona i togotogo ma hai nugotuhu hi pa amaka togowa dewadewana hita wialoni . Ugolinei ma hai yogona hi teina hepaya ma hi'mkuka po Kilita niha labenei to wolawilawita ma to nae .
44027014	To gelu po ega daona ma togowa gowana bauli oyei i hopuhopuneya naka i kadidili duma .
44027015	Togowana wam i laulauni naka ega emoemotiyai ipa matana to gahi yaka to boboyogeya .
44027016	Bonabona gowana Kiloda liunei i alugeiyai po to nenae ma to ileta po dewa bagibagiyei apoma wamna a wam habuluna to houna imahiyeya .
44027017	Wamna habuluna tu bagibagi hi teina geleteya ma wamna baneina gulawanei hi lagilagita tataya . U Saitisi tawali hi lowogeya ma oleole baneina hi luholi po i alalugeiyai ma to nae .
44027018	Malitom ma guletutu wam i laiyoli gawahi yaka ginouli awai hi tutoulihi hi tugudu po hi ihulu hopunehi .
44027019	Ma iyeta witonugana ugolina nimahiyei wamna ginoulina hi wihulu hopuneya .
44027020	Iyeta po uguwa daodaohi ega kabudala po ubona tota gagalehi . Togowana yohola i kadikadidili ma i luyagohana tahayana to inugonugotuhugeya po ega emoemotiyai .
44027021	Lawa ega hit'omam naka iyeta i maga duma . Ugolinei Paulo i nae po i baha nae ugolihi i pa , ‘ Babada , itapa lolowa u baha ota nonoli po ega Kilita tata gelu haleya , apega apapoe po ginouli awai tata wihuluhi .
44027022	Tamogi geka amalai a palipaliwelemi ipa ona nugokadidili . Apega iyai ina hilage ma tamogi wam awa apo ta haleya .
44027023	Matababana Yaubada tauna e tanitaniwageu po ugolina a wotalagae naka a tu winoyanoya upomgei i nei ugoliu
44027024	po i pa , “ Paulo , ega una matomatouta ! Sisa u matana ipa tam una towolo . Ma Yaubada a lunugotootogogei geka lawahi mitehi o kadakadau , u nimam i hounihi po apega ona hilage . ”
44027025	Ugolinei babada , ipa ona nugokadidili , matababana Yaubada a witumaganeya naka a tu winoyanoya awai i palipaliweleu apo ina wawala .
44027026	Tamogi apo bonabona gehouna ugolina tan'omhepa . ’
44027027	Gaogao luwaga hi kokoe ma boga u baneina yohola i alalugeiyai . Mei upom u tipolina ma wamna tu bagibagiyena u nugonugohi i kadidili naka hipuli to tutuliyaliyani .
44027028	Ega yaka ginouli witewiteina gulawa u aliyana hi duli ma hi woipipeili po i hopu po boga a dao hi galeya . Hi tuhagaya naka bogana a dao guli magouna 20 . Gulawana hi teini po to tunae ma hi halena meya . Ma hi tuhagaya naka bogana a dao guli magouna 15 .
44027029	Yaka hi lowo hi pa , ‘ Apo i wam in'omhepa ’ . Ega yaka yogona wohepali wamna u mulina hi halehi ma malatom hi laihunehuneya .
44027030	Wamna tu bagibagiyena hi ileta ipa wamna hina lowo haleya . Wam habuluna hi witenomya ma yogona gehouhi wamna u naona wihuluna hi itepeya .
44027031	Ma tamogi Paulo i baha nae tu wigawiya ma hai kapena ugolihi i pa , ‘ Inapa geka wamna tu bagibagiyena ega hau wam hina mamae yaka apega ona luyagohana .
44027032	Ega yaka tu wigawiya wamna habuluna gulawana hi lautuiya ma hi wialugeya po i nae .
