46001002	Taumi Yaubada a bolu o memae Kolinito meyageina uyahina , omi leta geka a giluma neiyahi . Taumi Yesu Keliso amaka i otugemi po i wiwoiyawemi po a bolu i inaganihi u hinehi o lui mai . Taumi po tauyai po gasi tauhi tupo wohepali uyahihi miteta ta laupali gogona Yesu Keliso gowanei , tauna ataputa ata Guyau .
46001003	Yaubada amata ma ata Guyau Yesu Keliso hai lunugotootogo , po hai nugodumola hina melabenimi .
46001004	Houga magomagouna Yaubada a maamali babana tauna a lunugotootogo i welemi Yesu Keliso uyahinei .
46001005	Yaka ginouli dewadewahi e welemi po o iwasawasa naka omi wibaabani po omi hanapu uyahina .
46001006	Ma a imaamala matababana Keliso o kawamoineya po noyana o witumaganeya ,
46001007	po Yaubada anani'mbenena dewadewahi atapuhi uyahimi he memae , ma houga geka o iotonana ata Guyau Yesu Keliso a gunawilana meme binei .
46001008	Tauna e woomomohita ipa ata Guyau Yesu Keliso a iyeta uyahina ega ina igouta .
46001009	Yaubada emoemotana po ta witumaganeya naka i wiutaneta ipa Natuna Yesu Keliso ata Guyau mitehi ta witulana gogona .
46001010	Walewalehiu , geka u wihaahalana uyahimi , ata Guyau Yesu Keliso gowanei ipa ega ona imemepuputana ma ona winaowelewelena po nugonugomi emosi ma ona tanitaniwaga gogona .
46001011	Babana Kiloi a manago gehouhi amaka hi paliweleu omi wikahakaha binei .
46001012	U baha anona gegeka , gehoumi o pa , ‘ Tauyai Paulo a bolu ’ , ma gehoumi o pa , ‘ Tauyai Apolo a bolu ’ , ma gehoumi o pa , ‘ Tauyai Pita a bolu ’ , ma gehoumi o pa , ‘ Tauyai Keliso a bolu ’ .
46001013	Iyowai , Keliso i maga , bo ? Eega . Tau Paulo hoi ani take a hilage bimiyei , bo ? Eega . Ma gowaugei hi wibapatisomi , bo ? Eega .
46001014	Yaubada a maamali matababana ega bolu baneina ata wibapatisomi , naka Kilisipa ma Gaiyasi tunawahi .
46001015	Uyahinei ega ona ibaabani ona pa , ‘ Tauyai Paulo a bolu , babana Paulo i wibapatisoiyai ’ .
46001016	( Oo baha dumana gasi Setepano managona a wibapatisohi , nugote naka amaka magouhina . )
46001017	U bagibagi Keliso i weleweleu naka tuwega dewadewana luguguyana , ma ega wibapatiso . Ma u luguguya ega ipa baha hanahanapugei meka po apo Keliso a hilage hoi ani take maninina a wiapapoeya .
46001018	Keliso a hilage hoi ani take , tauhi alugohi hilahilagehi , tuwega geka hi kawaikoyakoyameya , ma tauta ta lauyagohana naka Yaubada a manini tuwegana e memae uyahita .
46001019	Geka bahana binei ma Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Lawa tauhi launugoholaholahi hai nugotuhu a wiapapoenihi ma tauhi tu hanahanapu hai hanapu a liyababahi . ’
46001020	Uyahinei tauhi tu hanahanapu iyowai ? Po tauhi tu wiatatiyana iyowai ? Po tauhi tu baha hanahanapu geka hougana hoi hipuli he memae iyowai ? Hai hanapuhi Yaubada amaka i liyababahi , bo ?
46001021	Matababana hipuli nugotuhunei apega Yaubada ta hanapugeya . Tamogi Yaubada a nugotuhu tuwega dewadewana wiatatiyanana uyahinei tu witumagana tauta i luyawahita . Tuwega geka tu mehipuli hi kawaiapapoeya .
46001022	Mi Yudeya nugonugohi ipa manini hina galeya , ma mi Giliki hai luhogala ipa hina hanapu duma ,
46001023	ma tauta tuwega ta lauguguyeya Keliso a hilage hoi ani take binei , naka mi Yudeya he ihinigigiyeya ma tauhi ega mi Yudeya he kawakawaibuubuuweni .
46001024	Tamogi tauta Yaubada tu witumaganena bolu i inaganita , mi Yudeya i bolu , po taumi ega mi Yudeya omi bolu , ataputa uyahitiyei tuwegana naka Yaubada a hanapu po a manini Yesu Keliso uyahinei e weleweleta .
46001025	Babana Yaubada a bagibagi yabayababa tauta lawa ata hanapu i gelagonihi ma Yaubada a bagibagi tapitapiyana tauta lawa ata kadidili baneihi i kadidila lagonihi .
46001026	Walewalehiu , ona nugotuhuya naka tauta Yaubada i inaganita ta maga duma tauta ega hipuli a hanapugei bo a kadidiligei bo a wibadagei .
46001027	Tamogi buubuwata i winaganita po tu hanahanapu ta witepahinihinimayahi , ma hoi hipuli ta itapitapiya Yaubada i winaganita po tu kadidili ta witepahubahi .
46001028	Yaka lawa awai hi gagalena hopuhopuneya po hi ihinigigiyeya ipa ega anona naka Yaubada i winaganihi ma i wobuiya po lawa awai u nugonugohi i gegeduma naka i liyababahi .
46001029	Uyahinei ega emoemotana po lawa gehouna Yaubada u matana ina baha gegae .
46001030	Yaubada tauna a bagibagigei Yesu Keliso mitehi ta wiemota po Yaubada hanapuna Yesu i houna damaneya uyahita . Yaka ta hanapugeya tauna amaka i houna idumaluta po i wiwoiyaweta po i wimihena haleta .
46001031	Uyahinei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Iyai apo ina baha gegae yaka ata Guyau tunawana ina hunehuneya ’ .
46002001	Walewalehiu , lolowa Yaubada tuwegana a neiyahi uyahimi po a ibaabaniyeya ega u baha hanahanapugei
46002002	ma nugonugou ipa Yesu Keliso tunawa hotana binei a wiatatiyana uyahimi , tauna hi lihilageni ani take uyahina .
46002003	Uyahinei a laugeletahi uyahimi mei tu tapitapiya po anai nugoheleleu po anai matoutau .
46002004	Ma gasi u luguguya uyahimi ega baha kadikadidilahi bo baha hanahanapugei , tamogi Alugo Woiyawa a kadidiligei ,
46002005	ipa u luguguya ona nonoli po ona witumagana ega u winugonugotuhugei ma Yaubada a kadidiligei .
46002006	Hanapu dumana Yaubada uyahinei taumi tu nugomagula uyahimi a ibaabaniyeya , tamogi hipuli hanapuna po tu taniwagena hai hanapu apo hina yababa .
46002007	Ma lolowa Yaubada a hanapu gowagowadana ma geka hougana amaka i wogeleteya naka hipuli muliyei i wiwawali ma ata wasawasa tauna i nugotuhu tahaeya .
46002008	Hipuli tu taniwagena hanapu geka ega hita galena tuhagaya . Itapa hita hanapugeya apega ata Guyau waiwasawasana hita lihilageni hoi ani take .
46002009	Geka binei ma Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Lawa awai ega hita galeya po awai ega hita nonoli po u nugonugohi ega ita lugeleteya naka Yaubada tu luhogalena ubeita i wononogogeya . ’
46002010	Yaubada Alugona uyahinei a hanapu gowagowadana e woogeleteya uyahita . Yaubada Alugona ginouli atapuhi i hanapugehi , yaka Yaubada a nugotuhu gowagowadahi i hanapugehi po e woogeleteya uyahita .
46002011	Ta nugotuhu meta tauta lawa , apo iyai a nugotuhu gowagowada lawana alugona i hanapugena meya . Naka pitena gasi Yaubada Alugona , Yaubada a nugotuhu i hanapugeya .
46002012	Ma Alugona uyahita e memae naka Yaubada uyahinei ma ega hipuligei , yaka Yaubada anani'mbenena uyahita ta gagalena tuhagahi .
46002013	Naka binei ega tauyai i winugonugotuhugei ma Alugo Woiyawa a nugotuhugei to ibaabani uyahimi po o galena tuhaga babana Alugona Woiyawa i wihogomi .
46002014	Ma tauhi tu meuputa Alugo Woiyawa a nugutuhu ega hita galena tuhagaya babana uyahihi ipa ginouli buubuwana . Ega emoemotahi ginoulihi hina hanapugehi matababana Yaubada Alugonei ega hita inugohiyahiyawa .
46002015	Tauta tamogi ginouli atapuhi Yaubada Alugonei ta ikaha imahiyehi , po ega iyai gehouna ipa ina libahibahita .
46002016	Mei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Ega iyai gehouna Guyau a nugotuhu ita hanapugeya . Ega iyai gehouna emoemotana po ina wiatatiyeya . ’ Tamogi tauta Keliso a nugotuhugei ta inugonugotuhu .
46003001	Walewalehiu , apo awai a baheya uyahimi ? Taumi omi winugonugotuhu mei tu mehipuli hai winugonugotuhu ma ega mei Alugo Woiyawa a winugonugotuhu . Yaka Keliso witumaganana uyahina taumi mei logaloga meyameyami .
46003002	Uyahinei ega emoemotami po aniani kapakapalana uyahinei a wianimi ma gugu yawa a welewelemi , matababana odubona po amalai ega emoemotami po aniani kapakapalana ona ani .
46003003	Geka binei ma a laubayademi babana omi dewa mei tu mehipuli ; yohola o yamgenagenaliliyena memi po o imemepuputana , yaka galenami mei tu meuputa .
46003004	Gehoumi o ikahakaha po o pa , ‘ Tauyai Paulo a bolu ’ , ma gehoumi o pa , ‘ Tauyai Apolo a bolu ’ . Omi bahahi naka mei tu mehipuli hai wibaabani , bo ?
46003005	Yaka tauyai iyawoi , Apolo iyai ma tau iyai ? Tauyai tu bagibagi hota Guyau binei . Guyau i bagibagi i weliweliyai tapuhi po tapuhi to dewadewahi po taumi Keliso o witumaganeya tauyai uyahiyei .
46003006	Tau u bagibagi ugota , ma Apolo a bagibagi galena itete , ma Yaubada a kadidiligei apo ina wiugoya po anona ina maga .
46003007	Uyahinei Yaubada tunawana ta hunehuneya ma tauyai apeega . Matababana tauyai tu ugota ma tu galena itete , ma Yaubada anona tu wilatana .
46003008	Tu ugota ma tu galena itete emoemotiyai apo i meiha to tuhagaya i wileta kadidili a lata naka pitenana .
46003009	Ega yaka geka hougana Yaubada mitehi a tano uyahina to wobagibagi . A tanona naka taumi lawa po gasi taumi Yaubada a numa .
46003010	Yaubada i lunugotootogogeu yaka i winaganiu po ipa tau tu wiwogatala a numa binei . Uyahinei ogola a houna imahiyehi ma tu bagibagi gehouhi ogolahi uyahihi he launuma , ma ipa hina galena itete mehi po hina wogo imahi .
46003011	Ata ogola kadikadidilina e memae tauna Yesu Keliso uyahinei ega emoemotana po ogola tapuna ta witowoli .
46003012	Ma ipa ogolana u tepana ita modale ta hounihi . Lawa gehouhi hai modale dewadewahi he neneihimai mei yabalawa po kasikasi po wakoya po . Ma gehouhi hai modale tapitapiyahi mei keipoki po gologolowa po mulumulu po .
46003013	Yaka luhetala iyetana uyahina ata Guyau emosi po emosi ata bagibagi apo ina galehi ma ina ludadanihi hi kadidili bo hi tapiya .
46003014	Apo iyawoi ogolana u tepana hina lunuma imahi yaka maiha hina waya .
46003015	Ma tauhi tu lunuma apapoehi apo hai numa ina liyababahi , lawa yawa apo ina wiluyagohanihi ma hai gapola apega gehouna ina memae .
46003016	Ipa ona hanapugena memi tauta Yaubada a numa gegena , ma Yaubada Alugona i luinita .
46003017	Apo iyawoi Yaubada a numana hina iapapoeya yaka gasi Yaubada apo ina wiapapoenihi , matababana numa waiwoiyawana tauhi tu wiapapoenina . A numana naka tauta tu witumagana .
46003018	Ega tam iyai una koyakoyamena mem po una pa , ‘ Tau tu hanahanapu babana hipuli geka hanapuna a hanapugeya ’ . Ma a dumalu ipa hanapu naka ona wihinigigiyeya ma hanapu dumana Yaubada uyahinei ona waya , hawena apo hina iapapoenimi .
46003019	Matababana hanapu hipuligei i winonola luwaga Yaubada u matana . Ma Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Yaubada tu hanahanapu i walohi po hi hilage tauhi hai walogei ’ .
46003020	Ma gasi i bahena meya i pa , ‘ Guyau tu hanahanapu i hanapugena dumahi naka he inugonugotuhu powa ’ .
46003021	Uyahinei ega ona bahabaha gegae omi tapalolo tanitaniwagahi ubeiyai babana Keliso ginouli atapuhi amaka i welemi :
46003022	tau po Apolo po Pita i itowoliyai ipa to hagumi . Naka pitenana gasi hipuli atapuna i welemi . Ma gasi yautumi po omi hilage ma gasi ginouli atapuhi houga geka po houga he nenei ubeihi i welemi .
46003023	Ma taumi Keliso galinei ma Kelisona Yaubada galinei .
46004001	Taumi o gagal'iyai galen'iyai iyowaka ? Tauyai Keliso a tu bagibagi Yaubada a tuwega gowagowadana geka hougana to ipaliweleneya .
46004002	I bagibagina uyahina i linaniyai ipa to bagibagi imahi .
46004003	U bagibagi geka binei apo ona libahibahiu bo lawa gehouhi hina libahibahiu naka ega ginouli baneina babana ega ata laibahibahi meu .
46004004	Tau u nugotuhu a pa , ata wobagibagi imahi po ega ata nugohelele , tamogi ega ata hanapugena imahiyeya i dewadewa bo i apapoe Yaubada tauna i hanapugeya po apo ina houna ikahakahaya .
46004005	Uyahinei geka hougana ega iyai gehouna a lawa uyahihi ina inimayoyogana . Tamogi Guyau a nei binei ona iotonana , babana a houga nei uyahina apo ina houna ikahakahata . A wikaha hi dumalu babana ata nugotuhu apapoehi u nugonugota Yaubada apo ina houna geletehi , ma ata nugotuhu dewadewahi apo gasi ina houna geletehi po ubeita ina kawaidewadewa .
46004006	Walewalehiu , geka u winugonugotuhu a paliwelemi tau ma Apolo ani galena uyahiyai ona galeya po tahaya dewadewana ega ona nenehaleya po ega ona bahabaha gegae omi tanitaniwaga ubeihi uyahinei taniwaga gilugilumana apega ona tulagoni .
46004007	Awai binei o nugogegae omi lawa uyahihi po o pa , ‘ To dewadewa lagonimi ’ . Ega naka pite . Dewadewa atapuna uyahimi e memae naka Yaubada uyahinei o tutuhagahi , yaka ega ona bahabaha gegae .
46004008	Amaka o galena tuhaga , bo ? Amaka o wiwasawasa , bo ? Amaka o witaniwaga ma tauyai yohola , bo ? Hilaki ota wiwasawasa po taumi ma tauyai tata tanitaniwaga gogona .
46004009	Tamogi , u winugonugotuhu galenana naka Yaubada i dewiyai po tauyai tu wituwetuwega geka hougana galen'iyai mei gamogamo hi panipaniyai po he lauguyoguyogeiyai Yaubada a tu winoyanoya po lawa u matahi ipa hina lihilageniyai .
46004010	Yaka galen'iyai mei badebade Keliso binei , ma taumi galenami mei tu hanahanapu Keliso binei , babana tauyai to tapiya ma taumi o kadidili po he iyateyatemi ma tauyai ega hita iyateyateiyai .
46004011	Lolowa i nei po amalai to lauomhilage ma to lauuyopopo haleyana , ma ega i kaleko dewadewahi , ma ega i numa ma to ineneyabayababa nae , ma lawa he ilawiyai .
46004012	Tauyai nimaiyei to wobagibagi ma iyawoi he kawakawaiapapoeniyai lunugodewadewagei hai baha to imihehi ma he ihiniwiyuwaiyai ma to yamtaibagibagi .
46004013	Apo gasi hina lumataniyai ma anai nugodewidewiyai to itulatulanehi . Geka hougana tauyai mei nudanuda po lawa he ihinigigiyeiyai .
46004014	Baha geka a gilugilumiyahi ega ipa a paliwihinihinimayami , tamogi mei natunatuwe dumami po a palihibahibami .
46004015	Omi tanitaniwaga Keliso binei hi maga duma , ma tunawa hotau amami babana tuwega dewadewana uyahinei a weluwinimi po o nei Yesu Keliso uyahina .
46004016	Uyahinei natunatuwe , a laupaliyemi ipa ona witutupoganeu .
46004017	Yaka natuwe Timoti a himihimiliyahi uyahimi po u dewa Keliso binei apo ina paliwelemi mei tu witumagana dobu atapuhi uyahihi a iatatiyehi yaka ega nugomi ina guluguluwi . Timoti a luhogaleya ma a witumaganeya babana Guyau a bagibagi uyahina i wileta kadidili duma po geka hougana e nenehi uyahimi .
46004018	Ma uyahimiyei lawa gehouhi hai nugotuhu ipa apega tau a nehi po binei ma hi bahabaha gegae .
46004019	Tamogi Guyau apo u gaogao ina weleu yaka a bulili mahi uyahimi po tauhi tu nugogegae a ludadanihi , ega ipa hai wibaabani uyahinei ma hai bagibagi a galehi he ipoya bo eega .
46004020	Matababana Yaubada a taniwaga ega wibaabani hota tamogi a maninigei ta wobagibagi .
46004021	Yaka omi winugonugotuhu iyowai ? Anai taniwaga kadidiliu a nehi bo anai luhogalau po anai nugodewadewau a nehi , taumi ona taniwaga .
46005001	Omi apapoe a nonoli naka lawa gehouna uyahimiyei amana agona mitehi hi powaya . Powa naka apapoe banei dumana . Tauhi tu meuputa ega naka pite hita dewadewa .
46005002	Yaka ega ona nugonugogegae tamogi omi dewa apapoena binei ona nugodubugena memi ma lawana apapoe tu dewana omi bolu uyahinei ona houna hopuneya po tauna mei tu meuputa .
46005003	Geka hougana tau a mebala daogemi tamogi u nugotuhu yawa uyahimi e memae po amaka mei taumi ma tau mitehi ta meme gogona . Yaka naka tu apapoena a taniwaga a bahebahena neiyahi .
46005004	A taniwaga geka pitenana omboina ona dewaya ata Guyau Yesu gowanei po gasi u nugotuhu mitehi . Naka hougana Guyau Yesu a kadidiligei ,
46005005	tu apapoena on'ombeneneya Tomodulele uyahina ipa hinina ina wiapapoeya ma apo yohola ata Guyau a iyeta uyahina lawana alugona ina wiluyagohani .
46005006	Ega ona nugonugogegae ma ipa ona nugotuhuya apo apapoe habuluna uyahimi ina memae yaka atapumina ina wiapapoenimi .
46005007	Yaka apapoe naka uyahimiyei ona wiyaga haleya ma taumi bolu woumi . Matababana Keliso a hilage uyahinei i liyeuyeumi . Ma Kelisona tauna mei ata Welulagona tolehana puhomana babana ubeita ma hi lihilageni .
46005008	Tauna uyahinei ata toleha ta dewadewaya ega ipa ata dewa gobugobunei po ata apapoe uyahinei tamogi ata dewa yeuyeuhi po dumadumaluhi uyahihiyei .
46005009	Lolowa omi leta gehouna uyahina a paliwelemi ipa ega tu matamaga mitehi ona itulatulana .
46005010	Tamogi ega ata wilugagayomi po ipa tu matamaga po tu'mgaganu po tu danene po tu wipalilougo ona wihinigigiyehi babana hipuli geka uyahina tauhi geka pite hi maga duma yaka ega emoemotana po ta nehalehi .
46005011	Geka hougana u lugagayo uyahimi apo iyawoi tu nugobui ma hina matamatamaga bo hina yamgaganu bo hina ipalilougo bo hina ihapona bo hina umuma buuwa bo hina danedanene ega ona itulatulanehi bo mitehi on'omam .
46005012	Omi lugagayo geka taumi tu nugobui bolumi . Tauhi tu meuputa ega ta lauhetalehi .
46005013	Babana Yaubada apo yohola ina taniwagehi . Ma taumi omi boluna u hinena apapoe tu dewana ona houna hopuneya .
46006001	Ginouli gehouna uyahimi e memae naka omi luhetala hougana uyahina taumi o nenae tauhi ega tu witumagana tanitaniwagahi uyahihi , ma a dumalu ipa ona nenae tauhi tu wiwoiyawa uyahihi .
46006002	Ona nugotuhuya , tauta Yaubada a lawa apo tu mehipuli atapuhi ta luhetalehi . Yaka emoemotana po pilipili muhomuhohi luhetalahi ubeihi ona tanitaniwaga .
46006003	Ona nugotuhuya , apo yohola Yaubada a tu winoyanoya ta luhetalehi yaka geka hougana hoi hipuli bagibagi gehouhi emoemotata po ta taniwagehi .
46006004	Uyahinei pilipili ona ialonihi ega ona nenae tanitaniwaga balubaluhi uyahihi ma ipa omi bolu uyahinei babada una witowolihi po hina laidumalumi .
46006005	Naka dewana ani wihinimaya . Apo iyai uyahimiyei ipa tulana mitehi hina luhetala , yaka a dumalu ipa bolu tu tapalolo uyahimiyei tu baha hanahanapu gehouna ona biheya po tauna luhetalana ina nonoli po ina taniwageya .
46006006	Ma ega ipa mei lolowa omi welupowana naka tauhi ega Keliso hita itumaganeya u matahi o lauhetala .
46006007	Taumi tu nugobui o iluluhetala galenami ega ita haki . Ma inapa pilipili uyahimi ina gelegeleta yaka tu wikoyakoyamana binei on'omtaibagibagi ma ega ona lauhetaleya .
46006008	Ma ega ipa mei geka hougana , taumi tu nugobui walewalehimi o koyamehi po o iapapoenihi .
46006009	Inapa omi dewa naka pitenana yaka apega Yaubada anani taniwaga uyahina ona lui . Ega ona koyakoyamena memi , tu apapoe atapuhi Yaubada i guduhi , tauhi tu matamaga po , tu wipalilougo po , tu enogwau po , tu dewaapapoe wiwine po ololoto yawa he enenogena mehi ,
46006010	po gasi tu danene po , tu'mgaganu po , tu umabuuwa po , tu wihapona po , tu wikoyakoyama po . Tauhi apega hina lui Yaubada anani taniwaga uyahina .
46006011	Lolowa gehoumi dewa geka pite o mimiyehi ma geka hougana Yaubada amaka i ogami po i liyeuyeumi . Babana ata Guyau Yesu Keliso gowanei po Alugo Woiyawa a kadidiligei i houna idumalumi .
46006012	Lawa gehouhi hi ibaabani hi pa , ‘ Ginouli magomagouhi emoemotata po ta dewahi ’ . Baha dumana ginouli atapuhi emoemotau po a dewahi ma tamogi ginouli gehouhi ega hita haguwe , matababana hai kadidiligei apo hina paniu .
46006013	Aniani ona nugotuhuya , naka koibata binei ma gasi koibatana aniani binei , tamogi aniani po koibata Yaubada apo ina liyababahi . Ma hinita mahina Guyau binei ma ega matamaga binei , yaka naka hinita atapuna Guyau ina tanitaniwageya .
46006014	Ma houga u matata Yaubada a kadidiligei apo hilage uyahinei ina witowolo meta , naka pitenana ata Guyau hilagei i witowolo meya .
46006015	Hinita mei Keliso hinina gutana gehouna . Ma iyowai po apo Keliso hinina gutana gehouna anai matamagomagougeya ? Ega ita haki .
46006016	Apo lawa gehouna tu matamaga mitehi hin'enogwau yaka naka mitehi amaka hi wihiniemosi po mei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya i pa , ‘ Hai luwaga hi iemota po amaka mei hinihi emosi ’ .
46006017	Inapa ata Guyau mitehi ta wiemota yaka apo gasi alugota emosi .
46006018	Uyahinei matamaga ona lowo haleya . Matamaga ega mei dewa apapoehi gehouhi babana matamaga hinita e iapapoeya .
46006019	Yaka ona hanapugeya hinita naka Alugo Woiyawa anani mae , ma Alugo Woiyawa Yaubada uyahinei i nei po u hineta e memae . Yaka tauta ega galitiyei , ma Yaubada galinei .
46006020	Tauna amaka i wimiheta yaka ta wiyateyateya hinita uyahihiyei .
46007001	Tawine nugotuhuna binei u leta uyahina o lubayadeu yaka tau a palipaliwelemi . Inapa ololoto ega hina tawitawine yaka naka i dewadewa .
46007002	Ega emoemotana po atapumi geka pite ona memae . Ma inapa matamaga a ludadana hina gelegeleta uyahimi , yaka a dumalu ipa ona tawine po yamoha yamoha agona .
46007003	Ololotomi agagomi hai nugotuhu ona wotagohi mei gasi wiwinemi agagomi hai nugotuhu ona wotagohi .
46007004	Wawine tawitawinena ega tunawana hinina ina tanitaniwageya ma agona ina taniwageya , mei gasi oloto ega tunawana hinina ina tanitaniwageya ma agona ina taniwageya .
46007005	Ma agagomi ega ona eneno liya halehi . Inapa omi winugonugotuhu emosi yaka iyeta wabiha hota ona hudiyena memi ipa Yaubada uyahina ona lupali apoma ona eno gogona meme , ma ega ona memeliya duma meka po apo luhogala gowagowada uyahimi hina geleta po Tomodulele a ludadanagei ina lipeunimi .
46007006	Apo nugonugomi ona tawine yaka naka i dewadewa ma apega a taniwagemi po ipa bolumi ona tawine .
46007007	Tau ega ata tawine , yaka hilake gehoumi mei tau . Tamogi Yaubada ata ani'mbenena i weleta po gehoumi o tawitawine ma gehouyai eega .
46007008	Yaka taumi hewahewali po guguhini po hiwahiwape geka omi ututu a lawilawi . Inapa ega ona tawitawine yaka naka i haki apo ona memae mei tau a memae pite .
46007009	Ma inapa luhogala gowagowada ina ibagibagimi yaka ona tawine po ega luhogala gowagowada ina iapapoenimi .
46007010	Ma tutu tawine Guyau a lugagayo a baheya uyahimi ega ona ihulu .
46007011	Tam wawine awai agom u haleya , naka tahaya luwaga he memae , tunawam una memae ma ega una tawitawine meme , ma a dumalu ipa una gunawilena mem agom uyahina . Ma ololoto agagomi ega ona hahalehi .
46007012	Geka gasi nugotuhu gehouna tau uyahiugei ( ma ega Guyau a lugagayogei ) . Inapa tam oloto awai agom Yaubada ega ita itumaganeya ma a luhogala ipa mitehi ona memae ega una hahaleya .
46007013	Gasi tam wawine awai agom olotona Yaubada ega ita itumaganeya , ma a luhogala ipa mitehi ona memae ega una hahaleya .
46007014	Apo oloto ega ita itumagana ma tam agona wawinem om witumagana binei Yaubada i wiwoiyawemi mei gasi wawine ega ita itumagana ma tam agona olotom om witumagana binei Yaubada i wiwoiyawemi naka binei natunatumi hi wiwoiyawa Yaubada u matana .
46007015	Apo tam iyai agom Yaubada ega ina itumaganeya ma a luhogala ipa ina halem , yaka una nugohaleya po ina nae ma ega una nugonugoneya . Matababana Yaubada a luhogala ipa ta menugotau ma ega nugonugona ipa tana iwogawogalahi .
46007016	Taumi ololotomi bo wiwinemi agagomi apo iyowai ma ona winugobuinihi po hina witumagana , iyai'galehi , ega tata hanapugehi .
46007017	Geka u lugagayo tu nugobui tupo atapumi uyahimi . Emosi po emosi ata luyagohana Yaubada i gutaya uyahita po naka mamaehi ta mimiyehi .
46007018	Tam iyai lawa Yudeyagei po lolowa hinim hi hapi , tauta mi Yudeya ata wekiwekilalagei , ma u mulina Yesu Keliso u itumaganeya ega una nugonugowitai mi Yudeya ata wekiwekilala binei . Ma inapa gasi ega wekiwekilala uyahim yaka ega hina hapihapim .
46007019	Babana omhapi naka ega ginouli baneina . Ma Yaubada a taniwaga wiponawogona naka ginouli baneina .
46007020	Meka hotanana u memae ma Yaubada i otugem po u witumaganeya naka hotanana una memae .
46007021	Tam iyai bada gehouna a tu bagibagi po hougana u nugonugobui ega una genogeno duma u wobagibagi yababa binei , ma inapa om gaogao ina lugeleteya yaka apo una nae om meyagai uyahina .
46007022	Tu witubagibagi hoi hipuli inapa Keliso hina witumaganeya yaka Yaubada apo hai apapoe ina hoe halehi . Ma babada Keliso hina witumaganeya yaka tauhi hina witubagibagi Kelisona binei .
46007023	Matababana Kelisona i gimaleta po tauta a bolu . Yaka ega ona palipalihalena memi bada tapuna uyahina .
46007024	Walewalehiu , omi ani mae awai uyahina ma Yaubada i otugemi po o itumaganeya , naka hotanana ona memae Yaubada mitehi .
46007025	Taumi ega tawitawinemi omi ututu a lawilawi . Ega lugagayo gehouna Guyau ita weleta ma i lunugotootogogeu po ani towolo dumadumaluna i weleu yaka u nugotuhu a palipaliwelemi .
46007026	Geka hougahi houga waipilipilihi ta ialonihi yaka u nugotuhu ipa ega ona tawitawine .
46007027	Ma tam iyai amaka u tawitawine agom mitehi ona memae . Ma tam iyai ega uta tawitawine ega wawine una bibiheya .
46007028	Inapa tam hewali awai una tawine naka ega apapoena , ma gasi inapa tam guguhini awai una tawine naka ega apapoena , tamogi tutu tawine hipuli pilipilina he ialoni yaka nugonugou ipa a liteyateyami .
46007029	Walewalehiu , u wibaabani anona gegeka : houga u matata i kuku yaka taumi amaka o tawitawine ona dewa memi po ega mei tutu tawine .
46007030	Ma taumi o tutou ona dewa memi po ega mei tauhi hita tutou , ma taumi tu kaoha ona dewa memi po mei tu nugodubu , ma taumi tu waigapola ona dewa memi po mei tu dayadayabu .
46007031	Ega gasi ona inugonugotuhu duma hipuli gapolahi uyahihi , matababana houga kuku hotana apo hina kokoe po hipuli geka ina yababa .
46007032	U luhogala ipa ega hipuli gapolahi uyahihi ona genogeno duma . Tauhi ega hita tawitawine Guyau a bagibagi binei he inugonugotuhu duma ipa iyowai ma Guyau hina likaohaya .
46007033	Ma tauhi tutu tawine hipuli genohi he genogenogehi ipa uyahihiyei agagohi hina laikaohahi .
46007034	Uyahinei ega emoemotahi po tahaya luwaga uyahihi hina nenae . Naka pitena tauhi wiwine ega tawitawinehi emoemotahi po Guyau binei hina inugonugotuhu labatana ipa hinihi ma alugohi hina wele mehi Guyau uyahina . Ma tawitawinehi he inugonugotuhu duma hipuli genohi ubeihi po ipa uyahihiyei agagohi hina laikaohahi .
46007035	U wipaliwelena geka ega tawine ata talagagali , ma ipa a hagumi po Yaubada a bagibagi uyahina ona bagibagi imahi po ega ginouli tapuhi uyahihi ona inugonugotuhu duma .
46007036	Inapa tam hewali awai apo guguhini gehouna mitehi amaka o wiheliyam ma tamogi Keliso binei o meliya po o memae . Ma om guguhinina amaka i wiwawine labatana po binei e genogeno , naka om nugodagiha una dewaya po luhogalam ipa una lawagi yaka naka ega apapoena .
46007037	Ma inapa tam iyai nugonugom ina kadidili po ega una tawitawine naka nugonugom dagiha ega ita tanitaniwageya ipa om guguhinina una lawagi , yaka naka i haki po om guguhinina ega uta lawagi .
46007038	Inapa una tawine yaka naka i haki , ma inapa ega una tawitawine yaka naka i haki lagona .
46007039	Apo wawine awai ina tawine po agona mitehi hina wiemota ega emoemotana po ina haleya . Ma olotona ina hilage , emoemotana po wawinena ina tawine meme . Ma a dumalu ipa Yaubada tu witumaganena olotona gehouna ina lawagi .
46007040	Tamogi a nugonugotuhuya inapa wawinena tunawana ina memae ma ega ina tawitawine meme naka apo ina kaoha duma . Nugote Yaubada Alugona a nugotuhu geka pitena .
46008001	Ginouli gehouna naka aniani lawa he welewelehi hai talaoloto uyahihi apo tan'anani , bo eega ? Lawa hai wikoyakoyama amaka o hanapugehi , tamogi ega ona nugonugogegae omi hanapu binei , ma omi luhogalagei ata lawa ipa ona wikadidilihi .
46008002	Apo lawa awai ina nugotuhu meya po ina pa , ‘ Tau tu hanahanapu ’ , naka tauna yohola duma .
46008003	Ma hanapu dumana naka apo lawana Yaubada ina luhogaleya yaka Yaubada lawana ina hanapugeya .
46008004	Iyowai , aniani lawa he welewelehi talaoloto uyahihi apo tan'anani , bo eega ? Ta hanapugeya naka ani polou koyakoyama ega ani witumagana dumahi , babana Yaubada tunawa hotana e memae ma ani witumagana gehouhi ginouli yabayababa .
46008005	Lawa boluhi hai nugotuhu ipa ani witumagana hi maga duma po hi pa , ‘ Yaubada gehouhi po guyau gehouhihoi yada po hoi hipuli he mamae ’ .
46008006	Ma tauta uyahita naka Yaubada emosi hota tauna Amata yaka ginouli atapuhi i wiwawalihi po tauna binei ta memae . Ma tauta uyahita naka Guyau emosi hota tauna Yesu Keliso ma Kelisona uyahinei Yaubada ginouli magomagouhi i wiwawalihi po tauna uyahinei ta memae .
46008007	Tauta ata witumagana he ikadidili ma tu witumagana gehouhi hai witumagana he tapitapiya . Tauhi nugonugohi he lauluwaluwagehi po he pa , ‘ Talaoloto gehouhi hi kadidili po aniani hi italaguyabehi uyahihiyei to'mam ’ . Yaka tauhi hai dewa i wigouhi po hi nugohelele .
46008008	Ma tamogi aniani binei Yaubada apega ina wigouta babana ega aniani gehouna alugota ita idewadewaya bo ita iapapoeya .
46008009	Uyahinei aniani boluna emoemotana tan'anani ma tamogi ona galena itete memi po ega omi amgei tu witumagana tapitapiyahi ona laipeunihi .
46008010	Apo tam iyai om winugonugotuhugei u hanapugeya po u pa , ‘ Talaoloto naka ginouli yabayababa po ega hai kadidili awai ’ , ma hai am wailugagayona un'anani ma tulam a witumagana tapitapiyana ma ina galem apo tauna gasi in'ani ma tamogi anai nugohelelena .
46008011	Yaka tam om nugohanahanapugei walehimna tapitapiyana apo una wiapapoeya . Ma walehimna binei Keliso i hilage .
46008012	Ma inapa walehimna una lipeuya po ina nugohelele yaka naka om apapoe Keliso uyahina .
46008013	Tau ega nugonugou ipa walehiu gehouna a lipeuya uyahinei anianihi a wihinigigiyena dumahi po apega a hanadadanihi babana walehiu apo a lipeuya .
46009001	Ega ipa lawa hina tanitaniwageu babana tau Guyau Yesu a tu wituwetuwega gehouna . Guyouna Yesu amaka a galeya po noyana uyahimi a wibaabaniyeya po Guyouna o witumaganeya .
46009002	Tamogi lawa he idibogiu he pa , ‘ Paulo tauna ega tu wituwetuwega dumana ’ . Ma taumi ega ota inugonugotuhu naka pite babana u guguya o noonoli po ata Guyau uyahina o witumagana , yaka u wituwetuwega o limoineya .
46009003	Geka pite apo a baha mahi tu widibodiboga uyahihi .
46009004	Tau tunawau ipa ega am po uma ona weleu , bo ?
46009005	Tauhi tu wituwetuwega po ata Guyau Yesu walewalehina po gasi Pita hai kadau uyahihi anai agagohi hi nehi po o gagalena itetehi , ma tau gasi itapa ata tawine apo agou mitehi tota nehi po ota galena itetiyai , bo eega ?
46009006	Tau ma Banabasi ega uyahiyai geka pite ota dewaya , ma tauyai to galena itete meiyai i bagibagi mihahi uyahihiyei .
46009007	Lubayada gehouna a lubayademi , tu wigawiya a hagu meka pihena e nenei , tu galena itete uyahinei bo tauna nugonei ? U lubayada gehouna gasi , apo lawa a tano ina wagoya ma houga luano uyahina apo lawana yaniyanina in'ani , bo eega ? U lubayada gehouna gasi , lawa gehouhi gamogamo he gagalena itete ma gugu he buyohi po he umuma , bo eega ?
46009008	Ani galena geka ata dewagei , ma Mose a lugagayo mitehi emoemotahi
46009009	i bahebaheya i pa , apo bulumakau pegapega u hinena ina wobagibagi yaka ega gamona ona lautomgeya ma pegapegahi ina ananihi . Yaubada ega ita inugonugotuhu bulumakau tunawana binei .
46009010	Tamogi i ibaabani naka tauta lawa tu bagibagi ubeita . Uyahinei taniwaga geka i huhouni ipa ta witumagana po ata bagibagihi uyahihiyei ata am ta tuhagahi , mei tauhi tu wao po tu gigila hai witumagana hi houni ipa apo hai tanogei am hina tutuhagaya .
46009011	Tauyai naka pitenana alugo hai am amaka to ugohihi uyahimi ma a dumalu ipa hiniyai hai am ona weleweleiyai .
46009012	Tu wituwetuwega gehouhi o ianihi yaka ipa tauyai gasi ona wianiyai ? Ma hougana mitemi ta memae ega omi hagu tota wiwaya ma tamogi to'mtaibagibagi meka po apo Keliso tuwegana to luguduguduya .
46009013	Ma numa dalabu baneina tu bagibagiyena ona nugotuhuhi . Tauhi lawa hai ani'mbenena uyahinei hai am hi tutuhagahi , ma gasi tu witalaguyaba hai am gamogamo hi ununihi talaguyaba binei hi tamitamihi .
46009014	Guyau a taniwaga geka pitena po ipa Yesu Keliso noyana tu wituwetuwegena hai am hina tutuhagaya hai bagibagi uyahihiyei .
46009015	A paliwelemi tau ega ipa ona wianiu gasi omi leta geka a gilugilumi ega ipa ona wimiheu , geka u ani kaoha . Apo am a hilage naka i haki wahaga babana ega ata luhogaleya ipa lawa hai amgei a wobagibagi .
46009016	U bagibagi geka Yaubada i weleweleu ipa tuwega dewadewana a lauguguyeya ma ega ipa geka bagibagina binei ma hina huneu , babana geka bagibagina i linanau po a dewaya ma inapa a luhinigigai apo witai baneina uyahiu ina geleta .
46009017	Yaubada a nugotuhugei u bagibagi geka i weleu ma ega tau u nugotuhugei , yaka apega maiha a wiwaya bagibagi geka binei .
46009018	Tamogi u ani kaoha babana tuwega dewadewana a yambeneneya uyahimi ma ega ata inugonugotuhu omi wihaguhagu binei , uyahinei hagu awai i linanau ega ata wiwaya .
46009019	Ma lawa ega hina tanitaniwageu tamogi lawa boluhi ubeihi a wobagibagi po ipa a wiluyagohanihi .
46009020	Yaka a dewa meu po mi Yudeya hai memae a dewaya po ipa mi Yudeya a haguhi ma tauhi Mose a lugagayo he wotagoya , po apo mitehi to memae naka a dewa meu po ipa hai dewagei a memae po a haguhi , tamogi u nugonugou apega hai lugagayona uyahina a palihalena meu .
46009021	Ma tauhi Mose a lugagayo ega hita hanahanapugeya apo mitehi to memae yaka a mae po mei tauhi hai dewa po a haguhi . Tamogi u lugagayo Yesu Keliso uyahinei apega a wihinigigiyeya babana Yaubada a nugotuhu .
46009022	Tauhi tu witumagana tapitapiyahi mitehi to memae yaka apo a dewa meu po mei tauhi ma a haguhi . Uyahinei lawa boluhi tauhi mitehi ma a ileta kadidili ipa a malagamehi po gehouhi luyagohana hina tuhagaya Keliso uyahinei .
46009023	Tuwega dewadewana bagibagina binei ipa tau gasi ani kaoha a tuhagaya .
46009024	Ma ta hanapugeya bulili uyahina bolu he bulibulili , tamogi emosi hota apo ina tahaya , uyahinei ta wileta kadidili po ta tahaya .
46009025	Ma tauhi tu wibulibulili hoi hipuli he ileta kadidili po gasi he yamtaibagibagi ipa uyahinei apo unuhau kokoena hina tuhagaya , tamogi tauta ta wileta kadidili po unuhau memewahagana hoi yada ta tuhagaya .
46009026	Geka binei ma a bulibulili kadidili po gasi a ileta kadidili , ma ega ipa ana ileta yabayababa .
46009027	Uyahinei hiniu a wilugagayogeya po ega a dewadewa yabayababaya , meka po apo u wiatatiyana lawa gehouhi uyahihi ma u mulina tau a peu .
46010001	Walewalehiu , ona nugotuhuya odubona googata hoi balabala yabayababa hi nenae ma yaloi uyahinei Yaubada i tahatahaehi ma gasi boga hinenagei hai tahaya i dewaya po hi damana u tuponei .
46010002	Yaloi hi wootagoya ma boga hayanei hi damadamana po naka binei ma hai bapatiso hi tuhagahi .
46010003	Ma hai am po hai goila yadei hi tutuhagaya ,
46010004	ma hai goila ani tamana gaima gehouna uyahinei ma gaimana yadei mitehi hi nenegogona gowana Keliso .
46010005	Tamogi Yaubada ega ita kaoha googatahi hai dewa binei , yaka atapuhi hi hilage pahihi hoi balabala po kokowagahi hi nenehalehi balabalana atapuna u hinena .
46010006	Tauhi ata ani winugonugotuhu tauta uyahita po ipa ega apapoe binei tana inugonugotuhu duma ,
46010007	ma gasi ega tana itumagana nae ani witumagana tapuhi uyahihi po mei tauhi hoi balabala hi dewadewa pite . Yaubada a Buka uyahina tauhi ubeihi i ibaabani i pa , ‘ Lawa hi tugula po hi am ma hi uma ma hai wotowolo u mulina hi dewadewa yabayababa ’ .
46010008	Ma hi matamatamaga po hai matamaga binei iyeta emosi uyahina magouna tausana 23 hi hilage . Ani galena geka uyahita po ega ta matamatamaga .
46010009	Ma Yaubada uyahina hi lauhinigaligali yaka mota hi'mpahihi . Ani galena geka uyahita po ipa tauta ega naka pitena ta dewadewaya .
46010010	Ma gasi Yaubada uyahina hi wobahabaha yaka tu winoyanoya gehouna i himili po i wiapapoenihi hai wobahabaha binei . Ani galena geka uyahita po ega ta woobahabaha .
46010011	Ani galena atapuhi geka Buka u hinena hi gilumihi po ipa geka hougana tauta hapa waimulita wimeiha witewiteihi ta nugonugotuhuhi po ega pilipili ta dewadewahi .
46010012	Apo tam iyai una nugotuhu mem po ipa anai kadidilim una towotowolo yaka una galena itete mem po ipa ega una pipeu .
46010013	Ani ludadana uyahinei Tomodulele e laudadanimi naka lawa boluta e laudadanita tamogi Yaubada a lugagayo i huhouni ipa Tomodulele ega ina laudadana dumata ma inapa tan'omtaibagibagi yaka apo tahaya dewadewana ina wiatatiyeta po ani ludadanahi ta kadidila lagonihi .
46010014	Uyahinei u lawa , omi ani witumagana tapuhi ona lowo halehi .
46010015	Taumi tu hanahanapu yaka geka u bahana binei ona winugonugotuhu labatana .
46010016	Uma waiwoiyawana ta wiwaya yaka ta wimamala Yaubada uyahina apoma tan'umuma naka Keliso talanei i widewadewata po Kelisona mitehi ta wiemota . Naka pite gasi palawa ta tomutomuya po ta'nani yaka palawana uyahinei Keliso mitehi ta iemota babana tauna hinina ta'nani .
46010017	Palawana emosina uyahinei boluta ta'mam yaka Keliso hinina uyahina ta ibolu emota .
46010018	Naka pitenana mi Isalaela boluhi hai ani witalaguyaba hi ununihi Yaubada binei ma hi ananihi ( yaka Yaubada mitehi hi bolu emota ) .
46010019	Ma tauhi ega mi Yudeya aniani hi talaguyabehi hai ani witumagana tapuhi uyahihi . Hai ani witumaganahi naka , ginouli yabayababa po ega hai kadidili .
46010020	Ma hai ani talaguyabahi ega Yaubada binei tamogi Tomodulele a lawa mitehi ubeihi . Uyahinei ega nugonugou ipa ani witumagana tapuhi ubeihi ona wobagibagi , meka po apo Tomodulele a lawa mitehi ona wibolu emota .
46010021	Ega ita haki ipa Guyau a keyakagei on'umuma ma gasi a gaebagei on'omam ma Tomodulele witumaganana ona dewadewaya ,
46010022	matababana Guyau o inugotutouya . Guyau tauna tu kadidili dumana yaka ega ta laiuyogigeiya meka po apo ina liyababata .
46010023	Ega ipa lawa hina guduguduta babana ginouli atapuhi emoemotata tamogi ginouli gehouhi apega hina haguta .
46010024	Ega ipa tunawata ta nugonugotuhu meta ma ipa ata lawa gehouhi ta haguhaguhi .
46010025	Apo gamogamo uyogona lawa gehouhi uyahihi ona gimagimaleya yaka ega ona laubayada ma on'ani po ega ona inugonugotuhugeya Tomodulele uyahina muhalana hi witalaguyabeya , bo eega .
46010026	Matababana ginouli atapuhi hoi hipuli Yaubada e tanitaniwagehi .
46010027	Ma inapa tu meuputa gehouna ina otugem po una nenae anu numa po aniani bimgei ina houni yaka un'ani ma ega una laubayada lolowa awai uyahinei hi dewaya po anianina i geleta .
46010028	Ma inapa iyai ina paligeleteya anianina binei po ina pa , ‘ Tauhi Tomodulele uyahina aniani he italaguyabeya ’ . Anianina ega on'anani , meka po tu wibenabenama apo ina nugohelele .
46010029	Tam ega uta nugohelele tamogi tu wibenabenama i nugohelele . Ma nugote lawa gehouna e laubayadeu e pa , ‘ Paulo , awai binei ma apo tu tapitapiya ubeihi lugagayo a wialoni ?
46010030	Awai binei ma tu tapitapiya hina iyalutugeu ? Amaka u am binei a imaamala Yaubada uyahina po ega apapoe gehouna uyahiu ita memae . ’
46010031	Tinani baneina , tulau , a palipaliwelem , matababana ata bagibagi atapuna po ata am po ata uma , po gasi awai gehouhi uyahihiyei Yaubada gowana ta ilataya .
46010032	Uyahinei ega lawa gehouna ona lainugowiteiya mi Yudeya bo ega mi Yudeya bo tauhi Yaubada a bolu .
46010033	Tau gasi a ileta ipa ega u nugotuhugei a wobagibagi ma ipa lawa hai nugotuhugei a wobagibagi po hina kaoha ma hai luyagohana hina tuhagaya Yaubada uyahina .
46011001	Uyahinei u dewa ona witutupoganeya po mei tau Keliso a dewa a itutupoganeya .
46011002	A hunena dumami babana houga magomagouna o nugonugotuhuwe ma u wiatatiyana a welewelemi o womomohihi .
46011003	Ma a luhogaleya ipa ona hanapugena dumaya tauta ololoto ata bada Keliso ma wiwine hai babada tauta ololoto , ma Keliso a bada Yaubada .
46011004	Apo oloto awai anai unuhauna ina laupali bo ina bahabaha piko naka a bada Keliso e itepahinihinimayani .
46011005	Apo wawine ega a ununu humahumana ma ina laupali bo ina bahabaha piko naka agona e itepahinihinimayani . Ani galenana i apapoe mei unununa kalekaleyana .
46011006	Inapa wawine unununa ega ina lautataya , yaka apalana ina boli haleya ma ina wihinimaya kaleyana binei . Uyahinei ina lutata meya po hoi tapalolo galenana ina haki .
46011007	Houga tapalolo uyahina ega emoemotana po oloto unununa ina lutataya , matababana oloto galenana Yaubada anani wiwasawasa , ma wawine oloto anani wiwasawasa .
46011008	Matababana oloto tahatahayana ega wawine uyahinei ita liwawali , ma wawine oloto uyahinei i liwawali .
46011009	Ma Yaubada oloto i laiwawali ega wawine binei , ma wawine oloto binei i liwawali .
46011010	Uyahinei wiwine hai linana ipa ununuhi hina lautatahi tapalolo hougana uyahina po wiwinehi hai wiponawogo agagohi uyahihi tu winoyanoya hina galeya .
46011011	Ma inapa Guyau a tahaya ta wotagoya yaka ega emoemotana po wawine tunawana ina tanitaniwaga bo oloto tunawana ina tanitaniwaga .
46011012	Matababana wawine oloto uyahinei i wawala ma oloto wawine i guni , po ataputana Yaubada uyahinei ta wawala mai .
46011013	Uyahinei ona nugotuhuya , apo wawine ega a ununu humahumana ma ina laupali Yaubada uyahina iyowaka galenana i haki , bo ? Nugote i apapoe .
46011014	Ataputa hoi hipuli ta memae ma apo oloto apalana daodaona ta galeya naka ani wihinimaya .
46011015	Ma apo wiwine apalahi daodaohi ta galehi naka hai ani'mhuna po gasi ununuhi lutatana .
46011016	U lugagayo geka pite , ega meka dewa gehouna tauta Yaubada a bolu ataputa uyahita . Yaka ega iyai ina yampaliwilawila .
46011017	Omi tapalolo binei ega ata kaokaoha , babana dewana o dewedeweya apega lawa ona haguhi .
46011018	Ginouli tahatahayana naka lawa hi palipaliweleu hi pa omi omboina uyahihi o kahakaha memi po yamoha yamoha a bolu , yaka naka nugote moinana .
46011019	Ma omi wikahakahana a dumalu ipa iyawoi tauhi Yaubada i laimoinahi ta hanapugehi .
46011020	Ma omi omboina uyahihi Guyau a am winugohepana o anani naka galenana ega ita haki ,
46011021	matababana ega ota upuma gogoneya ma gehoumi omi amgei o'mam ma omi lawa gehouhi anai omhilagehi . Ma gehoumi o yamlabatana gasi gehoumi o umuma labatana yaka o wobadebade .
46011022	Yaka omi u numa on'omam po gasi on'umuma , ma ega ipa omi tapalolo ona iapapoeya po tu widayadayabu o laiwihinihinimayahi . Naka binei ega ata kaokaohemi .
46011023	Ata Guyau Yesu a am nugotuhuna amaka hi wiatatiyeu po tau a wiatatiyemi , naka uguwana Yudasa Yesu i nugohaleya apoma Yesu palawa i waya ,
46011024	po i wimaamala Yaubada uyahina ma i tomuya ma i pa , ‘ Geka hiniu taumi bimiyei , yaka geka pitena ona dewadewaya ani nugotuhu momota biugei ’ .
46011025	Hi am po i kokoe ma Yesu keyaka i waya po i pa , ‘ Keyaka geka wogatala wouna binei , wogatalana tau talaugei a lidumaluya . Omi houga uma iyetana apo ona nugonugohepau ’ .
46011026	Uyahinei palawa amna ma keyaka umana uyahihiyei Guyau a hilage binei ta palipaligeleteya houga magomagouna a sigana ina gunawilena meya .
46011027	Ma apo iyai anianina ina yam yabayababeya bo Guyau a keyaka in'umuma yabayababeya yaka lawana tauna a gou , matababana ata Guyau hinina ma talana e dewadewa yabayababahi .
46011028	Ega yaka ata dewa ubeihi ta winugonugotuhu tahaya po ta lidumalu meta apoma muliyei anianina tan'ani ma keyakana uyahinei tan'uma .
46011029	Inapa iyai in'omam yabayababa bo in'umuma yabayababa ma ega Keliso hinina binei ina inugonugotuhu apo yohola libahibahi ina wialoni .
46011030	Naka binei ma omi witapitapiya po omi witootogo hi maga ma he gelegeleta uyahimi , ma omi bolu gehouhi amaka hi hilage .
46011031	Uyahinei i linanata po tauta ata dewa ta woimahi , meka po apo Yaubada ina libahibahita .
46011032	Ma inapa geka hougana Guyau ina laibahibahita yaka naka e laidumaluta po ipa houga u naota apega tu mehipuli mitehi ina libahibahi emoteta .
46011033	Walewalehiu , hougana Guyau a am on'anani yaka omi lawa ona iotonanehi po on'am gogoneya .
46011034	Ma inapa iyai am ina hilage yaka a u numa in'om tahaya po ega ina yamlabatana tapalolo u hinena meka po apo Yaubada ina libahibahimi . Naka amaka ma tamogi omi lugagayo gehouhi he memae , ma apo a nehi uyahimi yaka apo a paliwelemi .
46012001	Walewalehiu , nugonugou ipa Yaubada a luguta alugota ubeihi emosi po emosi uyahimi a liyayahi po ona hanapugeya .
46012002	Taumi lolowa hoi uputa o memae ani witumagana tapuhi po tapuhi uyahihi o palipalihalena memi ma hi koyakoyamemi .
46012003	Ma u luhogala ipa ona hanapugeya iyai Alugo Woiyawa uyahina e memae yaka naka Yesu ega ita paliguyoguyougeya ma tamogi e kawakawaiguyougeya .
46012004	Alugo Woiyawa emosi hota tamogi a luguta tapuhi po tapuhi .
46012005	Guyau emosi hota ma ata hagu tapuhi po tapuhi lawa ta welewelehi .
46012006	Bagibagi tapuhi po tapuhi ta dewadewahi ma babahi emosi hota naka Yaubada , tauna ginouli atapuhi i wogeletehi .
46012007	Alugo Woiyawa a ombenena lawa emosi po emosi awai e weleweleta ipa uyahinei ata lawa ta haguhi .
46012008	Alugo Woiyawa a ombenena galenahi tapuhi po tapuhi , lawa gehouhi tu'mpalihanahanapu ma gehouhi tu'mpalihibahiba ,
46012009	ma lawa gehouhi hai witumagana i lata Alugo Woiyawa a hagu uyahinei po gehouhi tu luyawata
46012010	ma gehouhi tu manini ma gehouhi tu bahapiko ma gehouhi alugo tapuhi po tapuhi tu hanapugehi , ma gehouhi pona geha tu bahehi ma gehouhi baha anona tu lugeletehi .
46012011	Geka gutahi naka Alugo Woiyawa tauna e woogeletehi a nugotuhugei emosi po emosi uyahita .
46012012	Lawa hinina emosi hota ma gutana tapuna po tapuna . Ma gutaguta atapuhi he memae hini emosi uyahina . Naka pite Keliso .
46012013	Tauta bolu emosi hota babana hini emosigei ataputa he ibapatisota ; mi Yudeya po ega mi Yudeya , panipanihi po palipalihalenahi , ataputana Alugo Woiyawa e weluweluwinita .
46012014	Ta hanapugeya hini emosi ma gutaguta tapuna po tapuna .
46012015	Apo ae ina baha ina pa , ‘ Tau ega hini a bolu uyahina ata memae matababana tau ega nima ’ , a bahana naka ega baha dumana .
46012016	Apo gasi taniga ina baha ina pa , ‘ Tau ega hini a bolu uyahina ata memae , matababana tau ega mata ’ , a bahana naka ega baha dumana .
46012017	Itapa hini atapuna mata yawa ega emoemotana po baha gehouna ita nonoli . Apo gasi hini atapuna taniga yawa ega emoemotana po ginouli gehouna ita galeya .
46012018	Ma Yaubada tauna a nugotuhugei hini gutagutahi hai bagibagi i welehi .
46012019	Apo hini gutana emosi hota naka ega hini atapuna .
46012020	Uyahinei hini emosi hota i wiwawali ma tamogi gutagutana i maga duma .
46012021	Uyahinei ega emoemotana po mata ina baha nae nima uyahina po ina pa , ‘ Ega nugonugou tam ’ , ma ununu ina baha nae ae uyahina ina pa , ‘ Ega nugonugou tam ’ .
46012022	Ma hinita gutagutahi gehouhi galenahi mei hina tapiya ma tamogi hai bagibagi naka hini haguna binei .
46012023	Gasi gutaguta gehouhi ega ipa ta hunehunehi po ubeihi tana ihinimaya , tamogi ta galena itetehi po ta gowadihi .
46012024	Ma gutata kadikadidilina ega tata galena iteteya . Matababana Yaubada hinita i wiwawali ipa gutata tapitapiyahi ta galena itete imahiyehi
46012025	po ega wikahakaha ina gelegeleta hini gutagutana uyahina . Yaka ataputa ta wiemota po ta haguhagu meta ita bagibagi uyahina .
46012026	Inapa hinita gutana gehouna ina wiyuwa apo hinita atapuna ina wiyuwa pahi . Mei gasi hinita gutana gehouna ina kaoha , apo hinita atapuna ina kaoha pahi .
46012027	Tauta boluta Keliso hinina ma emosi po emosi hinina gutagutana .
46012028	Tauta Yaubada a bolu yaka geka ginoulihi e weleweleta : tahatahayana tu wituwetuwega , wiluwagana tu bahapiko , witonugana tu wiatatiyana , apoma manini tu dewana , tu luyawata , tu wihaguhagu , tu weluweluwai , ma gehouhi pona geha tu bahehi .
46012029	Ataputana tu wituwetuwega , bo ? Ataputana tu bahapiko , bo ? Ataputana tu wiatatiyana , bo ? Ataputana manini tu wogeletehi , bo ?
46012030	Ataputana tu luyawata , bo ? Ataputana pona wouhi tu bahehi , bo ? Ataputana baha anohi tu lugeletehi , bo ? Eega duma .
46012031	Tamogi bagibagi atapuhi geka Yaubada e weleweleta . Yaka ona inugonugotuhu imahi bagibagi dewadewahi ubeihi , po gasi tahaya dewadewa dumana a iatatiyemi luhogala binei .
46013001	Apo u wibaabani ina dewadewa duma po mei tu luguguya , po mei yada tu winoyanoyahi hai wibaabani , ma luhogala u nugonugou ega ina memae , apo u luguguyahi hina wiginouli yabayababa po mei inaga hina ilawi ma himogo hina huwehuwena yababaya .
46013002	Ma apo tau Yaubada a tu bahapiko po ginouli gowagowadahi a hanapugehi po a hanapu duma po u witumaganagei a baha po oya hina nae uheiya , ma luhogala u nugonugou ega ina memae apo tau mei lawa yabayababa .
46013003	Ma inapa u gapola atapuhi tu dayadayabu a welehi ma hiniu a palihaleya po hina apapuya hoi ani witalaguyaba , ma luhogala u nugonugou ega ina memae u bagibagi anona apega a tuhagaya .
46013004	Luhogala dewa atapuhi i gelagonihi , luhogala i'mtaibagibagi po i lunugohegohegoya lawa uyahihi , ma ega ita yamgenagenalili , ma ega ita nugonugotuhu meya po ita nugonugogegae ,
46013005	ma ega ita tanitanigapota . Luhogala ega ita yamgaganu ma ega ita lauhinidoodola ma ega ita laubigo .
46013006	Luhogala dewa apapoena binei ega ita kaokaoha ma dewa dumadumaluna binei e kaokaoha .
46013007	Luhogala e hagahaga momohita . Luhogala e laimoineta . Luhogala e inugonugotuhu lagoneta . Luhogala e yamtaibagibagiyeta .
46013008	Uyahinei luhogala apega ina kokoe ma tauhi Yaubada a tu bahapiko hai baha apo hina kokoe . Tauhi pona geha he ibaabaniyehi bahahi apo hina kokoe . Tauhi tu hanahanapu hai hanapu apo ina kokoe .
46013009	Babana ita hanapu geka hougana tupo hotana ma gasi ata bahapiko tupo hotahi .
46013010	Ma houga e nenei apo hanapu dumadumaluna ina geleta po hanapu odubona ta winugoguluwi .
46013011	Tau lolowa a itewela po u dewa mei tewela ma geka hougana a inugomagula po logaloga hai wibaabani po hai dewa po hai winugonugotuhu u nugonugou amaka hi kokoe .
46013012	Geka hougahi ata winugohiyahiyawa hi wigahugahu , ma yohola apo ta galena imahiyeya . Ma tau hanapu tupo hotana a hanapugeya , ma tamogi yohola apo atapuna a hanapugena imahiyeya , apo geka hougana Yaubada ina hanapugena dumau yaka .
46013013	Ginouli tonuga memewahagahi : witumagana , nugotuhu lagona , luhogala . Tonugahi geka naka luhogala i lata duma .
46014001	Uyahinei ona wileta kadidili po ona lauhogala ma gasi ona wileta po Yaubada Alugona a ombenena uyahita ona tuhagaya naka ani'mbenena dewadewana ipa Yaubada a baha tana ipikogeya .
46014002	Ma ani'mbenena gehouna lawa uyahita naka pona geha uyahihiyei ta ibaabani . Bahahi anona naka Yaubada uyahina ta ibaabani ma ega lawa uyahihi tata ibaabani . Uyahinei bahahi anohi lawa ega hita hanapugehi babana Alugo Woiyawa a kadidiligei ginouli laugowagowadahi ta ibaabaniyehi .
46014003	Ma apo tu bahapiko Yaubada a baha ina ibaabaniyeya yaka lawa u nugonugohi ina lugadagadali po hai ani towolo kadidili ma hai hagu ma hai lunugotootogo hina tuhagaya .
46014004	Inapa lawa gehouna pona tapunei ina ibaabani naka tauna tunawana e haguhagu meya tamogi inapa tu bahapiko gehouna ina ibaabani naka tu witumagana boluhi e haguhaguhi .
46014005	Tau u luhogala ipa atapumi pona tapuhiyei ona ibaabani , ma u luhogala baneina ipa ona bahabaha piko babana tu bahapiko hai bagibagi ginouli baneina . Ma pona tapuhiyei wibaabanina naka ega ginouli baneina ma inapa lawa gehouna baha anohi ina laugeletehi naka ginouli dewadewana bolu hai hagu binei .
46014006	Walewalehiu , apo a nehi uyahimi po pona tapunei ana ibaabani nugote apega hagu ona tuhagaya . Ma apo a nehi uyahimi yaka Yaubada a hanapu gowagowadana a wogeleteya po awai a nugonugotuhuhi a paliwelemi , po gasi Yaubada a baha a bahabaha pikogeya , po a wiatatiyemi , uyahinei hagu apo ona tuhagaya .
46014007	Ega a dumalu ipa mei dilehu ta huwehuwena yabayababaya ma lougo gadona ta lawilawi , naka apega kikina lawa hina nonola tuhagaya .
46014008	Ma apo himogo hina huwehuwena yabayababaya naka daguguna apega ta nonola tuhagaya po tana pa noka gawiya binei .
46014009	Tauta naka pitena inapa ega tana ibaabani dumalu ata baha lawa apega hina nonola tuhagaya babana ata wibaabani mei gololo yabayababa .
46014010	Hoi hipuli pona tapuhi po tapuhi he memae ma tupo emosi po emosi tauhi ponahi dumana hi hanapugeya .
46014011	Tupo gehouhi ponahi ega ata hanahanapugehi uyahihi tau mei hewahewa babana a winugoneina po ega emoemotau ponahi a hanapugehi . Mei tauhi gasi ega emoemotahi ponau hina hanapugeya .
46014012	U lawa , inapa nugonugomi ani'mbenena ona waya po uyahimi yaka ona wileta po Yaubada Alugona a ombenena uyahinei a bolu ona wikadidilihi .
46014013	Ma apo iyai uyahimiyei pona tapunei ina ibaabani yaka ina laupali Yaubada uyahina ipa baha anona ina weleya po lawa uyahihi ina palipaligeleteya .
46014014	Ma inapa pona tapunei a lupali naka alugou yawa e lupali po u bahahi anohi ega ata hanapugehi .
46014015	Ega yaka awai apo a dewaya ? Geka pite : pona tapunei apo a lupali po gasi ponaugei apo a lupali . Ma pona tapunei apo lougo a lawi po gasi ponaugei apo lougo a lawi .
46014016	Apo tam iyai pona tapunei una wotalagae ma anona om lawa ega hina hanapugeya naka iyowai ma apo bolumi ona lueena gogona .
46014017	Om wotalagaena i haki ma tamogi ega ita haki duma babana om lawa ega uta haguhi .
46014018	Yaubada a mamala dumaya babana pona tapuhiyei a ibaabani duma , ma apoma taumi .
46014019	Ma tapalolo omboina gogonana uyahina nugonugou pona awai a hanahanapugeya uyahinei wiatatiyana kukuna a baheya lawa uyahihi , ma ega ata luhogaleya pona tapunei ana ibaabani duma babana lawa ega hita hanapugeya .
46014020	Walewalehiu , nugonugomi ega hina itunowanowa ma nugonugomi hina wilawa banai . Ma ega dewa apapoe binei ona inugonugotuhu duma ipa ona hanapugeya .
46014021	Matababana lugagayo Bukana u hinena i baheya i pa , ‘ Yohola hewahewa apo hina nei po pona tapuhiyei u bolu hina paliwelehi ma tamogi u bahahi apega hina wotagohi . ’ Yaubada a baha geka pite .
46014022	Pona tapuhiyei ta ibaabani naka wekiwekilala ega tu witumagana ubeita ma tu meuputa ubeihi . Ma bahapikogei ta ibaabani naka wekilala ega tu meuputa ubeihi ma tu witumagana ubeita .
46014023	Itapa taumi tapalolo binei ot'omboina gogona po pona tapuhiyei ota ibaabani ma tauhi tu meuputa apo hita lui mai po pona waipilipilihi hita nonolihi apo hita pa , ‘ O badebade ! ’
46014024	Ma inapa Yaubada a baha ona bahabaha pikogeni ma tauhi tu meuputa hina lui po bahapikona hina nonoli apo hai powa hina galena tuhagahi ma hina wigou mehi ,
46014025	ma hai nugotuhu gowagowadahi tu bahapiko apo hina paligeletehi . Yaka tu meuputahi hina polou po Yaubada hina wotalagiyeya , ma hina pa , ‘ Moina dumana , Yaubada u hayami e memae ’ .
46014026	Walewalehiu , u baha a baba gegeka : apo tapalolo binei on'omboina gogona yaka lawa gehouhi lougo hina wononogogeya ma lawa gehouhi hina wiatatiyana ma gehouhi nugotuhu wouna hina paligeletehi ma gehouhi pona tapuhiyei hina wibaabani yaka lawa gehouhi bahahi anohi hina paligeletehi po naka bagibagihi uyahihiyei lawa ta wikadidilihi .
46014027	Ma inapa pona geha lawahi hina ibaabani yaka naka i haki apo luwaga bo tonuga hina wibaabani ma tamogi emosi po emosi hina wibaabani ma hai baha tu'mbuibui apo bahahi anohi ina paligeletehi .
46014028	Ma inapa ega pona tu'mbuibui ina memae ega emoemotana po iyai pona tapunei ina wibaabani tapalolo u hinena yaka tauna tunawana nugonugonei ina wibaabani Yaubada uyahina .
46014029	Ma tu bahapiko luwaga bo tonuga hina wibaabani po ona lutanigana yaka hai bahahi ona inugonugotuhugena imahiyehi .
46014030	Apo tu bahapiko gehouna ina ibaabani ma lawa gehouna nugotuhu wouna ina tuhagaya yaka ina towolo po ina paligeleteya po tu bahapikona ina todi .
46014031	Naka pite atapumina emoemotami emosi po emosi ona bahabaha piko po atapumina omi hanapu po omi hagu ona tuhagahi .
46014032	Tu bahapiko emoemotahi po hai wibaabani hina galena iteteya ,
46014033	babana Yaubada tauna e laidumadumaluta yaka anai nugohegoyata ta tapatapalolo .
46014034	Ma taumi wiwine tapalolo uyahina ona genuwana imahi ma ona lautanigana mei tu witumagana meyagai atapuhi uyahihi ? Matababana Buka u hinena Mose a lugagayo wiwine ubeihi ipa apega hina tanitaniwaga ma hina iyateyate .
46014035	Ma wiwine inapa nugonugomi awai gehouna ona hanapugeya yaka omi numa u hinehi agagomi ona lubayadehi po hina wiatatiyemi . Matababana wiwine tapalolo u hinehi he ibaabani ani wihinimaya uyahita .
46014036	Ega ona nugonugogegae po ona pa taumi tunawami uyahimiyei Yaubada a baha e gelegeleta bo tunawami uyahimi e memae .
46014037	Ma apo iyai ina nugotuhu meya po ina pa tauna tu bahapiko ma Yaubada Alugona uyahina yaka u baha geka ina kawamoineya naka Yaubada uyahinei i nei .
46014038	Ma inapa lawana u baha ega ina kawamoineya yaka a baha ega ona kawakawamoineya .
46014039	Uyahinei , walewalehiu , ona wileta kadidili po Yaubada a baha ona bahabaha pikogeya ma pona tapuhi wibaabanihi ega ona guduguduhi .
46014040	Ma tamogi ginouli atapuhi ona laidumaluhi omi tapalolo uyahina .
46015001	Walewalehiu , a luhogaleya ipa a winugohepa memi , lolowa tuwega dewadewana a luguguyeya po o nonoli ma uyahina o palihalena memi po o towolo kadidili .
46015002	Tuwega dewadewana uyahina luyagohana o tutuhagaya inapa u bahana ega nugomi ina guluwi yaka apo ona towolo kadidili po omi witumagana apega hina powa .
46015003	Lolowa tuwega dewadewana binei Yaubada awai i bahebaheya uyahiu naka a paliwelemi . Ma nugotuhu baneina naka Keliso ata apapoe ubeihi i hilage mei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya pite .
46015004	Hoi kokowaga hi houna imahiyeya ma tamogi iyeta tonuga hi kokoe ma i towolo meme mei Yaubada a Buka i bahebaheya pite .
46015005	I towotowolo meme po Pita uyahina i wogeletena meya ma gasi a hewahewali uyahihi i wogeletena meya .
46015006	Ma iyeta gehouna walewalehita magouhi handele nimitutu uyahihi i wogeletena meya . Bolu naka tupohi amaka hi hilage ma hi maga duma anai yautuhi .
46015007	Yamesa uyahina i wogeletena meya ma tu wituwetuwega uyahihi i wogeletena meya .
46015008	Ma anani kokoe tau uyahiu i wogeletena meya , tamogi u houga guni meme uyahina a wigwameyameya .
46015009	Tau gowa tu wituwetuwega ega ita linanau , babana Yaubada a bolu a iapapoenihi . Uyahinei Keliso a tu wituwetuwega atapuhi hi haki lagoniu .
46015010	Ma tamogi Yaubada i lunugotootogogeu po i haguwe ma ega ita hagu yababau , tamogi tu wituwetuwega atapuhi hai bagibagi a lagonihi ma ega tau u kadidiligei ma Yaubada a lunugotootogogogei .
46015011	Yaka hawena , tamogi naka tauhi ma tau tuwega dewadewana to lauguguyeya po amaka Keliso o witumaganeya .
46015012	I luguguya uyahimi to ibaabaniyehi Keliso a hilage po a towolo meme o witumaganeya . Ma awai binei gehoumi o pa , ‘ Lawa ega emoemotahi po hilagei hina towolo meme ? ’
46015013	Itapa lawa ega hilagei hita towotowolo meme yaka ega Keliso hilage uyahinei ita towolo meme .
46015014	Yaka naka i luguguya ega anona po taumi gasi omi witumagana Keliso binei ega anona .
46015015	Po tauyai Yaubada a tu wituwetuwega mei tona ikoyakoyama i wibaabani uyahihiyei babana to pa , ‘ Yaubada Keliso hilage uyahinei i witowolo meya ’ . Ma gehoumi o pa , ‘ Ega tu hilahilage hita towotowolo meme ’ .
46015016	Omi nugotuhu iyowai ? Keliso gasi ega ita towolo meme , bo ?
46015017	Itapa Keliso ega ita towolo meme yaka naka omi witumaganahi Keliso uyahina ega kikina anona po apo omi apapoe uyahina ota memae .
46015018	Ma omi winugonugotuhu o pa tauhi lolowa Keliso hi itumaganeya po hi hilahilage apega hina luyagohana , bo ?
46015019	Tauta gasi Keliso tu witumaganena ta winugotootogo duma inapa Keliso a hagu hoi hipuli geka hougana uyahita tunawa binei ma ega houga e nenei hilage u mulina binei .
46015020	Ma a dumalu dumana naka Keliso hilage uyahinei i towolo tahaya yaka apo tu hilahilage atapuhi hina towolo meme .
46015021	Lawa emosi hota a dewa uyahinei hilage i geleta hoi hipuli naka Adam , ma gasi lawa emosi hota a dewa uyahinei towolo meme i wogeleteya .
46015022	Matababana Adam a apapoe uyahinei magomagouta hilage uyahita i geleta , ma Keliso uyahinei luyagohana ta tuhagaya .
46015023	Ma luyagohana galenana geka pite , Keliso i towolo tahaya ma hougana ina gunagunawilena meya tauta iyawoi a bolu apo ta towolo meme .
46015024	Apoma houga anani kokoe uyahina , Keliso apo Tomodulele a tu manini po tu kadidili hoi yada po hoi hipuli ina tuibaabahi po Amana uyahina anani taniwaga ina wele damaneya .
46015025	Matababana Keliso apo anai kadidilina ina tanitaniwaga a sigana Yaubada a gawiya atapuhi ina tuibaabahi .
46015026	Ma gawiya baneina ani kokoe uyahina apo Keliso ina kadidila lagoni naka hilage ina buiya po luyagohana .
46015027	Matababana taniwaga atapuna Yaubada Keliso i weleya , ma tamogi Tu'mbenenana Keliso apega ina taniwageya .
46015028	Apo yohola Keliso ina witaniwaga yaka ginouli atapuhi ina tanitaniwagehi po apoma ina palihalehi Amana uyahina babana Keliso a taniwaga atapuhi Amana e weleweleya , uyahinei Yaubada apo i gelagona duma .
46015029	Ma itapa tu hilahilage ega hita towotowolo meme ma awai binei taumi mi Kolinito gehoumi bapatiso o wiwaya tauhi hilahilagehi ubeihi ?
46015030	Ma tau iyowai ? Itapa hilage uyahinei ega tata towotowolo meme , awai binei apo ata wobagibagi gawata ma wiyuwa ata ialonihi Keliso binei ?
46015031	Babana iyeta emosi po emosi tau tu hilahilage ma tamogi anai kaohau omi witumagana ata Guyau Yesu Keliso uyahina binei .
46015032	Ma geka hougana u Epeso a memae , lawa hi winugoneina po mei gamogamo he woyahiyahi uyahiu babana towolo meme binei a ipaliwelena . Ma inapa ega hilage uyahinei ta towotowolo meme , ‘ Yaka tan'omam po ta umuma ma ta kaokaoha . ’
46015033	Naka bahana koyama , ega hina koyakoyamemi apo omi dewa dewadewahi hina wiapapoenihi .
46015034	Omi dewa dumadumaluhi ona galena itetehi po ega mei tu umabuubuwa hai dewa ona wotagoya . Gehoumi yohola Yaubada o inugoniniyeya . Ona wihinimaya duma .
46015035	Ma gehoumi towolo meme binei o ilulubayada o pa , ‘ Tu hilahilage iyowai ma he towotowolo meme ? Ma tu towolo meme hinihi galenana meka pite ? ’
46015036	Yaka ona winugonugotuhu imahi po ona hanapugeya hoi tano ta laupehi ega emoemotana po pehi polana ina lahaya apo inapa ega ta guluwi po ina buda tahaya .
46015037	Ma heki ona nugotuhu imahiyeya apo pehi polana hoi hipuli ta houni po e lahalahaya apega galenana mei lolowa polanana ma apo ina buiya po galenana tapuna .
46015038	Yaka pola emosi po emosi he lahalahahi galenahi tapuhi po tapuhi , Yaubada a nugotuhugei i wiwawalihi .
46015039	Ma hinita gasi Yaubada a nugotuhugei i wiwawali . Lawa hinita galenana tapuna ma gamogamo hinihi galenahi tapuhi , ma kiu hinihi galenahi tapuhi , ma iyana hinihi galenahi tapuhi .
46015040	Yada ginoulihi he memae , po gasi hipuli ginoulihi he memae ma hai didiga tapuhi po tapuhi .
46015041	Ma kabudala galenana tapuna ma wamahiya galenana tapuna , ma ubona galenana tapuna , ma ubona emosi po emosi galenahi tapuhi po tapuhi .
46015042	Naka pite gasi , ata towolo meme galenana ginouli hilahilagena ta guluguluwi , ma ginouli ega ita hilahilage apo ina towolo meme .
46015043	Hinita wopilopilohi he guluguluwihi ma ta towotowolo meme anai didigata . Hinita tapitapiyahi he guluguluwihi ma ta towotowolo meme anai kadidilita .
46015044	Matababana hipuli a hini apo hina guluwi hoi kokowaga ma yada a hini apo ina towolo meme . Hipuli a hini tapuna ma yada a hini tapuna
46015045	mei Yaubada a Buka gilumana i palipaliweleta i pa , ‘ Lawa tahatahayana Adam hinina anai yautuna ’ , ma lawa wiluwagana naka Keliso tauna luyagohana waiyautuna e weleweleta .
46015046	Lawa ata luyagohana ega ita geleta tahaya ma yautu i geleta tahaya apoma ata luyagohana muliyei .
46015047	Babana lawa tahatahayana Yaubada i iwawali naka hipuli dubudubunei ma lawa wiluwagana yadei i hopu mai .
46015048	Adam hipuli dubudubunei i wawala mai yaka tauta gasi hipuli dubudubunei ta wawala mai tamogi Keliso tauna lawa yadei i hopu mai yaka tauta apo mei Keliso po ta wilawa mi yadena .
46015049	Uyahinei galenata mei lawana hipuligei ma tamogi galenatana apo ina buiya po mei Keliso lawa yadei .
46015050	Walewalehiu , ona nugotuhuya hini hipuligei ega emoemotana po Yaubada anani taniwaga ina luiya , matababana hini hipuligei budabudana ma hini yadei apega ina buda .
46015051	O nonoli , baha gowagowadana ma a palipaliwelemi , tauta Keliso a bolu ataputa apega ta hilage ma gehouta apo ta memae ma Yaubada hinita ina wobuinihi .
46015052	Houga anani kokoe uyahina mala emosi himogo hina huweni po Yaubada hinita ina wobui yagiyaginehi po tauhi tu hilahilage anai hini wouwouhi hina towolo meme ma tauta a yaututa hinita apo gasi ina liwounihi .
46015053	Yaka Yaubada apo hinita budabudahi po hilahilagehi ina liwou mehi po hina metuwetuwenai .
46015054	Houga noka uyahina Buka a baha ina limoinena imahiyeya babana i pa , ‘ Apo hilage ina liyababaya ma tauta ta mewahaga ’ .
46015055	‘ Hilage , meka om kadidili ? I kokoe . Hilage , meka om wiyuwa ? I kokoe . ’
46015056	Hilage e ananita ata dewa apapoehi uyahihiyei ma Mose a lugagayo uyahihiyei ata dewa apapoehi ta gagalena tuhagahi .
46015057	Ma ata Guyau Yesu Keliso uyahinei hilage ta kadidili lagoni yaka tana imaamala labatana Yaubada uyahina .
46015058	Walewalehiu , awai a bahebaheya uyahimi naka binei ona towolo momota ma ona kadidili ma houga magomagouna ona ileta imahi Guyau a bagibagi uyahina , babana Guyau a bagibagi anona apo yohola ta tuhagaya .
46016001	Ma ginouli gehouna naka ani'mbenena Yaubada a lawa Yelusalem hai hagu binei . Lolowa mi Galatiya hai ombenena binei a palipaliwelemi naka pite taumi gasi ona dewaya .
46016002	Dalabu emosi po emosi atapumi omi ombenena ona huhouni . Inapa lawa awai om mone ina lata yaka ani'mbenena baneina una houni ma inapa lawa awai om mone ega ina lata yaka ani'mbenena habuluna una houni . Ani'mbenena naka ina nonogo po ina memae ma a lugeletahi .
46016003	Ma houga awai a laugeletahi uyahimi naka lawa gehouhi ona winaganihi po omi ani'mbenena hina niyeya Yelusalem , yaka pepa a gilumi po u nimahi ma hina nae u Yelusalem .
46016004	Ma apo ina linanau yaka tau mitehi to nae Yelusalem .
46016005	Geka hougana ipa a tahaya nae Masedoniya ma apoma a nehi uyahimi
46016006	po naka hotana a wiyagohina . Apo nugote naka hota a meidaodao a sigana houga wayau ina kokoe ma tupo awai a nugotuhuya yaka ona haguwe po a kadau nae uyahihi .
46016007	Ega ata luhogaleya ipa houga kukuna a memae uyahimi ma inapa Guyau u houga ina palihaleya yaka apo ta meidaodao naka hota .
46016008	Ma geka hougana tau u Epeso a memae a sigana Penitikosi tolehana uyahina ma apoma a nehi uyahimi .
46016009	Apega a bulili babana dobu geka uyahina gaogao baneina a tuhagaya Yesu a bagibagi binei , hawena u gawiya he memae ma ega ata genogehi .
46016010	Ma apo Timoti ina nehi uyahimi yaka ona likaohaya po ega ina nugonugodubu , babana tauna e wobagibagi ata Guyau binei mei tau a wobagibagi pite .
46016011	Ega iyai gehouna Timoti ina ihinigigiyeya , ma houga awai ina gunagunawileya yaka ona haguya po anai nugohegoyana ina gunawilena meya , babana walewalehita gehouhi mitehi a ototonihi .
46016012	Walehita Apolo , lolowa a paliweleya ipa walewalehita mitehi hina nehi po i luhinigigai , ma inapa gaogao ina tuhagaya yaka apo ina nehi .
46016013	Ona galena itete memi ma witumagana dumanei ona towolo moomota ma ona kadidili anai nugomotumi .
46016014	Ma omi bagibagi atapuhi uyahihiyei ona lauhogalena memi .
46016015	Sitibeni a manago mitehi amaka o hanapugehi tauhi Keliso tu witumaganena tahatahayahi Giliki u tuponana , tauhi amaka hi palihalena mehi Yaubada tu wiwoiyawena haguhi binei .
46016016	Yaka walewalehiu , taumi hai baha ona wotagoya ma iyawoi nawa Keliso binei mitehi he wobagibagi tauhi hai baha ona wotagoya .
46016017	Geka hougana a kaoha duma babana Sitibeni ma Patuneto ma Akeko amaka hi nei po tauhi mei taumi luhalenami po he laikaohau .
46016018	Naka pite gasi taumi lolowa hi ikaohami yaka geka hougana u kamna hi liwou meya . Naka binei lawa mei tauhi ona iyateyatehi .
46016019	Yaubada a bolu emosi po emosi Asiya tuponanei hai wimaamala uyahimi . Akwila ma Pilisila , tu witumagana hai u numa he tapatapalolo ata Guyau gowanei hai wimaamala uyahimi .
46016020	Walewalehita atapuhi hai wimaamala uyahimi . Winiuyagoyagonagei ona mamala memi .
46016021	Tau geka u wimaamala nimaugei a gilumiyahi .
46016022	Apo iyai Guyau ega ina luhogaleya yaka paliguba ina wialoni . Guyau e nenei .
46016023	Ata Guyau Yesu a lunugotootogo ina melabenimi .
46016024	U luhogala Yesu Keliso gowanei atapumi uyahimi .
47001001	Tau Paulo Yaubada a nugotuhugei a ituwetuwega Yesu Keliso binei . Ma walehita Timoti . Omi gilumana i nenehi naka Yaubada a bolu u Kolinito ubeimi . Ma gasi Yaubada tu wiwoiyawena Giliki tupona atapuna u hinena ubeihi .
47001002	Yaubada Amata po Guyau Yesu Keliso hai lunugotootogo po hai nugodumola hina melabenimi .
47001003	Yaubada tauna Guyau Yesu Keliso Amana ta mamali tauna lunugotootogo a baba . Yaubadana uyahinei wihaguhagu atapuna e nenei ta mamali .
47001004	Tauna ata pilipili atapuhi uyahihi e haguhaguta . Yaka wihaguhagu emosina Yaubada e weleweleta uyahinei apo lawa gehouhi hai pilipili tapuhi po tapuhi ta haguhi .
47001005	Matababana Keliso a wiyuwa magomagouhi u hinehi tauta mitehi yaka gasi Keliso uyahinei Yaubada a wihaguhagu baneina apo ta wialoni .
47001006	Inapa Yaubada a bagibagi binei tona iyuwa yaka naka taumi hagumi po luyagohanami binei to iyuwa . Ma inapa hagu to tuhagaya yaka taumi gasi apo ina hagumi po wiyuwahi emotahi ton'omtaibagibagiyehi po apo ina ikadidilimi po on'omtaibagibagi .
47001007	I witumagana lagona a kadidili uyahimi e mamae , matababana amaka to hanapugeya naka mei i wiyuwa u hinehi o iyuwa naka pite gasi apo hagu tona ialonihi gasi taumi ona wialoni .
47001008	Walewalehiyai , Asiya u tupona pilipili to ialonihi ipa to winugohepami . Witai uyahiyai hi huhounihi naka hi lata po hi witai duma po yautuwe a nugotapiyeya .
47001009	Maya a wiwaya naka amaka mei u hilage hina lueeneya . Tamogi noka i waawala naka ipa ega ana itumaganena meu , ma Yaubada tauna tu hilahilage e itowolihi ipa uyahina a lauwahala .
47001010	Hilage banei dumana uyahinei i luyawahiu po apo ina wiluyagohaniu . Ma u witumagana lagona tauna uyahina a houni po apo ina luyawata meu .
47001011	Taumi gasi ipa lupaliyei ona haguhaguiyai . Yaka apo lupali atapuhi ubeiyai Yaubada ina wimihehi po Yaubada apo ina kawaidewidewiyai , ma lawa boluhi apo ubeiyai ma hina wimaamala tauna uyahina .
47001012	I nugogegae naka gegeka . I winugonugotuhu i bahena idumaluya naka i bagibagi geka hipulina uyahina po gasi ginouli baneina naka i witulatulana taumi mitehi naka tauhi Yaubada a nugotuhu waiwoiyawanei po a baha moinanei i tanitaniwageiyai . Ega tu mehipuli hai nugoholaholagei ma Yaubada a lunugotootogogei .
47001013	Naka binei to yamgilumanehi ega bahagowagowadei ma ipa ona hanapugena pahi .
47001014	Awai to gilugiluma neiyahi to luhogaleya ipa nugonugomi hina lugadagadalihi po ona hanapugeya ega tota koyakoyamemi . Yaka ata Guyau Yesu a iyeta gunawilana meme uyahina apo ona winugogegeiyai mei to nugonugogegemi pite .
47001015	Omi nugogegae a hanapugena dumaya yaka lolowa u wiwogatala ipa a nehi uyahimi mala luwaga po omi kaoha ina lata duma .
47001016	A luhogaleya ipa u nae Masedoniya uyahina a weludadanimi po gasi u gunawilana uyahina a dadana memi . Ma a daadana memi uyahina apo ona haguwe po a kadau nae u Yudeya .
47001017	Geka u wiwogatalana a womoomohi ega tau tu lunugoluwaluwaga . U wiwogatala a dewadewahi ega mei tu mehipuli ginouli emosi binei he lueena ma a dumalu ega .
47001018	Amaka mei Yaubada e bahabaha moina naka pite u paliwitumagana uyahimi . Ega ata lueena ma anona ega .
47001019	Matababana Yaubada Natuna Yesu Keliso , Sailasi po Timoti po tau to guguyeya u hayami naka ega ‘ Ee ’ ma ‘ Eega ’ . Tauna Yaubada a limoina .
47001020	Matababana Yaubada a paliwitumagana atapuhi lueenahi naka Keliso uyahina . Geka binei tauna uyahinei ‘ Moina ’ ta bahebaheya ipa Yaubada ta wiwasewaseya .
47001021	Yaka Yaubada tauna Keliso uyahina e itowolo moomohiyai taumi miteiyai . Ma gasi Yaubada tauna i winaganita po i wotepanita
47001022	po tauna a wekiwekilala uyahita i houni naka Alugona Waiwoiyawana i weleta po u nugonugota mei anani'mbenena tahatahayana . Ma uyahinei ta hanapugeya anani'mbenena gehouhi ubeita i wononogogehi po he iotonana .
47001023	Yaubada a bahebaheya tauna u tu bahamoina , tauna nugonugou hinena i hanapugena pahi naka ega ata koyamemi , ma u nehi u Kolinito a womoomohi babana ipa a hagumi po ega a linugodubumi .
47001024	Awai ipa ona itumaganeya ega tota ileta ipa uyahina to witaniwaga . Matababana to hanapugeya naka omi witumagana uyahihi o towolo momota . Yaka taumi miteiyai ta wobagibagi omi kaoha binei .
47002001	Uyahinei u nugotuhu a dewaya ega ipa a nememahi po a winugodubumi .
47002002	Matababana inapa a winugodubumi naka iyai yagana e memae apo ina winugokaohau ? Lawa tu winugokaohau naka apo a winugodubumi .
47002003	Geka binei ma naka bahana a giluma neiyahi uyahimi . Ega nugonugou ipa a nehi po taumi ipa ona inugokaohau ona winugodubuwe . Matababana a hanapugena dumaya naka u kaoha taumi gasi omi kaoha .
47002004	Ega yaka a'mgiluma mahi anai nugopilipiliu po anai nugowiyuwau po anai matadiligwegweu ma a'mgiluma . Ega ipa a winugodubumi ma ipa u luhogala a lata uyahimi ona hanapugeya .
47002005	Inapa tulami ina linugowiteniu naka ega tau tunawau ita linugowiteniu ma atapumi gasi nugote i liwiteinimi . ‘ Nugote ’ a bahebaheya ega ipa tulami a lipilipili dumaya .
47002006	Ma lawa bolumi o'mboina po wimeihana geka pite lawana o weleweleya naka amaka emoemotana .
47002007	Tamogi ona paligigili ma ona wikadidili po ega ina nugonugodubu lagona po ina pipeu .
47002008	Uyahinei a lupaliyemi ipa omi luhogala tauna binei ona wogeletena meya .
47002009	Geka binei ma a'mgiluma mahi ipa omi wiponawogo a ludadani po a hanapugemi naka moina ginouli tapuhi uyahihi o wiponawogo , bo eega ?
47002010	Iyai gehouna a apapoe ona paligigili yaka tau gasi a paligigili . Ma inapa awai binei ma an'ompaligigila yaka naka Keliso u matana ma a dewaya taumi ubeimi .
47002011	Ma a dewaya ipa Tomodulele ega ina gegelagonita , matababana a nugotuhu amaka ta hanapugehi .
47002012	Hougana u Tolowasi a lugeleta po ipa Keliso tuwegana dewadewana a guguyeya naka Guyau noka hosi u gaogao i hoeya .
47002013	Tamogi nugonugou ega ita yato babana walehita Taitasi a bihena aweya u Tolowasi . Ega yaka a mamalihi ma a nehalehi po a nae u Masedoniya .
47002014	Ma Yaubada ta mamala dumaya babana tauna a weluweluwinagei houga magomagouna Keliso uyahinei ta kadikadidila lagona . Ma tauta uyahitiyei tauna galena tuhagana i gunanohaya po tupo atapuna mei dadi puguna .
47002015	Matababana tauta mei dadi puguna wodewadewana Keliso i'mbeneneya Yaubada uyahina . Naka pugunana e gunanohaya po tu luyagohana po tu hilahilage u hayahi he noonoli .
47002016	Tu hilahilage uyahihi geka pugunana mei ani hilage . Ma tu luyagohana uyahihi geka pugunana tauna luyagohana e neneiyai . Geka binei ma iyai emoemotana apo geka witeihi ina dewahi ?
47002017	Tamogi tauyai emoemotiyai matababana tauyai ega mei lawa gehouhi tauhi Yaubada a baha hi waya po mei ani wigimagimala . Tauyai Yaubada a wihimilana binei tauna u matana nugotuhu moinanei to ibaabani Keliso gowanei .
47003001	Geka bahana gololona mei a wohepa meu , bo ? Ma nugote ega ota hanapugeu , bo ? Tau ega mei tu witoumanemi po nugonugomi palihanahanapu gilumana tau uyahiugei ina nehi uyahimi ma ega tota luhogaleya ipa taumi uyahimiyei ina nei uyahiyai .
47003002	Odubona ma i nei po amalai u palihanahanapu gilumana naka taumi . U nugonugomi a gilumihi po lawa magomagouhi hi hiyawi po hi hanapugeya .
47003003	Ma i lugeletena dumaya naka Keliso tauna geka gilumana i dewaya po tau a lugeleteya lawa u matahi . Tauna ega ani'mgiluma uyahinei it'omgiluma ma Yaubada Lauyagohanana Alugona Waiwoiyanei i'mgiluma . Ma gasi ega ani'mgiluma gaima yawayawatana uyahina it'omgiluma mei Mose a lugagayo ma ani'mgiluma lawa u nugonugomi .
47003004	Geka bahana to baheya babana Keliso uyahinei ma to nugokadidili Yaubada u matana .
47003005	Ega awai gehouna uyahiyai ita memae ipa apo to bahena meiyai naka emoemotiyai apo geka bagibagina to dewaya . Nugokadidili uyahiyai e memae naka Yaubada uyahinei e nenei .
47003006	Tauna i winugokadidiliyai po wogatala wouna to ipaliweleneya . Geka wogatala wouna naka ega lugagayo gilugilumana ma Alugo Woiyawa . Matababana lugagayo gilugilumana naka lawa e ununihi ma Alugo Woiyawa luyagohana lawa e welewelehi .
47003007	Lugagayona naka ani'mgiluma gaimana uyahina hi gilumi po hougana Mose i wiwaya naka hougana Yaubada a kaoha namanamalina i wogeleteya . Hawena Mose tepana yayatana i yababa po i nenae tamogi lugagayona yayatana i wimatatona duma po ega emoemotana ipa mi Isalaela Mose tepana hina gagaleya . Lugagayo a bagibagi u hinena lawa he hilahilage ma hougana i nenei naka i namala dumaya .
47003008	Uyahinei ma Alugo Woiyawa namalina i lagona duma a bagibagi u hinena .
47003009	Ma lugagayo dewana tauna apapoe wigouna e neneiyai naka a namanamalina i nei . Uyahinei ma Alugo Woiyawa tauna kawaidumalu e neneiyai naka apo namalina ina lagona duma .
47003010	Ma amalai namanamalinana tahatahayana galenana mei ega ina namala dumaya babana waimulina namalina i lata duma .
47003011	Matababana inapa wogatala odubona ina yabayababa a namanamalina i nei yaka wogatala memewahagana namalina i lagona duma .
47003012	Tauta ata winugonugotuhu lagona galenana geka pite naka binei to nugomotu duma .
47003013	Tauta ega mei Mose . Tauna kalekogei naona i lugaagali babana a namanamali i habulu po i yabayababa ega ipa mi Isalaela hina galeya .
47003014	Ma nugonugohi hi pupupu babana odubona po amalai naka tauhi kalekona emotana yohola naohi e laugaagali ma houga magomagouna wogatala odubona he hiyahiyawi ma tamogi ega hita hanapugeya . Yaka Keliso tunawana uyahinei apo geka kalekona Yaubada ina wihaleya .
47003015	Ma odubona po amalai , mehougana Mose a lugagayo hina hiyawi naka kalekona yohola nugonugohi e laupupuya .
47003016	Tamogi hougana lawa e lauhagawilena niyeya Guyau uyahina naka , ‘ Yaubada kalekona i wihaleya ’ .
47003017	Ma Guyouna naka tauna Alugo Woiyawa . Ma meka hosi Guyau Alugona e memae naka hosi ega lugagayo bo apapoe a panipani gehouna .
47003018	Uyahinei ataputa ega ata tepalugaagala ma Guyau a wiwasawasa ta woogeleteya . Ma Guyouna naka tauna Alugo Woiyawa yaka e buinita po Keliso galenana waiwasawasana uyahita e lalata .
47004001	Uyahinei geka wiwotagala wouna Yaubada a lunugotootogogei i weliyai yaka ega tota nugotapiya .
47004002	Dewa laugowagowadahi po waitepahinihinimayahi to houna liyehi . Ega dewa koyakoyamagei tota memae po ega Yaubada a baha tota ibagibagi powaya . Ma kawamoina atapunei Yaubada u matana to memae ipa lawa atapuhi hai winugonugotuhu imahi binei to welemeiyai .
47004003	Ma inapa tuwega dewadewana to guuguyeya hina gowadi yaka tu hilahilage tunawahi u matahi i lugowadeya .
47004004	Tauhi ega hita witumagana babana Tomodulele hipuli a taniwaga woapapoena nugonugohi i lipupuhi . Tauna i guduhi po Yayata e lalanihi ega emoemotana hina galena tuhagaya . Yayata naka Yaubada ani galenana Keliso i lugogoni . Tauna tuwega dewadewana Kelisona i iwasewaseya ma yayatana lawa ega hita galena tuhagaya .
47004005	Ega tunawiyai tuwegiyai tota guuguyeya ma Yesu Keliso tauna Guyau tuwegana to guuguyeya . Ma Yesu binei tauyai taumi omi tu bagibagi .
47004006	Matababana Yaubada tauna i baha i pa , ‘ Uguwa u hinena yayata ina yayahi ’ . Ma geka hougana tauna Yaubadana emotana Keliso u tepana Yaubada a wiwasawasa i woogeleteya hanapuna i liyayahi u nugonugoiyai po uyahinei tauyai omi tu bagibagi .
47004007	Tamogi tauyai Yaubada a wasawasa hiniyai tapitapiyahi uyahihi he memae po mei bagi dewadewana nau odubana u hinena . Tauyai ipa kadidili banei dumana to wogeleteya naka ega tauyai galiyei ma Yaubada tauna galinei .
47004008	Houga i dao hi winugopilipiliyai tamogi ega hita tumutumutuiyai . Houga gehouhi to lunugoluwaluwaga tamogi ega tota nugotapiya .
47004009	Houga gehouhi hi wihiniwiyuwaiyai tamogi ega ita nugohaleiyai . Houga gehouhi hi ludubaliyai tamogi ega tota apapoe duma .
47004010	Houga daodaona Yesu binei to hilahilage ipa tauna a luyagohana lawa u hiniyai hina galeya .
47004011	I mae iyeta emosi po emosi u hinehi Yesu binei ma hilage to tutuliyaliyana dumahi . Ma geka u hiniyeina to'mtaibagibagi po ipa Yesu a luyagohana lawa hina galeya .
47004012	Yaka hawena hilage u hineiyai e wobagibagi ma taumi luyagohana o tutuhagaya .
47004013	Yaubada a Buka i baheya i pa , ‘ A baha babana a witumagana ’ . Geka witumaganana emotana uyahiyai binei ma gasi to ibaabani babana to witumagana .
47004014	Ta hanapugeya naka tauna Yaubadana emotana Yesu hilage uyahinei i witowolo meya apo taumi ma tauyai ina witowola meta . Ma ina lugogonita po ta nae tauna u matana .
47004015	Geka atapunana naka taumi bimiyei . Ma Yaubada a lunugotootogo i nohaya bolu po bolu uyahihi po apo Yaubada a wiwasawasa wimaamalana ina lata .
47004016	Yaka apega to nugotapiya . Hawena hiniyai he tapitapiya ma tamogi alugoiyai iyeta emosi po emosi e laiwou meya .
47004017	Ma geka pilipilihi habuluhi houga kukuna u hinena to ialonihi . Apo wiwasawasa baneina po memewahagana ina neneiyai , geka pilipilihi apo ina lata lagonihi .
47004018	Awai ta gagalehi ega uyahihi tota inugonugotuhu duma . Ma awai ega tata gagalehi tauhi uyahihi to inugonugotuhu duma . Matababana awai ta gagalehi naka houga kukuna binei ma awai ega tata gagalehi naka houga tuwetuwenai binei .
